original: bādhanaṭṭhena ca sayaṃ kāmetīti kāmo. Vuttampi cetaṃ “ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena
analyzed: bādhana ṭṭhena ca sayam kāmeti iti kāmaḥ vuttam pi brāhmaṇa rāgena

original: abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi
analyzed: abhibhūtaḥ pariyādinna cittaḥ atta byābādhāya api cetā iti para byābādhāya api cetā iti ubhaya byābādhāya api

original: cetetī”ti ca “ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, pāṇampi hanati, adinnampi ādiyati, paradārampi
analyzed: ceteti iti ca ratto kho brāhmaṇa pāṇampi hanati adinnampi ādiyati paradārampi

original: gacchati, musāpi bhaṇatī”ti ca evamādi nidassanaṃ.
analyzed: gacchati musā api bhaṇati iti ca evamādi nidassanam

original: Tameva paṭiniddesavasena vitthāretvā vattukāmo – “katame vatthukāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: tam eva paṭiniddesa vasena vitthāretvā vattu kāmaḥ katame vatthu kāma ati ādim āha tattha

original: katameti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Pañcavidhā hi pucchā, tāsaṃ vibhāgo upari pāḷiyaṃyeva
analyzed: katamā iti kathā itu kamyatā pucchā pañcavidhā hi pucchā tāsam vibhāgaḥ upari

original: āvi bhavissati. Tāsu ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Tattha manāpikāti manaṃ appāyanti
analyzed: āvi bhavissati tāsu ayam kathā itu kamya tā pucchā tattha manāpikā ati manam appāyanti

original: vaddhentīti manāpā, manāpā eva manāpikā. Rūpāti kammacittautuāhārasamuṭṭhānavasena
analyzed: manāpā manāpā eva manāpikā

original: catusamuṭṭhānikā rūpārammaṇā. Rūpayantīti rūpā, vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānā hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsentīti attho.
analyzed: catu samuṭṭhānikāḥ rūpa ārammaṇāḥ rūpayanti iti rūpāḥ vaṇṇa vikāram āpajjamānāḥ hadayaṅgata bhāvam pakāsenti iti attho

original: Tattha kenaṭṭhena rūpanti? Ruppanaṭṭhena. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
analyzed: tattha kena aṭṭhena rūpanti ruppana ṭṭhena vuttam ha etam bhagavatā

original: “Kiñca, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ vadetha? Ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccati.
analyzed: kiñca bhikkhave rūpam vadetha ruppati iti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati

original: Kena ruppati? Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi
analyzed: kena ruppati sītena api ruppati uṇhena api ruppati jighacchāya api ruppati pipāsāya api

original: ruppati, ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi ruppati. Ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave,
analyzed: ruppati ḍaṃsa makasa vāta ātapa sarīsapa samphassena api ruppati ruppati iti kho bhikkhave

original: tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccatī”ti.
analyzed: tasmāt vuccati iti

original: Tattha ruppatīti kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyati, bhijjatīti attho. Sītena tāva ruppanaṃ
analyzed: tattha ruppati iti kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyati bhijjati iti attho sītena tāva ruppanam

original: lokantarikaniraye pākaṭaṃ. Mahiṃsakaraṭṭhādīsupi himapātasītalesu padesesu etaṃ pākaṭameva.
analyzed: lokantarika niraye pākaṭam mahiṃsa karaṭṭha ādīsu pi hima pāta sītalesu padesesu etam pākaṭam eva

original: Tattha hi sattā sītena bhinnachinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayampi pāpuṇanti.
analyzed: tattha hi sattā sītena bhinna chinna sarīrā jīvita kkhayam pi pāpuṇanti

original: Uṇhena ruppanaṃ avīcimahāniraye pākaṭaṃ. Tattha hi tattāya lohapathaviyā nipajjāpetvā pañcavidhabandhanādikaraṇakāle sattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
analyzed: uṇhena ruppanam avīcimahāniraye pākaṭam tattha hi tattāya loha pathaviyā nipajjāpetvā pañcavidha bandhana ādi karaṇa kāle sattāḥ mahā dukkham anubhavanti

original: Jighacchāya ruppanaṃ pettivisaye ceva dubbhikkhakāle ca pākaṭaṃ. Pettivisayasmiñhi
analyzed: jighacchāya ruppanam petti visaye ca iva dubbhikkha kāle ca pākaṭam petti visayasmin hi

original: sattā dve tīṇi buddhantarāni kiñcideva āmisaṃ hatthena gahetvā mukhe pakkhipantā
analyzed: sattā dve tīṇi buddhantarāni kiñcid eva āmisam hatthena gahetvā mukhe pakkhipantā

original: nāma na honti, antoudaraṃ ādittasusirarukkho viya hoti. Dubbhikkhe kañjikamattampi

original: alabhitvā maraṇasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
analyzed: a labhitvā maraṇa sattānam pamāṇam natthi

original: Pipāsāya ruppanaṃ kālakañjikādīsu pākaṭaṃ. Tattha hi sattā dve tīṇi buddhantarāni
analyzed: pipāsāya ruppanam kālakañjika ādīsu pākaṭam tattha hi sattā dve tīṇi buddhantarāni

original: hadayatemanamattaṃ vā jivhātemanamattaṃ vā udakabindumpi laddhuṃ na sakkonti. “Pānīyaṃ
analyzed: hadaya temana mattam vā jivhā temana mattam vā udaka bindum pi laddhum na sakkonti pānīyam

original: pivissāmā”ti nadiṃ gatānaṃ jalaṃ vālukātalaṃ sampajjati. Mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhantānampi
analyzed: pivissāma iti nadim gatānam jalam vālukā talam sampajjati mahā samuddam pakkhantānam pi

original: samuddo piṭṭhipāsāṇoyeva hoti. Te sussantā balavadukkhapīḷitā viravanti. Ḍaṃsādīhi
analyzed: samuddaḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ yā iva hoti te sussantāḥ balava dukkha pīḍitāḥ viravanti ḍaṃsa ādīhi

original: ruppanaṃ ḍaṃsamakkhikādibahulesu padesesu pākaṭaṃ. Taṃ pana – “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: ruppanam ḍaṃsa makkhikā ādi bahulesu padesesu pākaṭam tam pana katamam tam rūpam

original: sanidassanaṃ? Sappaṭigha”nti ādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
analyzed: ādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritam eva

original: Sappantīti saddā, udāharīyantīti attho. Utucittavasena dvisamuṭṭhānikā saddā. Gandhayantīti
analyzed: sappanti iti saddāḥ udāharīyanti iti attho utu citta vasena dvi samuṭṭhānikā saddāḥ gandhayanti iti

original: gandhā, attano vatthūni sūcayantīti attho. Rasanti te sattāti rasā, assādentīti attho.
analyzed: gandhāḥ attanaḥ vatthūni sūcayanti iti atthaḥ rasanti te sattā ati rasāḥ assādenti iti atthaḥ

original: Phusīyantīti phoṭṭhabbā. Ete gandhādayo catusamuṭṭhānikāva. Tesaṃ vibhāgo abhidhamme vitthāritoyeva.
analyzed: phusīyanti iti phoṭṭhabbāḥ ete gandha ādayo catu samuṭṭhānikāḥ va tesam vibhāgaḥ abhidhamme

original: Tamevatthaṃ vitthāravasena dassento “attharaṇā pāvuraṇā”tiādimāha. Tattha attharitvā
analyzed: tam eva attham vitthāra vasena dassentaḥ attharaṇā pāvuraṇā iti ādim āha tattha attharitvā

analyzed: nipajjiyanti iti attharaṇā sarīram veṭhetvā pārupīyanti iti pāvuraṇāḥ antojāta ādayo cattāro

analyzed: dāsī ca dāso ca dāsi dāsā khettam nāma yasmim pubbaṇṇam ruhati vatthu nāma yasmim

analyzed: vatthu khetta vatthu sīsena ca ittha vāpī taḷāka ādīni pi saṅgahitāni hiraññanti kahāpaṇo

original: Suvaṇṇanti jātarūpaṃ. Tesaṃ gahaṇena lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti sabbepi saṅgahaṃ

analyzed: gacchanti gāma nigama rājadhāniyaḥ ti eka kuṭikā ādi gāmaḥ āpaṇa yuttaḥ nigamaḥ ekassa rañño

analyzed: āṇāpa vatti ṭṭhānam rājadhānī raṭṭhanti janapada eka desam janapadaḥ iti kāsi kosala ādi janapadaḥ

original: Kosoti catubbidho koso – hatthī asso ratho patti. Koṭṭhāgāranti tividhaṃ koṭṭhāgāraṃ

analyzed: dhana koṭṭhāgāram dhañña koṭṭhāgāram vattha koṭṭhāgāram yam kiñci iti anavasesa pariyādāna vacanam

original: Rajanīyanti rañjetuṃ yuttaṭṭhena.
analyzed: rañjetum

analyzed: chattike āha tattha atīta ttike tāva attano sabhāvam uppāda ādi khaṇam vā patvā atikkantā ati

analyzed: atītā tat ubhayam pi na āgatā ati anāgatā tam tam kāraṇam paṭicca uppannā ati paccuppannā

analyzed: idam bhavena paricchannam paṭisandhitaḥ hi paṭṭhāya atīta bhavesu nibbattā anantara bhave

original: vā, sabbe anāgatāyeva nāma. Cutipaṭisandhiantare pavattā kāmā paccuppannā nāma.
analyzed: vā sabbe anāgatāya iva nāma cuti paṭisandhi antare pavattā kāmā paccuppannā nāma

original: Ajjhattattike “evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ attāti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmā”ti iminā viya adhippāyena

analyzed: attānam adhikāram katvā pavattā attanaḥ santāne pavattā pāṭipuggalikā kāmā ajjhattā

analyzed: kāmāḥ nāma tatas bahibhūtā pana indriya baddhāḥ vā an indriya baddhāḥ vā bahiddhāḥ nāma

original: Tatiyapadaṃ tadubhayavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tatiya padam tad ubhaya vasena vuttam

analyzed: hīna ttike hīnā ati lāmakā majjhimā ati hīna paṇītānam majjhe majjhimā avasesā

analyzed: kāmā koṭippattāḥ hīnāḥ nāma te upādāya tiracchānesu nāga supaṇṇānam kāmā paṇītā nāma

analyzed: kāmā paṇītā nāma avasesānam kāmā majjhimā nāma tesam pi hīnā te upādāya jānapadānaṃ

analyzed: janapada sāmikānam kāmā paṇītāḥ nāma tesam paricārikānam kāmāḥ majjhimāḥ nāma tesam pi

original: Okāsattike āpāyikā kāmāti avaḍḍhisaṅkhātesu apagataayesu catūsu apāyesu nibbattakāmā āpāyikā. Manussesu nibbattakāmā mānusikā. Devesu nibbattakāmā dibbā.

analyzed: ajjhāsayam ñatvā parehi nimmite ārammaṇe sevanti iti para nimmita vasa vattīnam kāmā para nimmitā

original: vuttesu kāmāvacaradhammesu pariyāpannā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – uddānato dve kāmā,

original: vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo cāti. Tattha kilesakāmo atthato chandarāgo. Vatthukāmo tebhūmakaṃ

analyzed: vaṭṭam kilesa kāmo ca ittha kāmeti iti kāmo itaro kāmīyati iti yasmin pana padese duvidha upeso

original: vasena ekādasavidho padeso kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaro. Tattha pariyāpannadhamme

original: Tā eva dhātuyo puna bhavapariyāyena vuttā. Bhavantīti hi bhavāti vuccanti. Saññāya

original: yutto bhavo, saññāvataṃ vā bhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo. So kāmabhavo
analyzed: yuttaḥ bhavo saññāvatam vā bhavo saññā vā ettha bhave atthi iti saññābhavo so kāmabhavo

original: ca asaññābhavamutto rūpabhavo ca nevasaññānāsaññābhavamutto arūpabhavo ca hoti.
analyzed: ca asaññā bhava mutto rūpa bhavo ca nevasaññānāsaññā bhava mutto arūpa bhavo ca hoti

original: Na saññābhavo asaññābhavo, so rūpabhavekadeso. Oḷārikattābhāvato nevasaññā, sukhumattena
analyzed: na saññā bhavaḥ asaññā bhavo so rūpa bhava eka deso oḷārika ttā bhāvataḥ na iva saññā sukhuma ttena

original: sabbhāvato nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā, tāya yutto bhavo nevasaññānāsaññābhavo. Atha
analyzed: sabbhāvataḥ na asaññā ati nevasaññā anāsaññā tāya yuttaḥ bhavaḥ nevasaññā nāsaññā bhavaḥ atha

original: vā oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññānāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo,
analyzed: vā oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā nāsaññā asmin bhava iti nevasaññā nāsaññā bhavaḥ

original: so arūpabhavekadeso. Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo, eko vā vokāro, assa bhavassāti
analyzed: saḥ arūpa bhava eka desaḥ ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇaḥ bhavaḥ ekaḥ vā vokāraḥ assa bhavassa ati

original: ekavokārabhavo, so asaññābhavova. Catūhi arūpakkhandhehi vokiṇṇo bhavo, cattāro vā
analyzed: eka vokāra bhavo so asaññā bhavo va catūhi arūpa kkhandhehi vokiṇṇaḥ bhavo cattāro vā

original: vokārā assa bhavassāti catuvokārabhavo, so arūpabhavo eva. Pañcahi khandhehi vokiṇṇo
analyzed: vokārāḥ assa bhavassa ati catu vokāra bhavo so arūpa bhavaḥ eva pañcahi khandhehi vokiṇṇaḥ

original: bhavo, pañca vā vokārā assa bhavassāti pañcavokārabhavo, so kāmabhavo ca rūpabhavekadeso
analyzed: bhavo pañca vā vokārāḥ assa bhavassa ati pañcavokāra bhavo so kāma bhavaḥ ca rūpa bhava eka deso

original: ca hoti. Atītattiko heṭṭhā vuttanayova. Diṭṭhanti catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ca hoti atīta ttikaḥ heṭṭhā vutta nayaḥ uva diṭṭha nti catu samuṭṭhānikam rūpa ārammaṇam

original: Sutanti dvisamuṭṭhānikaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ. Mutanti phusitvā gahetabbāni catusamuṭṭhānikāni

original: gandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇāni. Viññātabbaṃ nāma manasā jānitabbaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ.

original: Tesu diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu. Visaṭā vitthatāti mahantā patthaṭā.
analyzed: tesu diṭṭha suta muta viññātabbesu dhammesu visaṭā vitthatā ati mahantā patthaṭā

original: Apāyaloketi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātassa ayassa abhāvena apāyo, tasmiṃ apāyaloke. Khandhaloketi
analyzed: apāya loka iti vaḍḍhi saṅkhātassa ayassa abhāvena apāyaḥ tasmin apāya loke khandha loka iti

original: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo eva loko. Āyatanaloketi āyatanādīhi kāraṇehi dvādasāyatanāni eva

analyzed: lokaḥ sabbe pi lujjana palujjana ṭṭhena lokaḥ vutta ppakāre loke visaṭā vitthaṭā ati visattikā

original: Satoti saratīti sato, puggalena sati vuttā.
analyzed: sataḥ iti sarati iti sataḥ puggalena sati vuttā

original: Tattha saraṇalakkhaṇā sati. Saranti tāya, sayaṃ vā sarati, saraṇamattameva vā esāti
analyzed: tattha saraṇa lakkhaṇā sati saranti tāya sayam vā sarati saraṇa mattam eva vā

analyzed: sati sā pana esā apilāpana lakkhaṇā asammosana rasā ārakkha paccupaṭṭhānā visaya abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vā, thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā, kāyādisatipaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ārammaṇe daḷhapatiṭṭhitattā
analyzed: vā thira saññā padaṭṭhānā kāya ādi sati paṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānā vā ārammaṇe daḷha patiṭṭhita ttā

original: pana esikā viya, cakkhudvārādīnaṃ rakkhaṇato dovāriko viya ca daṭṭhabbā.

original: Tassā pavattiṭṭhānaṃ dassento “kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato”tiādinā
analyzed: tassā pavatti ṭṭhānam dassento kāye kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam bhāvento sato tiādinā

original: nayena catubbidhaṃ satipaṭṭhānamāha. Tattha kāyeti rūpakāye. Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
analyzed: nayena catubbidham sati paṭṭhānam āha tattha kāya iti rūpa kāye rūpa kāyaḥ hi idha aṅga paccaṅgānam

analyzed: yathā ca samūhaṭṭhena evam āyaṭṭhena

analyzed: saḥ āyo tipi kāyo āyo ti uppatti deso tatra ayam vacana attho āyanti ke āyanti iti

original: Kucchitā kesādayo. Iti kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo.
analyzed: kucchitā kesa ādayaḥ iti kucchitānam kesa ādīnam

original: Kāyānupassanāti kāyassa anupassanā, kāyaṃ vā anupassanā, “kāye”ti ca vatvāpi puna

original: atha kho rathasambhārānupassakassa viya aṅgapaccaṅgasamūhānupassanā, nagarāvayavānupassakassa

original: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;

original: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti

original: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipāta ādi pāpam a karontaḥ hirim samuṭṭhāpeti tathā pāpa kammam nāma etam

original: dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti
analyzed: dubbala jātikānam kammam mādisassa sūra bhāva sampannassa idam kammam kātum na yuttan ti

original: evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā
analyzed: evam sūra bhāvam paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipāta ādi pāpam a karontaḥ hirim samuṭṭhāpeti tathā

original: “pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ. Mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa
analyzed: pāpa kammam nāma etam andha bālānam kammam na paṇḍitānam mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahu sutassa

original: idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto
analyzed: idam kammam kātum na yuttan ti evam bāhusaccam paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipāta ādi pāpam a karontaḥ

original: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: hirim samuṭṭhāpeti evam ajjhatta samuṭṭhānam hirim catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hirim pavesetvā pāpa kammam na karoti evam ajjhatta samuṭṭhānā

original: hirī nāma hoti. Kathaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma? “Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi,
analyzed: hirī nāma hoti katham bahiddhā samuṭṭhānam ottappam nāma sace tvam pāpa kammam karissasi

original: catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi –
analyzed: catūsu parisāsu garaha ppattaḥ bhavissasi

original: “Garahissanti taṃ viññū, asuciṃ nāgariko yathā;
analyzed: garahissanti tam viññū asucim nāgarikaḥ yathā

original: Vajjito sīlavantehi, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasī”ti. –
analyzed: vajjitaḥ sīlavantehi katham bhikkhu karissasi iti

original: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti, evaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: evam paccavekkhantaḥ hi bahiddhā samuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpa kammam na karoti evam bahiddhā samuṭṭhānam ottappam nāma hoti

original: Kathaṃ attādhipati hirī nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
analyzed: katham attā adhipati hirī nāma idha ekaccaḥ kula puttaḥ attānam adhipatim jeṭṭhakam katvā

original: “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutaṅgadharassa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ
analyzed: mādisassa saddhā pabbajitassa bahu ssutassa dhutaṅga dharassa na yuttam pāpa kammam

original: kātu”nti pāpaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ attādhipati hirī nāma hoti. Tenāha bhagavā “so attānaṃyeva
analyzed: pāpam na karoti evam attā adhipatiḥ hirī nāma tena āha bhagavā saḥ attā anaṃyā iva

original: adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ
analyzed: adhipatim karitvā akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti sa avajjam pajahati anavajjam

original: bhāveti, suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
analyzed: bhāva iti suddham attānam pariharati iti

original: Kathaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
analyzed: katham loka adhipati ottappam nāma idha ekaccaḥ kula puttaḥ lokam adhipatim jeṭṭhakam katvā pāpa kammam na karoti yathā āha

original: “Mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso, mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā
analyzed: mahā kho pana ayam loka sannivāsaḥ mahantasmin kho pana loka sannivāse santi samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ

original: iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno, te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti,
analyzed: iddhimantaḥ dibba cakkhukā para citta vidunaḥ te dūratas pi passanti āsannā api na dissanti

original: cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti. Tepi maṃ evaṃ jāneyyuṃ ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ saddhāya
analyzed: cetasā api cittam jānanti te api mama evam jāneyyum passatha bho imam kula puttam saddhāya

original: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
analyzed: agārasmaā anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ vokiṇṇaḥ viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi iti

original: Devatāpi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo, tā dūratopi passanti,
analyzed: devatā api kho santi iddhimantiniyaḥ dibba cakkhukā para citta viduniyaḥ tāḥ dūratas pi passanti

original: āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti. Tāpi maṃ evaṃ jāneyyuṃ ‘passatha bho
analyzed: āsannā api na dissanti cetasā api cittam jānanti tā api mama evam jāneyyum passatha bho

original: imaṃ kulaputtaṃ saddhāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi
analyzed: imam kula puttam saddhāya agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ vokiṇṇaḥ viharati pāpakehi

original: akusalehi dhammehī’ti. So iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ bhavissati
analyzed: akusalehi dhammehi iti saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati āraddham kho pana me vīriyam bhavissati

original: asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: a sallīnam upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam

original: ekagga’nti. So lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ
analyzed: ekagganti saḥ lokam yā iva adhipatim karitvā akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti sa avajjam

original: pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
analyzed: pajahati anavajjam bhāveti suddham attānam pariharati iti

original: Evaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma hoti. “Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ
analyzed: evam loka adhipatiḥ ottappam nāma hoti lajjā sabhāva saṇṭhitā hirī bhaya sabhāva saṇṭhitam

original: ottappa”nti ettha pana lajjāti lajjanākāro, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. Bhayanti
analyzed: ettha pana lajjā ati lajjana ākāraḥ tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitāḥ

original: apāyabhayaṃ, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Tadubhayampi pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ
analyzed: apāya bhayam tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitam ottappam tat ubhayam pi pāpa parivajjane pākaṭam

original: hoti. Ekacco hi yathā nāma eko kulaputto uccārapassāvādīni karonto lajjitabbayuttakaṃ
analyzed: hoti ekaccaḥ hi yathā nāma ekaḥ kula puttaḥ uccāra passāva ādīni karontaḥ lajjitabba yuttakam

original: ekaṃ disvā lajjanākārappatto bhaveyya hīḷito, evameva ajjhattaṃ lajjīdhammaṃ okkamitvā
analyzed: ekam disvā lajjana ākāra ppattaḥ bhaveyya evam eva ajjhattam lajjī dhammaṃ okkamitvā

original: pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Ekacco apāyabhayabhīto hutvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
analyzed: pāpa kammam na karoti ekaccaḥ apāya bhaya bhītaḥ hutvā pāpa kammam na karoti

original: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā hi dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko
analyzed: tatra idam opammam yathā hi dvīsu ayaḥ guḷesu ekaḥ sītalaḥ bhaveyya gūtha makkhitaḥ ekaḥ

original: uṇho āditto. Tattha paṇḍito sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ
analyzed: uṇhaḥ ādittaḥ tattha paṇḍito sītalam gūtha makkhitattā jigucchantaḥ na gaṇhāti itaram

original: ḍāhabhayena. Tattha sītalassa gūthamakkhanajigucchāya agaṇhanaṃ viya ajjhattaṃ lajjīdhammaṃ
analyzed: ḍāha bhayena tattha sītalassa gūtha makkhana jigucchāya a gaṇhanam viya ajjhattam lajjī dhammam

original: okkamitvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, uṇhassa ḍāhabhayena agaṇhanaṃ viya apāyabhayena pāpassa
analyzed: okkamitvā pāpassa a karaṇam uṇhassa ḍāha bhayena a gaṇhanam viya apāya bhayena pāpassa

original: akaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a karaṇam veditabbam

original: “Sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti idampi
analyzed: sappatissava lakkhaṇā hirī vajja bhīruka bhaya dassāvi lakkhaṇam ottappanti idam pi

original: dvayaṃ pāpaparivajjane eva pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā
analyzed: dvayam pāpa parivajjane eva pākaṭam hoti ekaccaḥ hi jāti mahatta paccavekkhaṇā satthu mahatta paccavekkhaṇā

original: dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti catūhi kāraṇehi sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: dāyajja mahatta paccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacāri mahatta paccavekkhaṇā ati catūhi kāraṇehi sa patissava lakkhaṇam

original: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ
analyzed: hirim samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpam na karoti ekaccaḥ attā anuvāda bhayam para anuvāda bhayam daṇḍa bhayam

original: duggatibhayanti catūhākārehi vajjabhīrukabhāvadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
analyzed: duggati bhayanti catūhākārehi ottappam samuṭṭhāpetvā

original: pāpaṃ na karoti. Tattha jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇādīni ceva attānuvādabhayādīni ca
analyzed: pāpam na karoti tattha jāti mahatta paccavekkhaṇa ādīni ca iva atta anuvāda bhaya ādīni ca

original: vitthāretvā kathetabbāni. Evaṃ vuttaṃ sattavidhaṃ balaṃ yassa puggalassa natthi,
analyzed: vitthāretvā kathetabbāni evam vuttam sattavidham balam yassa puggalassa na atthi

original: te kilesā taṃ puggalaṃ sahanti…pe… pariyādiyanti maddantīti.
analyzed: te kilesā tam puggalam

original: Dve parissayāti pākaṭāpākaṭavasena dve eva upaddavā, na ekaṃ, na tīṇi. Te vibhāgato
analyzed: dve parissayā ti pākaṭa apākaṭa vasena dve eva upaddavā na ekam na tīṇi te vibhāgato

original: dassetuṃ “katame pākaṭaparissayā”tiādimāha. Tattha kokāti kekā. Ayameva vā pāṭho.
analyzed: dassetum katame pākaṭa parissayā ti ādim āha tattha koka ati kekā ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ

original: Corāti coriyakammehi yuttā. Māṇavāti sāhasikakammehi yuttā. Katakammāti sandhicchedādikatacorikakammā.
analyzed: corā ati coriya kammehi yuttā māṇavā ati sāhasika kammehi yuttā kata kammā ati sandhi cheda ādi kata corika kammā

original: Akatakammāti taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ nikkhantā. Ettha assūti bhaveyyunti attho. Cakkhurogoti
analyzed: a kata kammā ti tam kammam kātum nikkhantāḥ ettha bhaveyyunti attho cakkhu rogaḥ ti

original: cakkhusmiṃ uppannarogo, rujatīti rogo. Cakkhurogotiādayo vatthuvasena veditabbā.
analyzed: cakkhusmiṃ uppanna rogaḥ rujati iti rogo cakkhu roga uti ādayaḥ vatthu vasena veditabbā

original: Nibbattitapasādānañhi rogo nāma natthi. Kaṇṇarogoti bahikaṇṇarogo. Mukharogoti mukhe
analyzed: nibbatti tapasā ādānam hi rogaḥ nāma natthi kaṇṇa rogo ti bahi kaṇṇa rogaḥ mukha rogo ti mukhe

original: uppannarogo. Dantarogoti dantasūlaṃ. Kāsoti khayarogo. Sāsoti svāso uggārarogo. Pināsoti
analyzed: uppanna rogaḥ danta rogaḥ iti danta sūlam kāso ti khaya rogo sāso ti svāso uggāra rogo pināso ti

original: bahināsikāya rogo. Ḍāhoti abbhantare uppajjanako uṇho. Mucchāti sativissajjanakā.
analyzed: bahi nāsikāya rogaḥ ḍāhoti abbhantare uppajjanakaḥ uṇhaḥ mucchāti sati vissajjanakā

original: Pakkhandikāti lohitapakkhandikā atisāro. Sūlāti āmasūlā kucchivāto. Visūcikāti mahanto
analyzed: pakkhandikā ati lohitapakkhandikā atisāraḥ sūlā ati āmasūlā kucchivātaḥ visūcikā ati mahanto

original: virecanako. Kilāsoti sabalo. Sosoti sukkhanako sosabyādhi. Apamāroti amanussaggāho
analyzed: virecanakaḥ kilāso ti sa balaḥ sosaḥ oti sukkhanakaḥ sosa byādhi apamāro ti a manussa ggāho

original: veriyakkhābādho. Daddūti daddupīḷakā. Kaṇḍūti khuddakapīḷakā. Kacchūti mahākacchu.
analyzed: veriyakkha ābādhaḥ daddūti daddu pīḷakā kaṇḍūti khuddaka pīḷakā kacchūti mahākacchu

original: Rakhasāti nakhehi vilikhitaṭṭhāne rogo. “Nakhasā”tipi pāḷi. Vitacchikāti hatthatalapādatalesu
analyzed: rakhasā ati nakhehi vilikhita ṭṭhāne rogaḥ vitacchikā ati hattha tala pāda talesu

original: hīraṃ hīraṃ katvā phālento uppajjanakarogo. Lohitapittanti soṇitapittaṃ, rattapittanti
analyzed: hīram hīram katvā uppajjanaka rogaḥ lohita pittanti soṇita pittam ratta pittanti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Madhumehoti sarīrabbhantare ukkaṭṭharogo. Vuttañhetaṃ “api ca madhumeho ābādho ukkaṭṭho”ti.
analyzed: vuttam hoti madhumehaḥ iti sarīra bbhantare ukkaṭṭha rogaḥ vuttam ha etam api ca madhumehaḥ ābādhaḥ ukkaṭṭhaḥ ti

original: Aṃsāti arisarogo. Pīḷakāti lohitapīḷakā. Bhagaṃ dālayatīti bhagandalā, vaccamaggaṃ
analyzed: pīḍakā ati lohitapīḍakā bhagam dālayati iti bhagandalā vaccamaggaṃ

original: phāletīti attho. Pittasamuṭṭhānāti pittena samuṭṭhānaṃ uppatti etesanti pittasamuṭṭhānā.
analyzed: phāleti iti attho pitta samuṭṭhānā ti pittena samuṭṭhānam uppatti etesan ti pitta samuṭṭhānā

original: Te kira dvattiṃsa honti. Semhasamuṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Sannipātikāti vātapittasemhānaṃ
analyzed: te kira dvattiṃsa honti semha samuṭṭhāna ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ sannipātikā ati vāta pitta semhānam

original: sannipātena ekībhāvena uppannā. Ābādhaṭṭhena ābādhā. Utupariṇāmajāti utupariṇāmena.
analyzed: sannipātena ekībhāvena uppannā ābādha aṭṭhena ābādhā utu pariṇāma jāti utu pariṇāmena

original: Accuṇhāti sītena uppajjanakarogā. Visamaparihārajāti atiṭṭhānanisajjādinā visamaparihārena
analyzed: sītena uppajjanaka rogā visama parihāra jāti atiṭṭhāna nisajja ādinā visama parihārena

original: jātā. Opakkamikāti vadhabandhanādinā upakkamena jātā. Kammavipākajāti balavakammavipākasambhūtā.
analyzed: jātā opakkamikā ati vadha bandhana ādinā upakkamena jātā kamma vipāka jāti balava kamma vipāka sambhūtā

original: Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ…pe… samphassoti ime pākaṭā eva. Iti vāti evaṃ vā. Ime vuccantīti nigamento āha.
analyzed: sītam samphasso ti ime pākaṭāḥ eva iti vā ati evam vā ime vuccanti iti nigamentaḥ āha

original: Katame paṭicchannaparissayāti apākaṭā acchāditaupaddavā katameti pucchati. Tattha
analyzed: katame paṭicchanna parissayā ati apākaṭā acchādita aupaddavā katamā iti pucchati tattha

original: kāyaduccaritanti pāṇātipātaadinnādānamicchācāracetanā veditabbā. Vacīduccaritanti
analyzed: pāṇa atipāta a dinna ādānam icchā ācāra cetanā veditabbā

original: musāvādapisuṇavācāpharusavācāsamphappalāpacetanā veditabbā. Manoduccaritanti abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo
analyzed: musāvāda pisuṇa vācā pharusa vācā samphappalāpa cetanāḥ veditabbāḥ manaḥ duccaritanti abhijjhā byāpāda micchā diṭṭhiyaḥ

original: veditabbā. Kāye pavattaṃ, kāyato vā pavattaṃ, duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesapūtikattā vā
analyzed: veditabbā kāye pavattam kāyataḥ vā pavattam duṭṭhu caritam kilesa pūtikattā vā

original: duṭṭhu caritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Vacīmanoduccaritesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: duṭṭhu kāya duccaritam vacī manaḥ duccaritesu pi esā iva nayo

original: Kāmīyantīti kāmā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Kāmesu chando kāmacchando. Kāmayatīti vā kāmo,
analyzed: kāmīyanti iti kāmā pañca kāma guṇā kāmesu chandaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmayati iti vā kāmaḥ

original: kāmo eva chando, kāmacchando na kattukamyatāchando, na dhammacchando vā. Kāmataṇhāva
analyzed: kāmaḥ eva chando kāma chandaḥ na kattu kamyatā chandaḥ na dhamma chandaḥ vā

original: evaṃnāmikā. Kusaladhamme nīvaratīti nīvaraṇaṃ, kāmacchando eva nīvaraṇaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: evaṃnāmikā kusala dhamme nīvarati iti nīvaraṇam kāmacchandaḥ eva nīvaraṇam kāmacchanda nīvaraṇam

original: Evaṃ sesesupi. Byāpajjati tena cittaṃ pūtibhāvaṃ upagacchati, byāpādayati vā vinayācārarūpasampattihitasukhādīnīti
analyzed: evam sesesu pi byāpajjati tena cittam pūti bhāvam upagacchati byāpādayati vā vinaya ācāra rūpa sampatti hita sukha ādīni iti

original: vā byāpādo. Thinanatā thinaṃ. Middhanatā middhaṃ, anussāhasaṃhananatā asattivighātatā
analyzed: vā byāpādaḥ thina natā thinam middha natā middham anussāha saṃhanana tā a satti vighāta tā

original: cāti attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhanalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ,
analyzed: ca ati attho thinam ca middham ca thinam iddham tattha thinam anussāhana lakkhaṇam vīriya vinodana rasam

original: saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Middhaṃ akammaññatālakkhaṇaṃ, onahanarasaṃ, līnabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: saṃsīdana paccupaṭṭhānam middham akammañña tā lakkhaṇam onahana rasam līna bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Ubhayampi aratitandīvijambhitādīsu ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānanti.
analyzed: vā ubhayam pi arati tandīvijambhi tā ādīsu a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānam ti

original: Uddhatassa bhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ
analyzed: uddhatassa bhāvaḥ uddhaccam tam a vūpasama lakkhaṇam vāta abhighāta cala jalam viya an avaṭṭhāna rasam

original: vātābhighātacaladhajapaṭākaṃ viya, bhantattapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ pāsāṇābhighātasamuddhatabhasmaṃ
analyzed: vāta abhighāta cala dhaja paṭākam viya bhantatta paccupaṭṭhānam pāsāṇa abhighāta samuddhata bhasmam

original: viya, cetaso avūpasamo ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Cittavikkhepoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: viya cetasaḥ a vūpasamaḥ a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānam citta vikkhepaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ,
analyzed: kucchitam katam kukatam tassa bhāvo kukkuccam tam pacchā anutāpa lakkhaṇam kata akata anusocana rasam

original: vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uddhaccañca
analyzed: vippaṭisāra paccupaṭṭhānam kata akata padaṭṭhānam dāsabyam viya daṭṭhabbam uddhaccam ca

original: kukkuccañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ. Vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā, sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto
analyzed: uddhat ca kukkuccam vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā sabhāvam vā vicinantaḥ

original: etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā, sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, saṃsappanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: etāya kicchati kilamati iti vicikicchā sā saṃsaya lakkhaṇā saṃsappana rasā anicchaya paccupaṭṭhānā

original: anekaṃsaggāhapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānā. Paṭipattiantarāyakarāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: aneka saggāha paccupaṭṭhānā vā a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānā paṭipatti antarāya karā ti daṭṭhabbā

original: Rajjanalakkhaṇo rāgo. Dussanalakkhaṇo doso. Muyhanalakkhaṇo moho. Kujjhanalakkhaṇo
analyzed: rajjana lakkhaṇaḥ rāgaḥ dussana lakkhaṇaḥ doso muyhana lakkhaṇaḥ moho kujjhana lakkhaṇo

original: kodho, caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo vā, āghātakaraṇaraso, dūsanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Upanandhanalakkhaṇo
analyzed: kodho caṇḍikka lakkhaṇaḥ vā āghāta karaṇa rasaḥ dūsana paccupaṭṭhānaḥ upanandhana lakkhaṇo

original: upanāho, veraappaṭinissajjanaraso, kodhānubandhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. Vuttañcetaṃ “pubbakālaṃ
analyzed: upanāhaḥ vera appaṭinissajjana rasaḥ kodha anubandha bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno vuttam ca itam pubba kālam

original: kodho, aparakālaṃ upanāho”tiādi.
analyzed: kodhaḥ apara kālam

original: Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho. Tesaṃ vināsanaraso, tadacchādanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo
analyzed: para guṇa makkhana lakkhaṇaḥ makkho tesam vināsana raso tad acchādana paccupaṭṭhāno yuga ggāha lakkhaṇo

original: paḷāso, paraguṇehi attano guṇānaṃ samīkaraṇaraso, paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: paḷāsaḥ para guṇehi attanaḥ guṇānam samīkaraṇa raso paresam guṇa ppamāṇena upaṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Parasampattikhīyanalakkhaṇā issā, tassa akkhamanalakkhaṇā vā, tattha anabhiratirasā,
analyzed: para sampatti khīyana lakkhaṇā issā tassa akkhamana lakkhaṇā vā tattha an abhirati rasā

original: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Attano sampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ macchariyaṃ, attano
analyzed: tatas vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā attano sampatti nigūhana lakkhaṇam macchariyam attano

original: sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ akkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇa bhāvam akkhamana rasam saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Katapāpapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, tassa nigūhanarasā, tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā. Attano
analyzed: kata pāpa paṭicchādana lakkhaṇā māyā tassa nigūhana rasā tad āvaraṇa paccupaṭṭhānā attano

original: avijjamānaguṇappakāsanalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ, tesaṃ samudāharaṇarasaṃ, sarīrākārehipi
analyzed: avijjamāna guṇa ppakāsana lakkhaṇam sāṭheyyam tesam samudāharaṇa rasam sarīra ākārehi pi

original: tesaṃ vibhūtakaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tesam vibhūta karaṇa paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Cittassa uddhumātabhāvalakkhaṇo thambho, appatissavavuttiraso, amaddavapaccupaṭṭhāno. Karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho, vipaccanīkatāraso, agāravapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: cittassa uddhumāta bhāva lakkhaṇo thambhaḥ appatissava vutti rasaḥ amaddava paccupaṭṭhāno karaṇa uttariya lakkhaṇaḥ sa ārambhaḥ vipaccanīka tā rasaḥ agārava paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno, ahaṃkāraraso, uddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. Abbhuṇṇatilakkhaṇo atimāno, ativiya ahaṃkāraraso, accuddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: uṇṇa ti lakkhaṇaḥ mānaḥ ahaṃkāra raso uddhu māta bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno abbhuṇṇa ti lakkhaṇaḥ atimānaḥ ativiya ahaṃkāra raso accuddhu māta bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Mattabhāvalakkhaṇo mado, madaggahaṇaraso, ummādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
analyzed: matta bhāva lakkhaṇaḥ madaḥ mada gahaṇa rasaḥ ummāda paccupaṭṭhāno pañcasu kāmaguṇesu

original: cittassa vossaggalakkhaṇo pamādo, vossaggānuppadanaraso, sativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānoti
analyzed: cittassa vossagga lakkhaṇaḥ pamādaḥ vossagga anuppada na raso sati vippavāsa paccupaṭṭhāno ti

original: evaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
analyzed: evam imesam dhammānam lakkhaṇa ādīni veditabbāni ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana

original: “tattha katamo kodho”tiādinā vibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: tattha katamo kodhaḥ ti ādinā vibhaṅge vutta nayena iva veditabbo

original: Visesato cettha āmisagiddho attanā alabhanto aññassa lābhino kujjhati, tassa sakiṃ
analyzed: visesato ca ittha āmisa giddhaḥ attanā a labhantaḥ aññassa lābhinaḥ kujjhati tassa sakim

original: uppanno kodho kodhoyeva. Taduttari upanāho. So evaṃ kuddho upanayhanto ca santepi
analyzed: uppannaḥ kodhaḥ kodhaḥ yā iva tad uttari upanāhaḥ saḥ evam kuddhaḥ ca sante pi

original: aññassa lābhino guṇaṃ makkheti “ahampi tādiso”ti ca yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti. Ayamassa
analyzed: aññassa lābhinaḥ guṇam makkheti aham pi tādisaḥ iti ca yuga ggāham gaṇhāti ayam assa

original: makkho ca palāso ca, so evaṃ makkhī palāsī tassa lābhasakkārādīsu “kiṃ imassa iminā”ti
analyzed: makkho ca palāsaḥ ca saḥ evam makkhī palāsī tassa lābha sakkāra ādīsu kim imassa

original: issati padussati, ayamassa issā. Sace panassa kāci sampatti hoti, tassā tena sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ
analyzed: issati padussati ayam assa issā sace pana assa kāci sampatti hoti tassā tena sādhāraṇa bhāvam

original: na sahati, idamassa maccheraṃ. Lābhahetu kho pana attano santepi dose paṭicchādeti,
analyzed: na sahati idam assa maccheram lābha hetu kho pana attanaḥ sante pi dose paṭicchādeti

original: ayamassa māyā. Asantepi guṇe pakāseti, idamassa sāṭheyyaṃ. So evaṃ paṭipanno sace
analyzed: ayam assa māyā asante pi guṇe pakāseti idam assa sāṭheyyam saḥ evam paṭipannaḥ sace

original: pana yathādhippāyaṃ lābhaṃ labhati, tena thaddho hoti amuducitto “na idaṃ evaṃ kātabba”nti
analyzed: pana yathā adhippāyam lābham labhati tena thaddhaḥ hoti amudu cittaḥ na idam evam kātabbanti

original: ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo, ayamassa thambho. Sace pana naṃ koci kiñci vadati “na idaṃ
analyzed: ovaditum a sakkuṇeyyaḥ ayam assa thambho sace pana nam koci kiñci vadati naḥ idam

original: evaṃ kātabba”nti, tena sāraddhacitto hoti, bhākuṭikamukho “ko me tva”nti pasayhabhāṇī,
analyzed: evam kātabbanti tena sa āraddha cittaḥ hoti bhākuṭikamukho kaḥ me pasayha bhāṇī

original: ayamassa sārambho. Tato thambhena “ahameva seyyo”ti attānaṃ maññanto mānī hoti. Sārambhena
analyzed: ayam assa sa ārambhaḥ tatas thambhena aham eva seyyo ti attānam maññantaḥ mānī hoti sa ārambhena

original: “ke ime”ti pare atimaññanto atimānī, ayamassa māno ca atimāno ca. So tehi mānātimānehi
analyzed: ke ime iti pare atimaññantaḥ atimānī ayam assa māno ca atimāno ca saḥ tehi māna atimānehi

original: jātimadādianekarūpaṃ madaṃ janeti, matto samāno kāmaguṇādibhedesu vatthūsu pamajjati,
analyzed: jāti mada ādi aneka rūpam madam janeti mattaḥ samānaḥ kāma guṇa ādi bhedesu vatthūsu pamajjati

original: ayamassa mado ca pamādo cāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ayam assa mado ca pamādaḥ ca ati veditabbam

original: Sabbe kilesāti sabbepi akusalā dhammā. Upatāpanaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena ca kilesā.
analyzed: sabbe kilesā ti sabbe pi akusalāḥ dhammāḥ upatāpana ṭṭhena vibādhana ṭṭhena ca kilesā

original: Kilesapūtikattā duccaritā. Kilesadarathakaraṇaṭṭhena darathā. Antoḍāhādikaraṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: kilesa pūti kattā duccaritā kilesa daratha karaṇa ṭṭhena darathā antoḍāha ādi karaṇa ṭṭhena

original: pariḷāhā. Sadā tāpanaṭṭhena santāpā. Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: pariḷāhā sadā tāpana ṭṭhena santāpā akosalla sambhūta ṭṭhena abhisaṅkharaṇa ṭṭhena

original: ca sabbe akusalābhisaṅkhārā.
analyzed: ca sabbe akusala abhisaṅkhārā

original: Kenaṭṭhenāti kena atthena. Abhibhavanāditividhaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “parisahantīti parissayā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: kenaṭṭhena ati kena atthena abhibhavanāt itividham attham dassetum parisahanti iti parissayā iti ādim āha

original: Parisahantīti dukkhaṃ uppādenti abhibhavanti. Parihānāya saṃvattantīti kusalānaṃ
analyzed: parisahanti iti dukkham uppādenti abhibhavanti parihānāya saṃvattanti iti kusalānam

original: dhammānaṃ pariccajanāya saṃvattanti. Tatrāsayāti tasmiṃ sarīre akusalā dhammā āsayanti
analyzed: dhammānam pariccajanāya saṃvattanti tatra āsayā ati tasmin sarīre akusalāḥ dhammāḥ āsayanti

original: nivasanti uppajjantīti attho. Te parissayāti kāyaduccaritādayo upaddavā. Kusalānaṃ
analyzed: nivasanti uppajjanti iti attho te parissayā ti kāya duccarita ādayaḥ upaddavā kusalānam

original: dhammānaṃ antarāyāyāti upari vattabbānaṃ sammāpaṭipadādito kosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: dhammānam antarāyāya ati upari vattabbānam sammāpaṭipada āditas kosalla sambhūtānam dhammānam

original: antaradhānāya adassanatthāya saṃvattanti. Sammāpaṭipadāyāti sundarāya pasaṭṭhāya
analyzed: antaradhānāya a dassana tthāya saṃvattanti sammāpaṭipadāya ati sundarāya pasaṭṭhāya

original: vā paṭipadāya, na micchāpaṭipadāya. Anulomapaṭipadāyāti aviruddhapaṭipadāya, na paṭilomapaṭipadāya.
analyzed: vā paṭipadāya na micchā paṭipadāya anuloma paṭipadāya ati aviruddha paṭipadāya na paṭiloma paṭipadāya

original: Apaccanīkapaṭipadāyāti na paccanīkapaṭipadāya, apaccatthikapaṭipadāya. Anvatthapaṭipadāyāti
analyzed: apaccanīka paṭipadāya ati na paccanīka paṭipadāya apaccatthika paṭipadāya anvattha paṭipadāya ati

original: atthaanugatāya paṭipadāya, uparūpari vaḍḍhitāya paṭipadāya. Yathā attho, tathā paṭipajjitabbāya
analyzed: attha anugatāya paṭipadāya uparūpari vaḍḍhitāya paṭipadāya yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabbāya

original: paṭipadāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Attatthapaṭipadāyā”tipi pāḷi, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Dhammānudhammapaṭipadāyāti
analyzed: paṭipadāya iti vuttam hoti tam na sundaram dhamma anudhamma paṭipadāya ati

original: dhammo nāma navalokuttaradhammo. Anudhammo nāma vipassanādi. Tassa dhammassa anurūpā
analyzed: dhammo nāma nava lokuttara dhammo anudhammaḥ nāma vipassanā ādi tassa dhammassa anurūpā

original: dhammapaṭipadā dhammānudhammapaṭipadā, tassā dhammānudhammapaṭipadāya.
analyzed: dhamma paṭipadā dhamma anudhamma paṭipadā tassāḥ dhamma anudhamma paṭipadāya

original: Sīlesu paripūrikāritāyāti pātimokkhasīlesu pāripūriṃ katvā ṭhitatāya. Indriyesu guttadvāratāyāti
analyzed: sīlesu paripūri kāri tāya ati pātimokkha sīlesu pāripūrim katvā ṭhita tāya indriyesu gutta dvāra tāya ati

original: “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādinā nayena vuttesu manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu sugopitadvārabhāvassa.
analyzed: cakkhunā rūpam disvā ati ādinā nayena vuttesu mana chaṭṭhesu indriyesu su gopita dvāra bhāvassa

original: Bhojane mattaññutāyāti paṭiggahaṇādīsu pamāṇayuttatāya. Alaṃsāṭakādiṃ muñcitvā mitabhojanatāya.
analyzed: bhojane mattaññu tāya ati paṭiggahaṇa ādīsu pamāṇa yutta tāya alaṃsāṭaka ādim muñcitvā mita bhojana tāya

original: Jāgariyānuyogassāti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehī”ti evamādinā
analyzed: jāgariya anuyogassa ati divasam caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi iti evamādinā

original: nayena pañca jāgaraṇadhamme anuyogassa. Satisampajaññassāti sabbakammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyuttānaṃ
analyzed: nayena pañca jāgaraṇa dhamme anuyogassa sati sampajaññassa ati sabba kammaṭṭhāna bhāvanā anuyuttānam

original: sabbayogīnaṃ sabbadā upakārakassa satisampajaññassa.
analyzed: sabba yogīnam sabbadā upakārakassa sati sampajaññassa

original: Satipaṭṭhānānanti ārammaṇesu okkantitvā pakkanditvā upaṭṭhānato paṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānānaṃ ti ārammaṇesu okkantitvā pakkanditvā upaṭṭhānato paṭṭhānam satiyā eva

original: paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Kāyavedanācittadhammesu panassā asubhadukkhāniccānattākāragahaṇavasena
analyzed: paṭṭhānam sati paṭṭhānam kāya vedanā citta dhammesu pana assā asubha dukkha anicca anatta ākāra gahaṇa vasena

original: subhasukhaniccattasaññāpahānakiccasādhanavasena ca pavattito catudhā pabhedo hoti,
analyzed: ca pavattito catudhā pabhedaḥ hoti

original: tesaṃ catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ.
analyzed: tesam catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam

original: Catunnaṃ sammappadhānānanti padahanti etenāti padhānaṃ, sobhanaṃ padhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ,
analyzed: catunnam sammappadhānānam ti padahanti etena ati padhānam sobhanam padhānam sammappadhānam

original: sammā vā padahanti etenāti sammappadhānaṃ, sobhanaṃ vā taṃ kilesavirūpattavirahato,
analyzed: sammā vā padahanti etena ati sammappadhānam sobhanam vā tam kilesa virūpa tta virahato

original: padhānañca hitasukhanipphādakaṭṭhena seṭṭhabhāvāvahanato, padhānabhāvakaraṇato cāti
analyzed: padhānam ca hita sukha nipphādaka ṭṭhena seṭṭha bhāva āvahanataḥ padhāna bhāva karaṇataḥ ca ati

original: sammappadhānaṃ, vīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uppannuppannānaṃ anuppannuppannānañca catunnaṃ
analyzed: sammappadhānam vīriyassa itam adhivacanam uppanna uppannānam an uppanna uppannānam ca catunnam

original: akusalakusalānaṃ pahānānuppattiuppādaṭṭhitikiccasādhanavasena pavattito panassa catudhā
analyzed: akusala kusalānam pahāna anuppatti uppāda ṭṭhiti kicca sādhana vasena pavattito pana assa catudhā

original: pabhedo hoti, tesaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ.
analyzed: pabhedaḥ hoti tesam catunnam sammappadhānānam

original: Catunnaṃ iddhipādānanti ettha chandavīriyacittavīmaṃsāsu ekeko ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati
analyzed: catunnam iddhipādānan ti ettha chanda vīriya citta vīmaṃsāsu ekekaḥ ijjhati iti id hi samijjhati

original: nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
analyzed: nipphajjati iti atthaḥ ijjhanti vai etāya sattāḥ iddhāḥ vuddhāḥ ukkaṃsa gatāḥ honti iti id hi

original: Paṭhamena atthena iddhiyeva pādoti iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Dutiyena atthena
analyzed: paṭhamena atthena iddhiyā iva pādo ti iddhipādaḥ iddhi koṭṭhāsaḥ ti atthaḥ dutiyena atthena

original: iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo, pādoti patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti attho. Tena hi yasmā uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: iddhiyā pādo ti iddhi pādo pādo ti patiṭṭhā adhigama upāyo ti attho tena hi yasmai upari upari visesa saṅkhātam

original: iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā pādoti vuccati. Tesaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ.
analyzed: iddhim pajjanti pāpuṇanti tasmā pādaḥ ti vuccati tesam catunnam iddhipādānam

original: Sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānanti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti,
analyzed: sattannam bojjhaṅgānan ti bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgā ati bojjhaṅgāḥ idam vuttam hoti

original: yā esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ

original: aññāṇaṃ. Tattha kāmaguṇe assādato manasi karoto anuppanno ca kāmogho uppajjati, uppanno
analyzed: aññāṇam tattha kāma guṇe assādataḥ manasi karotaḥ anuppannaḥ ca kāmoghaḥ uppajjati uppanno

original: ca kāmogho saṃvaḍḍhati. Mahaggatadhamme assādato manasi karoto anuppanno ca bhavogho
analyzed: ca kāma oghaḥ saṃvaḍḍhati mahaggata dhamme assādataḥ manasi karotaḥ anuppannaḥ ca bhava oghaḥ

original: uppajjati, uppanno ca saṃvaḍḍhati. Tebhūmakadhammesu catuvipallāsapadaṭṭhānabhāvena
analyzed: uppajjati uppanno ca saṃvaḍḍhati tebhūmaka dhammesu catu vipallāsa padaṭṭhāna bhāvena

original: anuppanno ca avijjogho uppajjati, uppanno ca saṃvaḍḍhatīti veditabbo. Vuttanayapaccanīkato
analyzed: anuppannaḥ ca avijjoghaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ ca saṃvaḍḍhati iti veditabbaḥ vutta naya paccanīkato

original: sukkapakkho vitthāretabbo.
analyzed: sukkapakkhaḥ vitthāretabbaḥ

original: Appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ paṭipanno kāmoghaṃ, animittavimokkhaṃ paṭipanno bhavoghaṃ, suññatavimokkhaṃ
analyzed: appaṇihita vimokkham paṭipannaḥ kāma ogham animitta vimokkham paṭipannaḥ bhava ogham suññata vimokkham

original: paṭipanno avijjoghañca tareyya. Paṭhamamaggavasena tareyya, dutiyamaggavasena uttareyya,
analyzed: paṭipannaḥ avijjogham ca tareyya paṭhama magga vasena tareyya dutiya magga vasena uttareyya

original: tatiyamaggavasena patareyya, catutthamaggavasena samatikkameyya, phalavasena vītivatteyyāti.
analyzed: tatiya magga vasena patareyya catuttha magga vasena samatikkameyya phala vasena vītivatteyya ati

original: Atha vā “kāmoghavasena tareyya, bhavoghavasena uttareyya, diṭṭhoghavasena patareyya,
analyzed: atha vā kāma ogha vasena tareyya bhava ogha vasena uttareyya diṭṭha ogha vasena patareyya

original: avijjoghavasena samatikkameyya, sabboghavasena vītivatteyyā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
analyzed: avijja ogha vasena samatikkameyya sabba ogha vasena vītivatteyya ati evam eke vaṇṇayanti

original: Garukanti na sallahukaṃ. Bhārikanti bhārabhaṇḍaṃ ettha ṭhapayantīti bhārikaṃ. Udakaṃ
analyzed: garukanti na sat lahukam bhārikanti bhārabhaṇḍam ettha ṭhapayanti iti bhārikam udakam

original: sitvāti udakaṃ siñcitvā. Osiñcitvāti atirekaṃ siñcitvā. Chaḍḍetvāti pātetvā. Lahukāyāti
analyzed: sitvā ati udakam siñcitvā osiñcitvā ati atirekam siñcitvā chaḍḍetvā ati pātetvā lahukāya ati

original: sallahukāya. Khippanti sīghaṃ. Lahunti taṃkhaṇaṃ. Appakasirenevāti nidukkheneva.
analyzed: sallahukāya khippanti sīgham lahunti taṃkhaṇam appa kasirena iva ati nidukkhena iva

original: Pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānanti sakkāyaorato pārabhūtaṃ pāraṃ. Taṇhāvānato nikkhantaṃ
analyzed: pāram vuccati amatam nibbānan ti sakkāya orataḥ pāra bhūtam pāram taṇhā vānataḥ nikkhantam

original: nibbānaṃ kathīyati. Yosoti yo eso. Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabbaṃ nibbānameva.
analyzed: nibbānam kathīyati yosaḥ ti yaḥ esaḥ sabba saṅkhāra samathaḥ tiādi sabbam nibbānam eva

original: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni samanti vūpasamanti, tasmā “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti
analyzed: yasmā hi tam āgamma sabba saṅkhāra vipphanditāni samanti vūpasamanti tasmā sabba saṅkhāra samatha uti

original: vuccati. Yasmā cetaṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti, sabbā taṇhā khīyanti,
analyzed: vuccati yasmai cetaṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayaḥ paṭinissaṭṭhāḥ honti sabbā taṇhā khīyanti

original: sabbe kilesarajjā virajjanti, sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā “sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo,
analyzed: sabbe kilesa rajjāḥ virajjanti sabbam dukkham nirujjhati tasmā sabba upadhi paṭinissaggo

original: taṇhakkhayo, virāgo, nirodho”ti vuccati. Yā panesā taṇhā bhavena bhavaṃ, phalena
analyzed: taṇhā khayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodho ti vuccati yā pana esā taṇhā bhavena bhavam phalena

original: vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati, tato nikkhantaṃ vānatoti
analyzed: vā saddhim kammam vinati saṃsibbati iti katvā vānanti vuccati tatas nikkhantam vānato ti

original: nibbānaṃ. Pāraṃ gaccheyya nimittavasena ekato vuṭṭhānagotrabhuñāṇena nibbānapāraṃ
analyzed: nibbānam pāram gaccheyya nimitta vasena ekatas vuṭṭhāna gotra bhuñāṇena nibbāna pāram

original: pāpuṇeyya. Adhigaccheyya nimittapavattehi ubhatovuṭṭhānamaggañāṇena nibbānapāraṃ
analyzed: pāpuṇeyya adhigaccheyya nimitta pavattehi ubhatas vuṭṭhāna magga ñāṇena nibbāna pāram

original: visesena pāpuṇeyya. Phuseyya nibbānārammaṇaphalacittavasena nibbānapāraṃ phuseyya.
analyzed: visesena pāpuṇeyya phuseyya nibbāna ārammaṇa phala citta vasena nibbāna pāram phuseyya

original: Sacchikareyya guṇavasena phusitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena nibbānapāraṃ paccakkhaṃ kareyya.
analyzed: sacchikareyya guṇa vasena phusitvā paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇena nibbāna pāram paccakkham kareyya

original: Atha vā “paṭhamamaggena pāraṃ gaccheyya, dutiyena adhigaccheyya, tatiyena phuseyya,
analyzed: atha vā paṭhama maggena pāram gaccheyya dutiyena adhigaccheyya tatiyena phuseyya

original: catutthena sacchi kareyyā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Yopi pāraṃ gantukāmoti yo koci vipassanāñāṇe
analyzed: catutthena sacchi kareyya iti evam eke vaṇṇayanti yaḥ api pāram gantu kāmo ti yaḥ koci vipassanā ñāṇe

original: ṭhito puggalo nibbānapāraṃ gantukāmo, sopi avassaṃ tattha gamissatīti pāragū. Vuttañhetaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ puggalaḥ nibbāna pāram gantu kāmo saḥ api avassam tattha gamissati iti pāragū vuttam ha etam

original: – “otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehī”tiādi.
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi itiādi

original: Pubbabhāge ajjhāsayavasena vipassanāyogena ca, sopi pāragū nāma. Yopi pāraṃ gacchatīti
analyzed: pubba bhāge ajjhāsaya vasena vipassanā yogena ca saḥ api pāragū nāma yaḥ api pāram gacchati iti

original: yopi maggasamaṅgī nibbānapāraṃ gacchati, sopi pāragū nāma. Yopi pāraṃ gatoti yopi
analyzed: yaḥ api magga samaṅgī nibbāna pāram gacchati saḥ api pāragū nāma yaḥ api pāram gataḥ iti yaḥ api

original: maggena kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā phale ṭhito nibbānapāraṅgato, sopi pāragū nāma.
analyzed: maggena kiccam niṭṭhāpetvā phale ṭhitaḥ nibbāna pāraṅgato saḥ api pāragū nāma

original: Taṃ jinavacanena dassetuṃ “vuttampi hetaṃ bhagavatā – tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati
analyzed: tam jina vacanena dassetum vuttam api ha itam bhagavatā pāraṅgataḥ thale tiṭṭhati

original: brāhmaṇo”tiādimāha. Abhiññāpāragūti adhigatena ñāṇena ñātapariññāya nibbānapāraṃ
analyzed: brāhmaṇa uti ādim āha abhiññā pāragū ti adhigatena ñāṇena ñāta pariññāya nibbāna pāram

original: gantukāmo gacchati, gatoti pāragū. Pariññāpāragūti sabbadhammānaṃ tīraṇapariññāya
analyzed: gantu kāmaḥ gacchati gataḥ iti pāragū pariññā pāragū ti sabba dhammānam tīraṇa pariññāya

original: samatikkamitvā vuttanayena pāragū. Pahānapāragūti samudayapakkhikānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānapariññāya
analyzed: samatikkamitvā vutta nayena pāragū pahāna pāragū ti samudaya pakkhikānam kilesānam pahāna pariññāya

original: samatikkamitvā vuttanayena pāragū. Yo hi sabbadhammaṃ parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi
analyzed: samatikkamitvā vutta nayena pāragū yaḥ hi sabba dhammam parijānāti saḥ tīhi pariññāhi

original: parijānāti ñātapariññāya tīraṇapariññāya pahānapariññāyāti. Tattha katamā ñātapariññā?
analyzed: parijānāti ñāta pariññāya tīraṇa pariññāya pahāna pariññāya ati tattha katamā ñāta pariññā

original: Sabbadhammaṃ jānāti “ime ajjhattikā, ime bāhirā, idamassa lakkhaṇaṃ, imāni rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti,
analyzed: sabba dhammam jānāti ime ajjhattikāḥ ime bāhirāḥ idam assa lakkhaṇam imāni rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni iti

original: ayaṃ ñātapariññā. Katamā tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā labbhamānavasena sabbadhammaṃ
analyzed: ayam ñāta pariññā katamā tīraṇa pariññā evam ñātam katvā labbhamāna vasena sabba dhammam

original: tīreti “aniccato dukkhato rogato”tiādinā, ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā. Katamā pahānapariññā?
analyzed: tīre ti aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ rogato ti ādinā ayam tīraṇa pariññā katamā pahāna pariññā

original: Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena dhammesu chandarāgaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ pahānapariññāti. Imā
analyzed: evam tīrayitvā agga maggena dhammesu chanda rāgam pajahati ayam pahāna pariññā ati imā

original: pariññāyo sandhāya “so abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū”ti āha.
analyzed: sandhāya saḥ abhiññā pāragū pariññā pāragū pahāna pāragū ti āha

original: Bhāvanāpāragūti bhāvanāya koṭiṃ patvā maggavasena nibbānapāraṃ gato. Sacchikiriyāpāragūti
analyzed: bhāvanā pāragū ti bhāvanāya koṭim patvā magga vasena nibbāna pāram gataḥ sacchikiriyā pāragū ti

original: phalanibbānavasena sacchi kiriyāphalanibbānapāraṃ gato. Samāpattipāragūti aṭṭhannaṃ
analyzed: phala nibbāna vasena sacchi kiriyā phala nibbāna pāram gataḥ samāpatti pāragū ti aṭṭhannam

original: samāpattīnaṃ pāraṃ patto. Sabbadhammānanti pañcakkhandhādisabbadhammānaṃ. Sabbadukkhānanti
analyzed: samāpattīnam pāram pattaḥ sabba dhammānam ti pañca kkhandha ādi sabba dhammānam sabba dukkhānam ti

original: jātidukkhādisabbadukkhānaṃ. Sabbakilesānanti kāyaduccaritādisabbakilesānaṃ. Ariyamaggānanti
analyzed: jāti dukkha ādi sabba dukkhānam sabba kilesānam ti kāya duccarita ādi sabba kilesānam ariya maggānam ti

original: sotāpattimaggādicatunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ. Nirodhassāti nibbānassa. Sabbasamāpattīnanti
analyzed: sotāpatti magga ādi catunnam ariya maggānam nirodhassa ati nibbānassa sabba samāpattīnam

original: sabbāsampi aṭṭhannaṃ rūpārūpasamāpattīnaṃ. Soti so ariyo. Vasippattoti vasībhāvappatto.
analyzed: sabbāsam pi aṭṭhannam rūpa arūpa samāpattīnam saḥ ti so ariyaḥ vasi patto ti vasībhāva ppatto

original: Atha vā kantabhāvaṃ issariyabhāvaṃ nipphannabhāvaṃ patto. Pāramippattoti pāramīti
analyzed: atha vā kanta bhāvam issariya bhāvam nipphanna bhāvam patto pārami patto ti pāramī iti

original: avasānaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ, uttamabhāvaṃ vā taṃ patto. Kattha pattoti āha “ariyasmiṃ sīlasmi”ntiādi.
analyzed: avasānam niṭṭhānam uttama bhāvam vā tam patto kattha patto ti āha ariyasmin sīlasmin tiādi

original: Tattha ariyasmiṃ sīlasminti niddose sīlasmiṃ. Ariyasmiṃ samādhisminti niddose samādhismiṃ.
analyzed: tattha ariyasmin sīlasmin ti niddose sīlasmin ariyasmin samādhismin ti niddose samādhismin

original: Ariyāya paññāyāti niddosāya paññāya. Ariyāya vimuttiyāti niddosāya phalavimuttiyā.
analyzed: ariyāya paññāya ati niddosāya paññāya ariyāya vimuttiyā ati niddosāya phala vimuttiyā

original: Purimena vācākammantājīvā gahitā, dutiyena vāyāmasatisamādhayo gahitā, tatiyena vitakkasammādiṭṭhiyo
analyzed: purimena vācā kammanta ājīvāḥ gahitāḥ dutiyena vāyāma sati samādhayaḥ gahitā tatiyena vitakka sammādiṭṭhiyo

original: gahitā, catutthena taṃsampayuttā sesadhammā gahitāti veditabbā.
analyzed: gahitā catutthena tad sampayuttā sesa dhammā gahitā ati veditabbā

original: Antagatoti maggena saṅkhāralokantaṃ gato. Antappattoti tameva lokantaṃ phalena patto.
analyzed: anta gataḥ ti maggena saṅkhāra loka antam gataḥ anta patto ti tam eva loka antam phalena patto

original: Koṭigatoti maggena saṅkhārakoṭiṃ gato. Koṭippattoti tameva koṭiṃ phalena patto. Pariyantagatoti
analyzed: koṭi gataḥ ti maggena saṅkhāra koṭim gataḥ koṭippatto ti tam eva koṭim phalena patto pariyanta gataḥ ti

original: maggena khandhāyatanādilokapariyantaṃ paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā gato. Pariyantappattoti
analyzed: maggena khandha āyatana ādi loka pariyantam paricchedam parivaṭumam katvā gataḥ pariyanta ppatto ti

original: tameva lokaṃ phalena pariyantaṃ katvā patto. Vosānagatoti maggena avasānaṃ gato.
analyzed: tam eva lokam phalena pariyantam katvā pattaḥ vosāna gataḥ ti maggena avasānam gataḥ

original: Vosānappattoti phalena avasānaṃ patto. Tāṇagatoti maggena tāyanaṃ gato. Tāṇappattoti
analyzed: vosāna patto ti phalena avasānam patto tāṇa gataḥ ti maggena tāyanam gataḥ tāṇa patto ti

original: phalena tāyanaṃ patto. Leṇagatoti maggena nilīyanaṃ gato. Leṇappattoti taṃ phalena
analyzed: phalena tāyanam patto leṇa gato ti maggena nilīyanam gataḥ leṇa ppatto ti tam phalena

original: nilīyanaṃ patto. Saraṇagatoti maggena patiṭṭhaṃ gato. Saraṇappattoti phalena saraṇaṃ
analyzed: nilīyanam patto saraṇa gato ti maggena patiṭṭham gato saraṇa ppatto ti phalena saraṇam

original: patto. Abhayagatoti maggena nibbhayaṃ gato. Abhayappattoti phalena nibbhayaṃ nibbānaṃ
analyzed: pattaḥ abhaya gataḥ iti maggena nibbhayam gataḥ abhaya ppattaḥ iti phalena nibbhayam nibbānam

original: patto. Accutagatoti cutivirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ maggena gato. Accutappattoti taṃ phalena
analyzed: pattaḥ accuta gataḥ ti cuti virahitam nibbānam maggena gataḥ accuta ppatto ti tam phalena

original: patto. Amatagatoti maraṇarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ maggena gato. Amatappattoti taṃ phalena
analyzed: pattaḥ amatagataḥ ti maraṇa rahitam nibbānam maggena gataḥ amata ppatto ti tam phalena

original: patto. Nibbānagatoti taṇhāvānato nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ maggena gato. Nibbānappattoti
analyzed: pattaḥ nibbāna gataḥ ti taṇhā vānataḥ nikkhantam nibbānam maggena gataḥ nibbāna ppatto ti

original: tameva phalena patto. So vuṭṭhavāsoti so arahā dasasu ariyavāsesu vasi parivasi vuṭṭho
analyzed: tam eva phalena patto saḥ vuṭṭhavāsaḥ ti so arahā dasasu ariya vāsesu vasi parivasi vuṭṭhaḥ

original: vuṭṭhāti ca vuṭṭhavāso. Ciṇṇacaraṇoti sīlena saha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasīti
analyzed: vuṭṭhā ati ca vuṭṭha vāso ciṇṇa caraṇo ti sīlena saha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu

original: ciṇṇacaraṇo. Gataddhoti saṃsāraddhānaṃ atikkanto. Gatadisoti supinantenapi agatapubbaṃ
analyzed: ciṇṇa caraṇaḥ gataddhaḥ ti saṃsāraddhānam atikkantaḥ gata disaḥ iti supin antena api a gata pubbam

original: nibbānadisaṃ gato. Gatakoṭikoti anupādisesanibbānakoṭiṃ gato hutvā ṭhito. Pālitabrahmacariyoti
analyzed: nibbāna disam gataḥ gata koṭiko ti anupādisesa nibbāna koṭim gataḥ hutvā ṭhitaḥ pālita brahmacariyaḥ ti

original: rakkhitabrahmacariyo. Uttamadiṭṭhippattoti uttamaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ patto. Paṭividdhākuppoti
analyzed: rakkhita brahmacariyaḥ uttama diṭṭhi patto ti uttamam sammādiṭṭhim patto paṭividdha akuppaḥ ti

original: akuppaṃ acalanaṃ arahattaphalaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito. Sacchikatanirodhoti nirodhaṃ
analyzed: akuppam acalanam arahatta phalam paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaḥ sacchikata nirodho ti nirodham

original: nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā ṭhito.
analyzed: nibbānam sacchikatvā ṭhitaḥ

original: Dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātanti tividhaṃ dukkhaṃ tena samatikkamitvā paricchinnaṃ. Abhiññeyyanti
analyzed: dukkham tassa pariññātanti tividham dukkham tena samatikkamitvā paricchinnam abhiññeyyanti

original: sabhāvalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena sobhanena ākārena jānitabbaṃ. Abhiññātanti adhikena
analyzed: sabhāva lakkhaṇa avabodha vasena sobhanena ākārena jānitabbam abhiññātanti adhikena

original: ñāṇena ñātaṃ. Pariññeyyanti sāmaññalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena kiccasamāpannavasena ca
analyzed: ñāṇena ñātam pariññeyyanti sāmañña lakkhaṇa avabodha vasena kicca samāpanna vasena ca

original: byāpitvā parijānitabbaṃ. Pariññātanti samantato ñātaṃ. Bhāvetabbanti vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
analyzed: byāpitvā parijānitabbam pariññātanti samantataḥ ñātam bhāvetabbam nti vaḍḍhetabbam

original: Sacchikātabbanti paccakkhaṃ kātabbaṃ. Duvidhā hi sacchikiriyā paṭilābhasacchikiriyā
analyzed: sacchikātabbanti paccakkham kātabbam duvidhā hi sacchikiriyā paṭilābha sacchikiriyā

original: ārammaṇasacchikiriyā cāti.
analyzed: ārammaṇa sacchikiriyā ca ati

original: Ukkhittapalighoti ettha palighoti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā. Ayañhi dukkhipanaṭṭhena “paligho”ti
analyzed: ukkhitta paligho ti ettha palighaḥ ti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā ayam hi dukkhipana ṭṭhena palighaḥ ti

original: vuccati. Tenesa tassā ukkhittattā “ukkhittapaligho”ti vutto. Saṃkiṇṇaparikhoti parikhā
analyzed: vuccati tena isa tassā ukkhitta ttā ukkhitta palighaḥ ti vutto saṃkiṇṇa parikho ti parikhā

original: vuccati punabbhavadāyako bhavesu jāyanavasena ceva saṃsaraṇavasena ca “jātisaṃsāro”ti
analyzed: vuccati punabbhava dāyakaḥ bhavesu jāyana vasena ca iva saṃsaraṇa vasena ca jāti saṃsāraḥ ti

original: laddhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakkhandhānaṃ paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro. So hi punappunaṃ uppattikaraṇavasena
analyzed: laddha nāmānam punabbhava kkhandhānam paccayaḥ kamma abhisaṅkhāro so hi punappunam uppatti karaṇa vasena

original: parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā “parikhā”ti vuccati. Tenesa tassā saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā “saṃkiṇṇaparikho”ti
analyzed: parikkhipitvā ṭhita ttā parikhā ati vuccati tena isa tassā saṃkiṇṇa ttā vikiṇṇa ttā saṃkiṇṇa parikhā ti

original: vutto. Abbūḷhesikoti esikāti vaṭṭamūlikā taṇhā. Ayañhi gambhīrānugataṭṭhena “esikā”ti
analyzed: vuttaḥ abbūḷhesiko ti esikā ati vaṭṭamūlikā taṇhā ayam hi gambhīra anugata ṭṭhena esikā ti

original: vuccati. Tenesa tassā abbūḷhattā luñcitvā chaḍḍitattā “abbūḷhesiko”ti vuccati. Niraggaḷoti
analyzed: vuccati tena isa tassāḥ abbūḷha ttā luñcitvā chaḍḍita ttā abbūḷhesikaḥ ti vuccati niraggaḷaḥ ti

original: aggaḷaṃ vuccanti orambhāgajanakāni kāmabhave uppattipaccayāni orambhāgiyāni. Etāni
analyzed: aggaḷam vuccanti orambhāga janakāni kāma bhave uppatti paccayāni orambhāgiyāni etāni

original: hi mahākavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā “aggaḷa”nti vuccanti.

original: Tenesa tesaṃ niraggaḷattā bhinnattā “niraggaḷo”ti vutto. Ariyoti nikkileso parisuddho.
analyzed: tena isa tesam niraggaḷa ttā bhinna ttā niraggaḷaḥ iti vuttaḥ ariyaḥ ti nikkilesaḥ parisuddho

original: Pannaddhajoti pātitamānaddhajo. Pannabhāroti khandhabhārakilesabhāraabhisaṅkhārabhārapañcakāmaguṇabhārā
analyzed: pannaddhajā iti pātita mānaddhajā pannabhārā iti khandha bhāra kilesa bhāra abhisaṅkhāra bhāra pañca kāmaguṇa bhārā

original: pannā oropitā assāti pannabhāro. Api ca idha mānabhārasseva oropitattā “pannabhāro”ti
analyzed: pannā oropitā assa ati panna bhāraḥ api ca idha māna bhārassa iva oropita ttā panna bhāraḥ iti

original: adhippeto. Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto. Idha pana mānayogeneva
analyzed: adhippetaḥ visaṃyuttaḥ ti catūhi yogehi sabba kilesehi ca visaṃyuttaḥ idha pana māna yogena iva

original: visaṃyuttattā “visaṃyutto”ti adhippeto.
analyzed: visaṃyutta ttā visaṃyuttaḥ ti adhippeto

original: Ettāvatā therena maggena kilese khepetvā nirodhasayanavaragatassa khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ettāvatā therena maggena kilese khepetvā nirodha sayana vara gatassa khīṇāsavassa nibbāna ārammaṇam

original: phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharaṇakālo dassito. Yathā hi dve nagarāni ekaṃ coranagaraṃ,
analyzed: phala samāpattim appetvā viharaṇa kālaḥ dassitaḥ yathā hi dve nagarāni ekam cora nagaram

original: ekaṃ khemanagaraṃ. Atha ekassa mahāyodhassa evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya “yāvimaṃ coranagaraṃ
analyzed: ekam khema nagaram atha ekassa mahā yodhassa evam icchā uppajjeyya yāva imam cora nagaram

original: tiṭṭhati, tāva khemanagaraṃ bhayato na muccati. Coranagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti
analyzed: tiṭṭhati tāva khema nagaram bhayataḥ na muccati cora nagaram a nagaram karissāmi iti

original: sannāhaṃ katvā khaggaṃ gahetvā coranagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nagaradvāre ussāpite esikatthambhe

original: khaggena chinditvā saddhiṃ dvārabāhāhi kavāṭaṃ bhinditvā palighaṃ ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ
analyzed: khaggena chinditvā saddhim dvāra bāhāhi kavāṭam bhinditvā paligham ukkhipitvā pākāram

analyzed: bhuñjeyya evam cora nagaram viya sakkāyaḥ khema nagaram viya nibbānam mahā yodhaḥ viya

original: yogāvacaro. Tassevaṃ hoti “yāva sakkāyavaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭati, tāva dvattiṃsakammakāraṇehi
analyzed: yogāvacaro tassa ivam hoti yāva sakkāyavaṭṭam vaṭṭati tāva dvattiṃsa kamma kāraṇehi

original: aṭṭhanavutirogehi pañcavīsatimahabbhayehi ca parimuccanaṃ natthī”ti. So mahāyodho
analyzed: aṭṭhanavuti rogehi pañcavīsati mahā bhayehi ca parimuccanam natthi iti saḥ mahā yodhaḥ

original: viya sannāhaṃ sīlasannāhaṃ katvā paññātiṇhakhaggaṃ gahetvā khaggena esikatthambhe
analyzed: viya sannāham sīla sannāham katvā paññā tiṇha khaggam gahetvā khaggena esikatthambhe

original: viya arahattamaggena taṇhesikaṃ chinditvā, so yodho sadvārabāhakaṃ nagarakavāṭaṃ

original: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃkiṇṇaparikho hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobhaviko jātisaṃsāro pahīno hoti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃkiṇṇaparikho hoti.

original: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbūḷhesiko hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbūḷhesiko hoti.

original: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niraggaḷo hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niraggaḷo hoti.

original: Pañcaṅgavippahīnoti kāmacchandādipañcaṅgāni vividhehi upāyehi pajahitvā ṭhito. Vuttañhetaṃ –

analyzed: hoti byāpādaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti thinam iddham pahīnam hoti uddhacca kukkuccam pahīnam hoti

analyzed: vicikicchā pahīnā hoti evam kho āvuso bhikkhu pañcaṅga vippahīnaḥ hoti iti

analyzed: disvā na iva sumanaḥ hoti na dummanaḥ upekkhakaḥ viharati sataḥ sampajāno sotena saddam

original: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.

original: Ekārakkhoti satiārakkhena eko uttamo ārakkho assāti ekārakkho. Vuttañhetaṃ –

original: Paṇunnapaccekasaccoti “idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni paṇunnāni nihaṭāni pahīnāni assāti paṇunnapaccekasacco.

original: Samavayasaṭṭhesanoti ettha avayāti anūnā. Saṭṭhāti vissaṭṭhā. Sammā avayā saṭṭhā
analyzed: ettha avayā ati anūnā saṭṭhā ati vissaṭṭhā sammā avayā saṭṭhā

original: esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano. Sammā vissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho. Kevalīti paripuṇṇo.
analyzed: esanā assa ati sama vaya saṭṭha esano sammā vissaṭṭha sabba esano ti attho kevalī iti paripuṇṇo

original: Vusitavāti vusitabrahmacariyo, garusaṃvāse ariyamaggepi dasasu ariyavāsesupi vusitavanto.
analyzed: vusitavāti vusita brahmacariyaḥ garu saṃvāse ariya magge pi dasasu ariya vāsesu pi vusitavanto

original: Uttamapurisoti khīṇakilesattā visesapuriso ājaññapuriso. Paramapurisoti uttamapuriso,
analyzed: uttama puriso ti khīṇa kilesa ttā visesa purisaḥ ājañña purisaḥ parama purisaḥ ti uttama purisaḥ

analyzed: paramam vā paṭilābham pattattā uttamam pattabbam arahatta paṭilābham patto anuttara puññakkhetta bhūto

original: uttamapuriso, tenevatthena paramapuriso. Anuttaraṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ amataṃ
analyzed: uttama purisaḥ tena ivatthena parama purisaḥ anuttaram samāpattim samāpajjitum amatam

original: paṭilābhaṃ pattattā paramapattippatto. Atha vā “gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ sañjānitvā sāsanapavisanavasena
analyzed: paṭilābham pattattā parama patti ppattaḥ atha vā ghara āvāse ādīnavam sañjānitvā sāsana pavisana vasena

original: uttamapuriso. Attabhāve ādīnavaṃ sañjānitvā vipassanāpavisanavasena paramapuriso.
analyzed: uttama purisaḥ atta bhāve ādīnavam sañjānitvā vipassanā pavisana vasena parama purisaḥ

original: Kilese ādīnavaṃ sañjānitvā ariyabhūmantaraṃ paviṭṭho paramapattippattoti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
analyzed: kilese ādīnavam sañjānitvā ariya bhūmantaram paviṭṭhaḥ parama patti patto ti evam eke vaṇṇayanti

original: Nevācinatīti kusalākusalānaṃ pahīnattā tesaṃ vipākaṃ na vaḍḍheti. Nāpacinatīti phale
analyzed: na iva ācinati iti kusala akusalānam pahīna ttā tesam vipākam na vaḍḍheti na apacinati iti phale

original: ṭhitattā na viddhaṃseti. Apacinitvā ṭhitoti paṭippassaddhipahāne ṭhitattā kilese
analyzed: ṭhita ttā na apacinitvā ṭhitaḥ ti paṭippassaddhi pahāne ṭhita ttā kilese

original: viddhaṃsetvā ṭhito. Ito paraṃ tīhipi padehi maggaphalavaseneva yojetabbaṃ. Neva pajahatīti
analyzed: viddhaṃsetvā ṭhitaḥ itas param tīhi pi padehi magga phala vasena iva yojetabbam na iva pajahati iti

original: pahātabbābhāvena kilese na pajahati. Na upādiyatīti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gahetabbābhāvato
analyzed: pahātabba abhāvena kilese na pajahati na upādiyati iti taṇhā māna diṭṭhīhi gahetabba abhāvato

original: tehi na gaṇhāti. Pajahitvā ṭhitoti cajitvā ṭhito. Neva saṃsibbatīti taṇhāvasena neva
analyzed: tehi na gaṇhāti pajahitvā ṭhitaḥ uti cajitvā ṭhitaḥ na iva saṃsibbati iti taṇhā vasena na iva

original: saṃsibbati. Na ussinetīti mānavasena na ukkaṃsati. Visinitvā ṭhitoti taṇhāsaṃsīvanaṃ
analyzed: saṃsibbati na ussineti iti māna vasena na ukkaṃsati visinitvā ṭhitaḥ iti taṇhā saṃsīvanam

original: akatvā ṭhitoti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Neva vidhūpetīti kilesaggiṃ na nibbāpeti. Na sandhūpetīti
analyzed: a katvā ṭhitaḥ iti evam eke vaṇṇayanti na iva vidhūpeti iti kilesa aggim na nibbāpeti na sandhūpeti iti

original: kilesaggiṃ na jālāpeti. Vidhūpetvā ṭhitoti taṃ nibbāpetvā ṭhito.
analyzed: kilesaggim na jālāpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhitaḥ ti tam nibbāpetvā ṭhitaḥ

original: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti sikkhitabbābhāvena asekkhena vācākammantājīvasīlakkhandhena
