analyzed: bhittiyam ākoṭita khāṇuke nāga danta iti tathā iva hatthi danta sadise vaṅka daṇḍake

original: bhittikhile laggaṃ. Visattanti nāgadante laggaṃ. Āsattanti cīvaravaṃse laggaṃ. Lagganti
analyzed: bhitti khile laggam visattanti nāga dante laggam āsattanti cīvara vaṃse laggam lagganti

original: cīvararajjuyā laggaṃ. Laggitanti pīṭhapāde laggaṃ. Palibuddhanti mañcapāde lagganti
analyzed: cīvara rajjuyā laggam pīṭha pāde laggam mañca pāde lagganti

original: evamādinā nayena yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: evamādinā nayena yojetabbam

original: Lagganādhivacananti visesena allīyanakathanaṃ. Channoti vuttappakārehi kilesehi chādito.
analyzed: laggana adhivacanam ti visesena allīyana kathanam channaḥ ti vutta ppakārehi kilesehi chādito

original: Punappunaṃ uppattivasena uparūpari channoti ucchanno. Āvutoti āvarito. Nivutoti vārito.
analyzed: punappunam uppatti vasena upari upari channaḥ ti ucchannaḥ āvutaḥ iti āvaritaḥ nivutaḥ iti vāritaḥ

original: Ophutoti avattharitvā chādito. Pihitoti bhājanena ukkhalimukhaṃ viya paliguṇṭhito.
analyzed: ophutaḥ ti avattharitvā chāditaḥ pihitaḥ iti bhājanena ukkhali mukham viya paliguṇṭhitaḥ

original: Paṭicchannoti āvaṭo. Paṭikujjitoti adhomukhaṃ ṭhapito. Tattha tiṇapaṇṇādīhi chāditaṃ
analyzed: paṭicchannaḥ ti āvaṭaḥ paṭikujjito ti adhomukham ṭhapitaḥ tattha tiṇa paṇṇa ādīhi chāditam

original: viya channo. Ucchanno nadiṃ āvaraṇasetu viya. Āvuto janasañcaraṇamaggāvaraṇaṃ viya.
analyzed: viya channaḥ ucchannaḥ nadim āvaraṇa setu viya āvutaḥ jana sañcaraṇa magga āvaraṇam viya

original: Vinibaddho mānavasenāti nānāvidhena mānātimānavasena nānāvidhe ārammaṇe baddho hutvā
analyzed: vinibaddhaḥ māna vasena ati nānāvidhena māna atimāna vasena nānāvidhe ārammaṇe baddhaḥ hutvā

original: tiṭṭhati. Parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhivasenāti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena parāmaṭṭho āmasitvā
analyzed: tiṭṭhati parāmaṭṭhaḥ diṭṭhi vasena ati dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhīnam vasena parāmaṭṭhaḥ āmasitvā

original: gahito. Vikkhepagato uddhaccavasenāti ārammaṇe asantiṭṭhanavasena cittavikkhepaṃ
analyzed: gahitaḥ vikkhepa gataḥ uddhacca vasena ati ārammaṇe asantiṭṭhana vasena citta vikkhepam

original: patto upagato. Aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchāvasenāti ratanattayādīsu kaṅkhāsaṅkhātāya vicikicchāya
analyzed: patto upagataḥ a niṭṭhaṅgataḥ vicikicchā vasena ati rata nattaya ādīsu kaṅkhā saṅkhātāya vicikicchāya

original: vasena sanniṭṭhānaṃ appatto. Thāmagato anusayavasenāti dunnīharaṇaappahīnānusayavasena
analyzed: vasena sanniṭṭhānam appatto thāma gataḥ anusaya vasena ati dunnīharaṇa appahīna anusaya vasena

original: thirabhāvaṃ patto upagato hutvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: thira bhāvam pattaḥ upagataḥ hutvā tiṭṭhati

original: Rūpūpayanti taṇhādiṭṭhūpayavasena rūpaṃ upagantvā ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ
analyzed: rūpūpayanti taṇhā diṭṭhu upaya vasena rūpam upagantvā ārammaṇam katvā viññāṇam tiṭṭhamānam

original: tiṭṭhatīti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe rūpārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ tiṭṭhati. Rūpārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tiṭṭhati iti tasmin ārammaṇe rūpa ārammaṇam viññāṇam tiṭṭhantam tiṭṭhati rūpa ārammaṇam

original: rūpapatiṭṭhanti rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ ālambitvā rūpameva patiṭṭhaṃ katvā. Nandūpasecananti
analyzed: rūpam eva ārammaṇam ālambitvā rūpam eva patiṭṭham katvā

original: sappītikataṇhodakena āsittaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Vuddhinti vuddhibhāvaṃ. Virūḷhinti javanavasena
analyzed: sappītika taṇhā udakena āsittam viññāṇam vuddhinti vuddhi bhāvam virūḍhinti javana vasena

original: uparito virūḷhibhāvaṃ. Vepullanti tadārammaṇavasena vepullaṃ.
analyzed: uparitas virūḷhi bhāvam vepullanti tad ārammaṇa vasena vepullam

original: Atthi rāgotiādīni lobhasseva nāmāni. So hi rañjanavasena rāgo, nandanavasena nandī,
analyzed: atthi rāga uti ādīni lobhassa iva nāmāni saḥ hi rañjana vasena rāgaḥ nandana vasena nandī

original: taṇhāyanavasena taṇhāti vuccati. Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā
analyzed: taṇhāyana vasena taṇhā ati vuccati patiṭṭhitam tattha viññāṇam virūḷhanti kammam javāpetvā

original: paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva virūḷhañca. Yatthāti tebhūmakavaṭṭe
analyzed: paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhana samattha tāya patiṭṭhitam ca iva virūḍham ca tebhūmaka vaṭṭe

original: bhummaṃ. Sabbattha vā purimapade etaṃ bhummaṃ. Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti
analyzed: bhummam sabbattha vā purima pade etam bhummam atthi tattha vuddhi iti

original: idaṃ imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyatiṃ vaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yattha
analyzed: idam imasmin vipāka vaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyatim vaṭṭa hetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttam yattha

original: atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
analyzed: atthi āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti iti yasmin ṭhāne āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti atthi

original: Tattha purimasuttaṃ rūpādiārammaṇalagganavasena vuttaṃ, dutiyasuttaṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha purima suttam rūpa ādi ārammaṇa laggana vasena vuttam dutiya suttam tat eva ārammaṇam

original: abhinandanavasena vuttaṃ, tatiyaṃ viññāṇapatiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ, catutthaṃ catubbidhaāhāravasena,
analyzed: abhinandana vasena vuttam tatiyam viññāṇa patiṭṭhāna vasena vuttam catuttham catubbidha āhāra vasena

original: kusalākusalaviññāṇapatiṭṭhānavasena vuttanti ñātabbaṃ.
analyzed: kusala akusala viññāṇa patiṭṭhāna vasena vuttan ti ñātabbam

original: Yebhuyyenāti pāyena. Muyhantīti mohaṃ āpajjanti. Sammuyhantīti visesena muyhanti.
analyzed: yebhuyyena ati pāyena muyhanti iti moham āpajjanti sammuyhanti iti visesena muyhanti

original: Sampamuyhantīti sabbākārena muyhanti. Atha vā rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭicca muyhanti, saddārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: sampamuyhanti iti sabba ākārena muyhanti atha vā rūpa ārammaṇam paṭicca muyhanti sadda ārammaṇam

original: paṭicca sammuyhanti, mutārammaṇaṃ paṭicca sampamuyhanti. Avijjāya andhīkatāti aṭṭhasu
analyzed: paṭicca sammuyhanti muta ārammaṇam paṭicca sampamuyhanti avijjāya andhīkatā ati aṭṭhasu

original: ṭhānesu aññāṇāya avijjāya andhīkatā. “Gatā”ti vā pāṭho, andhabhāvaṃ upagatāti attho.
analyzed: ṭhānesu aññāṇāya avijjāya andhīkatā gatā iti vā pāṭhaḥ andha bhāvam upagatā iti atthaḥ

original: Pagāḷhoti paviṭṭho. Ogāḷhoti heṭṭhābhāgaṃ paviṭṭho. Ajjhogāḷhoti adhiogāhitvā avattharitvā
analyzed: pagāḷhaḥ iti paviṭṭhaḥ ogāḷhaḥ iti heṭṭhā bhāgam paviṭṭhaḥ ajjhogāḷhaḥ ti adhiogāhitvā avattharitvā

original: visesena paviṭṭho nimuggoti adhomukhaṃ hutvā paviṭṭho. Atha vā dassanasaṃsaggena
analyzed: visesena paviṭṭhaḥ nimuggaḥ ti adhomukham hutvā paviṭṭhaḥ atha vā dassana saṃsaggena

original: ogāḷho. Savanasaṃsaggena ajjhogāḷho. Vacanasaṃsaggena nimuggo. Sappurisasaṃsaggavirahito
analyzed: ogāḷhaḥ savana saṃsaggena ajjhogāḷhaḥ vacana saṃsaggena nimuggo sappurisa saṃsagga virahito

original: vā ogāḷho. Saddhammasevanavirahito vā ajjhogāḷho. Dhammānudhammapaṭipattivirahito vā nimuggo.
analyzed: vā ogāḷhaḥ saddhamma sevana virahitaḥ vā ajjhogāḷhaḥ dhamma anudhamma paṭipatti virahitaḥ vā nimuggo

original: Vivekāti vivitti, viviccanaṃ vā viveko. Tayoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Kāyavivekoti kāyena
analyzed: viveka ati vivitti viviccanam vā gaṇana paricchedaḥ kāya vivekaḥ iti kāyena

original: vivitti, vinā apasakkanaṃ. Cittavivekādīsupi eseva nayo. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane.
analyzed: vivitti vinā apasakkanam citta viveka ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ idha bhikkhu iti imasmim sāsane

original: Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanato bhikkhu. Vivittanti suññaṃ, appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho.
analyzed: saṃsāre bhayam ikkhanataḥ bhikkhu vivittanti suññam appa saddam appa nigghosanti attho

original: Etadeva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge “vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: etat eva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge santike ca ipi senāsanam hoti tat ca an ākiṇṇam

original: gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi, tena taṃ vivitta”nti vuttaṃ. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ,
analyzed: gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi tena tam vivittanti vuttam seti ca iva āsati ca ettha ati senāsanam

original: mañcapīṭhādīnametamadhivacanaṃ. Tenāha –
analyzed: mañca pīṭha ādīnam etam adhivacanam tena āha

original: “Senāsananti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi… bhisipi… bibbohanampi… vihāropi… aḍḍhayogopi…
analyzed: senāsananti mañcaḥ api senāsanam pīṭham pi bhisi pi bibbohanam pi vihāraḥ api aḍḍhayogaḥ pi

original: pāsādopi… aṭṭopi… māḷopi… leṇampi… guhāpi… rukkhamūlampi… veḷugumbopi… yattha vā
analyzed: pāsādaḥ api aṭṭaḥ pi māḷaḥ pi leṇampi guhā api rukkha mūlampi veḷu gumbo pi yattha vā

original: pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ senāsana”nti.
analyzed: pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti sabbam etam senāsananti

original: Api ca vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhāti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. Mañco pīṭhaṃ
analyzed: api ca vihāraḥ aḍḍhayogo pāsādaḥ hammiyam guhā ti idam vihāra senāsanam nāma mañco pīṭham

original: bhisi bibbohananti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. Cimilikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro
analyzed: bhisi bibbohananti idam mañcapīṭha senāsanam nāma cimilikā camma khaṇḍaḥ tiṇa santhāraḥ

original: paṇṇasanthāroti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti,
analyzed: paṇṇa santhāraḥ ti idam santhata senāsanam nāma yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti

original: idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti. Taṃ sabbampi senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva.
analyzed: idam okāsa senāsanam nāma ati evam catubbidham senāsanam hoti tat sabbam pi senāsana ggahaṇena gahitam eva

original: Idha panassa sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikasenāsanaṃ dassento
analyzed: idha panassa sakuṇa sadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavika senāsanam dassento

original: “araññaṃ rukkhamūla”ntiādimāha. Tattha araññanti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ
analyzed: araññam rukkha mūlam ti ādim āha tattha araññam ti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbam etam

original: arañña”nti idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ. “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ
analyzed: araññanti idam bhikkhunīnam vasena āgatam āraññakam nāma senāsanam pañca dhanusatikam

original: pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese
analyzed: pacchiman ti idam pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpam tassa lakkhaṇam visuddhimagge dhutaṅga niddese

original: vuttaṃ. Rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci santacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti selaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam rukkha mūlam ti yaṃkiñci santa chāyam vivittam rukkha mūlam pabbatam ti selam

original: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu
analyzed: tattha hi udaka soṇḍīsu udaka kiccam katvā sītāya rukkha chāyāya nisinnassa nānā disāsu

original: khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti kaṃ vuccati
analyzed: khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittam ekaggam hoti kandaranti kam vuccati

original: udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ, udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatapadesaṃ. Yaṃ “nadītumba”ntipi “nadīkuñja”ntipi
analyzed: udakam tena dāritam udakena bhinnam pabbata padesam yam

original: vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālukā hoti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahanaṃ,
analyzed: vadanti tattha hi rajata paṭṭa sadisā vālukā hoti matthake maṇi vitānam viya vana gahanam

original: maṇikhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni
analyzed: maṇi khandha sadisam udakam sandati evarūpam kandaram oruyha pānīyam pivitvā gattāni

original: sītāni katvā vālukaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ
analyzed: sītāni katvā vālukam ussāpetvā paṃsukūla cīvaram paññapetvā nisinnassa samaṇa dhammaṃ

original: karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ, ekasmiṃyeva vā
analyzed: karotaḥ cittam ekaggam hoti giri guhanti dvinnam pabbatānam antaram ekasmiṃyeva vā

original: umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. Susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
analyzed: umaṅga sadisam mahā vivaram su sāna lakkhaṇam visuddhi magge vuttam

original: Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ yattha na kasanti
analyzed: vana patthanti gāmantam atikkamitvā manussānam an upacāra ṭhānam yattha na kasanti

original: na vapanti. Tenevāha “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādi. Abbhokāsanti
analyzed: na vapanti tena iva āha senāsanānam

original: acchannaṃ. Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsiṃ.
analyzed: a channam ākaṅkhamānaḥ pana itthā cīvara kuṭim katvā vasati palāla puñjanti palāla rāsim

original: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi
analyzed: mahā palāla puñjataḥ hi palālam nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāra leṇa sadise ālaye karonti gaccha gumba ādīnam pi

original: upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Sabbametaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: upari palālam pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇa dhammam karonti sabbam etam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ “kāyena vivitto viharatī”tiādi. Eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti pavattayatīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: vuttam kāyena vivittaḥ viharati itiādi ekaḥ caṅkamam adhiṭṭhāti pavattayati iti vuttam

original: hoti. Iriyatīti iriyāpathaṃ vattayati. Vattatīti iriyāpathavuttiṃ uppādeti. Pāletīti
analyzed: hoti iriyati iti iriyāpatham vattayati vattati iti iriyāpatha vuttim uppādeti pāleti iti

original: iriyāpathaṃ rakkhati. Yapetīti yapayati. Yāpetīti yāpayati.
analyzed: iriyāpatham rakkhati yapeti iti yapayati yāpeti iti yāpayati

original: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassāti kusalajjhānasamaṅgissa. Nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ vivittanti
analyzed: paṭhamam jhānam samāpannassa ati kusala jjhāna samaṅgissa nīvaraṇehi cittam vivittanti

original: upacārena nīvaraṇehi vivittampi samānaṃ antoappanāyaṃ suṭṭhu vivittaṃ nāma hotīti
analyzed: upacārena nīvaraṇehi vivittam api samānam antoappanāyam suṭṭhu vivittam nāma hoti iti

original: dassetuṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum paṭhamam jhānam samāpannassa nīvaraṇehi cittam vivittam hoti iti vuttam

original: Eseva nayo vitakkavicārapītisukhadukkhehi dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni samāpannānanti.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ vitakka vicāra pīti sukha dukkhehi dutiya tatiya catuttha jhānāni

original: Rūpasaññāyāti kusalavipākakiriyavasena pañcadasannaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ saññāya.
analyzed: rūpa saññāya ati kusala vipāka kiriya vasena rūpāvacara jhānānam saññāya

original: Paṭighasaññāyāti cakkhurūpādisaṅghaṭṭanena uppannāya kusalākusalavipākavasena dvipañcaviññāṇasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: paṭigha saññāya ati cakkhu rūpa ādi saṅghaṭṭanena uppannāya kusala akusala vipāka vasena dvi pañca viññāṇa saṅkhātāya

original: paṭighasaññāya ca. Nānattasaññāyāti nānārammaṇe pavattāya catucattālīsakāmāvacarasaññāya
analyzed: paṭigha saññāya ca nānatta saññāya ati nānā ārammaṇe pavattāya catucattālīsa kāmāvacara saññāya

original: ca cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti suññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ca cittam vivittam hoti suññam hoti

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassāti ettha nāssa antoti anantaṃ, ākāsaṃ anantaṃ ākāsānantaṃ,
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatanam samāpannassa ati ettha na assa antaḥ ti anantam ākāsam anantam ākāsa anantam

original: ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ, taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa
analyzed: ākāsānantam eva ākāsānañcam tam ākāsānañcam adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena āyatanam assa sa sampayutta dhammassa

original: jhānassa devānaṃ devāyatanamivāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, kasiṇugghāṭimākāsārammaṇajhānassetaṃ
analyzed: jhānassa devānam devāyatanam iva ati ākāsānañcāyatanam kasiṇugghāṭim ākāsa ārammaṇa jhānassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa kusalakiriyajhānaṃ samāpannassa.
analyzed: adhivacanam tam ākāsānañcāyatanam samāpannassa kusala kiriya jhānam samāpannassa

original: Rūpasaññāyāti saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānato ceva tadārammaṇato ca. Rūpāvacarajjhānampi
analyzed: rūpa saññāya ti saññā sīsena rūpāvacara jhānato ca iva tad ārammaṇato ca rūpāvacara jhānam pi

original: hi “rūpa”nti vuccati “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu, tassa ārammaṇampi “bahiddhā rūpāni
analyzed: hi rūpanti vuccati rūpī rūpāni passati itiādīsu tassa ārammaṇam pi bahiddhā rūpāni

original: passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsupi. Tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena
analyzed: passati suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇāni itiādīsu pi tasmai idha rūpe saññā rūpa saññā ti evam saññā sīsena

original: rūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Rūpe saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ, rūpamassa nāmanti
analyzed: rūpāvacara jhānassa etam adhivacanam rūpe saññā assa ati rūpa saññam rūpam assa nāman ti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam hoti evam pathavī kasiṇa ādi bhedassa tad ārammaṇassa ca itam adhivacanan ti veditabbam

original: Etāya kusalavipākakiriyāvasena pañcadasavidhāya jhānasaṅkhātāya rūpasaññāya. Etāya
analyzed: etāya kusala vipāka kiriyā vasena pañcadasavidhāya jhāna saṅkhātāya rūpa saññāya etāya

original: ca pathavīkasiṇādivasena aṭṭhavidhāya ārammaṇasaṅkhātāya rūpasaññāya.
analyzed: ca pathavī kasiṇa ādi vasena aṭṭhavidhāya ārammaṇa saṅkhātāya rūpa saññāya

original: Paṭighasaññāyāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena samuppannā
analyzed: paṭigha saññāya ati cakkha ādīnam vatthūnam rūpa ādīnam ārammaṇānaṃ ca paṭighātena samuppannā

original: saññā paṭighasaññā, rūpasaññādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamā paṭighasaññā?
analyzed: saññā paṭigha saññā rūpa saññā ādīnam etam adhivacanam yathā āha tattha katamā paṭigha saññā

original: Rūpasaññā saddasaññā gandhasaññā rasasaññā phoṭṭhabbasaññā, imā vuccanti paṭighasaññāyo”ti.
analyzed: rūpa saññā sadda saññā gandha saññā rasa saññā phoṭṭhabba saññā imāḥ vuccanti paṭigha saññāyaḥ ti

original: Tā kusalavipākā pañca akusalavipākā pañcāti etāya paṭighasaññāya.
analyzed: tā kusala vipākā pañca akusala vipākā pañca ati etāya paṭigha saññāya

original: Nānattasaññāyāti nānatte gocare pavattāya saññāya, nānattāya vā saññāya. Yathāha
analyzed: nānatta saññāya ati nānatte gocare pavattāya saññāya nānattāya vā saññāya yathā āha

original: – “tattha katamā nānattasaññā? Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa
analyzed: tattha katamā nānatta saññā asamāpannassa manaḥ dhātu samaṅgissa vā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu samaṅgissa

original: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā
analyzed: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjāni tattam imāḥ vuccanti nānatta saññāyo ti evam vibhaṅge vibhajitvā

original: vuttā. Tā idha adhippetā. Asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā saññā
analyzed: vuttā tāḥ idha adhippetāḥ a samāpannassa manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu saṅgahitā saññā

original: rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti. Yasmā cesā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā,
analyzed: rūpa sadda ādi bhede nānatte nānā sabhāve gocare pavattanti yasmā ca isā aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusala saññā

original: dvādasa akusalasaññā, ekādasa kāmāvacarakusalavipākasaññā, dve akusalavipākasaññā,
analyzed: dvādasa akusala saññāḥ ekādasa kāmāvacara kusala vipāka saññāḥ dve akusala vipāka saññā

original: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: ekādasa kāmāvacara kiriya saññā ati evam catucattālīsam pi saññāḥ nānattāḥ nānā sabhāvāḥ aññamaññam

original: asadisā, tasmā “nānattasaññā”ti vuttā, tāya nānattasaññāya.
analyzed: asadisā tasmā nānatta saññā iti vuttā tāya nānatta saññāya

original: Cittaṃ vivittaṃ hotīti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānānattasaññāsaṅkhātāhi
analyzed: cittam vivittam hoti iti ākāsānañcāyatanam samāpannassa rūpa saññā paṭigha saññā nānatta saññā saṅkhātāhi

original: saññāhi jhānacittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti vinā hoti apasakkanaṃ hoti. Viññāṇañcāyatananti
analyzed: saññāhi jhāna cittam vivittam hoti vinā hoti apasakkanam hoti viññāṇam ca āyatanam ti

original: etadeva viññāṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, ākāse pavattaviññāṇārammaṇassa
analyzed: etat eva viññāṇam adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena āyatanam assa ati viññāṇañca āyatanam ākāse pavatta viññāṇa ārammaṇassa

original: jhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vuttappakārāya ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya
analyzed: jhānassa itam adhivacanam tam jhānam samāpannassa vutta ppakārāya ākāsa anañca āyatana saññāya

original: cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: cittam vivittam hoti

original: Ākiñcaññāyatananti ettha pana nāssa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ, antamaso bhaṅgamattampi
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatananti ettha pana na assa kiñcananti akiñcanam antamasaḥ bhaṅga mattam pi

original: assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇāpagamassetaṃ
analyzed: assa avasiṭṭham natthi iti vuttam hoti akiñcanassa bhāvaḥ ākiñcaññam ākāsa ānañca āyatana viññāṇa apagamassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākiñcaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, ākāse
analyzed: adhivacanam tam ākiñcaññam adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena āyatanam assa ati ākiñcaññāyatanam ākāse

original: pavattitaviññāṇāpagamārammaṇajhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa
analyzed: pavattita viññāṇa apagama ārammaṇa jhānassa itam adhivacanam tam ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpannassa

original: tāya viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāya cittaṃ vivittaṃ.
analyzed: tāya viññāṇañca āyatana saññāya cittam vivittam

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ettha pana yāya saññāya bhāvato taṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti
analyzed: neva saññā na asaññā āyatanan ti ettha pana yāya saññāya bhāvato tam neva saññā nā asaññā āyatanan ti

original: vuccati, yathāpaṭipannassa sā saññā hoti, taṃ tāva dassetuṃ vibhaṅge “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti
analyzed: vuccati yathā paṭipannassa sā saññā hoti tam tāva dassetum vibhaṅge nevasaññī nāsaññī iti

original: uddharitvā taññeva “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ
analyzed: uddharitvā tañca eva ākiñcaññāyatanam santataḥ manasi karoti saṅkhāra avasesa samāpattim

original: bhāveti, tena vuccati nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha santato manasi karotīti
analyzed: bhāveti tena vuccati na ivasaññī na asaññī iti vuttam tattha santataḥ manasi karoti iti

original: “santovatāyaṃ samāpatti, yatra hi nāma natthibhāvampi ārammaṇaṃ karitvā vasatī”ti
analyzed: samāpatti yatra hi nāma ārammaṇam karitvā vasati iti

original: evaṃ santārammaṇatāya naṃ “santā”ti manasi karoti. Taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ appetvā
analyzed: evam santa ārammaṇa tāya nam santa ati manasi karoti tam nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam appetvā

original: nisinnassa tāya ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya jhānacittaṃ suññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nisinnassa tāya ākiñcaññāyatana saññāya jhāna cittam suññam hoti

original: Sotāpannassāti sotāpattiphalaṃ pattassa. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyāti vīsativatthukāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā.
analyzed: sotāpannassa ati sotāpatti phalam pattassa sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā ati vīsati vatthukāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā

original: Vicikicchāyāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kaṅkhāya. Sīlabbataparāmāsāti “sīlena suddhi, vatena
analyzed: vicikicchāya ati aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kaṅkhāya sīla bbata parāmāsā ati sīlena suddhi vatena

original: suddhī”ti parāmasitvā uppajjanakadiṭṭhi. Diṭṭhānusayāti appahīnaṭṭhena santāne anusayakā
analyzed: suddhi iti parāmasitvā uppajjanaka diṭṭhi diṭṭha anusayā ti appahīna ṭṭhena santāne anusayakā

original: diṭṭhānusayā. Tathā vicikicchānusayā. Tadekaṭṭhehi cāti tehi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīhi ekato
analyzed: diṭṭhā anusayā tathā vicikicchā anusayā tad ekaṭṭhehi ca ati tehi sakkāya diṭṭhi ādīhi ekatas

original: ṭhitehi ca. Upatāpenti vibādhenti cāti kilesā, tehi sakkāyadiṭṭhiyādikilesehi cittaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitehi ca upatāpenti vibādhenti ca ati kilesā tehi sakkāya diṭṭhiyā ādi kilesehi cittam

original: vivittaṃ suññaṃ hoti. Ettha “tadekaṭṭha”nti duvidhaṃ ekaṭṭhaṃ pahānekaṭṭhaṃ sahajekaṭṭhañca.
analyzed: vivittam suññam hoti ettha tat ekaṭṭham ti duvidham ekaṭṭham pahāna ekaṭṭham sahaja ekaṭṭham ca

original: Apāyagamanīyā hi kilesā yāva sotāpattimaggena na pahīyanti, tāva diṭṭhivicikicchāhi
analyzed: apāya gamanīyāḥ hi kilesāḥ yāva sotāpatti maggena na pahīyanti tāva diṭṭhi vicikicchāhi

original: saha ekasmiṃ puggale ṭhitāti pahānekaṭṭhā. Dasasu hi kilesesu idha diṭṭhivicikicchā
analyzed: saha ekasmin puggale ṭhitā ati pahā anekaṭṭhā dasasu hi kilesesu idha diṭṭhi vicikicchā

original: eva āgatā. Anusayesu diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayā āgatā. Sesā pana apāyagamanīyo
analyzed: eva āgatā anusayesu diṭṭha anusaya vicikicchā anusayā āgatā sesā pana apāya gamanīyaḥ

original: lobho doso moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti aṭṭha kilesā diṭṭhivicikicchāhi
analyzed: lobhaḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ mānaḥ thinam uddhaccam ahirikam anottappanti aṭṭha kilesāḥ diṭṭhi vicikicchāhi

original: saha pahānekaṭṭhā hutvā dvīhi anusayehi saddhiṃ sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti. Rāgadosamohapamukhesu
analyzed: saha pahāna ekaṭṭhāḥ hutvā dvīhi anusayehi saddhim sotāpatti maggena pahīyanti rāga dosa moha pamukhesu

original: vā diyaḍḍhesu kilesasahassesu sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhiyā pahīyamānāya diṭṭhiyā saha
analyzed: vā diyaḍḍhesu kilesa sahassesu sotāpatti maggena diṭṭhiyā pahīyamānāya diṭṭhiyā saha

original: vicikicchā pahīnā, diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayehi saha apāyagamanīyā sabbakilesā
analyzed: vicikicchā pahīnā diṭṭha anusaya vicikicchā anusayehi saha apāya gamanīyā sabba kilesā

original: pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti. Sahajekaṭṭhā pana diṭṭhiyā saha vicikicchāya ca saha
analyzed: pahāna ikaṭṭha vasena pahīyanti sahaja ekaṭṭhā pana diṭṭhiyā saha vicikicchāya ca saha

original: ekekasmiṃ citte ṭhitā avasesakilesā.
analyzed: eka ekasmin citte ṭhitā avasesa kilesā

original: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhisahagatāni vicikicchāsahagatañcāti pañca cittāni
analyzed: sotāpatti maggena hi cattāri diṭṭhi sahagatāni vicikicchā sahagatam ca ati pañca cittāni

original: pahīyanti. Tattha dvīsu diṭṭhisampayuttaasaṅkhārikacittesu pahīyamānesu tehi sahajāto
analyzed: pahīyanti tattha dvīsu diṭṭhi sampayutta asaṅkhārika cittesu pahīyamānesu tehi sahajātaḥ

original: lobho moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti,
analyzed: lobhaḥ mohaḥ uddhaccam ahirikam anottappanti ime kilesā sahaja ekaṭṭha vasena pahīyanti

original: dvīsu diṭṭhisampayuttasasaṅkhārikacittesu pahīyamānesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho thinaṃ
analyzed: dvīsu diṭṭhi sampayutta sasaṅkhārika cittesu pahīyamānesu tehi sahajātaḥ lobhaḥ mohaḥ thinam

original: uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti, vicikicchāsahagatacitte
analyzed: uddhaccam ahirikam ime kilesā sahaja ekaṭṭha vasena pahīyanti vicikicchā sahagata citte

original: pahīyamāne tena sahajāto moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena
analyzed: pahīyamāne tena sahajātaḥ mohaḥ uddhaccam ahirikam ime kilesā

original: pahīyanti. Tehi duvidhekaṭṭhehi kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hotīti maggacittaṃ viviccati,
analyzed: pahīyanti tehi duvidha ekaṭṭhehi kilesehi cittam vivittam hoti iti magga cittam viviccati

original: phalacittaṃ vivittaṃ viyuttaṃ apasakkitaṃ suññaṃ hotīti attho.
analyzed: phala cittam vivittam viyuttam apasakkitam suññam hoti iti attho

original: Sakadāgāmissa oḷārikā kāmarāgasaññojanāti oḷārikabhūtā kāyadvāre vītikkamassa paccayabhāvena
analyzed: sakadāgāmissa oḷārikā kāma rāga saññojanā ati oḷārika bhūtā kāya dvāre vītikkamassa paccaya bhāvena

original: thūlabhūtā methunarāgasaṅkhātā saññojanā. So hi kāmabhave saññojetīti “saññojana”nti
analyzed: thūla bhūtā methuna rāga saṅkhātā saññojanā saḥ hi kāma bhave saññojeti iti saññojananti

original: vuccati. Paṭighasaññojanāti byāpādasaññojanā. So hi ārammaṇe paṭihaññatīti “paṭigha”nti
analyzed: vuccati paṭigha saññojanā ati byāpāda saññojanā so hi ārammaṇe paṭihaññati iti paṭighanti

original: vuccati. Te eva thāmagataṭṭhena santāne anusentīti anusayā. Aṇusahagatāti sukhumabhūtā
analyzed: vuccati te eva thāma gata ṭṭhena santāne anusenti iti anusayāḥ aṇu sahagatā ati sukhuma bhūtā

original: kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā aṇusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayāti appahīnaṭṭhena
analyzed: kāma rāga saññojanā paṭigha saññojanā aṇu sahagatā kāma rāga anusayā paṭigha anusayā ati appahīna ṭṭhena

original: santāne anusayanavasena sukhumabhūtā kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā. Tadekaṭṭhehi cāti vuttatthehi
analyzed: santāne anusayana vasena sukhuma bhūtā kāma rāga paṭigha anusayā tad ekaṭṭhehi ca ati vutta tthehi

original: duvidhekaṭṭhehi kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ suññaṃ hoti.
analyzed: duvidha ikaṭṭhehi kilesehi cittam vivittam suññam hoti

original: Arahatoti kilesārīnaṃ hatattā “arahā”ti laddhanāmassa. Rūparāgāti rūpabhave chandarāgā.
analyzed: kilesa arīnam hatattā arahā ati laddha nāmassa rūpa rāgā ati rūpa bhave chanda rāgā

original: Arūparāgāti arūpabhave chandarāgā. Mānāti arahattamaggavajjhā mānā eva. Tathā uddhaccaavijjāmānānusayādayo
analyzed: arūpa rāgā ati arūpa bhave chanda rāgāḥ mānāḥ ati arahatta magga vajjhāḥ mānāḥ eva tathā uddhacca avijjā māna anusaya ādayaḥ

original: arahattamaggavajjhā. Etesu uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno. Avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ uddhaccaṃ. Andhabhāvalakkhaṇā
analyzed: arahatta magga vajjhāḥ etesu uṇṇati lakkhaṇaḥ mānaḥ a vūpasama lakkhaṇam uddhaccam andha bhāva lakkhaṇā

original: avijjā. Rūparāgaarūparāgavasena pavattā bhavarāgānusayā. Tadekaṭṭhehi cāti tehi ekato
analyzed: avijjā rūpa rāga arūpa rāga vasena pavattā bhava rāga anusayā tad ekaṭṭhehi ca ati tehi ekatas

original: ṭhitehi ca kilesehi. Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehīti ajjhattacittasantāne akusalakkhandhe
analyzed: ṭhitehi ca kilesehi bahiddhā ca sabba nimittehi iti ajjhatta citta santāne akusala kkhandhe

original: upādāya “bahiddhā”ti saṅkhaṃ gatehi ajjhattaṃ muñcitvā bahiddhā pavattehi sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi
analyzed: upādāya bahiddhā iti saṅkham gatehi ajjhattam muñcitvā bahiddhā pavattehi sabba saṅkhāra nimittehi

original: maggacittaṃ viviccati vinā hoti apasakkati, phalacittaṃ vivittaṃ viyuttaṃ apasakkitaṃ hoti.
analyzed: magga cittam viviccati vinā hoti apasakkati phala cittam vivittam viyuttam apasakkitam hoti

original: Tattha kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā cāti dvidhā anusayānaṃ abhāvo veditabbo.
analyzed: tattha kilesa paṭipāṭiyā magga paṭipāṭiyā ca ati dvidhā abhāvaḥ veditabbo

original: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā hi kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tatiyamaggena abhāvo hoti, mānānusayassa
analyzed: kilesa paṭipāṭiyā hi kāma rāga anusaya paṭigha anusayānam tatiya maggena abhāvaḥ hoti māna anusayassa

original: catutthamaggena, diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayānaṃ paṭhamamaggena, bhavarāgānusayāvijjānusayānaṃ
analyzed: catuttha maggena diṭṭha anusaya vicikicchā anusayānam paṭhama maggena bhava rāga anusaya avijja anusayānam

original: catutthamaggeneva. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā pana paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayānaṃ
analyzed: catuttha maggena iva magga paṭipāṭiyā pana paṭhama maggena diṭṭha anusaya vicikicchā anusayānam

original: abhāvo hoti, dutiyamaggena kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tanubhāvo, tatiyamaggena
analyzed: abhāvaḥ hoti dutiya maggena tanu bhāvaḥ tatiya maggena

original: sabbaso abhāvo, catutthamaggena mānānusayabhavarāgānusayāvijjānusayānaṃ abhāvo hoti.
analyzed: sabbasas abhāvaḥ catuttha maggena māna anusaya bhava rāga anusaya avijja anusayānam abhāvaḥ hoti

original: Cittavivekoti mahaggatalokuttaracittānaṃ kilesehi suññabhāvo, tucchabhāvoti attho.
analyzed: citta vivekaḥ ti mahaggata lokuttara cittānam kilesehi suñña bhāvo tuccha bhāvo ti attho

original: Upadhivivekoti kilesakkhandhaabhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātānaṃ upadhīnaṃ suññabhāvo. Upadhiṃ
analyzed: upadhi vivekaḥ ti kilesa khandha abhisaṅkhāra saṅkhātānam upadhīnam suñña bhāvaḥ upadhim

original: tāva dassetuṃ “upadhi vuccanti kilesā cā”tiādimāha. Rāgādayo yassa uppajjanti, taṃ
analyzed: tāva dassetum vuccanti kilesā ca ati ādim āha rāga ādayaḥ yassa uppajjanti tam

original: upatāpenti vibādhentīti kilesā ca. Upādānagocarā rūpādayo pañcakkhandhā ca. Upādānasambhūtā
analyzed: upatāpenti vibādhenti iti kilesā ca upādāna gocarā rūpa ādayo pañca kkhandhā ca upādāna sambhūtā

original: puññāpuññaāneñjābhisaṅkhārā ca. Amatanti natthi etassa maraṇasaṅkhātaṃ matanti amataṃ,
analyzed: puñña apuñña āneñja abhisaṅkhārā ca amatanti natthi etassa maraṇa saṅkhātam matanti amatan

original: kilesavisapaṭipakkhattā agadantipi amataṃ. Saṃsārayonigatiupapattiviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
analyzed: a gadanti pi amatam saṃsāra yoni gati upapatti viññāṇa ṭṭhiti sattā vāsesu

original: saṃsibbati vinatīti taṇhā “vāna”nti vuccati, taṃ tattha natthīti nibbānaṃ. Vivekaṭṭhakāyānanti
analyzed: saṃsibbati vinati iti taṇhā vānanti vuccati tam tattha natthi iti nibbānam viveka ṭṭha kāya ānanti

original: gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya apagatasarīrānaṃ. Nekkhammābhiratānanti nekkhamme kāmādito nikkhante
analyzed: gaṇa saṅgaṇikāya apagata sarīrānam nekkhamma abhiratānam ti nekkhamme kāma āditaḥ nikkhante

original: paṭhamajjhānādike abhiratānaṃ tanninnānaṃ. Paramavodānappattānanti uttamaparisuddhabhāvaphalaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna ādike abhiratānam tad ninnānam parama vodāna ppattānam ti uttama parisuddha bhāva phalam

original: pāpuṇitvā ṭhitānaṃ. “Upakkilesābhāvena parisuddhacittānaṃ, kilesehi muttabhāvena
analyzed: pāpuṇitvā ṭhitānam upakkilesa abhāvena parisuddha cittānam kilesehi mutta bhāvena

original: paramavodānappattānaṃ. Vikkhambhanappahānena parisuddhacittānaṃ, samucchedappahānena
analyzed: parama vodāna pattānam vikkhambhana ppahānena parisuddha cittānam samuccheda ppahānena

original: paramavodānappattāna”nti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Nirūpadhīnanti vigatūpadhīnaṃ. Visaṅkhāragatānanti
analyzed: parama vodāna pattānam ti evam eke vaṇṇayanti vigata upadhīnam visaṅkhāra gatānam

original: cittanti etthapi hi nibbānameva “visaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cittanti ettha api hi nibbānam eva visaṅkhāranti vuttam

original: Vidūreti vividhe dūre. Suvidūreti suṭṭhu vidūre. Na santiketi na samīpe. Na sāmantāti
analyzed: vidūrā iti vividhe dūre su vidūrā iti suṭṭhu vidūre na santikā iti na samīpe na sāmantā ati

original: na ekapasse. Anāsanneti anaccantasamīpe. Vivekaṭṭheti atidūre, vigateti attho. Tādisoti
analyzed: na eka passe anāsannā iti anaccanta samīpe viveka ṭṭhā iti atidūre vigatā iti attho tādisaḥ ti

original: taṃsadiso. Tassaṇṭhitoti tena ākārena ṭhito. Tappakāroti tena pakārena ṭhito. Tappaṭibhāgoti
analyzed: taṃsadisaḥ tassaṇṭhitaḥ iti tena ākārena ṭhitaḥ tad pakāraḥ iti tena pakārena ṭhitaḥ tad paṭibhāgaḥ iti

original: taṃkoṭṭhāsiko. Atha vā “attabhāvaguhāya laggabhāvena tādiso. Kilesehi channabhāvena
analyzed: taṃkoṭṭhāsikaḥ atha vā atta bhāva guhāya lagga bhāvena tādisaḥ kilesehi channa bhāvena

original: tassaṇṭhito. Mohanasmiṃ pagāḷhabhāvena tappakāro. Tīhi vivekehi dūrabhāvena tappaṭibhāgoti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
analyzed: tassa ṭhitaḥ mohanasmin pagāḷha bhāvena tad pakāro tīhi vivekehi dūra bhāvena tad paṭibhāgaḥ ti evam eke vaṇṇayanti

original: Duppahāyāti sukhena pahātabbā na honti. Duccajjāti sukhena jahituṃ na sakkā. Duppariccajjāti
analyzed: duppahāyā ati sukhena pahātabbāḥ na honti duccajjā ati sukhena jahitum na sakkā duppariccajjā ati

analyzed: sabba ākārena jahitum na sakkā dunnimmadayāti nimmadam a madam kātum na sakkā dubbiniveṭhayāti

original: viniveṭhanaṃ mocanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā. Duttarāti uttaritvā atikkantuṃ na sakkā. Duppatarāti

original: visesetvā tarituṃ na sakkā. Dussamatikkamāti dukkhena atikkamitabbā. Dubbinivattāti
analyzed: visesetvā taritum na sakkā dussamatikkamā ati dukkhena atikkamitabbā dubbinivattā ati

original: nivattetuṃ dukkhā. Atha vā “pakativasena duppariccajjā. Goṇapatāsaṃ viya dunnimmadayā.
analyzed: nivattetum dukkhā atha vā pakati vasena duppariccajjā goṇa patāsam viya dunnimmadayā

original: Nāgapāsaṃ viya dubbiniveṭhayā. Gimhasamaye marukantāraṃ viya duttarā duppatarā. Byagghapariggahitā
analyzed: nāga pāsam viya gimha samaye maru kantāram viya duttarā duppatarā byaggha pariggahitā

original: aṭavī viya dussamatikkamā. Samuddavīci viya dubbinivattāti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
analyzed: aṭavī viya dussamatikkamā samudda vīci viya dubbinivattā ti evam eke vaṇṇayanti

original: 8. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho”ti sādhetvā puna tathāvidhānaṃ
analyzed: evam dūre hi tathāvidhā iti sādhetvā

original: sattānaṃ dhammataṃ āvi karonto “icchānidānā”tiādigāthamāha. Tattha icchānidānāti
analyzed: sattānam dhammataṃ āvi karontaḥ icchā nidānā iti ādi gātham āha tattha icchā nidānā iti

original: taṇhāhetukā. Bhavasātabaddhāti sukhavedanādimhi bhavasātena baddhā. Te duppamuñcāti
analyzed: taṇhā hetukā bhava sāta baddhā ati sukha vedanā ādimhi bhava sātena baddhā te duppamuñcā ati

original: te bhavasātavatthubhūtā dhammā. Te vā tattha baddhā icchānidānā sattā duppamocayā.
analyzed: te bhava sāta vatthu bhūtā dhammā te vā tattha baddhā icchā nidānā sattā duppamocayā

original: Na hi aññamokkhāti aññe ca mocetuṃ na sakkonti. Kāraṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ. Te sattā duppamuñcā.
analyzed: na hi añña mokkhāti aññe ca mocetum na sakkonti kāraṇa vacanam vā etam te sattāḥ duppamuñcā

original: Kasmā? Yasmā aññena mocetabbā na honti. Yadi sattā muñceyyuṃ, sakena thāmena muñceyyunti
analyzed: kasmai yasmai aññena mocetabbāḥ na honti yadi sattāḥ muñceyyum sakena thāmena muñceyyunti

original: ayamassa attho. Pacchā pure vāpi apekkhamānāti anāgate atīte vā kāme apekkhamānā.
analyzed: ayam assa atthaḥ pacchā pure vā api apekkhamānā ati anāgate atīte vā kāme apekkhamānā

original: Ime va kāme purime va jappanti ime vā paccuppanne kāme purime vā duvidhepi atītānāgate
analyzed: ime va kāme purime va jappanti ime vā paccuppanne kāme purime vā duvidhe pi atīta anāgate

original: balavataṇhāya patthayamānā. Imesañca dvinnaṃ padānaṃ “te duppamuñcā na hi aññamokkhā”ti
analyzed: balava taṇhāya patthayamānāḥ imesam ca dvinnam padānam te duppamuñcāḥ na hi

original: katāti na paññāyeyyuṃ.
analyzed: katā ati na paññāyeyyum

analyzed: ṭhitā tam bhājetvā dassetum ekam bhava sātam sukhā vedanā iti ādim āha yobbana bhāvaḥ

original: yobbaññaṃ. Arogabhāvo ārogyaṃ. Jīvitindriyassa pavattabhāvo jīvitaṃ. Lābhoti catunnaṃ
analyzed: aroga bhāvaḥ ārogyam jīvitindriyassa pavatta bhāvaḥ jīvitam lābho ti catunnam

analyzed: paccayānam lābhaḥ yasoti parivāro sukhanti kāyika cetasikam sukham

original: Manāpikā rūpāti manavaḍḍhanakā rūpā. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: manāpikā rūpā ati sesesu pi esā iva nayo

original: Cakkhusampadāti cakkhussa sampadā. “Mayhaṃ cakkhu sampannaṃ maṇivimāne ugghāṭitasīhapañjaraṃ
analyzed: cakkhu sampadā ati cakkhussa sampadā mayham cakkhu sampannam maṇi vimāne ugghāṭita sīha pañjaram

analyzed: viya khāyati iti uppannam sukha ssādam sandhāya cakkhu sampadā iti vuttam sota sampad ādīsu pi

analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya vibaddhā ati vividha ākārena baddhā ābaddhā ati

analyzed: visesena āditas baddhā laggā ati ārammaṇena saddhim appitā laggitā ati nāgadante phāṇitavārako

analyzed: viya laggitā yam ettha ca avuttam tam sattaḥ visattaḥ iti ādimhi vutta nayena gahetabbam

original: Na hi aññamokkhāti na parehi mokkhā. Te vā bhavasātavatthū duppamuñcāti bhave sukhassādavatthubhūtā

analyzed: tassa yaḥ ti imam uddesa vacanam āharitvā yaḥ attanā saḥ vata cunda

analyzed: param palipa palipannam uddharissati iti evam sesa padesu sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ palipa palipannaḥ ti

original: gambhīrakaddame nimuggo vuccati. Yathā, cunda, koci puriso yāva sīsato gambhīrakaddame

original: Adanto avinīto aparinibbutoti ettha pana anibbisevanatāya adanto. Asikkhitavinayatāya

original: Natthañño kocīti añño koci puggalo mocetuṃ samattho natthi. Sakena thāmenāti attano

original: Nāhaṃ sahissāmīti ahaṃ na sahissāmi na sakkomi, na vāyamissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. Pamocanāyāti pamocetuṃ. Kathaṃkathinti sakaṅkhaṃ. Dhotakāti ālapanaṃ. Taresīti tareyyāsi.

original: Attanā akataṃ pāpaṃ, attanāva visujjhati;

original: Suddhī asuddhi paccattaṃ, nāñño aññaṃ visodhaye”ti. –
analyzed: suddhī paccattam na aññaḥ aññam visodhaya iti

original: Etthāyamattho – yena attanā akusalaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ hoti, so catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ

analyzed: anubhavantaḥ attanā ava saṃkilissati yena pana attanā a katam pāpam saḥ sugatim ca iva

analyzed: paṭṭhāya ariya maggo tiṭṭhāma aham samādapetā ati aham gaṇhāpetā patiṭṭhāpetā tiṭṭhāmi

original: Evaṃ ovadiyamānā evaṃ anusāsiyamānāti mayā evaṃ ovadiyamānā evaṃ anusāsiyamānā. Ettha
analyzed: evam ovadiyamānā evam anusāsiyamānā ati mayā evam ovadiyamānā evam anusāsiyamānā ettha

analyzed: uppanne vatthusmim vadantaḥ ovadati nāma an uppanne vatthusmim anusāsantaḥ ayasaḥ pi

analyzed: a vivicca api jhānam upasampajja vihareyya iti na kho pana etam evam daṭṭhabbam tad nissaraṇato

original: hi pubbapade eva esa vutto. Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ

original: Uttarapadepi pana yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro

original: Tena kāyaviveko vutto hoti.

original: Dhammabhūto hi bhagavā, tasseva vinayo.

original: pavattamānā kāmataṇhā. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassata”nti

original: evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā. Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ ucchijjati

original: samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattatīti phusanalakkhaṇo. Ekadeseneva anallīyamānopi
analyzed: samānaḥ ārammaṇe phusana ākārena iva pavattati iti phusana lakkhaṇaḥ eka desena iva

original: rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭetīti saṅghaṭṭanaraso,
analyzed: rūpam viya cakkhum saddaḥ viya ca sotam cittam ārammaṇam ca saṅghaṭṭeti iti saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ

original: vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato vā uppannattā sampattiatthenapi rasena “saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti
analyzed: vattha ārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭanataḥ vā uppanna ttā sampatti atthena api rasena saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ ti

original: veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
analyzed: veditabbaḥ vuttam ha etam aṭṭhakathāyam

original: “Catubhūmakaphasso no phusanalakkhaṇo nāma natthi, saṅghaṭṭanaraso pana pañcadvārikova
analyzed: catu bhūmaka phasso no phusana lakkhaṇaḥ nāma natthi saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ pana pañca dvārikaḥ uva

original: hoti. Pañcadvārikassa hi phusanalakkhaṇotipi saṅghaṭṭanarasotipi nāmaṃ. Manodvārikassa
analyzed: hoti pañca dvārikassa hi phusana lakkhaṇaḥ itipi saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ itipi nāmam manaḥ dvārikassa

original: phusanalakkhaṇotveva nāmaṃ, na saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti.
analyzed: nāmam na saṅghaṭṭana rasā iti

original: Idañca vatvā idaṃ suttaṃ ābhataṃ –
analyzed: idam ca vatvā idam suttam ābhatam

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṃ, yathā eko meṇḍo, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja dve meṇḍāḥ yujjheyyum yathā ekaḥ meṇḍaḥ evam cakkhu daṭṭhabbam

original: Yathā dutiyo meṇḍo, evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yathā dutiyaḥ meṇḍaḥ evam rūpam daṭṭhabbam yathā tesam sannipātaḥ evam phassaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo ca phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso ca. Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṃ,
analyzed: evam phusana lakkhaṇaḥ ca phassaḥ saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ ca yathā mahā rāja dve sammā vajjeyyum

original: dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṃ. Yathā eko pāṇi, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā dutiyo pāṇi, evaṃ
analyzed: dve pāṇī vajjeyyum yathā ekaḥ pāṇi evam cakkhu daṭṭhabbam yathā dutiyaḥ pāṇi evam

original: rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo
analyzed: rūpam daṭṭhabbam yathā tesam sannipātaḥ evam phassaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ evam phusana lakkhaṇo

original: ca phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso cā”ti vitthāro.
analyzed: ca phasso saṅghaṭṭana raso ca ati vitthāro

original: Yathā vā “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīni cakkhuādināmena vuttāni,
analyzed: yathā vā cakkhunā rūpam disvā ati ādīsu cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni cakkhu ādi nāmena vuttāni

original: evamidhāpi tāni cakkhuādināmeneva vuttānīti veditabbāni. Tasmā “evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabba”ntiādīsu
analyzed: evam idha api tāni cakkhu ādi nāmena iva vuttāni iti veditabbāni tasmai evam cakkhu daṭṭhabba nti ādīsu

original: evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Evaṃ sante cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato
analyzed: evam cakkhu viññāṇam daṭṭhabban ti iminā nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ evam sante citta ārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭanato

original: imasmimpi sutte kiccaṭṭheneva rasena “saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti siddho hoti. Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: imasmim pi sutte kicca ṭṭhena iva rasena saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ ti siddhaḥ hoti sannipāta saṅkhātassa

original: pana attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno. Ayañhi tattha tattha
analyzed: pana attanaḥ kāraṇassa vasena pavedita ttā sannipāta paccupaṭṭhānaḥ ayam hi tattha tattha

original: “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti evaṃ kāraṇasseva vasena paveditoti. Imassa ca suttapadassa
analyzed: tiṇṇam phasso ti evam kāraṇassa iva vasena pavedito ti imassa ca sutta padassa

original: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phassoti ayamattho, na saṅgatimattameva phasso.
analyzed: tiṇṇam saṅgatiyā phasso ti ayam attho na saṅgatimattam eva phasso

original: Evaṃ paveditattā pana tenevākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti “sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti vutto.
analyzed: evam pavedita ttā pana tena iva ākārena paccupaṭṭhāti iti sannipāta paccupaṭṭhānaḥ ti vutto

original: Phalaṭṭhena pana paccupaṭṭhānenesa vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno nāma hoti. Vedanaṃ hesa paccupaṭṭhāpeti,
analyzed: phala aṭṭhena pana paccupaṭṭhānena isa vedanā paccupaṭṭhānaḥ nāma hoti vedanam ha esa paccupaṭṭhāpeti

original: uppādetīti attho. Uppādayamāno ca yathā bahiddhā uṇhapaccayāpi samānā lākhāsaṅkhātadhātunissitā
analyzed: uppādeti iti atthaḥ uppādayamānaḥ ca yathā bahiddhā uṇha paccayā api samānā lākhā saṅkhāta dhātu nissitā

original: usmā attano nissaye mudubhāvakārī hoti, na attano paccayabhūtepi bahiddhā vītaccitaṅgārasaṅkhāte
analyzed: attano nissaye mudu bhāva kārī hoti na attano paccaya bhūte pi bahiddhā

original: uṇhabhāve. Evaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅkhātaaññapaccayopi samāno cittanissitattā attano
analyzed: uṇha bhāve evam vattha ārammaṇa saṅkhāta añña paccayaḥ api samānaḥ citta nissita ttā attano

original: nissayabhūte citte eva esa vedanuppādako hoti, na attano paccayabhūtepi vatthumhi
analyzed: nissaya bhūte citte eva esa vedan uppādako hoti na attanaḥ paccaya bhūte pi vatthumhi

original: ārammaṇevāti veditabbo. Tajjena samannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhate visaye
analyzed: ārammaṇā iva ati veditabbo tajjena samannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhate visaye

original: anantarāyena uppajjanato esa “āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno”ti vuccati.
analyzed: anantarāyena uppajjanato esa āpātha gata visaya padaṭṭhāno ti vuccati

original: Phasso yato samudeti uppajjati, so “phassasamudayo”ti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “saḷāyatanapaccayā
analyzed: phassaḥ yatas samudeti uppajjati saḥ phassa samudayaḥ iti vuccati vuttam ha etam saḷāyatana paccayā

original: phasso”ti. Atītaduko kālavasena vutto. Vedanāduko “upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva
analyzed: phasso ti atīta duko kāla vasena vutto vedanā duko upekkhā pana santattā sukham icca eva

original: bhāsitā”ti vuttattā upekkhāvedanaṃ sukhameva katvā sukhadukkhavasena, nāmarūpaduko
analyzed: bhāsitā ati vutta ttā upekkhā vedanam sukham eva katvā sukha dukkha vasena

original: rūpārūpavasena, āyatanaduko saṃsārapavattivasena, sakkāyaduko pañcakkhandhavasena
analyzed: rūpa arūpa vasena āyatana duko saṃsāra pavatti vasena sakkāya duko pañca kkhandha vasena

original: vuttoti veditabbo. Tattha sukhayatīti sukhā. Vedayatīti vedanā. Dukkhayatīti dukkhā.
analyzed: vuttaḥ ti veditabbaḥ tattha sukhayati iti sukhā vedayati iti vedanā dukkhayati iti dukkhā

original: Namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. Cakkhāyatanādīni cha ajjhattikāni.
analyzed: namana lakkhaṇam nāmam ruppana lakkhaṇam rūpam cakkhāyatana ādīni cha ajjhattikāni

original: Rūpāyatanādīni cha bāhirāni. Rūpakkhandhādayo pañcakkhandhā vijjamānaṭṭhena sakkāyo.
analyzed: rūpa āyatana ādīni cha bāhirāni rūpa kkhandha ādayaḥ pañca kkhandhāḥ vijjamāna ṭṭhena sa kkāyaḥ

original: Avijjākammataṇhāāhāraphassanāmarūpā sakkāyasamudayo.
analyzed: avijjā kamma taṇhā āhāra phassa nāma rūpā sa kāya samudayaḥ

original: Cakkhusamphassoti cakkhatīti cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Cakkhuto
analyzed: cakkhu samphasso ti cakkhati iti cakkhu rūpam assādeti vibhāveti ca ati atthaḥ cakkhuto

original: pavatto samphasso cakkhusamphasso. So pana attanā sampayuttāya vedanāya sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhārasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
analyzed: pavatto samphasso cakkhu samphasso so pana attanā sampayuttāya vedanāya sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka āhāra sampayutta atthi avigata vasena

original: aṭṭhadhā paccayo hoti. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite
analyzed: aṭṭhadhā paccayaḥ hoti suṇāti iti sotam tam sa sambhāra sota bilassa antaḥ tanu tamba loma ācite

original: aṅguliveṭhakasaṇṭhāne padese sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ
analyzed: aṅguliveṭhaka saṇṭhāne padese sota viññāṇa ādīnam yathāraham vatthu dvāra bhāvam sādhayamānam

original: tiṭṭhati. Sotato pavatto samphasso sotasamphasso. Ghānasamphassādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tiṭṭhati sotataḥ pavattaḥ samphassaḥ sota samphassaḥ ghāna samphassa ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Taṃ sasambhārabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ
analyzed: ghāyati iti ghānam tam sa sambhāra bilassa antar aja pada saṇṭhāne padese ghāna viññāṇa ādīnam

original: yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Jīvitamavhāyatīti jivhā, sāyanaṭṭhena
analyzed: yathāraham vatthu dvāra bhāvam sādhayamānam tiṭṭhati jīvitam avhāyati iti jivhā sa ayanaṭṭhena

original: vā jivhā. Sā sasambhārajivhāya atiaggamūlapassāni vajjetvā uparimatalamajjhe bhinnauppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne
analyzed: vā jivhā sā sa sambhāra jivhāya ati agga mūla passāni vajjetvā uparima tala majjhe bhinna oppala da lagga saṇṭhāne

original: padese jivhāviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati. Kucchitānaṃ
analyzed: padese jivhā viññāṇa ādīnam yathāraham vatthu dvāra bhāvam sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati

original: sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇapavatti
analyzed: sāsava dhammānam āyo ti kāyaḥ āyo ti uppatti desaḥ yāvatā imasmin kāye upādiṇṇa pavatti

original: nāma atthi, tattha yebhuyyena kāyappasādo kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ
analyzed: nāma atthi tattha yebhuyyena kāya ppasādo kāya viññāṇa ādīnam yathāraham vatthu dvāra bhāvam

original: sādhayamāno tiṭṭhati. Munātīti mano, vijānātīti attho. Manoti sahāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ;
analyzed: sādhayamānaḥ tiṭṭhati munāti iti manaḥ vijānāti iti atthaḥ sahāvat jana bhavaṅgam

original: manato pavatto samphasso manosamphasso.
analyzed: manataḥ pavattaḥ samphassaḥ manaḥ samphassaḥ

original: Chabbidhampi phassaṃ duvidhameva hotīti dassetuṃ “adhivacanasamphasso paṭighasamphasso”ti
analyzed: chabbidham pi phassam duvidham eva hoti iti dassetum adhivacana samphassaḥ paṭigha samphasso ti

original: āha. Manodvāriko adhivacanasamphasso. Pañcadvāriko vatthārammaṇādipaṭighena uppajjanato paṭighasamphasso.
analyzed: āha manaḥ dvārikaḥ adhivacana samphassaḥ pañca dvārikaḥ vattha ārammaṇa ādi paṭighena uppajjanato paṭigha samphasso

original: Sukhavedanāya ārammaṇe sukhavedanīyo. Dukkhavedanāya ārammaṇe dukkhavedanīyo. Adukkhamasukhavedanāya
analyzed: sukha vedanāya ārammaṇe sukha vedanīyaḥ dukkha vedanāya ārammaṇe dukkha vedanīyaḥ adukkhamasukha vedanāya

original: ārammaṇe adukkhamasukhavedanīyo. Tattha sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇe adukkham asukha vedanīyo tattha sukhayati iti sukham yassa uppajjati tam sukhitam

original: karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khanati, khādati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ. Dukkhayatīti
analyzed: karoti iti attho suṭṭhu vā khanati khādati ca kāya citta ābādhanti sukham dukkhayati iti

original: dukkhaṃ, yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Na dukkhaṃ na sukhanti adukkhamasukhaṃ,
analyzed: dukkham yassa uppajjati tam dukkhitam karoti iti atthaḥ na dukkham na sukhanti adukkham asukham

original: ma-kāro padasandhivasena vutto.
analyzed: makāraḥ pada sandhi vasena vutto

original: Kusalotiādayo jātivasena vuttā. Tattha kusaloti ekavīsatikusalacittasampayutto. Akusaloti dvādasākusalacittasampayutto. Abyākatoti avasesavipākakiriyābyākatacittasampayutto.
analyzed: kusala uti ādayaḥ jāti vasena vuttā tattha kusalo ti ekavīsati kusala citta sampayutto akusalo ti dvādasa akusala citta sampayutto abyākato ti avasesa vipāka kiriyā abyākata citta sampayutto

original: Puna bhavappabhedavasena niddisanto “kāmāvacaro”tiādimāha. Catupaññāsakāmāvacaracittasampayutto
analyzed: puna bhava ppabheda vasena niddisantaḥ kāmāvacara iti ādim āha catu paññāsa kāmāvacara citta sampayuttaḥ

original: kāmāvacaro. Kāmaṃ pahāya rūpe avacaratīti rūpāvacaro, kusalābyākatavasena pañcadasarūpāvacaracittasampayutto.
analyzed: kāmāvacaraḥ kāmam pahāya rūpe avacarati iti rūpāvacaraḥ kusala abyākata vasena pañcadasa rūpāvacara citta sampayutto

original: Kāmañca rūpañca pahāya arūpe avacaratīti arūpāvacaro, kusalābyākatavasena dvādasārūpāvacaracittasampayutto.
analyzed: kāmam ca rūpam ca pahāya arūpe avacarati iti arūpa avacaraḥ kusala abyākata vasena dvādasa arūpāvacara citta sampayutto

original: Idāni abhinivesavasena dassento “suññato”tiādimāha. Tattha suññatoti rāgadosamohehi
analyzed: idāni abhinivesa vasena dassento suññatā tiādim āha tattha suññatā ti rāga dosa mohehi

original: suññattā suññato. Rāgadosamohanimittehi animittattā animitto. Rāgadosamohapaṇidhīnaṃ
analyzed: suññattā suññataḥ rāga dosa moha nimittehi animitta ttā animittaḥ rāga dosa moha paṇidhīnam

original: abhāvato appaṇihitoti vuccati.
analyzed: abhāvataḥ appaṇihito ti vuccati

original: Idāni vaṭṭapariyāpannaapariyāpannavasena dassento “lokiyo”tiādimāha. Loko vuccati
analyzed: idāni vaṭṭa pariyāpanna apariyāpanna vasena dassentaḥ lokiyaḥ iti ādim āha lokaḥ vuccati

original: lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ, tasmiṃ pariyāpannabhāvena loke niyuttoti lokiyo. Uttiṇṇoti
analyzed: lujjana palujjana ṭṭhena vaṭṭam tasmim pariyāpanna bhāvena loke niyuttaḥ ti lokiyaḥ uttiṇṇaḥ ti

original: uttaro, loke apariyāpannabhāvena lokato uttaroti lokuttaro. Phusanāti phusanākāro.
analyzed: uttaraḥ loke a pariyāpanna bhāvena lokataḥ uttaraḥ iti lokuttaraḥ phusana ati phusana ākāro

original: Samphusanā samphusitattanti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
analyzed: samphusanā upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam

original: Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvāti evaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā jānanto tīreti tīrayati, upari vattabbākārena
analyzed: evam ñātam katvā iti evam pākaṭam katvā jānantaḥ tīreti tīrayati upari vattabba ākārena

original: cinteti. Aniccantikatāya ādiantavantatāya ca aniccato tīreti. Uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāya
analyzed: cintā iti anicca antika tāya ādi antavanta tāya ca aniccataḥ tīra iti uppāda vaya paṭipīḍana tāya

original: dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhato. Paccayayāpanīyatāya rogamūlatāya ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogitāya
analyzed: dukkha vatthu tāya ca dukkhataḥ paccaya yāpanīya tāya roga mūla tāya ca rogataḥ dukkha tā sūla yogi tāya

original: kilesāsucipaggharatāya uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkapabhinnatāya ca gaṇḍato.
analyzed: uppāda jarā bhaṅgehi ca gaṇḍataḥ

original: Pīḷājanakatāya antotudanatāya dunnīharaṇīyatāya ca sallato. Vigarahaṇīyatāya avaḍḍhiāvahanatāya
analyzed: pīḍā janaka tāya antotudana tāya dunnīharaṇīya tāya ca sallataḥ vigarahaṇīya tāya a vaḍḍhi āvahana tāya

original: aghavatthutāya ca aghato. Aseribhāvajanakatāya ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya ca ābādhato.
analyzed: agha vatthu tāya ca aghataḥ aseri bhāva janaka tāya ābādha padaṭṭhāna tāya ca ābādhataḥ

original: Avasatāya avidheyyatāya ca parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi lujjanapalujjanatāya palokato.
analyzed: ca paratas byādhi jarā maraṇehi

original: Anekabyasanāvahanatāya ītito. Aviditānaṃyeva vipulānaṃ anatthānaṃ āvahanato sabbūpaddavavatthutāya
analyzed: aneka byasana āvahana tāya ītitaḥ aviditānam yeva vipulānam anatthānam āvahanataḥ sabbū paddava vatthu tāya

original: ca upaddavato. Sabbabhayānaṃ ākaratāya ca dukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa paramassāsassa
analyzed: ca upaddavataḥ sabba bhayānam ākaratāya ca dukkha vūpasama saṅkhātassa parama ssāsassa

original: paṭipakkhabhūtatāya ca bhayato. Anekehi anatthehi anubaddhatāya dosūpasaṭṭhatāya,
analyzed: paṭipakkha bhūta tāya ca bhayataḥ anekehi anatthehi anubaddha tāya dosa upasaṭṭha tāya

original: upasaggo viya anadhivāsanārahatāya ca upasaggato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhādīhi
analyzed: upasaggaḥ ca upasaggāt byādhi jarā maraṇehi ca iva lābha ādīhi

original: ca lokadhammehi pacalitatāya calato. Upakkamena ceva sarasena ca pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatāya
analyzed: ca loka dhammehi pacalita tāya calataḥ upakkamena ca iva sarasena ca pabhaṅgu pagamana sīla tāya

original: pabhaṅguto. Sabbāvatthāvinipātitāya, thirabhāvassa ca abhāvatāya adhuvato. Atāyanatāya
analyzed: pabhaṅgutaḥ sabba avatthā vinipāti tāya thira bhāvassa ca abhāva tāya a dhuvataḥ a tāyana tāya

original: ceva alabbhaneyyakhematāya ca atāṇato. Allīyituṃ anarahatāya, allīnānampi ca leṇakiccākāritāya
analyzed: ca iva a labbha neyya khema tāya ca a tāṇataḥ allīyitum an arahatāya ca leṇa kiccā kāritāya

original: aleṇato. Nissitānaṃ bhayasārakattābhāvena asaraṇato. Yathāparikappitehi dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvehi
analyzed: a leṇataḥ nissitānam bhaya sāraka ttā abhāvena a saraṇataḥ yathā parikappitehi dhuva subha sukhatta bhāvehi

original: rittatāya rittato. Rittatāyeva tucchato, appakattā vā. Appakampi hi loke “tuccha”nti
analyzed: rittatāya rittataḥ rittatāya iva tucchataḥ appakattā vai appakam hi loke tucchanti

original: vuccati. Sāminivāsivedaka kārakādhiṭṭhāyakavirahitatāya suññato.
analyzed: vuccati sāmi nivāsi vedaka kāraka adhiṭṭhāyaka virahita tāya

original: Sayañca asāmikabhāvāditāya anattato. Pavattidukkhatāya, dukkhassa ca ādīnavatāya
analyzed: sayam ca a sāmika bhāva ādi tāya anattataḥ pavatti dukkhatāya dukkhassa ca ādīnava tāya

original: ādīnavato. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti gacchati pavattatīti ādīnavo, kapaṇamanussassetaṃ
analyzed: ādīnavataḥ atha vā ādīnam vāti gacchati pavattati iti ādīnavaḥ kapaṇa manussassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Khandhāpi ca kapaṇāyevāti ādīnavasadisatāya ādīnavato. Jarāya ceva maraṇena
analyzed: adhivacanam ca kapaṇāya iva ati ādīnava sadisatāya ādīnavataḥ jarāya ca iva maraṇena

original: cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya vipariṇāmadhammato. Dubbalatāya, pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya
analyzed: ca ati dvedhā pariṇāma pakati tāya vipariṇāma dhammataḥ dubbala tāya pheggu sukha bhañjanīya tāya

original: ca asārakato. Aghahetutāya aghamūlato. Mittamukhasapatto viya vissāsaghātitāya vadhakato.
analyzed: ca asārakataḥ agha hetutāya agha mūlataḥ mitta mukha sapatto viya vissāsa ghāti tāya vadhakataḥ

original: Vigatabhavatāya vibhavasambhūtatāya ca vibhavato. Āsavapadaṭṭhānatāya sāsavato. Hetupaccayehi
analyzed: vigata bhava tāya vibhava sambhūta tāya ca vibhavataḥ āsava padaṭṭhāna tāya sa āsavataḥ hetu paccayehi

original: abhisaṅkhatatāya saṅkhatato. Maccumārakilesamārānaṃ āmisabhūtatāya mārāmisato. Jātijarābyādhimaraṇapakatitāya
analyzed: abhisaṅkhata tāya saṅkhatataḥ āmisa bhūta tāya māra āmisataḥ jāti jarā byādhi maraṇa pakati tāya

original: jātijarābyādhimaraṇadhammato. Sokaparidevaupāyāsahetutāya sokaparidevaupāyāsadhammato.
analyzed: jāti jarā byādhi maraṇa dhammato soka parideva aupāyāsa hetutāya soka parideva aupāyāsa dhammato

original: Taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritasaṃkilesānaṃ visayadhammatāya saṃkilesadhammato. Avijjākammataṇhāsaḷāyatanavasena
analyzed: taṇhā diṭṭhi duccarita saṃkilesānam visaya dhamma tāya saṃkilesa dhammataḥ avijjā kamma taṇhā saḷāyatana vasena

original: uppattito samudayato. Tesaṃ abhāvena atthaṅgamato. Phasse chandarāgavasena madhurassādena
analyzed: uppattitaḥ samudayataḥ tesaṃ abhāvena atthaṅgamato phasse chanda rāga vasena madhura ssādena

original: assādato. Phassassa vipariṇāmena ādīnavato. Ubhinnaṃ nissaraṇena nissaraṇato tīretīti
analyzed: assādataḥ phassassa vipariṇāmena ādīnavataḥ ubhinnam nissaraṇena nissaraṇataḥ tīreti iti

original: sabbesu ca imesu “tīretī”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sabbesu ca imesu tīre ti iti pāṭha sesaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Pajahatīti sakasantānato nīharati. Vinodetīti tudati. Byantiṃ karotīti vigatantaṃ
analyzed: pajahati iti saka santānataḥ nīharati vinodeti iti tudati byantim karoti iti vigata antam

original: karoti. Anabhāvaṃ gametīti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti. Ariyamaggasatthena ucchinnaṃ taṇhāavijjāmayaṃ
analyzed: karoti anabhāvam gama iti iti anu anu abhāvam gama iti ariya magga satthena ucchinnam taṇhā avijjā mayam

original: mūlametesanti ucchinnamūlā. Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā.
analyzed: ucchinna mūlā tāla vatthu viya nesam vatthu tālāvatthuka tā

original: Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna
analyzed: yathā hi tāla rukkham sa mūlam uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmin padese kate na punar

original: tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati, evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā
analyzed: tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati evam ariya magga satthena sa mūle rūpa ādi rase uddharitvā

original: tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate sabbepi te “tālāvatthukatā”ti
analyzed: tesam pubbe uppanna pubba bhāvena vatthumatte citta santāne kate sabbe pi te tālā vatthuka tā ati

original: vuccanti. Yassesoti yassa puggalassa eso gedho. Samucchinnoti ucchinno. Vūpasantoti
analyzed: vuccanti yassa isoti yassa puggalassa eso gedho samucchinno ti ucchinnaḥ vūpasanto ti

original: phalena vūpasanto. Paṭipassaddhoti paṭipassaddhippahānena paṭipassambhito. Upasaggena
analyzed: phalena vūpasantaḥ paṭipassaddho ti paṭipassaddhi ppahānena paṭipassambhitaḥ upasaggena

original: vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Abhabbuppattikoti puna uppajjituṃ abhabbo. Ñāṇagginā daḍḍhoti
analyzed: vā padam vaḍḍhitam abhabbuppattikaḥ ti punar uppajjitum abhabbaḥ ñāṇa agginā daḍḍho ti

original: maggañāṇagginā jhāpito. Atha vā visanikkhittaṃ bhājanena saha chaḍḍitaṃ viya vatthunā
analyzed: magga ñāṇa agginā jhāpitaḥ atha vā visa nikkhittam bhājanena saha chaḍḍitam viya vatthunā

original: saha pahīno. Mūlacchinnavisavalli viya samūlacchinnoti samucchinno. Uddhane udakaṃ
analyzed: saha samucchinnaḥ udakam

original: siñcitvā nibbāpitaaṅgāraṃ viya vūpasanto. Nibbāpitaaṅgāre patitaudakaphusitaṃ viya
analyzed: siñcitvā nibbāpita aṅgāram viya vūpasantaḥ nibbāpita aṅgāre patita udaka phusitam viya

original: paṭipassaddho. Aṅkuruppattiyā hetucchinnabījaṃ viya abhabbuppattiko. Asanipātavisarukkho
analyzed: paṭipassaddhaḥ aṅkura uppattiyā hetu chinna bījam viya abhabba uppattikaḥ a sanipāta visarukkhaḥ

original: viya ñāṇagginā daḍḍhoti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
analyzed: viya ñāṇagginā evam eke vaṇṇayanti

original: Vītagedhoti idaṃ sakabhāvapariccajanavasena vuttaṃ. Vigatagedhoti idaṃ ārammaṇe sālayabhāvapariccajanavasena.
analyzed: vīta gedhaḥ ti idam saka bhāva pariccajana vasena vuttam vigata gedhaḥ ti idam ārammaṇe sa ālaya bhāva pariccajana vasena

original: Cattagedhoti idaṃ puna anādiyanabhāvadassanavasena. Muttagedhoti idaṃ santatito vinimocanavasena.
analyzed: catta gedhā ti idam puna anādiyana bhāva dassana vasena mutta gedhā ti idam santatitaḥ vinimocana vasena

original: Pahīnagedhoti idaṃ muttassāpi kvaci anavaṭṭhānadassanavasena. Paṭinissaṭṭhagedhoti
analyzed: pahīna gedhaḥ ti idam muttassa api kvaci anavaṭṭhāna dassana vasena paṭinissaṭṭha gedhaḥ ti

original: idaṃ ādinnapubbassa nissaggadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgoti
analyzed: idam ādinna pubbassa nissagga dassana vasena vuttam vīta rāgaḥ vigata rāgo catta rāgo ti

original: vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. Tattha gijjhanavasena gedho. Rañjanavasena rāgo. Nicchātoti
analyzed: vutta nayena yojetabbam tattha gijjhana vasena gedhaḥ rañjana vasena rāgaḥ nicchāto ti

original: nittaṇho. “Nicchado”tipi pāṭho, taṇhāchadanavirahitoti attho. Nibbutoti nibbutasabhāvo.
analyzed: nittaṇhaḥ nicchado tipi pāṭho taṇhā chadana virahito ti attho nibbutaḥ ti nibbuta sabhāvaḥ

original: Sītibhūtoti sītasabhāvo. Sukhapaṭisaṃvedīti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ anubhavanasabhāvo.
analyzed: sīti bhūtaḥ iti sīta sabhāvaḥ sukha paṭisaṃvedī iti kāyika cetasika sukham anubhavana sabhāvaḥ

original: Brahmabhūtenāti uttamasabhāvena. Attanāti cittena.
analyzed: brahma bhūtena ati uttama sabhāvena cittena

original: Katattā cāti pāpakammānaṃ katabhāvena ca. Akatattā cāti kusalānaṃ akatabhāvena ca.
analyzed: kata ttā ca ati pāpa kammānam kata bhāvena ca a kata ttā ca ati kusalānam a kata bhāvena ca

original: Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me kāyasucaritantiādayo dvāravasena avirativirativasena
analyzed: me dvāra vasena avirati virati vasena

original: kammapathavasena ca vuttā. Sīlesumhi na paripūrakārītiādayo catupārisuddhisīlavasena.
analyzed: kammapatha vasena ca vuttā sīlesumhi na paripūra kārī iti ādayo catu pārisuddhi sīla vasena

original: Jāgariyamananuyuttoti pañcajāgaraṇavasena. Satisampajaññenāti sātthakādisampajaññavasena.
analyzed: jāgariyam an anuyuttaḥ ti pañca jāgaraṇa vasena sati sampajaññena ati sātthaka ādi sampajañña vasena

original: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānātiādayo bodhipakkhiyadhammā lokiyalokuttaravasena. Dukkhaṃ me
analyzed: cattāro sati paṭṭhāna ati ādayaḥ bodhi pakkhiya dhammāḥ lokiya lokuttara vasena dukkham me

original: apariññātantiādayo cattāro ariyasaccavasena vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Te atthato tattha
analyzed: apariññāta nti ādayo cattāro ariya sacca vasena vuttā iti veditabbam te atthataḥ tattha

original: tattha vuttanayattā pākaṭāyeva.
analyzed: tattha vutta naya ttā pākaṭāya iva

original: Dhīro paṇḍitoti satta padā vuttatthāyeva. Api ca dukkhe akampiyaṭṭhena dhīro. Sukhe
analyzed: dhīro paṇḍito ti satta padā vutta tthāya iva api ca dukkhe akampiya ṭṭhena dhīro sukhe

original: anuppilavaṭṭhena paṇḍito. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe kataparicayaṭṭhena paññavā.
analyzed: anuppilava ṭṭhena paṇḍitaḥ diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika tthe kata paricaya ṭṭhena paññavā

original: Attatthaparatthe niccalaṭṭhena buddhimā. Gambhīrauttānatthe apaccosakkanaṭṭhena ñāṇī.
analyzed: a t ttha para tthe nicca laṭṭhena buddhimā gambhīra auttāna tthe a paccosakkana aṭṭhena ñāṇī

original: Guḷhapaṭicchannatthe obhāsanaṭṭhena vibhāvī. Nikkilesabyavadānaṭṭhena tulāsadisoti
analyzed: guḷha paṭicchanna tthe obhāsana ṭṭhena vibhāvī nikkilesa byavadāna ṭṭhena tulā sadisaḥ ti

original: medhāvī. Na limpatīti sajātiyā na limpati ākāse lekhā viya. Na palimpatīti visesena
analyzed: medhāvī na limpati iti sajātiyā na limpati ākāse lekhā viya na palimpati iti visesena

original: na limpati. Na upalimpatīti saññogo hutvāpi na limpati hatthatale lekhā viya. Alittoti
analyzed: na limpati na upalimpati iti saññogaḥ hutvā api na limpati hattha tale lekhā viya a littā ti

original: saññogo hutvāpi na kilissati kāsikavatthe ṭhapitamaṇiratanaṃ viya. Apalittoti visesena
analyzed: saññogaḥ hutvā api na kilissati kāsikavatthe ṭhapita maṇi ratanam viya apalittaḥ ti visesena

original: na kilissati maṇiratane paliveṭhitakāsikavatthaṃ viya. Anupalittoti upagantvāpi na
analyzed: na kilissati maṇi ratane paliveṭhita kāsika vattham viya upagantvā api na

original: allīyati pokkharapatte udakabindu viya. Nikkhantoti bahi nikkhanto bandhanāgārato
analyzed: allīyati pokkhara patte udaka bindu viya nikkhanto ti bahi nikkhantaḥ bandhanāgārato

original: palāto viya. Nissaṭoti pāpapahīno amittassa paṭicchāpitakiliṭṭhavatthu viya. Vippamuttoti
analyzed: palātaḥ viya nissaṭaḥ ti pāpa pahīnaḥ amittassa paṭicchāpita kiliṭṭha vatthu viya vippamutto ti

original: suṭṭhu mutto gayhūpage vatthumhi ratiṃ nāsetvā puna nāgamanaṃ viya. Visaññuttoti
analyzed: suṭṭhu muttaḥ gayhu upage vatthumhi ratim na āsetvā puna na āgamanam viya visaññuttaḥ ti

original: kilesehi ekato na yutto byādhinā muttagilāno viya. Vimariyādikatena cetasāti vigatamariyādakatena
analyzed: kilesehi ekataḥ na yuttaḥ byādhinā mutta gilānaḥ viya vimariyādikatena cetasā ati vigata mariyāda katena

original: cittena, sabbabhavena sabbārammaṇena sabbakilesehi muttacittenāti attho.
analyzed: cittena sabba bhavena sabba ārammaṇena sabba kilesehi mutta cittena ati attho

original: 14. Saññaṃ pariññāti gāthāya pana ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – na kevalañca phassameva, api
analyzed: saññam pariññā ti gāthāya pana ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ na kevalam ca phassam eva api

original: ca kho pana kāmasaññādibhedaṃ saññaṃ, saññānusārena vā pubbe vuttanayeneva nāmarūpaṃ
analyzed: ca kho pana kāma saññā ādi bhedam saññam saññā anusārena vā pubbe vutta nayena iva nāma rūpam

original: tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā imāya paṭipadāya catubbidhampi vitareyya oghaṃ, tato so
analyzed: tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā imāya paṭipadāya catubbidham pi vitareyya ogham tatas so

original: tiṇṇogho taṇhādiṭṭhipariggahesu taṇhādiṭṭhikilesappahānena anupalitto khīṇāsavamuni
analyzed: tiṇṇa oghaḥ taṇhā diṭṭhi pariggahesu taṇhā diṭṭhi kilesa ppahānena an upalittaḥ khīṇāsava muni

original: rāgādisallānaṃ abbūḷhattā abbūḷhasallo, sativepullappattiyā appamatto caraṃ, pubbabhāge
analyzed: rāga ādi sallānam abbūḷha ttā abbūḷha sallaḥ sati vepulla ppattiyāḥ appamattaḥ caram pubbabhāge

original: vā appamatto caranto tena appamādacārena abbūḷhasallo hutvā sakaparattabhāvādibhedaṃ
analyzed: vā appamattaḥ carantaḥ tena appamāda cārena abbūḍha sallaḥ hutvā saka paratta bhāva ādi bhedam

original: nāsīsati lokamimaṃ parañca, aññadatthu carimacittanirodhā nirupādānova jātavedo parinibbātīti
analyzed: na āsīsati lokam imam param ca aññadatthu carima citta nirodhā nirupādānaḥ uva jātavedo parinibbāti iti

original: arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, dhammanettiṭhapanameva karonto; na tu imāya
analyzed: arahatta nikūṭena desanam niṭṭhāpesi dhamma netti ṭhapanam eva karontaḥ na tu imāya

original: desanāya maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādesi, khīṇāsavassa desitattāti.
analyzed: desanāya maggam vā phalam vā uppādesi khīṇāsavassa desita ttā ti

original: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānātīti saññā. Sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā paccābhiññāṇarasā.
analyzed: nīla ādi bhedam ārammaṇam sañjānāti iti saññā sā sañjānana lakkhaṇā pacca abhiññāṇa rasā

original: Catubhūmikasaññā hi nosañjānanalakkhaṇā nāma natthi, sabbā sañjānanalakkhaṇāva. Yā
analyzed: catu bhūmika saññā hi nosañjānana lakkhaṇā nāma natthi sabbā sañjānana lakkhaṇā ava yā

original: panettha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti, sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti. Tassā vaḍḍhakissa
analyzed: pana ittha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti tassā vaḍḍhakissa

original: dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena taṃ paccābhijānanakāle, purisassa
analyzed: dārumhi abhiññāṇam katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena tam paccābhijānana kāle purisassa

original: kāḷatilakādiabhiññāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena “asuko nāma eso”ti tassa
analyzed: kāḷatilaka ādi abhiññāṇam sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena asukaḥ nāma esaḥ ti tassa

original: paccābhijānanakāle, rañño piḷandhanagopakabhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ piḷandhane
analyzed: pacca abhijānana kāle raññaḥ piḷandhana gopaka bhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmim tasmim piḷandhane

original: nāmapaṇṇakaṃ bandhitvā “asukaṃ piḷandhanaṃ nāma āharā”ti vutte dīpaṃ jāletvā sāragabbhaṃ
analyzed: nāmapaṇṇakam bandhitvā asukam piḷandhanam nāma āharāti vutte dīpam jāletvā sāragabbham

original: pavisitvā paṇṇaṃ vācetvā tassa tasseva piḷandhanassa āharaṇakāle ca pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: pavisitvā paṇṇam vācetvā tassa tassa iva piḷandhanassa āharaṇa kāle ca pavatti veditabbā

original: Aparo nayo – sabbasaṅgāhikavasena hi sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā, punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ sabba saṅgāhika vasena hi sañjānana lakkhaṇā saññā puna sañjānana paccaya nimitta karaṇa rasā

original: dāruādīsu tacchakādayo viya, yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: dāru ādīsu tad śaka ādayaḥ yathā gahita nimitta vasena abhinivesa karaṇa paccupaṭṭhānā

original: hatthidassakaandho viya, ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā vijju
analyzed: hatthi dassaka andhaḥ viya ārammaṇe anogāḷha vutti tāya acira ṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānā vā vijju

original: viya, yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ purisāti uppannasaññā
analyzed: viya yathā upaṭṭhita visaya padaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu miga potakānam purisā ati uppanna saññā

original: viya. Yā panettha ñāṇasampayuttā hoti, sā ñāṇameva anuvattati, sasambhārapathavīādīsu
analyzed: viya yā pana ittha ñāṇa sampayuttā hoti sā ñāṇam eva anuvattati sa sambhāra pathavī ādīsu

original: sesadhammā pathavīādīni viyāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sesa dhammā pathavī ādīni viya ati veditabbā

original: Kāmapaṭisaññuttā saññā kāmasaññā. Byāpādapaṭisaññuttā saññā byāpādasaññā. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaññuttā
analyzed: kāma paṭisaññuttā saññā kāma saññā byāpāda paṭisaññuttā saññā byāpāda saññā vihiṃsā paṭisaññuttā

original: saññā vihiṃsāsaññā. Tesu dve sattesupi saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti. Kāmasaññā hi piye
analyzed: saññā vihiṃsā saññā tesu dve sattesu pi saṅkhāresu pi uppajjanti kāma saññā hi piye

analyzed: apadānam an avakhaṇḍanam ti saha apadānena sa padānam avakhaṇḍana virahitam

original: anugharanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sapadānaṃ carituṃ idamassa sīlanti sapadānacārī, sapadānacārīyeva

original: sapadānacāriko, tassa aṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ. Khalupacchābhattikaṅganti khalūti
analyzed: sa padāna cārikaḥ tassa aṅgam sa padāna cārika aṅgam khalu pacchābhattika anti khalu uti

original: paṭisedhanatthe nipāto. Pavāritena satā pacchā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ nāma,
analyzed: paṭisedhana atthe nipātaḥ pavāritena satā pacchā laddham bhattam pacchābhattam nāma

original: tassa pacchābhattassa bhojanaṃ pacchābhattabhojanaṃ, tasmiṃ pacchābhattabhojane pacchābhattasaññaṃ

original: samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tassa aṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: samādāna vasena paṭikkhitta atiritta bhojanassa itam nāmam tassa aṅgam khalu pacchābhattika ṅgam

original: Nesajjikaṅganti sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharituṃ sīlamassāti nesajjiko,
analyzed: nesajjikaṅganti sayanam paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharitum sīlam assa ati nesajjikaḥ

original: tassa aṅgaṃ nesajjikaṅgaṃ. Yathāsanthatikaṅganti yadeva santhataṃ yathāsanthataṃ,
analyzed: tassa aṅgam nesajjikaṅgam yathā santhatikaṅganti yat eva santhatam yathā santhatam

original: “idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhasenāsanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmiṃ

original: yathāsanthate viharituṃ sīlamassāti yathāsanthatiko, tassa aṅgaṃ yathāsanthatikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: yathā santhate viharitum sīlam assa ati yathāsanthatikaḥ tassa aṅgam yathāsanthatika ṅgam

original: Sabbāneva panetāni tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
analyzed: sabbāni eva pana itāni tena tena samādānena dhuta kilesa ttā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni

original: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesanti dhutaṅgāni. Atha vā

original: tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo. Sabbāneva cetāni samādānacetanālakkhaṇāni. Vuttampi cetaṃ –

original: “Yo samādiyati, so puggalo. Yena samādiyati, cittacetasikā ete dhammā. Yā samādānacetanā, taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ. Yaṃ paṭikkhipati, taṃ vatthu”nti.
analyzed: yaḥ samādiyati saḥ puggalaḥ yena samādiyati citta cetasikāḥ ete dhammāḥ yā samādāna cetanā tam dhutaṅgam yam paṭikkhipati tam vatthum ti

original: Sabbāneva ca loluppaviddhaṃsanarasāni, nilloluppabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni, appicchatādiariyadhammapadaṭṭhānāni. Evamettha lakkhaṇādīhi vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: sabbān eva ca loluppa viddhaṃsana rasāni nilloluppa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānāni appiccha tā ādi ariya dhamma padaṭṭhānāni evam ettha lakkhaṇa ādīhi vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Vīriyasamādānampīti vīriyaggahaṇampi. Kāmanti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. Taco ca nhāru cāti
analyzed: vīriya samādānam pi iti vīriya ggahaṇam pi kāmanti ekaṃsa tthe nipāto taco ca nhāru ca ati

original: chavi ca nhāruvalliyo ca. Aṭṭhi cāti sabbā aṭṭhiyo ca. Avasissatūti tiṭṭhatu. Upasussatu
analyzed: chavi ca nhāruvalliyaḥ ca aṭṭhi ca ati sabbāḥ aṭṭhiyaḥ ca avasissatu uti tiṭṭhatu upasussatu

original: maṃsalohitanti sabbaṃ maṃsañca lohitañca sukkhatu. “Taco”ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “nhārū”ti
analyzed: maṃsa lohitanti sabbam maṃsam ca lohitam ca sukkhatu taco ti ekam aṅgam

original: ekaṃ, “aṭṭhī”ti ekaṃ, “upasussatu maṃsalohita”nti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ. Yaṃ tanti upari vattabbapadena
analyzed: ekam aṭṭhi iti ekam upasussatu maṃsa lohitanti ekam aṅgam yam tam ti upari vattabba padena

original: sambandho. Purisathāmenāti purisassa kāyikena balena, balenāti ñāṇabalena. Vīriyenāti
analyzed: sambandho purisa thāmena ati purisassa kāyikena balena balena ati ñāṇa balena vīriyena ati

original: cetasikañāṇavīriyatejena. Parakkamenāti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanena ussāhappattavīriyena.

original: Pattabbanti yaṃ taṃ pāpuṇitabbaṃ. Na taṃ apāpuṇitvāti taṃ pattabbaṃ appatvā. Vīriyassa
analyzed: pattabbanti yam tam pāpuṇitabbam na tam a pāpuṇitvā ati tam pattabbam ap patvā vīriyassa

original: saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti vuttappakārassa vīriyassa sithilattaṃ osīdanaṃ na bhavissati.
analyzed: saṇṭhānam bhavissati iti vutta ppakārassa vīriyassa sithila ttam osīdanam na bhavissati

original: “Paṭṭhāna”ntipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti cittaṃ ussāhaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
analyzed: paṭṭhānam tipi pāṭhaḥ ayam eva atthaḥ cittam paggaṇhāti iti cittam ussāham gaṇhāpeti

original: Padahatīti patiṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: padahati iti patiṭṭhāpeti

original: Nāsissanti na khādissāmi na bhuñjissāmi. Na pivissāmīti yāgupānādīni na pivissāmi.
analyzed: na āsissanti na khādissāmi na bhuñjissāmi na pivissāmi iti yāgu pāna ādīni na pivissāmi

original: Vihārato na nikkhameti senāsanato bahi na nikkhameyyaṃ. Napi passaṃ nipātessanti
analyzed: vihārataḥ na nikkhameti senāsanataḥ bahi na nikkhameyyam na pi passam nipātessanti

original: passaṃ mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā kaṭasantharake vā pātanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ na karissāmi.
analyzed: passam mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmiyam vā kaṭasantharake vā pātanam ṭhapanam na karissāmi

original: Taṇhāsalle anūhateti taṇhāsaṅkhāte kaṇḍe anuddhaṭe, avigateti attho.
analyzed: taṇhā salle taṇhā saṅkhāte kaṇḍe anuddhaṭe a vigatā iti attho

original: Imaṃ pallaṅkanti samantato ābhujitaṃ ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Na bhindissāmīti na vijahissāmi.
analyzed: imam samantataḥ ābhujitam ūru baddha āsanam na bhindissāmi iti na vijahissāmi

original: Yāva me na anupādāyāti catūhi upādānehi gahaṇaṃ aggahetvā. Āsavehīti kāmāsavādīhi
analyzed: yāva me na an upādāya ati catūhi upādānehi gahaṇam aggahetvā āsavehi iti kāma āsava ādīhi

original: catūhi āsavehi. Vimuccissatīti samucchedavimuttiyā na muccissati. Na tāvāhaṃ imamhā
analyzed: catūhi āsavehi vimuccissati iti samuccheda vimuttiyāḥ na muccissati na tāva aham imamhā

original: āsanā vuṭṭhahissāmīti ādiṃ katvā yāva rukkhamūlā nikkhamissāmīti okāsavasena vuttā.
analyzed: āsanā vuṭṭhahissāmi iti ādim katvā yāva rukkha mūlā nikkhamissāmi iti okāsa vasena vuttā

original: Imasmiññeva pubbaṇhasamayaṃ ariyadhammaṃ āharissāmīti ādiṃ katvā yāva gimheti kālavasena
analyzed: imasmin ñeva pubbaṇhasamayam ariya dhammam āharissāmi iti ādim katvā yāva gimhā iti kāla vasena

original: vuttā. Purime vayokhandhetiādayo vayavasena vuttā. Tattha āsanā na vuṭṭhahissāmīti
analyzed: vuttā purime vayaḥ khandha iti ādayaḥ vaya vasena vuttā tattha āsanā na vuṭṭhahissāmi iti

original: nisinnāsanā na uṭṭhahissāmi. Aḍḍhayogāti nikuṇḍagehā. Pāsādāti dīghapāsādā. Hammiyāti
analyzed: nisinna āsanā na uṭṭhahissāmi aḍḍhayogā ati nikuṇḍagehā pāsādā ati dīghapāsādā hammiyā ati

original: muṇḍacchadanagehā. Guhāyāti paṃsuguhāya. Leṇāti mariyādachinnacchiddā pabbataleṇā.
analyzed: muṇḍacchadana gehā guhāya ati paṃsu guhāya leṇā ati mariyāda chinna chiddā pabbata leṇā

original: Kuṭiyāti ullittādikuṭiyā. Kūṭāgārāti kaṇṇikaṃ āropetvā katagehato. Aṭṭāti dvāraṭṭālakā.
analyzed: kuṭiyā ati ullitta ādi kuṭiyā kūṭāgārā iti kaṇṇikam āropetvā kata gehataḥ aṭṭā ati dvāra aṭṭālakā

original: Māḷāti vaṭṭagehā. Uddaṇḍo nāma eko patissayaviseso. “Tichadanageho”tipi eke. Upaṭṭhānasālāti
analyzed: māḷā ti vaṭṭa gehā uddaṇḍaḥ nāma eko patissaya viseso ti chadana geho ti pi eke upaṭṭhāna sālā ati

original: sannipātasālā bhojanasālā vā. Maṇḍapādayo pākaṭāyeva. Ariyadhammanti anavajjadhammaṃ,
analyzed: sannipāta sālāḥ bhojana sālāḥ vā maṇḍapa ādayaḥ pākaṭāya iva ariya dhammanti anavajja dhammam

analyzed: ariyānam vā buddha paccekabuddha buddha sāvakānam dhammam āharissāmi iti mama citta samīpam

original: ānayissāmi sīlena. Samāharissāmīti visesena ānayissāmi samādhinā. Adhigacchissāmīti
analyzed: ānayissāmi sīlena samāharissāmi iti visesena ānayissāmi samādhinā adhigacchissāmi iti

original: paṭilābhavasena gamissāmi tadaṅgena. Phassayissāmīti phusissāmi maggena. Sacchikarissāmīti
analyzed: paṭilābha vasena gamissāmi tad aṅgena phassayissāmi iti phusissāmi maggena sacchikarissāmi iti

original: paccakkhaṃ karissāmi phalena. Atha vā sotāpattimaggena āharissāmi. Sakadāgāmimaggena
analyzed: paccakkham karissāmi phalena atha vā sotāpatti maggena āharissāmi sakadāgāmi maggena

original: samāharissāmi, anāgāmimaggena adhigacchissāmi, arahattamaggena phassayissāmi, paccavekkhaṇena
analyzed: samāharissāmi anāgāmi maggena adhigacchissāmi arahatta maggena phassayissāmi paccavekkhaṇena
