analyzed: sacchikarissāmi dvīsu pi nayesu phassayissāmi iti nāmakāyena nibbānam phusissāmi iti attho

original: Apuṭṭhoti mūlapadaṃ, tassa apucchitoti attho. Apucchitoti ajānāpito. Ayācitoti anāyācito.
analyzed: a puṭṭhaḥ ti mūla padam tassa a pucchitaḥ iti atthaḥ a pucchitaḥ iti a jānāpitaḥ a yācitaḥ uti an āyācitaḥ

original: Anajjhesitoti anāṇāpito, “na icchito”ti eke. Apasāditoti na pasādāpito. Pāvadatīti
analyzed: an ajjhesito ti an āṇāpitaḥ na icchitaḥ iti eke apasādito ti na pasādāpitaḥ pāvadati iti

original: kathayati. Ahamasmīti ahaṃ asmi bhavāmi. Jātiyā vāti khattiyabrāhmaṇajātiyā vā. Gottena
analyzed: kathayati aham asmi iti aham asmi bhavāmi jātiyā vā ati khattiya brāhmaṇa jātiyā vā gottena

original: vāti gotamādigottena vā. Kolaputtiyena vāti kulaputtabhāvena vā. Vaṇṇapokkharatāya
analyzed: vā ati gotama ādi gottena vā kola puttiyena vā ati kula putta bhāvena vā vaṇṇa pokkhara tāya

original: vāti sarīrasundaratāya vā. Dhanena vāti dhanasampattiyā vā. Ajjhenena vāti ajjhāyakaraṇena
analyzed: vāti sarīra sundara tāya vā dhanena vāti dhana sampattiyā vā ajjhenena vāti ajjhāya karaṇena

original: vā. Kammāyatanena vāti kammameva kammāyatanaṃ, tena kammāyatanena, kasigorakkhakammādinā
analyzed: vā kamma āyatanena vāti kammam eva kamma āyatanam tena kamma āyatanena kasi gorakkha kamma ādinā

original: vā. Sippāyatanena vāti dhanusippādinā vā. Vijjāṭṭhānena vāti aṭṭhārasavijjāṭṭhānena

original: vā. Sutena vāti bahussutaguṇena vā. Paṭibhānena vāti kāraṇākāraṇapaṭibhānasaṅkhātañāṇena
analyzed: vā sutena vā ati bahussuta guṇena vā paṭibhānena vā ati kāraṇa akāraṇa paṭibhāna saṅkhāta ñāṇena

original: vā. Aññataraññatarena vā vatthunāti jātiādīnaṃ ekekena vatthunā vā.
analyzed: vā aññatara aññatarena vā vatthunā ati jāti ādīnam ekekena vatthunā vā

original: Uccā kulāti khattiyabrāhmaṇakulā, etena jātigottamahattaṃ dīpeti. Mahābhogakulāti
analyzed: uccā khattiya brāhmaṇa kulā etena jāti gottama hattam dīpeti mahā bhoga kulā ati

original: gahapatimahāsālakulā, etena aḍḍhamahattaṃ dīpeti. Uḷārabhogakulāti avasesavessādikulā,

original: etena pahūtajātarūparajatādiṃ dīpeti. Caṇḍālāpi hi uḷārabhogā honti. Ñātoti pākaṭo.
analyzed: etena pahūta jātarūpa rajata ādim dīpa iti hi uḷāra bhogāḥ honti pākaṭaḥ

original: Yassassīti parivārasampanno. Suttantikoti suttante niyutto. Vinayadharoti vinayapiṭakadharo.
analyzed: parivāra sampannaḥ suttantikaḥ iti suttante niyuttaḥ vinaya dharo ti vinaya piṭaka dharo

original: Dhammakathikoti ābhidhammiko. Āraññikotiādayo dhutaṅgapubbaṅgamapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ
analyzed: dhamma kathiko ti ābhidhammikaḥ āraññikaḥ iti ādayaḥ dhutaṅga pubbaṅgama paṭipatti dassana ttham

original: vuttā. Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhītiādayo rūpārūpaaṭṭhasamāpattiyo dassetvā paṭivedhadassanavasena
analyzed: vuttā paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī iti ādayo rūpa arūpa aṭṭha samāpattiyaḥ dassetvā paṭivedha dassana vasena

original: vuttā. Pāvadatīti mūlapadaṃ. Kathetīti “piṭakācariyosmī”ti kathayati. Bhaṇatīti “dhutaṅgikomhī”ti
analyzed: vuttā pāvadati iti mūla padam kathā iti iti piṭakā cariyaḥ asmi iti kathayati bhaṇati iti dhutaṅgikaḥ asmi iti

original: pākaṭaṃ karoti. Dīpayatīti “rūpajjhānaṃ lābhīmhī”ti paridīpayati. Voharatīti “arūpajjhānaṃ
analyzed: pākaṭam karoti dīpayati iti rūpa jhānam lābhīmhi iti paridīpayati voharati iti arūpa jhānam

original: lābhīmhī”ti vākyabhedaṃ karoti.
analyzed: vākya bhedam karoti

original: Khandhakusalāti pañcasu khandhesu salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇesu chekā, ñātatīraṇapahānavasena
analyzed: khandha kusalā ti pañcasu khandhesu salakkhaṇa sāmañña lakkhaṇesu chekāḥ ñāta tīraṇa pahāna vasena

original: kusalāti attho. Dhātuāyatanapaṭiccasamuppādādīsupi eseva nayo. Nibbānakusalāti nibbāne
analyzed: kusalā ati atthaḥ dhātu āyatana paṭiccasamuppāda ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ nibbāna kusalā ati nibbāne

original: chekā. Anariyānanti na ariyānaṃ. Eso dhammoti eso sabhāvo. Bālānanti apaṇḍitānaṃ.
analyzed: chekāḥ anariyānam ti na ariyānam eso dhammaḥ ti esaḥ sabhāvaḥ bālānam ti apaṇḍitānam

original: Asappurisānanti na sobhanapurisānaṃ. Attāti attānaṃ.
analyzed: na sobhana purisānam attā ati attānam

original: 18. Santoti rāgādikilesūpasamena santo. Tathā abhinibbutatto. Iti’hanti sīlesu akatthamānoti
analyzed: santaḥ iti rāga ādi kilesu upasamena santaḥ tathā abhinibbuta ttaḥ itihanti sīlesu akatthamāno ti

original: “ahamasmi sīlasampanno”tiādinā nayena iti sīlesu akatthamāno, sīlanimittaṃ attupanāyikaṃ
analyzed: aham asmi sīla sampannaḥ iti ādinā nayena iti sīlesu sīla nimittam attu panāyikam

original: vācaṃ abhāsamānoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tamariyadhammaṃ kusalā vadantīti tassa taṃ akatthanaṃ
analyzed: vācam a bhāsamānaḥ iti vuttam hoti tam ariya dhammam kusalāḥ vadanti iti tassa tam a katthanam

original: “ariyadhammo eso”ti buddhādayo khandhādikusalā vadanti. Yassussadā natthi kuhiñci
analyzed: ariya dhammo eso ti buddha ādayaḥ khandha ādi kusalāḥ vadanti natthi kuhiñci

original: loketi yassa khīṇāsavassa rāgādayo sattussadā kuhiñci loke natthi. Tassa taṃ akatthanaṃ
analyzed: loke ti yassa khīṇāsavassa rāga ādayo sattuḥ sadā kuhiñci loke na atthi tassa tam a katthanam

original: “ariyadhammo eso”ti evaṃ kusalā vadantīti sambandho.
analyzed: ariya dhammo esaḥ ti evam kusalāḥ vadanti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Santoti mūlapadaṃ. Rāgassa samitattāti rañjanalakkhaṇassa rāgassa samitabhāvena.
analyzed: santo ti mūla padam rāgassa samita ttā ati rañjana lakkhaṇassa rāgassa samita bhāvena

original: Dosādīsupi eseva nayo. Vijjhātattāti sabbapariḷāhānaṃ jhāpitattā. Nibbutattāti sabbasantāpānaṃ
analyzed: dosa ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ vijjhāta ttā ati sabba pariḷāhānam jhāpita ttā nibbuta ttā ati sabba santāpānam

original: nibbāpitabhāvena. Vigatattāti sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ vigatabhāvena dūrabhāvena.
analyzed: nibbāpita bhāvena vigata ttā ati sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārānam vigata bhāvena dūra bhāvena

original: Paṭipassaddhattāti sabbākārena abhabbuppattikabhāvena. Sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnattā
analyzed: paṭipassaddhattā ati sabba ākārena abhabbuppattika bhāvena sattannam dhammānam bhinnattā

original: bhikkhūti upari vattabbānaṃ sattadhammānaṃ bhinditvā ṭhitabhāvena bhikkhu. Sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsoti
analyzed: bhikkhu iti upari vattabbānam satta dhammānam bhinditvā ṭhita bhāvena bhikkhu sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāso ti

original: ime tayo kilesā sotāpattimaggena bhinnā, rāgo dosoti ime dve kilesā oḷārikā sakadāgāmimaggena
analyzed: ime tayo kilesā sotāpatti maggena bhinnā rāgaḥ doso ti ime dve kilesā oḷārikā sakadāgāmi maggena

original: bhinnā, te eva aṇusahagatā anāgāmimaggena bhinnā, moho mānoti ime dve kilesā arahattamaggena
analyzed: bhinnā te eva aṇu sahagatāḥ anāgāmi maggena bhinnā mohaḥ ime dve kilesāḥ arahatta maggena

original: bhinnā. Avasese kilese dassetuṃ “bhinnāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā”ti āha. Saṃkilesikāti
analyzed: bhinnā avasese kilese dassetum bhinnāḥ assa honti pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammā ti āha saṃkilesikā iti

original: kilesapaccayā. Ponobhavikāti punabbhavadāyikā. Sadarāti kilesadarathā ettha santīti
analyzed: kilesa paccayā ponobhavikā ati punabbhava dāyikā sa darā ati kilesa darathāḥ ettha santi iti

original: sadarā. “Saddarā”tipi pāṭho, sahadarathāti attho. Dukkhavipākāti phalakāle dukkhadāyikā.
analyzed: sadarā saddarā atipi pāṭhaḥ sahadarathā ati atthaḥ dukkha vipākā ati phala kāle dukkha dāyikā

original: Āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyāti anāgate jātijarāmaraṇassa paccayā.
analyzed: āyatim jāti jarā maraṇiyā ti anāgate jāti jarā maraṇassa paccayā

original: Pajjena katena attanāti gāthāya ayaṃ piṇḍattho – yo attanā bhāvitena maggena parinibbānaṃ
analyzed: pajjena katena attanā iti gāthāya ayam piṇḍa atthaḥ yaḥ attanā bhāvitena maggena parinibbānam

original: gato, kilesaparinibbānaṃ patto, parinibbānagatattā eva ca vitiṇṇakaṅkho, vipattisampattihānivuddhiucchedasassataapuññapuññappabhedaṃ
analyzed: gataḥ kilesa parinibbānam pattaḥ parinibbāna gata ttā eva ca vitiṇṇa kaṅkhaḥ vipatti sampatti hāni vuddhi uccheda sassata apuñña puñña ppabhedam

original: bhavañca vibhavañca vippahāya maggavāsaṃ vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavoti etesaṃ thutivacanānaṃ araho so bhikkhūti.
analyzed: bhavam ca vibhavam ca vippahāya magga vāsam vusitavā khīṇa punabbhavaḥ ti etesam thuti vacanānam araho so bhikkhu iti

original: Itihanti, idahantīti duvidho pāṭho. Itīti padasandhiādayo sandhāya “idaha”nti pāṭhaṃ
analyzed: itihanti idahanti iti duvidhaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti iti pada sandhi ādayaḥ sandhāya idahanti pāṭham

original: na rocenti. Tattha itīti yaṃ vuttaṃ. Padasandhīti padānaṃ sandhi padasandhi, padaghaṭananti
analyzed: na rocenti tattha iti iti yam vuttam pada sandhi iti padānam sandhi pada sandhi pada ghaṭanan ti

original: attho. Padasaṃsaggoti padānaṃ ekībhāvo. Padapāripūrīti padānaṃ paripūraṇaṃ dvinnaṃ
analyzed: attho pada saṃsaggo ti padānam ekībhāvo pada pāripūrī iti padānam paripūraṇam dvinnam

original: padānaṃ ekībhāvo. Akkharasamavāyoti ekībhūtopi aparipuṇṇopi hoti, ayaṃ na evaṃ. Akkharānaṃ
analyzed: padānam ekībhāvaḥ akkhara samavāyaḥ ti ekībhūtaḥ api a paripuṇṇaḥ api hoti ayam na evam

original: samavāyo sannipāto hotīti dassanatthaṃ “akkharasamavāyo”ti āha. Byañjanasiliṭṭhatāti
analyzed: samavāyaḥ sannipātaḥ hoti iti dassana attham akkhara samavāyaḥ iti āha byañjana siliṭṭha tā ti

original: byañjanasamuccayo padamīti vuttānaṃ byañjanānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ atthabyattikāraṇānaṃ
analyzed: byañjana samuccayaḥ vuttānam byañjanānam attha byañjanānam attha byatti kāraṇānam

original: vā madhurabhāvattā pāṭhassa mudubhāvo. Padānupubbatā metanti padānaṃ anupubbabhāvo
analyzed: vā madhura bhāva ttā pāṭhassa mudu bhāvaḥ pada anupubba tā mā itanti padānam anupubba bhāvaḥ

original: padānupubbatā, padapaṭipāṭibhāvoti attho. Metanti etaṃ. Katamanti ce? Itīti idaṃ.
analyzed: pada anupubba tā pada paṭipāṭi bhāvaḥ ti atthaḥ mā itanti etam kataman ti ce iti iti idam

original: Metanti ettha ma-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. Katthī hotīti “ahamasmi sīlasampanno”ti
analyzed: ettha makāro pada sandhi vasena vutto katthī hoti iti aham asmi sīla sampannaḥ ti

original: attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā kathanasīlo hoti. Katthatīti vuttanayena kathayati. Vikatthatīti
analyzed: attānam ukkaṃsetvā kathana sīlaḥ hoti katthati iti vutta nayena kathayati vikatthati iti

original: vividhā kathayati. Katthanāti kathanā. Āratoti dūrato rato. Viratoti ṭhānasaṅkantivasena
analyzed: vividhā kathayati katthanā ati kathanā ārato ti dūratas rataḥ virataḥ iti ṭhāna saṅkanti vasena

original: vigatabhāvena rato. Paṭiviratoti tato nivattitvā sabbākārena viyutto hutvā rato.
analyzed: vigata bhāvena rato paṭivirato ti tatas nivattitvā sabba ākārena viyuttaḥ hutvā rato

original: Tattha pisācaṃ viya disvā palāto ārato. Hatthimhi maddante viya paridhāvitvā gato
analyzed: tattha pisācam viya disvā palātaḥ ārataḥ hatthimhi maddante viya paridhāvitvā gataḥ

original: virato. Yodhasampahāraṃ viya pothetvā maddetvā gato paṭivirato.
analyzed: virataḥ yodha sampahāram viya pothetvā maddetvā gataḥ paṭivirataḥ

original: Khīṇāsavassāti khīṇakilesāsavassa. Kammussadoti puññābhisaṅkhāraapuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātānaṃ kammānaṃ ussado ussannatā. Yassimeti yassa khīṇāsavassa ime ussadā.
analyzed: khīṇa āsavassa ati khīṇa kilesa āsavassa kamma ussadaḥ ti puñña abhisaṅkhāra apuñña abhisaṅkhāra āneñja abhisaṅkhāra saṅkhātānam kammānam ussadaḥ ussanna tā yassa ime iti yassa khīṇa āsavassa ime ussadā

original: 19. Evaṃ khīṇāsavapaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni diṭṭhigatikānaṃ titthiyānaṃ paṭipattiñca
analyzed: evam khīṇāsava paṭipattim dassetvā idāni diṭṭhi gatikānam titthiyānam paṭipattiñca

original: dassento āha “pakappitā saṅkhatā”ti. Tattha pakappitāti parikappitā. Saṅkhatāti paccayābhisaṅkhatā.
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha pakappitā saṅkhatā ati tattha pakappitā ati parikappitā saṅkhatā ati paccaya abhisaṅkhatā

original: Yassāti yassa kassaci diṭṭhigatikassa. Dhammāti diṭṭhiyo. Purakkhatāti purato katā.
analyzed: yassa iti yassa kassaci diṭṭhi gatikassa dhammā ati diṭṭhiyaḥ purakkhatā āti puratas katā

original: Santīti saṃvijjanti. Avīvadātāti avodātā. Yadattani passati ānisaṃsaṃ, taṃ nissito
analyzed: santi iti saṃvijjanti avīvadātā ati avodātā passati ānisaṃsam tam nissitaḥ

original: kuppapaṭiccasantinti yassete diṭṭhidhammā ‘purakkhatā avodātā santi, so evaṃvidho
analyzed: kuppa paṭicca santim ti yassa ete diṭṭhi dhammā purakkhatāḥ avodātāḥ santi saḥ evaṃvidho

original: yasmā attani tassā diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhadhammikañca sakkārādiṃ, samparāyikañca gativisesādiṃ
analyzed: yasmai attani tassā diṭṭhiyāḥ diṭṭhadhammikam ca sakkāra ādim samparāyikam ca gati visesa ādim

original: ānisaṃsaṃ sampassati, tasmā tañca ānisaṃsaṃ, tañca kuppatāya ca paṭiccasamuppannatāya
analyzed: ānisaṃsam sampassati tasmai tam ca ānisaṃsam tam ca kuppa tāya ca paṭiccasamuppanna tāya

original: ca sammutisantitāya ca kuppapaṭiccasantisaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissito ca hoti. So taṃ
analyzed: ca sammuti santi tāya ca kuppa paṭiccasanti saṅkhātam diṭṭhim nissitaḥ ca hoti saḥ tam

original: nissitattā attānaṃ vā ukkaṃseyya, pare vā vambheyya abhūtehipi guṇadosehi.
analyzed: nissita ttā attānam vā ukkaṃseyya pare vā vambheyya abhūtehi pi guṇa dosehi

original: Saṅkhatāti mūlapadaṃ. Saṅkhatāti paccayehi samāgantvā katā. Upasaggavasena padaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhatā ati mūla padam saṅkhatā ati paccayehi samāgantvā katā upasagga vasena padam

original: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Abhisaṅkhatāti paccayehi abhikatā. Saṇṭhapitāti paccayavaseneva sammā
analyzed: vaḍḍhitam paccayehi abhikatā saṇṭhapitā ati paccaya vasena iva sammā

original: ṭhapitā. Aniccāti hutvā abhāvena. Paṭiccasamuppannāti vatthārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppannā.
analyzed: ṭhapitā aniccā ati hutvā abhāvena paṭicca samuppannā ati vattha ārammaṇam paṭicca uppannā

original: Khayadhammāti kamena khayasabhāvā. Vayadhammāti pavattivasena parihāyanasabhāvā.
analyzed: khaya dhammā ati kamena khaya sabhāvā vaya dhammā ati pavatti vasena parihāyana sabhāvā

original: Virāgadhammāti anivattī hutvā vigacchanasabhāvā. Nirodhadhammāti nirujjhanasabhāvā,
analyzed: virāga dhammā ati a nivattī hutvā vigacchana sabhāvā nirodha dhammā ati nirujjhana sabhāvā

original: anuppattidhammā hutvā nirujjhanasabhāvāti attho. Diṭṭhigatikassāti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo
analyzed: an uppatti dhammā hutvā nirujjhana sabhāvā ti attho diṭṭhi gatikassa ti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyaḥ

original: gahetvā ṭhitapuggalassa.
analyzed: gahetvā ṭhita puggalassa

original: Purekkhārāti pure katā. Taṇhādhajoti ussāpitaṭṭhena taṇhādhajo, taṇhāpaṭākā assa
analyzed: purekkhārā ati pure katā taṇhā dhajoti ussāpita ṭṭhena taṇhā dhajo taṇhā paṭākā assa

original: atthīti taṇhādhajo. Purecārikaṭṭhena taṇhā eva ketu assāti taṇhāketu. Taṇhādhipateyyoti
analyzed: atthi iti purecārika ṭṭhena taṇhā eva ketu assa ati taṇhā ketu taṇhā ādhipateyyaḥ ti

original: chandādhipativasena, taṇhā adhipatito āgatāti vā taṇhādhipateyyo, taṇhādhipati vā
analyzed: chanda adhipati vasena taṇhāḥ adhipatitaḥ āgatā ati vā taṇhā ādhipateyyaḥ taṇhā adhipati vā

original: etassa atthīti taṇhādhipateyyo. Diṭṭhidhajādīsupi eseva nayo. Avodātāti aparisuddhā.
analyzed: etassa atthi iti taṇhā ādhipateyyaḥ diṭṭhi dhac ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ avodātā ati aparisuddhā

original: Saṃkiliṭṭhāti sayaṃ kiliṭṭhā. Saṃkilesikāti tapanīyā.
analyzed: saṃkiliṭṭhā ati sayam kiliṭṭhā saṃkilesikā ati tapanīyā

original: Dve ānisaṃse passatīti dve guṇe dakkhati. Diṭṭhadhammikañca ānisaṃsanti imasmiṃyeva
analyzed: dve ānisaṃse passati iti dve guṇe dakkhati diṭṭhadhammikañca ānisaṃsanti imasmiṃ yeva

original: attabhāve paccakkhadhammānisaṃsañca. Samparāyikanti paraloke pattabbaṃ ānisaṃsañca.
analyzed: atta bhāve paccakkha dhamma ānisaṃsañca samparāyikan ti para loke pattabbam ānisaṃsañca

original: Yaṃdiṭṭhiko satthā hotīti satthā yathāladdhiko bhavati. Taṃdiṭṭhikā sāvakā hontīti
analyzed: yaṃdiṭṭhikaḥ satthā hoti iti satthā yathāladdhikaḥ bhavati taṃdiṭṭhikā sāvakāḥ honti iti

original: tassa vacanaṃ suṇantā sāvakāpi tathāladdhikā honti. Sakkarontīti sakkārappattaṃ karonti.
analyzed: tassa vacanam suṇantā sāvakā api tathāladdhikāḥ honti sakkaronti iti sakkāra ppattam karonti

original: Garuṃ karontīti garukārappattaṃ karonti. Mānentīti manasā piyāyanti. Pūjentīti catupaccayābhihārapūjāya
analyzed: garum karonti iti garukāra ppattam karonti mānenti iti manasā piyāyanti pūjenti iti catu paccaya abhihāra pūjāya

original: pūjenti. Apacitiṃ karontīti apacitippattaṃ karonti. Tattha yassa cattāro paccaye
analyzed: pūjenti apacitim karonti iti apaciti ppattam karonti tattha yassa cattāro paccaye

original: sakkaritvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇīte katvā denti, so sakkato. Yasmiṃ garubhāvaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
analyzed: sakkaritvā su abhisaṅkhate paṇīte katvā denti saḥ sakkataḥ yasmin garu bhāvam paṭṭhapetvā

original: denti, so garukato. Yaṃ manasā piyāyanti, so mānito. Yassa sabbampetaṃ karonti, so
analyzed: denti saḥ garukataḥ yam manasā piyāyanti saḥ mānitaḥ yassa sabbam petam karonti so

original: pūjito. Yassa abhivādanapaccupaṭṭhānaañjalikammādivasena paramanipaccakāraṃ karonti,
analyzed: pūjitaḥ yassa abhivādana paccupaṭṭhāna añjali kamma ādi vasena parama nipaccakāram karonti

original: so apacito. Keci “sakkaronti kāyena, garuṃ karonti vācāya, mānenti cittena, pūjenti
analyzed: saḥ apacitaḥ keci sakkaronti kāyena garum karonti vācāya mānenti cittena pūjenti

original: lābhenā”ti vaṇṇayanti. Alaṃ nāgattāya vāti nāgabhāvāya nāgarājabhāvāya vā alaṃ pariyattaṃ.
analyzed: lābhena ati vaṇṇayanti alam nāga ttāya vā ati nāga bhāvāya nāga rāja bhāvāya vā alam pariyattam

original: Supaṇṇattāya vāti supaṇṇarājabhāvāya. Yakkhattāya vāti yakkhasenāpatibhāvāya. Asurattāya
analyzed: supaṇṇattāya vāti supaṇṇa rāja bhāvāya yakkhattāya vāti yakkha senāpati bhāvāya asurattāya

original: vāti asurabhāvāya. Gandhabbattāya vāti gandhabbadevaghaṭe nibbattabhāvāya. Mahārājattāya
analyzed: vāti asura bhāvāya gandhabba ttāya vāti gandhabba deva ghaṭe nibbatta bhāvāya mahā rāja ttāya

original: vāti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ aññatarabhāvāya. Indattāya vāti sakkabhāvāya. Brahmattāya
analyzed: vāti catunnam mahā rājānam aññatara bhāvāya indattāya vāti sakka bhāvāya brahmattāya

original: vāti brahmakāyikādīnaṃ aññatarabhāvāya. Devattāya vāti sammutidevādīnaṃ aññatarabhāvāya.
analyzed: vāti brahmakāyika ādīnam aññatara bhāvāya devattāya vāti sammuti deva ādīnam aññatara bhāvāya

original: Suddhiyāti parisuddhabhāvāya alaṃ pariyattaṃ. Visuddhiyāti sabbamalarahitaaccantaparisuddhabhāvāya.
analyzed: suddhiyā ati parisuddha bhāvāya alam pariyattam visuddhiyā ati sabba mala rahita accanta parisuddha bhāvāya

original: Parisuddhiyāti sabbākārena parisuddhabhāvāya.
analyzed: parisuddhiyā ti sabba ākārena parisuddha bhāvāya

original: Tattha tiracchānayoniyaṃ adhipaccattaṃ suddhiyā. Devaloke adhipaccattaṃ visuddhiyā.
analyzed: tattha tiracchānayoniyam adhipaccattam suddhiyā deva loke adhipaccattam visuddhiyā

original: Brahmaloke adhipaccattaṃ parisuddhiyā. Caturāsītikappasahassāni atikkamitvā muccanatthaṃ
analyzed: brahma loke adhipaccattam parisuddhiyā caturāsīti kappa sahassāni atikkamitvā muccana attham

original: muttiyā. Antarāyābhāvena muccanatthaṃ vimuttiyā. Sabbākārena muttiyā parimuttiyā.
analyzed: muttiyāḥ antarāya abhāvena muccana attham vimuttiyā sabba ākārena muttiyā parimuttiyā

original: Sujjhantīti tasmiṃ samaye pabbajitabhāvena suddhiṃ pāpuṇanti. Visujjhantīti pabbajjaṃ
analyzed: sujjhanti iti tasmin samaye pabbajita bhāvena suddhim pāpuṇanti visujjhanti iti pabbajjam

original: gahetvā paṭipattiyā yuttabhāvena vividhena sujjhanti. Parisujjhantīti nipphattiṃ
analyzed: gahetvā paṭipattiyā yutta bhāvena vividhena sujjhanti parisujjhanti iti nipphattim

original: pāpetvā sabbākārena sujjhanti. Muccanti tesaṃ samayantaradhammena. Vimuccanti etassa
analyzed: pāpetvā sabba ākārena sujjhanti muccanti tesam samaya antara dhammena vimuccanti etassa

original: satthuno ovādena. Parimuccanti etassa satthuno anusāsanena. Sujjhissāmītiādayo anāgatavasena
analyzed: satthuno ovādena parimuccanti etassa satthuno anusāsanena sujjhissāmi iti ādayaḥ anāgata vasena

original: vuttā. Āyatiṃ phalapāṭikaṅkhīti anāgate vipākaphalamākaṅkhamāno. Idaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ
analyzed: vuttā āyatim phala pāṭikaṅkhī iti anāgate vipāka phalam ākaṅkhamāno idam diṭṭhi gatikānam

original: icchāmattaṃ. Diṭṭhigatañhi ijjhamānaṃ nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā nipphādeti.
analyzed: icchāmattam diṭṭhi gatam hi ijjhamānam nirayam vā tiracchānayonim vā nipphādeti

original: Accantasantīti atiantanissaraṇasanti. Tadaṅgasantīti paṭhamajjhānādiguṇaṅgena nīvaraṇādiaguṇaṅgaṃ
analyzed: accanta santi iti ati anta nissaraṇa santi tad aṅga santi iti paṭhamajjhāna ādi guṇa aṅgena nīvaraṇa ādi aguṇa aṅgam

original: sametīti jhānaṃ tadaṅgasanti. Sammutisantīti samāhāravasena diṭṭhisanti. Tā vibhāgato
analyzed: sameti iti jhānam tat aṅga santi sammuti santi iti samāhāra vasena diṭṭhi santi tāḥ vibhāgato

original: dassetuṃ “katamā accantasantī”tiādimāha. Amataṃ nibbānanti evamādayo heṭṭhā vuttatthāyeva.
analyzed: dassetum katamāḥ accantasanti itiādim āha amatam nibbānam ti evamādayaḥ heṭṭhā vutta tthāya eva

original: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa nīvaraṇā santā hontīti evamādayo anto appanāyaṃ atisayavasena
analyzed: paṭhamam jhānam samāpannassa nīvaraṇā santā honti iti evamādayaḥ antaḥ appanā ayam atisaya vasena

original: vuttā. Api ca sammutisanti imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā, santīti itare dve santiyo paṭikkhipitvā
analyzed: vuttā api ca sammuti santi imasmin atthe adhippetā santi iti itare dve santiyaḥ paṭikkhipitvā

original: sammutisantimeva dīpeti. Kuppasantinti vipākajanakavasena parivattanavasena calasantiṃ.
analyzed: sammuti santim eva dīpeti kuppa santim ti vipāka janaka vasena parivattana vasena cala santim

original: Pakuppasantinti visesena calasantiṃ. Eritasantinti kampanasantiṃ. Sameritasantinti
analyzed: pakuppa santim ti visesena cala santim erita santim kampana santim samerita santim

original: visesena kampitasantiṃ. Calitasantinti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ghaṭṭitasantinti pīḷitasantiṃ.
analyzed: visesena kampita santim calita santim ti tassa iva vevacanam ghaṭṭita santim ti pīḷita santim

original: Santiṃ nissitoti diṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ santiṃ nissito. Assitoti āsito visesena nissito. Allīnoti ekībhūto.
analyzed: santim nissitoti diṭṭhi saṅkhātam santim nissitaḥ assitoti āsitaḥ visesena nissitaḥ allīnaḥ ti ekībhūtaḥ

original: 20. Evaṃ nissite tāva “diṭṭhīnivesā…pe… ādiyatī ca dhamma”nti tattha diṭṭhīnivesāti
analyzed: evam nissite tāva diṭṭhī nivesa āpe ādiyatī ca tattha diṭṭhī nivesā ti

original: Tasmā naro tesu nivesanesu, nirassatī ādiyatī ca dhammanti yasmā na hi svātivattā,
analyzed: tasmai naraḥ tesu nivesanesu nirassatī ādiyatī ca dhammanti yasmai na hi su ativattā

analyzed: tasmā naro tesu yeva diṭṭhi nivesanesu aja sīla go sīla kukkura sīla pañcātapa maruppa pāta aukkuṭika ppadhāna kaṇṭaka apassaya ādi bhedam

original: Evaṃ nirassanto ca ādiyanto ca anavaṭṭhitacittattā asantehipi guṇadosehi attano vā

original: parassa vā yasāyasaṃ uppādeyya. Durativattāti atikkamituṃ dukkhā. Duttarāti duuttarā.

original: Duppatarā dussamatikkamā dubbinivattāti upasaggena vaḍḍhitā.
analyzed: duppatarā dussamatikkamā dubbinivattā ati upasaggena vaḍḍhitā

original: Nicchinitvāti sassatavasena nicchayaṃ katvā. Vinicchinitvāti attavasena nānāvidhena

analyzed: vinicchayam katvā vicinitvā ati pariyesitvā pavicinitvā ati attaniya vasena sabba ākārena

analyzed: tathanti vipariṇāma rahitam bhūtanti vijjamānam yāthāvanti yathā sabhāvam aviparītanti na viparītam

original: Nirassatīti niassati vikkhipati. Paravicchindanāya vāti parehi vissajjāpanena. Anabhisambhuṇanto
analyzed: nirassati iti niassati vikkhipati para vicchindanāya vāti parehi vissajjāpanena an abhisambhuṇantaḥ

original: vāti asampāpuṇanto vā asakkonto vā vissajjeti. Paro vicchindetīti añño viyogaṃ karoti.

analyzed: nattha itthā ati natthi ettha sīlam an abhisambhuṇanto ati sīlam a sampādento sīlam nirassati iti

original: sīlaṃ vissajjeti. Ito paresupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: sīlam vissajja iti itas paresu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: 21. Yo panāyaṃ sabbadiṭṭhigatādidosadhunanāya paññāya samannāgatattā dhono, tassa

original: Kiṃ kāraṇāti kena kāraṇena. Dhonā vuccati paññāti dhonā iti kiṃkāraṇā paññā kathīyati.
analyzed: kim kāraṇā ati kena kāraṇena dhonā vuccati paññā ati dhonā iti kiṃkāraṇā paññā kathīyati

original: Tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritanti tāya vuttappakārāya paññāya kāyato pavattaṃ duṭṭhu
analyzed: tāya paññāya kāya duccaritan ti tāya vutta ppakārāya paññāya kāyataḥ pavattam duṭṭhu

original: kilesapūtikattā vā caritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Dhūtañca dhotañcāti kampitañca dhovitañca.

original: Arahā imehi dhoneyyehi dhammehīti rāgādīhi kilesehi dūre ṭhito arahā imehi vuttappakārehi

analyzed: lāmakam patthanam patiṭṭhāpeti mā mam jaññāti icchati iti mayham katam pāpam pare

original: Ekavidhena mānoti ekaparicchedena ekakoṭṭhāsena māno. Yā cittassa unnatīti yā cittassa abbhussāpanā, ayaṃ mānoti attho. Ettha puggalaṃ anāmasitvā nibbattitamānova vutto.
analyzed: ekavidhena māno ti eka paricchedena eka koṭṭhāsena māno yā cittassa unnati iti yā cittassa abbhussāpanā ayam māno ti atthaḥ ettha puggalam an āmasitvā nibbattita mānaḥ iva vutto

original: Attukkaṃsanamānoti attānaṃ upari ṭhapanamāno. Paravambhanamānoti pare lāmakakaraṇamāno. Ime dve mānā yebhuyyena tathā pavattākāravasena vuttā.
analyzed: attukkaṃsana mānaḥ ti attānam upari ṭhapana mānaḥ paravambhana mānaḥ iti pare lāmaka karaṇa mānaḥ ime dve mānā yebhuyyena tathā pavatta ākāra vasena vuttā

original: “Seyyohamasmī”ti mānoti jātiādīni nissāya “ahamasmi seyyo”ti uppanno māno. Sadisamānādīsupi
analyzed: seyyaḥ uham asmi iti māno ti jāti ādīni nissāya aham asmi seyyaḥ iti uppannaḥ māno sadisa māna ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Evamimepi tayo mānā puggalavisesaṃ anissāya tathā pavattākāravasena vuttā.

original: Tesu ekeko tiṇṇampi seyyasadisahīnānaṃ uppajjati. Tattha “seyyohamasmī”ti māno seyyasseva
analyzed: tesu ekekaḥ tiṇṇam pi seyya sadisa hīnānam uppajjati tattha seyyā uham asmi iti māno seyyassa iva

original: yāthāvamāno, sesānaṃ ayāthāvamāno. “Sadisohamasmī”ti māno sadisasseva yāthāvamāno,

original: sesānaṃ ayāthāvamāno. “Hīnohamasmī”ti māno hīnasseva yāthāvamāno, sesānaṃ ayāthāvamāno.

original: Catubbidhena māno lokadhammavasena vutto. Pañcavidhena māno pañcakāmaguṇavasena vutto. Chabbidhena māno cakkhādisampattivasena vutto. Tattha mānaṃ janetīti mānaṃ uppādeti.

original: Sattavidhena mānaniddese mānoti unnamo. Atimānoti “jātiādīhi mayā sadiso natthī”ti
analyzed: sattavidhena māna niddese mānoti unnamo atimānoti jāti ādīhi mayā sadiso natthi iti

analyzed: atikkamitvā maññana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ māna atimānaḥ ti ayam pubbe mayā sadisaḥ idāni

original: ahaṃ seṭṭho, ayaṃ hīnataro”ti uppanno māno. Ayaṃ bhārātibhāro viya purimaṃ sadisamānaṃ
analyzed: aham seṭṭhaḥ ayam hīnataraḥ iti uppannaḥ mānaḥ ayam bhāra atibhāraḥ viya purimam

original: upādāya mānātimāno nāmāti dassetuṃ “mānātimāno”ti āha. Omānoti hīnamāno. Yo “hīnohamasmī”ti
analyzed: upādāya mānātimānaḥ nāma ati dassetum mānātimānoti āha omāno ti hīna mānaḥ yaḥ hīnaḥ uham asmi iti

analyzed: mānaḥ nāma vuttaḥ ayam omānaḥ nāma api ca ittha tvam jātimā kāka jāti viya te jāti

analyzed: tvam caṇḍāla gottam viya te gottam tuyham saraḥ atthi kāka saraḥ viya te saraḥ ti

original: Adhosi so diṭṭhimidheva sabbanti. Yasmā so idheva attabhāve ñāṇambunā sabbadiṭṭhigataṃ

analyzed: adhosi pajahi vinodesi iti arahatta nikūṭena desanam niṭṭhāpesi tam sutvā rājā atta manaḥ

original: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā pakkāmīti.
analyzed: bhagavantam abhivādetvā pakkāmi iti

original: Rattoti vāti rāgena rattoti vā. Duṭṭhoti vātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Te abhisaṅkhārā

analyzed: muñcitabbam na atthi iti muñcitvā ṭhita ttā mocetabbam na atthi

analyzed: yassa atthi gahitanti yassa puggalassa aham mama ati gahitam atthi tassa atthi muñcitabbanti

analyzed: tassa puggalassa mocetabbam atthi upari padāni parivattetvā yojetabbāni gahaṇam

analyzed: muñcanā samatikkantoti gahaṇa mocanā arahā atikkanto buddhi parihāni vīti vatto ti vaḍḍhim ca

analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

original: 4. Suddhaṭṭhakasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā
23. Catutthe suddhaṭṭhake paṭhamagāthāya tāvattho – na, bhikkhave, evarūpena dassanena
analyzed: catutthe suddhaṭṭhake paṭhama gāthāya tāvatthaḥ na bhikkhave evarūpena dassanena

analyzed: suddhi hoti api ca kho asuddham kilesa rogāṇam adhigamā sa rogam eva

original: Paramaṃ ārogyappattanti uttamaṃ nibyādhiṃ pāpuṇitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tāṇappattanti tathā pālanappattaṃ.
analyzed: paramam uttamam nibyādhim pāpuṇitvā ṭhitam tāṇa ppattanti tathā pālana ppattam

original: Abhijānantoti visesena jānanto. Ājānantoti ājānamāno. Vijānantoti anekavidhena jānamāno. Paṭivijānantoti taṃ taṃ paṭicca vijānamāno. Paṭivijjhantoti hadaye kurumāno.
analyzed: abhijānantaḥ iti visesena jānantaḥ ājānantaḥ iti ājānamānaḥ vijānantaḥ iti anekavidhena jānamānaḥ paṭivijānantaḥ iti tam tam paṭicca vijānamānaḥ paṭivijjhantaḥ iti hadaye kurumānaḥ

original: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpadassanenāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ. Ñāṇanti paccetīti paññā

original: iti saddahati. Maggoti paccetīti “upāyo”ti saddahati. Pathoti sañcāro. Nīyānanti

original: gahetvā yātīti nīyānaṃ. “Niyyāna”nti vā pāṭho.

analyzed: diṭṭhe tathāvidha sadda saṅkhāte sute avītikkama saṅkhāte sīle hatthivata ādi bhede

analyzed: diṭṭhasuddhikā ati diṭṭhena suddhim icchamānā te ekaccānam rūpānam ete

original: Rohitamacchanti rattarohitamacchaṃ. Ājaññarathanti sindhavayuttarathaṃ. Usabhanti

original: maṅgalausabhaṃ. Gokapilanti kapilagāviṃ.
analyzed: maṅgalausabham kapilagāvim

original: Palālapuñjanti thusarāsiṃ. Takkaghaṭanti gotakkādipūritacāṭiṃ. Rittaghaṭanti tucchaghaṭaṃ.
analyzed: palāla puñjanti thusarāsim takka ghaṭanti go takka ādi pūrita cāṭim ritta ghaṭanti tuccha ghaṭam

original: Naṭanti naṭakādiṃ. “Dhuttakiriya”nti eke. Naggasamaṇakanti niccoḷasamaṇaṃ. Kharanti

analyzed: gadrabham khara yānanti gadrabha yuttam vayha ādikam eka yutta yānanti ekena vāhanena

original: saṃyuttaṃ yānaṃ. Kāṇanti ekakkhiubhayakkhikāṇaṃ. Kuṇinti hatthakuṇiṃ. Khañjanti khañjapādaṃ
analyzed: saṃyuttam yānam kāṇanti kuṇinti hattha kuṇim khañjanti khañja pādam

original: tiriyagatapādaṃ. Pakkhahatanti pīṭhasappiṃ. Jiṇṇakanti jarājiṇṇaṃ. Byādhikanti byādhipīḷitaṃ. Matanti kālaṅkataṃ.
analyzed: tiriya gata pādam pakkhahatanti pīṭhasappim jiṇṇakanti jarā jiṇṇam byādhikanti byādhi pīḷitam matanti kālaṅkatam

original: Sutasuddhikāti sotaviññāṇena sutena suddhiṃ icchamānā. Saddānaṃ savananti saddārammaṇānaṃ
analyzed: suta suddhikā ati sota viññāṇena sutena suddhim icchamānā saddānam savanan ti sadda ārammaṇānam

original: savanaṃ. Vaḍḍhāti vātiādayo loke pavattasaddamattāni gahetvā vuttā. Amaṅgalaṃ pana

original: “kāṇo”tiādinā tena tena nāmena vuttasaddāyeva. “Chinda”nti vāti hatthapādādicchinnanti
analyzed: kāṇa uti ādinā tena tena nāmena vutta saddāya iva chindanti vā

original: vā. “Bhinda”nti vāti sīsādibhinnanti vā. “Daḍḍha”nti vāti agginā jhāpitanti vā. “Naṭṭha”nti

original: Sīlasuddhikāti sīlena visuddhiṃ icchanakā. Sīlamattenāti saṃvaraṇamattena. Saṃyamamattenāti

original: uparamamattena. Saṃvaramattenāti dvārathakanamattena. Avītikkamamattenāti na atikkamitamattena.
analyzed: uparama mattena saṃvara mattena ati dvārathakana mattena avītikkama mattena ati na atikkamita mattena

original: Samaṇo muṇḍikāputtoti mātito laddhanāmaṃ. Sampannakusalanti paripuṇṇakusalaṃ. Paramakusalanti
analyzed: samaṇaḥ muṇḍikā putto ti mātitaḥ laddha nāmam sampanna kusalanti paripuṇṇa kusalam parama kusalanti

original: uttamakusalaṃ. Uttamapattippattanti uttamaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitabbataṃ patvā ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: uttama kusalam uttama patti pattanti uttamam arahattam pāpuṇitabba tam patvā ṭhitam

original: Ayojjanti parājetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ samaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ayojjanti parājetum a sakkuṇeyyam samaṇam

original: Vatasuddhikāti samādānena vatena suddhiṃ icchanakā. Hatthivatikā vāti samādinnaṃ

original: hatthivataṃ etesaṃ atthīti hatthivatikā, sabbahatthikiriyaṃ karontīti attho. Kathaṃ?

original: “Avijjāgatoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo puññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādīsu

analyzed: mahante ariya magge mahantāni sāmañña phalāni mahā abhiññāyaḥ mahantam paramattham

original: nibbānaṃ pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā.
analyzed: nibbānam pariggaṇhāti iti mahāpaññā

analyzed: puthu nānā atthesu dhammesu niruttīsu paṭibhānesu puthu nānā sīla kkhandhesu puthu nānā samādhi paññā vimutti vimutti ñāṇa dassana kkhandhesu

analyzed: sāmañña phalesu abhiññāsu puthuna anājana sādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe

original: nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
analyzed: nibbāne ñāṇam pavattati iti puthu paññā

original: Katamā hāsapaññā? Idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ

analyzed: paripūreti indriya saṃvaram paripūreti bhojane jāgariya anuyogam

original: sīlakkhandhaṃ… samādhikkhandhaṃ… paññākkhandhaṃ… vimuttikkhandhaṃ… vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ

analyzed: aniccataḥ khippam javati iti javana paññā dukkhataḥ anattataḥ khippam javati iti javana paññā

analyzed: yā kāci vedanā pe yā kāci saññā ye keci saṅkhārāḥ yam kiñci viññāṇam atīta anāgata paccuppannam pe

original: anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
analyzed: an attataḥ khippam javati iti javana paññā

analyzed: tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā rūpa nirodhe nibbāne khippam javati iti

original: javanapaññā. Vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ… cakkhuṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ
analyzed: javana paññā vedanā saññā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam cakkhuṃpe jarā maraṇam atīta anāgata paccuppannam

analyzed: vicikicchā uppajjati tam vinodetvā viharatam appamattakena visesa adhigamena

analyzed: upakārāya saṃvattati tasmai nam tava senā iti niddisantaḥ āha esā namuci te senā

analyzed: samugghāṭitāni iti visesena uppāṭitāni

analyzed: karoti hīnā ati aññe tatas sabbam āha ati tam attano satthāra ādim ṭhapetvā tatas aññe sabbe

original: “hīnā ime”ti āha. Tasmā vivādāni avītivattoti tena kāraṇena so diṭṭhikalahe avītivattova hoti.
analyzed: hīnāḥ ime iti āha tasmai vivādāni avītivatto iti tena kāraṇena so diṭṭhi kalahe avītivatto va hoti

original: Vasantīti paṭhamuppannadiṭṭhivasena vasanti. Pavasantīti pavisitvā vasanti. Āvasantīti
analyzed: vasanti iti paṭhama uppanna diṭṭhi vasena vasanti pavasanti iti pavisitvā vasanti āvasanti iti

original: visesena vasanti. Parivasantīti sabbabhāgena vasanti. Taṃ upamāya sādhento “yathā
analyzed: visesena vasanti parivasanti iti sabba bhāgena vasanti tam upamāya sādhentaḥ yathā

original: āgārikā vā”tiādimāha. Āgārikā vāti gharasāmikā. Gharesu vasantīti attano gharesu
analyzed: āgārikāḥ vā iti ādim āha āgārikāḥ vā ati ghara sāmikāḥ gharesu vasanti iti gharesu

original: āsaṅkavirahitā hutvā nivasanti. Sāpattikā vāti āpattibahulā. Sakilesā vāti rāgādikilesabahulā.
analyzed: āsaṅka virahitāḥ hutvā nivasanti sa āpattikā vāti āpatti bahulā sa kilesā vāti rāga ādi kilesa bahulā

original: Uttariṃ karotīti atirekaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ satthā sabbaññūti ‘ayaṃ amhākaṃ satthā sabbaṃ jānāti’.
analyzed: uttarim karoti iti atirekam karoti ayam satthā sabbaññu iti ayam amhākam satthā sabbam jānāti

original: Sabbe parappavāde khipatīti sabbā paraladdhiyo chaḍḍeti. Ukkhipatīti nīharati. Parikkhipatīti parammukhe karoti. Diṭṭhimedhagānīti diṭṭhivihesakāni.
analyzed: sabbe para pavāde khipati iti sabbā para laddhiyaḥ chaḍḍeti ukkhipati iti nīharati parikkhipati iti parammukhe karoti diṭṭhi medhagāni iti diṭṭhi vihesakāni

original: 32. Dutiyagāthāyattho – evaṃ avītivatto ca yaṃ diṭṭhe sute sīlavate muteti etesu
analyzed: evam ca yam diṭṭhe sute sīlavate muta iti etesu

original: catūsu vatthūsu uppannadiṭṭhisaṅkhāte attani pubbe vuttappakāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ passati,
analyzed: catūsu vatthūsu uppanna diṭṭhi saṅkhāte attani pubbe vutta ppakāram ānisaṃsam passati

original: tadeva so tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā ānisaṃsaṃ “idaṃ seṭṭha”nti abhinivisitvā aññaṃ sabbaṃ

original: parasatthārādikaṃ nihīnato passati.
analyzed: para satthāra ādikam nihīnataḥ passati

original: Dve ānisaṃse passatīti dve guṇe oloketi. Diṭṭhadhammikañcāti diṭṭhe paccakkhe attabhāve

analyzed: vipaccana karaṇam samparāyikam ca ati para loke paṭilabhitabba guṇam ca yaṃdiṭṭhikaḥ satthā ati

original: yaṃladdhiko titthāyatanasāmiko. Alaṃ nāgattāya vāti nāgarājabhāvāya vā pariyattaṃ.
analyzed: titthāyatana sāmikaḥ alam nāga ttāya vāti nāga rāja bhāvāya vā pariyattam

original: Supaṇṇattādīsupi eseva nayo. Devattāya vāti sammutidevādibhāvāya. Āyatiṃ phalapāṭikaṅkhī
analyzed: supaṇṇatta ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ devattāya vāti sammuti deva ādi bhāvāya āyatim phala pāṭikaṅkhī

analyzed: hoti iti anāgate vipāka phalam patthayānaḥ hoti diṭṭha suddhiyā api dve ānisaṃse passati iti

original: dve guṇe oloketi. Sutasuddhiyādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: dve guṇe oloka iti esa iva nayaḥ

original: 33. Tatiyagāthāyattho – evaṃ passato ca yaṃ attano satthārādiṃ nissito aññaṃ parasatthārādiṃ
analyzed: evam passataḥ ca yam attano satthārā ādim nissitaḥ aññam para satthārā ādim

analyzed: na abhiniveseyya ati vuttam hoti

original: Dhātuāyatanapaṭiccasamuppādasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādaindriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaphalanibbānesupi

original: eseva nayo. Tattha maggakusalāti catūsu maggesu. Phalakusalāti catūsu phalesu. Nibbānakusalāti
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ tattha magga kusalā ati catūsu maggesu phala kusalā ati catūsu phalesu nibbāna kusalā ati

original: duvidhe nibbāne chekā. Te kusalāti te etesu vuttappakāresu chekā. Evaṃ vadantīti
analyzed: duvidhe nibbāne chekā te kusalā ati te etesu vutta ppakāresu chekā evam vadanti iti

original: evaṃ kathenti. Gantho esoti passato ca attano satthārādinissitañca aññaṃ parasatthārādiṃ
analyzed: evam kathenti gantho eso ti passataḥ ca attano satthāra ādi nissitam ca aññam para satthāra ādim

original: hīnato dassanañca gantho bandhano esoti vadanti. Lagganaṃ etanti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
analyzed: hīnataḥ dassanam ca ganthaḥ bandhano eso ti vadanti lagganam etat ti etam vutta ppakāram

original: nāgadante laggitaṃ viya adholambanaṃ. Bandhanaṃ etanti nicchindituṃ dukkhaṭṭhena
analyzed: nāga dante laggitam viya adhas lambanam bandhanam etat ti nicchinditum dukkhaṭṭhena

original: saṅkhalikādibandhanaṃ viya etaṃ bandhanaṃ. Palibodho esoti saṃsārato nikkhamituṃ

original: appadānaṭṭhena eso palibodho.
analyzed: appadāna ṭṭhena eso palibodho

original: 34. Catutthagāthāyattho – na kevalaṃ diṭṭhasutādīsu na nissayeyya, apica kho pana
analyzed: na kevalam diṭṭha suta ādīsu na apica kho pana

original: asañjātaṃ uparūpari diṭṭhimpi lokasmiṃ na kappayeyya, na janeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kīdisaṃ?
analyzed: a sañjātam upari upari diṭṭhim pi lokasmim na kappayeyya na janeyya ati vuttam hoti kīdisam

original: diṭṭhiṃ na kappeyya. Na kevalañca diṭṭhiṃ na kappayeyya, apica kho pana mānenapi
analyzed: diṭṭhim na kappeyya na kevalañca diṭṭhim na kappayeyya apica kho pana mānena api

original: jātiādīhi vatthūhi samoti attānamanūpaneyya, hīno na maññetha visesi vāpīti.
analyzed: jāti ādīhi vatthūhi samaḥ ti attānam anūpaneyya hīnaḥ na maññetha visesi vā api iti

original: Aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vāti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ sampayuttapaññāya

original: vā. Pañcābhiññāñāṇena vāti lokiyānaṃ pañcannaṃ abhiññānaṃ sampayuttapaññāya vā. Micchāñāṇena
analyzed: vā pañca abhiññā ñāṇena vā ati lokiyānam pañcannam abhiññānam sampayutta paññāya vā micchā ñāṇena

original: 35. Pañcamagāthāyattho – evañhi diṭṭhiṃ akappento amaññamāno ca attaṃ pahāya anupādiyāno
analyzed: evam hi diṭṭhim a kappentaḥ a maññamānaḥ ca attam pahāya an upādiyānaḥ

analyzed: yam pubbe gahitam tam pahāya param aggaṇhanto tasmim pi vutta ppakāre ñāṇe duvidham

original: nissayaṃ no karoti, akaronto ca sa ve viyattesu nānādiṭṭhivasena bhinnesu sattesu

original: na pacceti, na paccāgacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: na pacceti na paccāgacchati iti vuttam hoti

original: Catūhi upādānehīti kāmupādānādīhi catūhi bhusaṃ gahaṇehi sa ve viyattesūti so puggalo nicchitesu. Bhinnesūti dvidhā bhinnesu.
analyzed: catūhi upādānehi iti kāma upādāna ādīhi catūhi gahaṇehi sa ve viyattesu iti saḥ puggalaḥ nicchitesu bhinnesu iti dvidhā bhinnesu

original: 36. Idāni yo so imāya gāthāya vutto khīṇāsavo, tassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ “yassūbhayante”tiādikā
analyzed: idāni yaḥ saḥ imāya gāthāya vuttaḥ khīṇa āsavaḥ tassa vaṇṇa bhaṇana attham

original: tisso gāthāyo āha. Tattha paṭhamagāthāya yassūbhayanteti pubbe vutte phassādibhede.
analyzed: tissaḥ gāthāyaḥ āha tattha paṭhama gāthāya pubbe vutte phassa ādi bhede

original: Paṇidhīti taṇhā. Bhavābhavāyāti punappunabhavāya. Idha vā huraṃ vāti sakattabhāvādibhede
analyzed: taṇhā bhava abhavāya ati punappunabhavāya vā vāti

original: idha vā parattabhāvādibhede parattha vā.
analyzed: idha vā paratta bhāva ādi bhede vā

original: Phasso eko antoti cakkhusamphassādiko eko koṭṭhāso. Phassasamudayoti vatthārammaṇo.
analyzed: phassaḥ ekaḥ anto ti cakkhu samphassa ādikaḥ ekaḥ koṭṭhāso phassa samudayo ti vattha ārammaṇo

original: Yato samudeti uppajjati, so samudayo. Dutiyo antoti dutiyo koṭṭhāso. Atītanti ati
analyzed: yatas samudeti uppajjati saḥ samudayaḥ dutiyaḥ anto ti dutiyaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ atīta nti ati

analyzed: itam atītam atikkantanti vuttam hoti anāgatanti na āgatam anuppannanti vuttam

original: hoti. Sukhā vedanādayo visabhāgavasena. Nāmarūpadukaṃ namanaruppanavasena. Ajjhattikādayo
analyzed: hoti sukhāḥ vedanā ādayaḥ visa bhāga vasena nāma rūpa dukam namana ruppana vasena ajjhattika ādayaḥ

original: ajjhattabāhiravasena. Sakkāyādayo khandhapañcakānaṃ pavattisamudayavasena vuttāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ajjhatta bāhira vasena sakkāya ādayaḥ khandha pañcakānam pavatti samudaya vasena vuttā iti veditabbā

original: Sakattabhāvoti attano attabhāvo. Parattabhāvoti parassa attabhāvo.
analyzed: sakattabhāvo ti attanaḥ atta bhāvo parattabhāvo ti parassa atta bhāvo

original: 37. Dutiyagāthāya diṭṭhe vāti diṭṭhasuddhiyā vā. Esa nayo sutādīsu. Saññāti saññāsamuṭṭhāpikā diṭṭhi.
analyzed: dutiya gāthāya diṭṭhe vā ati diṭṭha suddhiyā vā esa nayo suta ādīsu saññā ati saññā samuṭṭhāpikā diṭṭhi

original: Aparāmasantanti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na parāmasantaṃ. Anabhinivesantanti teheva anabhinivisantaṃ.
analyzed: a parāmasantam ti taṇhā māna diṭṭhīhi na parāmasantam an abhinivesantam ti tehi iva an abhinivisantam

original: “Vinibaddho”ti vāti mānena vinibaddhoti vā. “Parāmaṭṭho”ti vāti parato niccasukhasubhādīhi
analyzed: vinibaddhaḥ iti vā ati mānena vinibaddhaḥ iti vā parāmaṭṭhaḥ iti vā ati paratas nicca sukha subha ādīhi

original: parāmaṭṭhoti vā. Vikkhepagatoti uddhaccavasena. Aniṭṭhaṅgatoti vicikicchāvasena.
analyzed: parāmaṭṭho ti vā vikkhepa gato ti uddhacca vasena aniṭṭhaṅgato ti vicikicchā vasena

original: Thāmagatoti anusayavasena. Gatiyāti gantabbavasena.
analyzed: anusaya vasena gatiyā iti gantabba vasena

original: 38. Tatiyagāthāya dhammāpi tesaṃ na paṭicchitāseti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatadhammāpi tesaṃ
analyzed: tatiya gāthāya dhammā api tesam na dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gata dhammā api tesam

analyzed: idam eva saccam mogham aññanti evam na paṭicchitā pāraṅgataḥ na pacceti tādi iti nibbāna pāram

original: gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna nāgacchati pañcahi ca ākārehi tādī hotīti. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
analyzed: gataḥ tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna na āgacchati pañcahi ca ākārehi tādī hoti iti sesam pākaṭam eva

original: diṭṭhi. Dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhīti “natthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattā diṭṭhi. Antaggāhikādiṭṭhīti
analyzed: diṭṭhi dasa vatthukā micchādiṭṭhī iti natthi dinna nti ādi naya ppavattā diṭṭhi antaggāhikādiṭṭhīti

original: “sassato loko idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”ntiādinayappavattā ekekaṃ antaṃ atthīti
analyzed: sassataḥ lokaḥ idam eva saccam mogham aññanti ādi naya ppavattā ekekam antam atthi iti

original: gahetvā pavattā diṭṭhi. Yā evarūpā diṭṭhīti idāni vuccamānānaṃ ekūnavīsapadānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā pavattā diṭṭhi yā evarūpā diṭṭhī iti idāni vuccamānānam ekūnavīsa padānam sādhāraṇam

original: mūlapadaṃ. Yā diṭṭhi, tadeva diṭṭhigataṃ; yā diṭṭhi, tadeva diṭṭhigahananti sabbesaṃ
analyzed: mūla padam yā diṭṭhi tat eva diṭṭhi gatam yā diṭṭhi tat eva diṭṭhi gahanan ti sabbesam

original: sambandho kātabbo. Yā ayāthāvadassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhi, tadeva diṭṭhīsu gataṃ dassanaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ kātabbaḥ yā a yāthāvadassana ṭṭhena diṭṭhi tat eva diṭṭhīsu gatam dassanam

original: dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyā antogatattāti diṭṭhigataṃ. Heṭṭhāpissa attho vuttoyeva.
analyzed: dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyāḥ antogata ttā ti diṭṭhi gatam heṭṭhā api issa atthaḥ vuttaḥ yeva

original: Dvinnaṃ antānaṃ ekantagatattātipi diṭṭhigataṃ. Tattha sassatoti nicco. Lokoti attā.
analyzed: dvinnam antānam diṭṭhi gatam tattha sassatoti niccaḥ loko ti attā

original: “Idha sarīraṃyeva nassati, attā pana idha parattha ca soyevā”ti maññanti. So hi sāmaññeva
analyzed: idha sarīraṃya iva nassati attā pana idha parattha ca soyā iva ati maññanti so hi sāmaññā iva

original: āloketīti katvā lokoti maññati. Asassatoti anicco. Attā sarīreneva saha nassatīti
analyzed: āloka iti iti katvā maññati a sassatoti aniccaḥ attā sarīrena iva saha nassati iti

analyzed: maññanti antavāti paritte kasiṇe jhānam uppādetvā tam paritta kasiṇa ārammaṇam cetanam

original: “sapariyanto attā”ti maññanti. Ananta vāti na antavā appamāṇe kasiṇe jhānaṃ uppādetvā
analyzed: sapariyantaḥ attā iti maññanti ananta vāti na antavā appamāṇe kasiṇe jhānam uppādetvā

original: taṃ appamāṇakasiṇārammaṇaṃ cetanaṃ “apariyanto attā”ti maññanti. Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti

analyzed: ca sarīram ca attā liṅga vipallāsena napuṃsaka vacanam katam

original: Sarīranti rāsaṭṭhena khandhapañcakaṃ. Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti añño jīvo aññaṃ
analyzed: sarīranti rāsaṭṭhena khandha pañcakam aññam jīvam aññam sarīranti aññaḥ jīvaḥ aññam

original: khandhapañcakaṃ. Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti khandhā idheva vinassanti, satto maraṇato
analyzed: khandha pañcakam hoti tathāgataḥ param maraṇā ati khandhāḥ idha iva vinassanti satto maraṇato

analyzed: param hoti vijjati na nassati tathāgataḥ ti ca itam satta adhivacananti keci pana tathāgataḥ ti

original: arahā”ti vadanti. Ime na hotīti pakkhe dosaṃ disvā evaṃ gaṇhanti. Na hoti tathāgato
analyzed: arahā ati vadanti ime na hoti iti pakkhe dosam disvā evam gaṇhanti na hoti tathāgato

original: paraṃ maraṇāti khandhāpi idheva nassanti, tathāgato ca maraṇato paraṃ na hoti ucchijjati.
analyzed: param khandhā api idha iva nassanti tathāgato ca maraṇataḥ param na hoti ucchijjati

original: Udakathevoti udakassa thevo. “Udakatthevako”tipi pāṭho. Padumapatteti paduminipatte.

original: 48. Dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutamutesu vāti atrāpi yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ,
analyzed: dhonaḥ na hi tena maññati yat idam diṭṭha suta mutesu vāti atra api yat idam diṭṭha sutam

original: tena vatthunā na maññati, mutesu vā dhammesu na maññatīti evameva sambandho veditabbo.
analyzed: tena vatthunā na maññati mutesu vā dhammesu na maññati iti evam eva sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Na hi so rajjati, no virajjatīti bālaputhujjano viya na rajjati, kalyāṇaputhujjanasekkhā
analyzed: na hi saḥ rajjati no virajjati iti bāla puthujjanaḥ viya na rajjati kalyāṇa puthujjana sekkhā

original: viya na virajjati, rāgassa khīṇattā “viratto”tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
analyzed: viya na virajjati rāgassa khīṇattā virattaḥ tu eva saṅkham gacchati sesam pākaṭam eva ati

original: Tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritanti sampayuttāya pubbabhāgāyeva vā paññāya pariggahetabbe
analyzed: tāya paññāya kāya duccaritanti sampayuttāya pubbabhāgāya iva vā paññāya pariggahetabbe

original: pariggaṇhanto yogī tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ samucchedavasena dhunāti. Ayañca puggalo
analyzed: pariggaṇhantaḥ yogī tividham kāya duccaritam samuccheda vasena dhunāti ayaṃ ca puggalaḥ

original: vipannadhammaṃ desanādhammesu dhunantesu taṃdhammasamaṅgīpuggalopi dhunāti nāma.
analyzed: vipanna dhammam desanā dhammesu dhunantesu tad dhamma samaṅgī puggalaḥ api dhunāti nāma

original: Te ca dhamme paññāya attano pavattikkhaṇe dhunitumāraddho dhutāti vuccati, yathā
analyzed: te ca dhamme paññāya attano pavatti kkhaṇe dhunitum āraddhaḥ dhuta ati vuccati yathā

original: bhuñjitumāraddho bhuttoti vuccati. Lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthato veditabbaṃ. Dhutanti
analyzed: bhuñjitum āraddhaḥ bhuttaḥ ti vuccati lakkhaṇam pana ittha sadda satthataḥ veditabbam dhutanti

original: kattusādhanaṃ. Dhutaṃ paṭhamamaggena. Dhotaṃ dutiyamaggena. Sandhotaṃ tatiyamaggena.
analyzed: kattu sādhanam dhutam paṭhama maggena dhotam dutiya maggena sandhotam tatiya maggena

original: Niddhotaṃ catutthamaggena.
analyzed: catuttha maggena

original: Dhono diṭṭhaṃ na maññatīti arahā maṃsacakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ
analyzed: dhonaḥ diṭṭham na maññati iti arahā maṃsa cakkhunā diṭṭham dibba cakkhunā diṭṭham rūpa āyatanam

original: na maññati tīhi maññanāhi, kathaṃ? Rūpāyatanaṃ subhasaññāya sukhasaññāya ca passanto
analyzed: na maññati tīhi maññanāhi katham rūpa āyatanam subha saññāya sukha saññāya ca passanto

original: na tattha chandarāgaṃ janeti na taṃ assādeti nābhinandati, evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya
analyzed: na tattha chanda rāgam janeti na tam assādeti na abhinandati evam diṭṭham taṇhā maññanāya

original: na maññati. “Iti me rūpaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhāna”nti vā panettha nandiṃ na samannāneti.
analyzed: na maññati iti me rūpam siyā vā pana ittha nandim na

original: Rūpasampadaṃ vā ākaṅkhamāno dānaṃ na deti, sīlaṃ na samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ na
analyzed: rūpa sampadam vā ākaṅkhamānaḥ dānam na deti sīlam na samādiyati uposatha kammam na

original: karoti. Evampi diṭṭhaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya na maññati, attano pana parassa ca rūpasampattivipattiṃ
analyzed: karoti evam pi diṭṭham taṇhā maññanāya na maññati attanaḥ pana parassa ca rūpa sampatti vipattim

original: nissāya mānaṃ na janeti. “Imināhaṃ seyyosmīti vā, sadisosmīti vā, hīnosmīti vā”ti
analyzed: nissāya mānam na janeti iminā aham seyyaḥ asmi iti vā sadisaḥ asmi iti vā hīnaḥ asmi iti vā ati

original: evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ mānamaññanāya na maññati. Rūpāyatanaṃ pana “niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassata”nti
analyzed: evam diṭṭham māna maññanāya na maññati rūpa āyatanam pana niccam dhuvam

original: na maññati. Attānaṃ “attaniya”nti na maññati. Maṅgalaṃ “amaṅgala”nti na maññati.
analyzed: na maññati attānam attaniyanti na maññati maṅgalam a maṅgalanti na maññati

original: Evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya na maññati. Diṭṭhasmiṃ na maññatīti rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ
analyzed: evam diṭṭham diṭṭhi maññanāya na maññati diṭṭhasmin na maññati iti rūpasmin attānam

original: samanupassananayena amaññanto diṭṭhasmiṃ na maññati. Yathā vā thane thaññaṃ, evaṃ
analyzed: samanupassana nayena a maññantaḥ diṭṭhasmin na maññati yathā vā thane evam

original: rūpasmiṃ rāgādayoti amaññantopi diṭṭhasmiṃ na maññati. Tasmiṃyeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya
analyzed: rūpasmim rāga ādayo ti a maññantaḥ api diṭṭhasmim na maññati tasmin yeva panassa diṭṭhi maññanāya

original: amaññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca na uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi natthīti veditabbā.
analyzed: a maññite vatthusmim sineham mānam ca na uppādayato taṇhā māna maññanā api na atthi iti veditabbā

original: Evaṃ diṭṭhasmiṃ na maññati. Diṭṭhato na maññatīti ettha pana diṭṭhatoti nissakkavacanaṃ.
analyzed: evam diṭṭhasmin na maññati diṭṭhataḥ na maññati iti ettha pana diṭṭhato ti nissakka vacanam

original: Tasmā saupakāraṇassa attano vā parassa vā yathāvuttappabhedato diṭṭhato upapatti
analyzed: tasmā saupakāraṇassa attanaḥ vā parassa vā yathāvutta ppabhedataḥ diṭṭhataḥ upapatti

original: vā niggamanaṃ vā diṭṭhato vā añño attāti amaññamāno diṭṭhato na maññatīti veditabbo.
analyzed: vā niggamanam vā diṭṭhataḥ vā aññaḥ attā ati a maññamānaḥ diṭṭhataḥ na maññati iti veditabbaḥ

original: Ayamassa na diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya amaññite vatthusmiṃ
analyzed: ayam assa na diṭṭhi maññanā tasmiṃ yeva panassa diṭṭhi maññanāya a maññite vatthusmiṃ

original: sinehaṃ mānañca na uppādayato na taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
analyzed: sineham mānam ca na uppādayataḥ na taṇhā māna maññanā api veditabbā

original: Diṭṭhā meti na maññatīti ettha pana “etaṃ mamā”ti taṇhāvasena amamāyamāno diṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhā mā iti na maññati iti ettha pana etam mama ati taṇhā vasena amamāyamānaḥ diṭṭham

original: taṇhāmaññanāya na maññati. Sutanti maṃsasotenapi sutaṃ, dibbasotenapi sutaṃ, saddāyatanassetaṃ
analyzed: taṇhā maññanāya na maññati sutanti maṃsa sotena api sutam dibba sotena api sutam sadda āyatanassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Mutanti mutvā munitvā ca gahitaṃ āhacca upagantvāti attho. Indriyānaṃ
analyzed: adhivacanam mutanti mutvā munitvā ca gahitam upagantvā

original: ārammaṇānañca aññamaññaṃ saṃkilese viññātanti vuttaṃ hoti. Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇānam ca aññam aññam saṃkilese viññātam ti vuttam hoti gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba āyatanānam

original: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Viññātanti manasā viññātaṃ, sesānaṃ sattānaṃ āyatanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
analyzed: etam adhivacanam viññātanti manasā viññātam sesānam sattānam āyatanānam etam adhivacanam

original: dhammārammaṇassa vā, idha pana sakkāyapariyāpannameva labbhati. Vitthāro panettha
analyzed: dhamma ārammaṇassa vā idha pana sakkāya pariyāpannam eva labbhati vitthāro pana ittha

original: diṭṭhavāre vuttanayena veditabbo.
analyzed: diṭṭhavāre vutta nayena veditabbaḥ

original: Idāni bhagavatā vuttasuttavasena dassento “asmīti bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha asmīti
analyzed: idāni bhagavatā vutta sutta vasena dassentaḥ asmi iti bhikkhave ti ādim āha tattha asmi iti

original: bhavāmi, niccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Maññitametanti diṭṭhikappanaṃ etaṃ. Ayamahamasmīti
analyzed: bhavāmi niccassa etam adhivacanam maññitam etat ti diṭṭhi kappanam etam ayam aham asmi iti

original: ayaṃ ahaṃ asmi bhavāmi.
analyzed: ayam aham asmi bhavāmi

original: Aññatra satipaṭṭhānehīti ṭhapetvā catusatipaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: aññatra sati paṭṭhānehi iti ṭhapetvā catu sati paṭṭhāne

original: Sabbe bālaputhujjanā rajjantīti sakalā andhabālā nānājanā lagganti. Satta sekkhā
analyzed: sabbe bāla puthujjanāḥ rajjanti iti sakalāḥ andha bālāḥ nānā janāḥ lagganti satta sekkhā

original: virajjantīti sotāpannādayo satta ariyajanā virāgaṃ āpajjanti. Arahā neva rajjati
analyzed: virajjanti iti sotāpanna ādayo satta ariya janāḥ virāgam āpajjanti arahā na iva rajjati

original: no virajjatīti kilesānaṃ parinibbāpitattā ubhayampi na karoti. Khayā rāgassātiādayo
analyzed: no virajjati iti kilesānam parinibbāpita ttā ubhayam pi na karoti khayā rāgassa ati ādayaḥ

original: tividhāpi nibbānameva.
analyzed: tividhā api nibbānam eva

original: Saddhammappajjotikāya mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

original: Jarāsuttaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: jarā sutta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 7. Tissametteyyasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā
49. Sattame tissametteyyasutte methunamanuyuttassāti methunadhammaṃ samāyuttassa.
analyzed: sattame tissametteyya sutte methunam anuyuttassa ati methuna dhammam samāyuttassa

original: Itīti evamāha. Āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ. Tissoti nāmaṃ tassa therassa. Sopi hi tissoti
analyzed: iti iti evam āha tissaḥ iti nāmam tassa therassa saḥ api hi tissaḥ ti

original: nāmena. Metteyyoti gottaṃ, gottavaseneva esa pākaṭo ahosi. Tasmā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: nāmena metteyyaḥ ti gottam gotta vasena iva esa pākaṭaḥ ahosi tasmai aṭṭhuppattiyam vuttam

original: – “tissametteyyā nāma dve sahāyā”ti. Vighātanti upaghātaṃ. Brūhīti ācikkha. Mārisāti
analyzed: tissametteyyā nāma dve sahāyā ati vighātam ti upaghātam brūhi iti ācikkha mārisa ati

original: piyavacanametaṃ, niddukkhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sutvāna tava sāsananti tava vacanaṃ sutvā.
analyzed: piya vacanam etam niddukkha ati vuttam hoti sutvāna tava sāsanam ti tava vacanam sutvā

original: Viveke sikkhissāmaseti sahāyaṃ ārabbha dhammadesanaṃ yācanto bhaṇati, so pana sikkhitasikkhoyeva.
analyzed: viveke sikkhissāmase iti sahāyam ārabbha dhamma desanam yācantaḥ bhaṇati saḥ pana sikkhita sikkhaḥ yā eva

original: Methunadhammo nāmāti idaṃ niddisitabbassa methunadhammassa upadesapadaṃ. Asaddhammoti
analyzed: methuna dhammo nāma ati idam niddisitabbassa methuna dhammassa upadesa padam asat dhammaḥ ti

original: asataṃ nīcajanānaṃ dhammo. Gāmadhammoti gāmavāsīnaṃ sevanadhammo. Vasaladhammoti
analyzed: asatam nīca janānam dhammaḥ gāma dhammaḥ oti gāma vāsīnam sevana dhammaḥ vasala dhammaḥ iti

original: vasalānaṃ dhammo, kilesavassanato vā sayameva vasalo dhammoti vasaladhammo. Duṭṭhulloti
analyzed: vasalānam dhammo kilesa vassanataḥ vā sayam eva vasalaḥ dhammo ti vasala dhammo duṭṭhullo ti

original: duṭṭho ca kilesehi duṭṭhattā, thūlo ca anipuṇabhāvatoti duṭṭhullo. Yasmā ca tassa
analyzed: duṭṭhaḥ ca kilesehi duṭṭha ttā thūlaḥ ca a nipuṇa bhāvato ti duṭṭhullaḥ yasmā ca tassa

original: dhammassa parivārabhūtaṃ dassanampi gahaṇampi āmasanampi phusanampi ghaṭṭanampi duṭṭhullaṃ,
analyzed: dhammassa parivāra bhūtam dassanam pi gahaṇam pi āmasanam pi phusanam pi ghaṭṭanam pi duṭṭhullam

original: tasmāpi duṭṭhullo so methunadhammo. Odakantikoti udakaṃ assa ante suddhatthaṃ ādiyatīti
analyzed: tasmā api duṭṭhullaḥ saḥ methuna dhammo odakantikaḥ iti udakam assa ante suddhattham ādiyati iti

original: udakanto, udakantoyeva odakantiko. Raho paṭicchanne okāse kattabbatāya rahasso. Vinaye
analyzed: udakantaḥ odakantoya iva odakantikaḥ raho paṭicchanne okāse kattabbatāya rahassaḥ vinaye

original: pana “duṭṭhullaṃ odakantikaṃ rahassa”nti pāṭho. Tattha tīsu padesu yo soti padaṃ
analyzed: pana duṭṭhullam odaka ntikam rahassanti pāṭhaḥ tattha tīsu padesu yaḥ so ti padam

original: parivattetvā yaṃ tanti katvā yojetabbaṃ “yaṃ taṃ duṭṭhullaṃ, so methunadhammo, yaṃ
analyzed: parivattetvā yam tanti katvā yojetabbam yam tam duṭṭhullam saḥ methuna dhammaḥ yam

original: taṃ odakantikaṃ so methunadhammo, yaṃ taṃ rahassaṃ, so methunadhammo”ti. Idha pana
analyzed: tam odakantikam saḥ methuna dhammo yam tam rahassam saḥ methuna dhammaḥ ti idha pana

original: “yo so asaddhammo, so methunadhammo…pe… yo so rahasso, so methunadhammo”ti evaṃ yojanā
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ asat dhammo saḥ methuna dhammaḥ upe yaḥ saḥ rahassaḥ saḥ methuna dhammaḥ ti evam yojanā

original: veditabbā. Dvayena dvayena samāpajjitabbato dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti. Tattha yojanā –
analyzed: veditabbā dvayena dvayena samāpajjitabbataḥ dvayaṃdvaya samāpatti tattha yojanā

original: yā sā dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti, so methunadhammo nāmāti. Kiṃkāraṇā vuccati methunadhammoti
analyzed: yā sā dvayaṃdvaya samāpatti so methuna dhammaḥ nāma ati kiṃkāraṇā vuccati methuna dhammo ti

original: kena kāraṇena kena pariyāyena methunadhammoti kathīyati. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento “ubhinnaṃ
analyzed: kena kāraṇena kena pariyāyena methuna dhammaḥ ti kathīyati tam kāraṇam dassentaḥ ubhinnam

original: rattāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha ubhinnaṃ rattānanti dvinnaṃ itthipurisānaṃ rāgena rañjitānaṃ.
analyzed: rattānanti ādim āha tattha ubhinnam rattānanti dvinnam itthi purisānam rāgena rañjitānam

original: Sārattānanti visesena suṭṭhu rañjitānaṃ. Avassutānanti kilesena tintānaṃ. Pariyuṭṭhitānanti
analyzed: sārattānam ti visesena suṭṭhu rañjitānam avassutānam ti kilesena tintānam pariyuṭṭhitānam ti

original: kusalācāraṃ pariyādiyitvā madditvā ṭhitānaṃ “magge corā pariyuṭṭhitā”tiādīsu viya.
analyzed: kusala ācāram madditvā ṭhitānam magge corā pariyuṭṭhitā ti ādīsu

original: Pariyādinnacittānanti kusalacittaṃ pariyādiyitvā khepetvā ṭhitacittānaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ
analyzed: pariyādinna cittānam ti kusala cittam pariyādiyitvā khepetvā ṭhita cittānam ubhinnam

original: sadisānanti dvinnaṃ kilesena sadisānaṃ. Dhammoti sabhāvo. Taṃ kāraṇāti tena kāraṇena.
analyzed: dvinnam kilesena sadisānam dhammo ti sabhāvaḥ tam tena kāraṇena

original: Taṃ upamāya sādhento “ubho kalahakārakā”tiādimāha. Tattha ubho kalahakārakāti pubbabhāge
analyzed: tam upamāya sādhentaḥ ubho kalahakāraka iti ādim āha tattha ubho kalahakāraka iti pubba bhāge

original: kalahakārakā dve. Methunakāti vuccantīti sadisāti vuccanti. Bhaṇḍanakārakāti tattha
analyzed: kalahakārakā dve methunakā ati vuccanti iti sadisā ati vuccanti bhaṇḍana kārakā ti tattha

original: tattha gantvā bhaṇḍanaṃ karontā. Bhassakārakāti vācākalahaṃ karontā. Vivādakārakāti
analyzed: tattha gantvā bhaṇḍanam karontā bhassa kārakā ati vācā kalaham karontā vivāda kārakā ati

original: nānāvacanaṃ karontā. Adhikaraṇakārakāti vinicchayapāpuṇanavisesakāraṇaṃ karontā.
analyzed: nānā vacanam karontā adhikaraṇa kārakā ati vinicchaya pāpuṇana visesa kāraṇam karontā

original: Vādinoti vādapaṭivādino. Sallāpakāti vācaṃ kathentā evamevanti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
analyzed: vādinaḥ uti vāda paṭivādinaḥ sallāpakāḥ ati vācam kathentāḥ upamā saṃsandanam

original: Yuttassāti saññuttassa. Payuttassāti ādarena yuttassa. Āyuttassāti visesena yuttassa.
analyzed: yuttassa ati saññuttassa payuttassa ati ādarena yuttassa āyuttassa ati visesena yuttassa

original: Samāyuttassāti ekato yuttassa. Taccaritassāti taṃcaritaṃ karontassa. Tabbahulassāti
analyzed: samāyuttassa ati ekatas yuttassa tad caritassa ati tad caritam karontassa tad bahulassa ati

original: taṃbahulaṃ karontassa. Taggarukassāti taṃgaruṃ karontassa. Tanninnassāti tasmiṃ natacittassa.
analyzed: taṃbahulam karontassa taggarukassa ati taṃgarum karontassa tad ninnassa ati tasmin nata cittassa

original: Tappoṇassāti tasmiṃ natakāyassa. Tappabbhārassāti tasmiṃ abhimukhakāyassa. Tadadhimuttassāti
analyzed: tad poṇassa ati tasmin nata kāyassa tad pabbhārassa ati tasmin abhimukha kāyassa tad adhimuttassa ati

original: tasmiṃ adhiharitassa. Tadadhipateyyassāti taṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattassa.
analyzed: tasmin adhiharitassa tad adhipateyyassa ati tam adhipatim jeṭṭhakam katvā pavattassa

original: Vighātanti niddesassa uddesavacanaṃ. Vighātanti pīḷanaṃ. Upaghātanti samīpaṃ katvā
analyzed: vighātanti niddesassa uddesa vacanam vighātanti pīḷanam upaghātanti samīpam katvā

original: pīḷanaṃ. Pīḷananti ghaṭṭanaṃ. Ghaṭṭananti pīḷanaṃ. Sabbaṃ aññamaññavevacanaṃ. Upaddavanti
analyzed: pīḷanam pīḷananti ghaṭṭanam ghaṭṭananti pīḷanam sabbam aññamaññavevacanam upaddavanti

original: hiṃsanaṃ. Upasagganti tattha tattha upagantvā pīḷanākāraṃ. Brūhīti kathehi. Ācikkhāti
analyzed: hiṃsanam tattha tattha upagantvā pīḷana ākāram brūhi iti kathehi ācikkhāti

original: vissajjehi. Desehīti dassehi. Paññapehīti ñāpehi. Paṭṭhapehīti ṭhapehi. Vivarāti
analyzed: vissajjehi desehi iti dassehi paññapehi iti ñāpehi paṭṭhapehi iti ṭhapehi vivara ati

original: pākaṭaṃ karohi. Vibhajāti bhājehi. Uttānīkarohīti tīraṃ pāpehi. Pakāsehīti pākaṭaṃ karohi.
analyzed: pākaṭam karohi vibhajāti bhājehi uttānīkarohi iti tīram pāpehi pakāsehi iti pākaṭam karohi

original: karoti. Manussaloke attānaṃ bhañjatīti vividhakammakāraṇavasena bhañjati. Devaloke
analyzed: karoti manussa loke attānam bhañjati iti vividha kamma kāraṇa vasena bhañjati deva loke

original: attānaṃ bhañjatīti piyavippayogādidukkhavasena. Jātipapātampi papatatīti jātipapātepi
analyzed: attānam bhañjati iti piya vippayoga ādi dukkha vasena jāti papātam pi papatati iti jāti papāte pi

original: pāteti. Jarāpapātādīsupi eseva nayo. Manussaloketi idha adhippetalokameva dasseti.
analyzed: pāta iti jarā apapāta ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ manussa loke iti idha adhippeta lokam eva dasseti

original: Puthujjanāti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Tattha puthujjanāti –
analyzed: niddesassa uddesa padam tattha puthujjana ati

original: Puthūnaṃ jananādīhi, kāraṇehi puthujjano;
analyzed: puthūnam janana ādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjanaḥ

original: Puthujjanantogadhattā, puthuvāyaṃ jano iti.
analyzed: puthujjanantaḥ ugadhattā iti

original: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhipi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Taṃ vibhāgato
analyzed: saḥ hi puthūnam nānappakārānam kilesa ādīnam janana ādīhi pi kāraṇehi puthujjanaḥ tam vibhāgataḥ

original: dassetuṃ “puthu kilese janentī”tiādimāha. Tattha bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhīnaṃ
analyzed: dassetum puthu kilese janenti iti ādim āha tattha bahūnam nānappakārānam sakkāya diṭṭhīnam

original: avihatattā vā tā janenti, tāhi janitāti vā puthujjanā. Avihatamevatthaṃ janasaddo
analyzed: avihata ttāḥ vā tāḥ janenti tāhi janitā ati vā puthujjanāḥ avihata mevattham jana saddaḥ

original: vadati. Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti ettha puthū nānājanā satthupaṭiññā etesanti
analyzed: vadati puthu satthārānam mukhullokikā ati ettha puthū nānājanā satthu paṭiññā etesan ti

original: puthujjanāti vacanattho. Puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti ettha janetabbā janayanti
analyzed: puthujjanā ti vacana atthaḥ puthu sabba gatīhi avuṭṭhitā ti ettha janetabbā janayanti

original: etthāti janā, gatiyo. Puthū janā etesanti puthujjanā. Ito pare jāyanti etehīti janā,
analyzed: ettha ati janāḥ gatiyaḥ puthū janāḥ etesanti puthujjanāḥ itas pare jāyanti etehi iti janāḥ

original: abhisaṅkhārādayo. Te etesaṃ vijjantīti puthujjanā. Abhisaṅkharaṇādiattho eva vā janasaddo
analyzed: abhisaṅkhāra ādayaḥ te etesam vijjanti iti puthujjanāḥ abhisaṅkharaṇa ādi atthaḥ eva vā jana saddo

original: daṭṭhabbo. Nānāsantāpehi santapantīti rāgaggiādayo santāpā. Te eva vā sabbepi vā
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ nānā santāpehi santapanti iti rāga aggi ādayo santāpā te eva vā sabbe api vā

original: kilesā pariḷāhā. Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesūti ettha jāyatīti jano, rāgo gedhoti evamādiko,
analyzed: kilesā pariḷāhā puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu iti ettha jāyati iti janaḥ rāgaḥ gedhaḥ iti evamādiko

original: puthu jano etesanti puthujjanā. Puthu jātā rattāti evaṃ rāgādiattho eva vā janasaddo
analyzed: puthu janaḥ etesanti puthujjanā puthu jātā rattā ati evam rāga ādi atthaḥ eva vā jana saddo

original: daṭṭhabbo. Palibuddhāti sambaddhā. Āvutāti āvaritā. Nivutāti vāritā. Ovutāti uparito
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ palibuddhā ati sambaddhā āvutā ati āvaritā nivutā ati vāritā ovutā ati uparitas

original: pihitā. Pihitāti heṭṭhābhāgena pihitā. Paṭicchannāti apākaṭā. Paṭikujjitāti adhomukhagatā.
analyzed: pihitā pihitā ati heṭṭhā bhāgena pihitā paṭicchannā ati apākaṭā paṭikujjitā ati adhomukha gatā

original: Atha vā puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ
analyzed: atha vā puthūnam vā gaṇana patham atītānam ariya dhamma parammukhānam nīca dhamma samācārānam

original: janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā. Puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhaṃ gato, visaṃsaṭṭho
analyzed: janānam puthujjanā puthu vai ayam visuṃyā iva saṅkham gataḥ visaṃsaṭṭhaḥ

original: sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi janotipi puthujjano.
analyzed: sīla suta ādi guṇa yuttehi ariyehi puthujjano

original: Evaṃ ye te –
analyzed: evam ye te

original: “Duve puthujjanā vuttā, buddhenādiccabandhunā;
analyzed: duve puthujjanāḥ vuttāḥ buddhena adicca bandhunā

original: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano”ti. –
analyzed: andhaḥ puthujjanaḥ ekaḥ kalyāṇa ekaḥ puthujjanaḥ ti

original: Dveva puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
analyzed: dve iva puthujjanāḥ vuttā tesu andha puthujjanaḥ vuttaḥ hoti iti veditabbaḥ

original: 52. Yaso kitti cāti lābhasakkāro pasaṃsā ca. Pubbeti pabbajitabhāve. Hāyate vāpi
analyzed: yaso kitti ca ati lābha sakkāro pasaṃsā ca pubbe iti pabbajita bhāve hāyate vā api

original: tassa sāti tassa vibbhantakassa sato so ca yaso sā ca kitti hāyati. Etampi disvāti
analyzed: tassa sāti tassa vibbhantakassa sataḥ saḥ ca yaso sā ca kitti hāyati etam pi disvā ati

original: etampi pubbe yasakittīnaṃ lābhaṃ pacchā ca hāniṃ disvā. Sikkhetha methunaṃ vippahātaveti
analyzed: etam pi pubbe yasa kittīnam lābham pacchā ca hānim disvā sikkhetha methunam vippahātave ti

original: tisso sikkhāyo sikkhetha. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Methunaṃ vippahātave, methunappahānatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tissaḥ sikkhāyaḥ sikkhetha kim kāraṇā methunam vippahātave methuna ppahāna atthāya ati vuttam hoti

original: Kittivaṇṇagatoti bhagavā kittivaṇṇo, kittisaddañceva guṇañca ukkhipitvā vadanto hotīti attho. Cittaṃ nānānayena kathanaṃ assa atthīti cittakathī. Kalyāṇapaṭibhānoti sundarapañño.
analyzed: kitti vaṇṇa gataḥ ti bhagavā kittivaṇṇo kitti saddam ca iva guṇam ca ukkhipitvā vadantaḥ hoti iti attho cittam nānā nayena kathanam assa atthi iti citta kathī kalyāṇa paṭibhāno ti sundara pañño

original: Hāyatīti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Parihāyatīti samantato hāyati. Paridhaṃsatīti adhopathaviṃ
analyzed: hāyati iti niddesassa uddesa padam parihāyati iti samantataḥ hāyati paridhaṃsati iti adhopathavim

original: patati. Paripatatīti samantato apagacchati. Antaradhāyatīti adassanaṃ yāti. Vippalujjatīti ucchijjati.
analyzed: patati paripatati iti samantataḥ apagacchati antaradhāyati iti a dassanam yāti vippalujjati iti ucchijjati

original: Khuddako sīlakkhandhoti thullaccayādi. Mahanto sīlakkhandhoti pārājikasaṃṅghādiseso.
analyzed: khuddako sīla kkhandho ti thullaccaya ādi mahantaḥ sīla kkhandho ti pārājika saṃṅgha ādiseso

original: Methunadhammassa pahānāyāti tadaṅgādipahānena pajahanatthāya. Vūpasamāyāti malānaṃ
analyzed: methuna dhammassa pahānāya ati tad aṅga ādi pahānena pajahana tthāya vūpasamāyāti

original: vūpasamanatthāya. Paṭinissaggāyāti pakkhandanapariccāgapaṭinissaggatthāya. Paṭipassaddhiyāti
analyzed: vūpasamana atthāya paṭinissaggāya ati pakkhandana pariccāga paṭinissagga tthāya paṭipassaddhiyā ati

original: paṭipassaddhisaṅkhātassa phalassa atthāya.
analyzed: paṭipassaddhi saṅkhātassa phalassa atthāya

original: 53. Yo hi methunaṃ na vippajahati saṅkappehi…pe… tathāvidho. Tattha paretoti samannāgato. Paresaṃ nigghosanti upajjhāyādīnaṃ nindāvacanaṃ. Maṅku hotīti dummano hoti.
analyzed: yaḥ hi methunam na vippajahati tathāvidhaḥ tattha paretaḥ ti samannāgataḥ paresam upajjhāya ādīnam nindā vacanam maṅku hoti iti dummanaḥ hoti

original: Kāmasaṅkappenāti kāmapaṭisaṃyuttena vitakkena. Upariṭṭhepi eseva nayo. Phuṭṭhoti
analyzed: kāma saṅkappena ati kāma paṭisaṃyuttena vitakkena upariṭṭhe pi esa eva nayaḥ phuṭṭhaḥ ti

original: vitakkehi phusito. Paretoti aparihīno. Samohitoti sammā ohito anto paviṭṭho. Kapaṇo
analyzed: vitakkehi phusito paretaḥ iti a parihīnaḥ samohito ti sammā ohito antar paviṭṭho kapaṇo

original: viyāti duggatamanusso viya. Mando viyāti aññāṇī viya. Momūho viyāti sammohabhūto
analyzed: viyāti duggata manussaḥ viya mandaḥ viyāti aññāṇī viya momūhaḥ viyāti sammoha bhūto

original: viya. Jhāyatīti cinteti. Pajjhāyatīti bhusaṃ cinteti. Nijjhāyatīti anekavidhena cinteti.
analyzed: viya jhāyati iti cintā iti pajjhāyati iti bhusam cintā iti nijjhāyati iti anekavidhena cintā iti

original: Apajjhāyatīti tato apagantvā cinteti. Ulūkoti ulūkasakuṇo. Rukkhasākhāyanti rukkhe
analyzed: apajjhāyati iti tatas apagantvā cinteti ulūkaḥ iti ulūka sakuṇaḥ rukkhasākhāyanti rukkhe

original: uṭṭhitasākhāya, viṭape vā. Mūsikaṃ magayamānoti mūsikaṃ gavesamāno, “maggayamāno”tipi
analyzed: uṭṭhita sākhāya viṭape vā mūsikam magayamānaḥ iti mūsikam gavesamānaḥ maggayamānaḥ iti pi

original: paṭhanti. Kotthūti siṅgālo. Biḷāroti babbu. Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti dvinnaṃ gharānaṃ
analyzed: paṭhanti siṅgālaḥ biḷāraḥ iti babbu

original: antare ca udakaniddhamanacikkhallakacavaranikkhipanaṭṭhāne ca thaṇḍile ca. Vahacchinnoti
analyzed: antare ca udaka niddhamana cikkhallaka cavara nikkhipana ṭṭhāne ca thaṇḍile ca vaha chinnā ti

original: piṭṭhigīvamaṃsacchinno. Ito parā gāthā pākaṭasambandhā eva.
analyzed: piṭṭhigīva maṃsacchinnaḥ itas parā gāthā pākaṭa sambandhā eva

original: 54. Tāsu satthānīti kāyaduccaritādīni. Tāni hi attano paresañca chedanaṭṭhena “satthānī”ti
analyzed: tāsu satthāni iti kāya duccarita ādīni tāni hi attanaḥ paresam ca chedana ṭṭhena satthāni iti

original: vuccanti. Tesu vāyaṃ visesena tāva ādito musāvacanasatthāneva karoti, “iminā kāraṇenāhaṃ
analyzed: vuccanti tesu vā ayam visesena tāva āditas musā vacana satthān eva karoti iminā kāraṇena aham

original: vibbhanto”ti bhaṇanto. Tenevāha – “esa khvassa mahāgedho, mosavajjaṃ pagāhatī”ti.
analyzed: vibbhantaḥ iti bhaṇantaḥ tena iva āha esa khvassa mahā gedhaḥ mosa vajjam pagāhati iti

original: Tattha esa khvassāti esa kho assa. Mahāgedhoti mahābandhanaṃ. Katamoti ce? Yadidaṃ
analyzed: tattha esa khvassa ati esa kho assa mahāgedhoti mahābandhanam katamaḥ iti ce yat idam

original: mosavajjaṃ pagāhati, svāyaṃ musāvādajjhogāho “mahāgedho”ti veditabbo.
analyzed: mosavajjam pagāhati svāyam musāvāda ajjhogāhaḥ mahā gedhaḥ iti veditabbo

original: Tīṇi satthānīti tayo chedakā. Kāyaduccaritaṃ kāyasatthaṃ. Vacīsatthādīsupi eseva
analyzed: tīṇi satthāni iti kāya duccaritam kāya sattham vacī sattha ādīsu pi esā eva

original: nayo. Taṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ kāyasattha”nti āha. Sampajānamusā
analyzed: nayo tam vibhāgataḥ dassetum tividham kāya duccaritam kāya satthan ti āha sampajāna musā

original: bhāsatīti jānanto tucchaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. Abhirato ahaṃ bhante ahosiṃ pabbajjāyāti
analyzed: bhāsati iti jānantaḥ tuccham vācam bhāsati abhirataḥ aham bhante ahosim pabbajjāya ati

original: sāsane pabbajjāya anabhirativirahito ahaṃ āsiṃ. Mātā me posetabbāti mātā mayā posetabbā.
analyzed: sāsane pabbajjāya anabhirati virahitaḥ aham āsim mātā me posetabbā ati mātā mayā posetabbā

original: Tenamhi vibbhantoti bhaṇatīti tena kāraṇena paṭikkanto asmītipi katheti. Pitā me
analyzed: tenamhi vibbhantaḥ iti bhaṇati iti tena kāraṇena paṭikkantaḥ asmi iti pi kathā iti pitā me

original: posetabbotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: posetabba iti ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Eso tassa mahāgedhoti tassa puggalassa eso mahābandho. Mahāvananti mahantaṃ duṭṭhavanaṃ.
analyzed: eso tassa mahā gedhaḥ ti tassa puggalassa esaḥ mahā bandho mahā vanam ti mahantam duṭṭha vanam

original: Gahananti duratikkamaṃ. Kantāroti corakantārādisadiso. Visamoti kaṇṭakavisamo. Kuṭiloti
analyzed: gahanam ti duratikkamam kantāro ti cora kantāra ādi sadisaḥ visamaḥ ti kaṇṭaka visamaḥ kuṭilaḥ ti

original: vaṅkakaṭakasadiso. Paṅkoti pallalasadiso. Palipoti kaddamasadiso. Palibodhoti mahādukkho.
analyzed: vaṅka kaṭaka sadiso paṅkoti pallala sadiso palipoti kaddama sadiso palibodhoti mahā dukkho

original: Mahābandhananti mahantaṃ dumocayabandhanaṃ. Yadidaṃ sampajānamusāvādoti yo ayaṃ sampajānamusāvādo.
analyzed: mahā bandhanam ti mahantam dumocaya bandhanam yat idam yaḥ ayam sampajāna musāvādaḥ

original: Sabhaggato vāti sabhāyaṃ ṭhito vā. Parisaggato vāti gāmaparisāyaṃ ṭhito vā. Ñātimajjhagato
analyzed: sabhaggataḥ vā ati sabhāyam ṭhitaḥ vā parisaggataḥ vā ati gāma parisāyam ṭhitaḥ vā ñāti majjha gataḥ

original: vāti dāyādānaṃ majjhe ṭhito vā. Pūgamajjhagato vāti senīnaṃ majjhe ṭhito vā. Rājakulamajjhagato
analyzed: vāti dāyādānam majjhe ṭhitaḥ vā pūga majjha gataḥ vāti senīnam majjhe ṭhitaḥ vā rāja kula majjha gataḥ

original: vāti rājakulassa majjhe mahāvinicchaye ṭhito vā. Abhinītoti pucchanatthāya nīto.
analyzed: vāti rāja kulassa majjhe mahā vinicchaye ṭhitaḥ vā abhinītaḥ ti pucchana atthāya nītaḥ

original: Sakkhipuṭṭhoti sakkhiṃ katvā pucchito. Ehambho purisāti ālapanametaṃ. Attahetu vā
analyzed: sakkhi puṭṭhaḥ ti sakkhim katvā pucchitaḥ eham bho purisa iti ālapanam etam atta hetu vā

original: parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā. Āmisakiñcikkhahetu
analyzed: para hetu vā ati attanaḥ vā parassa vā hattha pāda ādi hetu vā dhana hetu vā āmisa kiñcikkha hetu

original: vāti ettha āmisanti lābho adhippeto. Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ, antamaso
analyzed: vā ti ettha lābhaḥ adhippeto yam vā tam vā appamattakam antamasaḥ

original: tittiravaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassapi lābhassa hetūti attho. Sampajānamusā
analyzed: tittira vaṭṭaka sappi piṇḍa navanīta piṇḍa ādi mattakassa api lābhassa hetu iti attho sampajāna musā

original: bhāsatīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ karoti.
analyzed: bhāsati iti musāvādam karoti

original: Puna aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ dassento “api ca tīhākārehi musāvādo hoti, pubbevassa hotī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: puna aññam pariyāyam dassentaḥ api ca tīhākārehi musāvādaḥ hoti pubbevassa hoti itiādim āha

original: Tattha tīhākārehīti sampajānamusāvādassa aṅgabhūtehi tīhi kāraṇehi. Pubbevassa hotīti
analyzed: tattha tīhākārehi iti sampajāna musāvādassa aṅga bhūtehi tīhi kāraṇehi pubbeva assa hoti iti

original: pubbabhāgeyeva assa puggalassa evaṃ hoti “musā bhaṇissa”nti. Bhaṇantassa hotīti bhaṇamānassa
analyzed: assa puggalassa evam hoti musā bhaṇissanti bhaṇantassa hoti iti bhaṇamānassa

original: hoti. Bhaṇitassa hotīti bhaṇite assa hoti. Yaṃ vattabbaṃ tasmiṃ vutte hotīti attho.
analyzed: hoti bhaṇitassa hoti iti bhaṇite assa hoti yat vattabbam tasmin vutte hoti iti atthaḥ

original: Atha vā bhaṇitassāti vuttavato niṭṭhitavacanassa hotīti. Yo evaṃ pubbabhāgepi jānāti,
analyzed: atha vā bhaṇitassa ati vuttavataḥ niṭṭhita vacanassa hoti iti yaḥ evam pubba bhāge pi jānāti

original: bhaṇantopi jānāti, pacchāpi jānāti “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti, so evaṃ vadanto musāvādakammunā
analyzed: bhaṇantaḥ api jānāti pacchā api jānāti musā mayā bhaṇita nti saḥ evam vadantaḥ musāvāda kammunā

original: bajjhatīti ayamettha attho dassito. Kiñcāpi dassito, atha kho ayamettha viseso –
analyzed: bajjhati iti ayam ettha atthaḥ dassito kiñcā api dassitaḥ atha kho ayam ettha viseso

original: pucchā tāva hoti, “musā bhaṇissa”nti pubbabhāgo atthi, “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti pacchābhāgo
analyzed: pucchā tāva hoti musā bhaṇissanti pubba bhāgaḥ atthi musā mayā bhaṇitanti pacchābhāgaḥ

original: natthi. Vuttamattameva hi koci pamussati kiṃ tassa musāvādo hoti, na hotīti? Sā evaṃ
analyzed: natthi vutta mattam eva hi koci pamussati kim tassa musāvādaḥ hoti na hoti iti sā evam

original: aṭṭhakathāsu vissajjitā – pubbabhāge “musā bhaṇissa”nti ca, bhaṇantassa “musā bhaṇāmī”ti
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāsu vissajjitā pubba bhāge musā bhaṇissanti ca bhaṇantassa musā bhaṇāmi iti

original: ca jānato pacchābhāge “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti na sakkā na bhavituṃ, sacepi na hoti,
analyzed: ca jānato pacchābhāge musā mayā bhaṇitanti na sakkā na bhavitum sace pi na

original: musāvādoyeva. Purimameva hi aṅgadvayaṃ pamāṇaṃ. Yassāpi pubbabhāge “musā bhaṇissa”nti
analyzed: musāvādaḥ yā iva purimam eva hi aṅga dvayam pamāṇam yassa api pubba bhāge musā bhaṇissanti

original: ābhogo natthi, bhaṇanto pana “musā bhaṇāmī”ti jānāti. Bhaṇitepi “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti
analyzed: ābhogaḥ natthi bhaṇantaḥ pana musā bhaṇāmi iti jānāti bhaṇite pi musā mayā bhaṇitanti

original: jānāti. So musāvādena na kāretabbo. Pubbabhāgo hi pamāṇataro. Tasmiṃ asati davā bhaṇitaṃ
analyzed: jānāti saḥ musāvādena na kāretabbaḥ pubba bhāgaḥ hi pamāṇataraḥ tasmin asati davā bhaṇitam

original: vā, ravā bhaṇitaṃ vā hotīti.
analyzed: vā bhaṇitam vā

original: Ettha ca taṃñāṇatā ca ñāṇasamodhānañca pariccajitabbaṃ. Taṃñāṇatā pariccajitabbāti
analyzed: ettha ca taṃñāṇa tā ca ñāṇa samodhānañca pariccajitabbam taṃñāṇa tā pariccajitabbā ati

original: yena cittena “musā bhaṇissa”nti jānāti, teneva “musā bhaṇāmī”ti ca, “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti

original: vibbhantakabhāve ādīnavaṃ muni ñatvā.
analyzed: vibbhantaka bhāve ādīnavam muni ñatvā

original: Daḷhaṃ kareyyāti niddesapadassa uddesapadaṃ. Thiraṃ kareyyāti asithilaṃ kareyya. Daḷhaṃ samādāno assāti thirapaṭiñño bhaveyya. Avaṭṭhitasamādānoti sanniṭṭhānapaṭiñño.
analyzed: daḷham kareyya ati niddesa padassa uddesa padam thiram kareyya ati asithilam kareyya daḷham samādānaḥ assa ati thira paṭiññaḥ bhaveyya avaṭṭhita samādānaḥ iti sanniṭṭhāna paṭiññaḥ

original: 57. Etaṃ ariyānamuttamanti yadidaṃ vivekacariyā, etaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ uttamaṃ.
analyzed: etam yat idam viveka cariyā etam buddha ādīnam ariyānam uttamam

original: Tasmā vivekaṃyeva sikkhethāti adhippāyo. Na tena seṭṭho maññethāti tena ca vivekena
analyzed: tasmā vivekam yeva sikkhetha ati adhippāyaḥ na tena seṭṭhaḥ maññetha ati tena ca vivekena

original: Unnatinti ussāpanaṃ. Unnamanti uggantvā paṭṭhapanaṃ. Mānanti ahaṃkāraṃ. Thāmanti

analyzed: balakkāram thambhanti thaddha karaṇam thaddho ti amaddavaḥ patthaddho ti visesena

analyzed: samīpe upakaṭṭhā iti santike

original: Rittassāti sabbakilesehi tucchassa. Vivittassāti suññassa. Pavivittassāti ekakassa.

analyzed: karitvā ati vigatantam vigata koṭim karitvā

original: vītivattassa. Pāraṃgatassātiādīni nibbānavasena vuttāni. Yathā iṇāyikā āṇaṇyanti

analyzed: saddhammapajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

59. Aṭṭhame pasūrasuttaniddese paṭhamagāthāya tāva saṅkhepo – ime diṭṭhigatikā attano

analyzed: diṭṭhim sandhāya idha iva suddhī iti vadanti aññesu pana dhammesu visuddhim na āhu

analyzed: niviṭṭhā ati anta upaviṭṭhā patiṭṭhitā ati tattha eva ṭhitā

original: Anojavantīti nihīnaojavatī, tejavirahitāti attho. Sā kathāti esā vācā. Kathojjaṃ vadantīti nittejaṃ bhaṇanti. Evaṃ vadānesu ca tesu eko niyamato eva.

original: Thomananti vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. Kittinti pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇahāriyanti guṇavaḍḍhanaṃ. Pubbeva
