analyzed: pārisajjā ati paricārikā pāsārikā ati kāraṇitā apaharanti iti paṭibāhanti

original: Atthāpagatanti atthato apagataṃ, attho natthīti. Atthato apaharantīti atthamhā paṭibāhanti.

original: Attho te dunnitoti tava attho na sammā upanīto. Byañjanaṃ te duropitanti tava byañjanaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ te dunnitaḥ ti tava atthaḥ na sammā upanītaḥ byañjanam te duropitanti tava byañjanam

original: rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā ārammaṇabhāvenettha osarantīti samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhenapi
analyzed: rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbāḥ ārammaṇa bhāvena ittha osaranti iti samosaraṇa ṭhāna ṭṭhena api

original: āyatanaṃ. Phassādīnaṃ pana sahajātādipaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇattā kāraṇaṭṭhenāpi āyatananti
analyzed: āyatanam phassa ādīnam pana sahajāta ādi paccaya ṭṭhena kāraṇa ttā kāraṇa ṭṭhena api āyatanam ti

original: veditabbaṃ. Manindriyaṃ vuttatthameva.
analyzed: veditabbam man indriyam vutta ttham eva

original: Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Viññāṇameva khandho viññāṇakkhandho. Tassa rāsiādivasena attho
analyzed: vijānāti iti viññāṇam viññāṇam eva khandhaḥ viññāṇa kkhandho tassa rāsi ādi vasena attho

original: veditabbo. “Mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha hi rāsaṭṭhena khandho
analyzed: veditabbaḥ mahā udaka khandhaḥ tu eva saṅkham gacchati iti ettha hi rāsaṭṭhena khandho

original: vutto. “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādīsu guṇaṭṭhena. “Addasa kho bhagavā mahantaṃ
analyzed: vuttaḥ sīla kkhandhaḥ samādhi kkhandho ti ādīsu guṇa ṭṭhena addasa kho bhagavā mahantam

original: dārukkhandha”nti ettha paṇṇattimattaṭṭhena. Idha pana rūḷhito khandho vutto. Rāsaṭṭhena
analyzed: dāru khandhanti ettha paṇṇattimatta ṭṭhena idha pana rūḷhitaḥ khandhaḥ vuttaḥ rāsa ṭṭhena

original: hi viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadeso ekaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Tasmā yathā rukkhassa ekadesaṃ chindanto
analyzed: hi viññāṇa kkhandhassa eka deso ekam viññāṇam tasmā yathā rukkhassa eka desam chindanto

original: rukkhaṃ chindatīti vuccati, evameva viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadesabhūtaṃ ekampi viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: rukkham chindati iti vuccati evam eva viññāṇa kkhandhassa eka desa bhūtam ekam pi viññāṇam

original: rūḷhito viññāṇakkhandhoti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: rūḷhitaḥ viññāṇa kkhandho ti vuttam

original: Tajjā manoviññāṇadhātūti tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ anucchavikā manoviññāṇadhātu.
analyzed: tajjā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu ti tesam phassa ādīnam dhammānam anucchavikā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Imasmiñhi pade ekameva cittaṃ minanaṭṭhena mano, vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ, sabhāvaṭṭhena
analyzed: imasmin hi pade ekam eva cittam minana ṭṭhena manaḥ vijānana ṭṭhena viññāṇam sabhāva ṭṭhena

original: nissattaṭṭhena vā dhātūti tīhi nāmehi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nissatta ṭṭhena vā dhātu iti tīhi nāmehi vuttam

original: Saddhiṃ yugaṃ samāgamanti ekappahārena saddhiṃ. Sammāgantvāti pāpuṇitvā. Yugaggāhaṃ
analyzed: saddhim yugam samāgamanti eka pahārena saddhim sammā āgantvā ati pāpuṇitvā yuga ggāham

original: gaṇhitvāti yugapaṭibhāgaṃ gahetvā. Sākacchetunti saddhiṃ kathetuṃ. Sallapitunti allāpasallāpaṃ
analyzed: gaṇhitvā iti yuga paṭibhāgam gahetvā sākacchetum iti saddhim kathetum sallapitum iti allāpa sallāpam

original: kātuṃ. Sākacchaṃ samāpajjitunti saddhiṃ kathanaṃ paṭipajjituṃ. Na paṭibalabhāve kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: kātum sākaccham samāpajjitum ti saddhim kathanam paṭipajjitum na paṭibala bhāve kāraṇam

original: dassetuṃ “taṃ kissahetu, pasūro paribbājako hīno”tiādimāha. So hi bhagavā aggo cāti
analyzed: dassetum tam kissahetu pasūraḥ paribbājakaḥ hīnaḥ iti ādim āha saḥ hi bhagavā aggaḥ ca ati

original: asadisadānaaggattā asamānapaññattā aggo ca. Seṭṭho cāti sabbaguṇehi appaṭisamaṭṭhena
analyzed: asadisa dāna agga ttā asamāna paññattā aggaḥ ca seṭṭhaḥ ca ati sabba guṇehi appaṭisamaṭṭhena

original: seṭṭho ca. Mokkho cāti savāsanehi kilesehi muttattā mokkho ca. Uttamo cāti attano
analyzed: seṭṭho ca mokkho ca ati sa vāsanehi kilesehi mutta ttā mokkho ca uttamo ca ati attano

original: uttaritaravirahitattā uttamo ca. Pavaro cāti sabbalokena abhipatthanīyattā pavaro
analyzed: uttaritara virahita ttā uttamo ca pavaro ca ati sabba lokena abhipatthanīya ttā pavaro

original: ca. Mattena mātaṅgenāti pabhinnamadena hatthinā.
analyzed: ca mattena mātaṅgena ati pabhinna madena hatthinā

original: Kotthukoti jiraṇasiṅgālo. Sīhena migaraññā saddhinti kesarasīhena migarājena saha.
analyzed: kotthukoti jiraṇasiṅgālo sīhena miga raññā kesarasīhena miga rājena saha

original: Taruṇakoti chāpako. Dhenupakoti khīrapako. Usabhenāti maṅgalasammatena usabhena.
analyzed: taruṇakaḥ uti chāpakaḥ usabhena ati maṅgala sammatena usabhena

original: Calakakunā saddhinti calamānakakunā saddhiṃ. Dhaṅkoti kāko. Garuḷena venateyyena
analyzed: cala kakunā calamāna kakunā saddhim kākaḥ garuḷena venateyyena

original: saddhinti ettha garuḷenāti jātivasena nāmaṃ. Venateyyenāti gottavasena. Caṇḍāloti
analyzed: ettha garuḷena ati jāti vasena nāmam venateyyena ati gotta vasena

original: chavacaṇḍālo. Raññā cakkavattināti cātuddīpikacakkavattinā. Paṃsupisācakoti kacavarachaḍḍanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: chava caṇḍālaḥ raññā cakkavattinā ati cātuddīpika cakkavattinā paṃsu pisācako ti kaca vara chaḍḍana ṭhāne

original: nibbattako yakkho. Indena devaraññā saddhinti sakkena devarājena saha. So hi bhagavā
analyzed: nibbattakaḥ yakkhaḥ indena deva raññā saddhinti sakkena devarājena saha saḥ hi bhagavā

original: mahāpaññotiādīni chappadāni heṭṭhā vitthāritāni. Tattha paññāpabhedakusaloti attano
analyzed: mahāpañño ti ādīni chappadāni heṭṭhā vitthāritāni tattha paññā apabheda kusalo ti attano

original: anantavikappe paññābhede cheko. Pabhinnañāṇoti anantappabhedapattañāṇo. Etena paññāpabhedakusalattepi
analyzed: ananta vikappe paññā bhede chekaḥ pabhinna ñāṇo ti ananta ppabheda patta ñāṇo etena paññā pabheda kusala tte pi

original: sati tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anantabhedattaṃ dasseti. Adhigatapaṭisambhidoti paṭiladdhaaggacatupaṭisambhidañāṇo.
analyzed: sati tāsam paññānam ananta bheda ttam dasseti adhigata paṭisambhidaḥ ti paṭiladdha agga catu paṭisambhida ñāṇo

original: Catuvesārajjappattoti cattāri visāradabhāvasaṅkhātāni ñāṇāni patto. Yathāha –
analyzed: catu vesārajja patto ti cattāri visārada bhāva saṅkhātāni ñāṇāni pattaḥ yathā āha

original: “Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ‘ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti, tatra vata maṃ samaṇo
analyzed: sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānataḥ ime dhammāḥ an abhisambuddhāḥ ati tatra vata mama samaṇaḥ

original: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā devaḥ vā māraḥ vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmim sahadhammena paṭicodessati iti

original: nimittametaṃ, bhikkhave, na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
analyzed: nimittam etam bhikkhave na samanupassāmi etam aham bhikkhave nimittam a samanupassantaḥ

original: khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi.
analyzed: khema ppattaḥ abhaya ppattaḥ vesārajja ppattaḥ viharāmi

original: “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ‘ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti…pe… ‘ye kho pana te antarāyikā
analyzed: khīṇa asavassa te paṭijānataḥ ime āsavāḥ a parikkhīṇa atipe ye kho pana te antarāyikā

original: dhammā vuttā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti…pe… yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo
analyzed: dhammāḥ vuttā te paṭisevataḥ na alam antarāyāya atipe yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo

original: desito, so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti, tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā
analyzed: desitaḥ saḥ na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkha kkhayāya āti tatra vata mama samaṇaḥ vā

original: brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ vā devaḥ vā māraḥ vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmim sahadhammena paṭicodessati iti

original: nimittametaṃ, bhikkhave, na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
analyzed: nimittam etam bhikkhave na samanupassāmi etam aham bhikkhave nimittam a samanupassantaḥ

original: khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmī”ti.
analyzed: khema ppattaḥ abhaya ppattaḥ vesārajja ppattaḥ viharāmi iti

original: Dasabalabaladhārīti dasa balāni etesanti dasabalā, dasabalānaṃ balāni dasabalabalāni,
analyzed: dasa bala bala dhārī iti dasa balāni dasa balāḥ balāni dasa bala balāni

original: tāni dasabalabalāni dhārayatīti dasabalabaladhārī, dasabalañāṇabaladhārīti attho.
analyzed: tāni dasa bala balāni dhārayati iti dasa bala bala dhārī dasa bala ñāṇa bala dhārī iti

original: Etehi tīhi vacanehi anantappabhedānaṃ neyyānaṃ pabhedamukhamattaṃ dassitaṃ. Soyeva
analyzed: etehi tīhi vacanehi ananta ppabhedānam neyyānam pabheda mukha mattam dassitam

original: paññāpayogavasena abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhena purisāsabho. Asantāsaṭṭhena purisasīho.
analyzed: paññā apayoga vasena abhimaṅgala sammata ṭṭhena purisa asabhaḥ asantāsa ṭṭhena purisa sīhaḥ

original: Mahantaṭṭhena purisanāgo. Pajānanaṭṭhena purisājañño. Lokakiccadhuravahanaṭṭhena purisadhorayho.
analyzed: mahanta ṭṭhena purisa nāgaḥ pajānana ṭṭhena purisa ajaññaḥ loka kicca dhura vahana ṭṭhena purisa dhorayho

original: Atha tejādikaṃ anantañāṇato laddhaṃ guṇavisesaṃ dassetukāmo tesaṃ tejādīnaṃ anantañāṇamūlabhāvaṃ
analyzed: atha teja ādikam ananta ñāṇataḥ laddham guṇa visesam dassetu kāmo tesam teja ādīnam ananta ñāṇa mūla bhāvam

original: dassento “anantañāṇo”ti vatvā “anantatejo”tiādimāha. Tattha anantañāṇoti gaṇanavasena
analyzed: dassentaḥ ananta ñāṇo ti vatvā ananta tejaḥ ti ādim āha tattha ananta ñāṇo ti gaṇana vasena

original: ca pabhāvavasena ca antavirahitañāṇo. Anantatejoti veneyyasantāne mohatamavidhamanena
analyzed: ca ca veneyya santāne moha tama vidhamanena

original: anantañāṇatejo. Anantayasoti paññāguṇeheva lokattayavitthatānantakittighoso. Aḍḍhoti
analyzed: ananta ñāṇa tejaḥ ananta yaso ti paññā guṇehi iva lokattaya vitthata ananta kitti ghoso aḍḍho ti

original: paññādhanasamiddhiyā samiddho. Mahaddhanoti paññādhanavaḍḍhattepi pabhāvamahattena
analyzed: paññādhana samiddhiyā samiddhaḥ mahat dhanoti paññādhana vaḍḍhatte pi pabhāva mahattena

original: mahantaṃ pavattapaññādhanamassāti mahaddhano. “Mahādhano”ti vā pāṭho. Dhanavāti pasaṃsitabbapaññādhanavattā
analyzed: mahantam pavatta paññādhanam assa ati mahat dhanaḥ mahā dhanaḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ dhanavā ati pasaṃsitabba paññādhanavattā

original: niccayuttapaññādhanavattā atisayabhāvena paññādhanavattā dhanavā. Etesupi hi tīsu
analyzed: nicca yutta paññā dhanavattā atisaya bhāvena paññā dhanavattā dhanavā etesu pi hi tīsu

original: atthesu idaṃ vacanaṃ saddavidū icchanti.
analyzed: atthesu idam vacanam sadda vidū icchanti

original: Evaṃ paññāguṇena bhagavato attasampattisiddhiṃ dassetvā puna paññāguṇeneva lokahitasampattisiddhiṃ
analyzed: evam paññā guṇena bhagavataḥ atta sampatti siddhim dassetvā puna paññā guṇena iva loka hita sampatti siddhim

original: dassento “netā”tiādimāha. Tattha veneyye saṃsārasaṅkhātabhayaṭṭhānato nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: dassentaḥ netā iti ādim āha tattha veneyye saṃsāra saṅkhāta bhaya ṭṭhānataḥ nibbāna saṅkhātam

original: khemaṭṭhānaṃ netā. Tattha nayanakāle eva saṃvaravinayapahānavinayavasena veneyye
analyzed: khema ṭṭhānam netā tattha nayana kāle eva saṃvara vinaya pahāna vinaya vasena veneyye

original: vinetā. Dhammadesanākāle eva saṃsayacchedanena anunetā. Saṃsayaṃ chinditvā saññāpetabbaṃ
analyzed: vinetā dhamma desanā kāle eva saṃsaya chedanena anunetā saṃsayam chinditvā saññāpetabbam

original: atthaṃ paññāpetā. Tathā paññāpitānaṃ nicchayakaraṇena nijjhāpetā. Tathā nijjhāpitassa
analyzed: attham paññāpetā tathā paññāpitānam nicchaya karaṇena nijjhāpetā tathā nijjhāpitassa

original: atthassa paṭipattipayojanavasena pekkhetā. Tathāpaṭipanne paṭipattibalena pasādetā.
analyzed: atthassa paṭipatti payojana vasena pekkhetā tathā paṭipanne paṭipatti balena pasādetā

original: So hi bhagavāti ettha hi-kāro anantaraṃ vuttassa atthassa kāraṇopadese nipāto.
analyzed: saḥ hi bhagavā iti ettha hikāraḥ anantaram vuttassa atthassa kāraṇa upadese nipātaḥ

original: Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetāti sakasantāne nauppannapubbassa chaasādhāraṇañāṇahetubhūtassa
analyzed: anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā ati saka santāne na uppanna pubbassa cha a sādhāraṇa ñāṇa hetu bhūtassa

original: ariyamaggassa bodhimūle lokahitatthaṃ sakasantāne uppādetā. Asañjātassa maggassa
analyzed: ariya maggassa bodhi mūle loka hitattham saka santāne uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa

original: sañjanetāti veneyyasantāne asañjātapubbassa sāvakapāramīñāṇahetubhūtassa ariyamaggassa
analyzed: sañjanetā ati veneyya santāne a sañjāta pubbassa sāvaka pāramī ñāṇa hetu bhūtassa ariya maggassa

original: dhammacakkappavattanato pabhuti yāvajjakālā veneyyasantāne sañjanetā. Sāvakaveneyyānampi
analyzed: dhamma cakka ppavattanataḥ pabhuti yāvajjakālā veneyya santāne sañjanetā sāvaka veneyyānam pi

original: hi santāne bhagavatā vuttavacaneneva ariyamaggassa sañjananato bhagavā sañjanetā
analyzed: hi santāne bhagavatā vutta vacanena iva ariya maggassa sañjananataḥ bhagavā sañjanetā

original: nāma hoti. Anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātāti aṭṭhadhammasamannāgatānaṃ buddhabhāvāya
analyzed: nāma hoti an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā ati aṭṭha dhamma samannāgatānam buddha bhāvāya

original: kathābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ buddhabhāvāya byākaraṇaṃ datvā anakkhātapubbassa
analyzed: kathābhinīhārānam bodhisattānam buddha bhāvāya byākaraṇam da tvā an akkhāta pubbassa

original: pāramitāmaggassa “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaraṇamatteneva bodhimūle uppajjitabbassa
analyzed: pāramitā maggassa buddhaḥ bhavissati iti byākaraṇa mattena iva bodhi mūle uppajjitabbassa

original: ariyamaggassa akkhātā. Ayaṃ nayo paccekabodhisattabyākaraṇepi labbhatiyeva. Maggaññūti
analyzed: ariya maggassa ayam nayo pacceka bodhisatta byākaraṇe pi

original: paccavekkhaṇāvasena attano uppāditassa ariyamaggassa ñātā. Maggavidūti veneyyasantāne
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇā vasena attano uppāditassa ariya maggassa ñātā magga vidū ti veneyya santāne

original: janetabbassa ariyamaggassa kusalo. Maggakovidoti bodhisattānaṃ akkhātabbamagge vicakkhaṇo.
analyzed: janetabbassa ariya maggassa kusalaḥ magga kovidaḥ ti bodhisattānam akkhātabba magge vicakkhaṇaḥ

original: Atha vā abhisambodhipaṭipatti maggaññū, paccekabodhipaṭipatti maggavidū, sāvakabodhipaṭipatti
analyzed: atha vā abhisambodhi paṭipatti maggaññū pacceka bodhi paṭipatti magga vidū sāvaka bodhi paṭipatti

original: maggakovido. Atha vā –
analyzed: magga kovidaḥ atha vā

original: “Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe,
analyzed: etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe

original: Tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. –
analyzed: tarissanti ye ca taranti oghanti

original: Vacanato yathāyogaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ maggavasena
analyzed: vacanataḥ yathāyogam atīta anāgata paccuppanna buddha paccekabuddha sāvakānam magga vasena

original: ca suññatānimittaappaṇihitamaggavasena ca ugghaṭitaññūvipañcitaññūneyyapuggalānaṃ
analyzed: ca suñña tā nimitta appaṇihita magga vasena ca ugghaṭita ññū vipañcita ññūneyya puggalānam

original: maggavasena ca yathākkamenettha yojanaṃ karonti. Maggānugā ca panassāti bhagavato
analyzed: magga vasena ca yathākkamena ittha yojanam karonti magga anugā ca bhagavataḥ

original: gatamaggānugāmino hutvā. Ettha ca-saddo hetuatthe nipāto, etena ca bhagavatā magguppādanādiguṇādhigamāya
analyzed: gata magga anugāminaḥ hutvā ettha ca saddaḥ hetu atthe nipātaḥ etena ca bhagavatā magga uppādana ādi guṇa adhigamāya

original: hetu vutto hoti. Pana-saddo katatthe nipāto, tena bhagavatā katamaggakaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: hetu vuttaḥ hoti pana saddo kata atthe nipāto tena bhagavatā kata magga karaṇam vuttam

original: hoti. Pacchā samannāgatāti paṭhamaṃ gatassa bhagavato pacchā sīlādiguṇena samannāgatā.
analyzed: hoti pacchā samannāgatā ati paṭhamam gatassa bhagavato pacchā sīla ādi guṇena samannāgatā

original: Iti thero “anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā”tiādīhi yasmā sabbepi bhagavato sīlādayo
analyzed: iti theraḥ anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā ati ādīhi yasmā sabbe pi bhagavato sīla ādayaḥ

original: guṇā arahattamaggameva nissāya āgatā, tasmā arahattamaggameva nissāya guṇaṃ kathesi.
analyzed: guṇāḥ arahatta maggam eva nissāya āgatā tasmai arahatta maggam eva nissāya guṇam kathesi

original: Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbaṃ jānāti, sabbaññutāya yaṃkiñci paññāya jānitabbaṃ nāma atthi,
analyzed: jānam jānāti iti jānitabbam jānāti sabbaññutāya yaṃ kiñci paññāya jānitabbam nāma atthi

original: taṃ sabbaṃ pañcaneyyapathabhūtaṃ paññāya jānātīti attho. Passaṃ passatīti passitabbaṃ
analyzed: tam sabbam pañcaneyya patha bhūtam paññāya jānāti iti attho passam passati iti passitabbam

original: passati, sabbadassāvitāya taṃyeva neyyapathaṃ cakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ viya karonto paññācakkhunā
analyzed: passati sabba dassāvitāya taṃ yeva neyya patham cakkhunā diṭṭham viya karonto paññā cakkhunā

original: passatīti attho. Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti, passantopi
analyzed: passati iti atthaḥ yathā vā ekaccaḥ viparītam gaṇhantaḥ jānantaḥ api na jānāti passantaḥ api

original: na passati, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā pana yathāsabhāvaṃ gaṇhanto jānanto jānātiyeva,
analyzed: na passati na evam bhagavā bhagavā pana yathā sabhāvam gaṇhantaḥ jānantaḥ jānātiyā iva

original: passanto passatiyeva. Svāyaṃ nayana pariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhubhūto. Viditatādiatthena
analyzed: passantaḥ passatiyā iva cakkhu bhūtaḥ viditatā ādi atthena

original: ñāṇabhūto. Aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena vā pariyattidhammapavattanato hadayena cintetvā
analyzed: ñāṇa bhūtaḥ aviparīta sabhāva ṭṭhena vā pariyatti dhamma pavattanataḥ hadayena cintetvā

original: vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti vā dhammabhūto. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūto. Atha vā cakkhu
analyzed: vācāya nicchārita dhamma mayo ti vā dhamma bhūto seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahma bhūtaḥ atha vā cakkhu

original: viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto. Ñāṇaṃ viya bhūtoti ñāṇabhūto. Aviparītadhammo viya bhūtoti
analyzed: viya bhūtoti cakkhu bhūtaḥ ñāṇam viya bhūtoti ñāṇa bhūtaḥ aviparīta dhammaḥ viya bhūtoti

original: dhammabhūto. Brahmā viya bhūtoti brahmabhūto. Yvāyaṃ dhammassa vacanato vattanato
analyzed: dhamma bhūtaḥ brahmā viya bhūto ti brahma bhūtaḥ yvā ayam dhammassa vacanataḥ vattanataḥ

original: vā vattā. Nānappakārehi vacanato vattanato vā pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvā dassanato
analyzed: vā vattā nānappakārehi vacanataḥ vattanataḥ vā pavattā attham nīharitvā dassanataḥ

original: atthassa ninnetā. Amatādhigamāya paṭipattidesanato, amatappakāsanāya vā dhammadesanāya
analyzed: atthassa ninnetā amata adhigamāya paṭipatti desanataḥ amata ppakāsanāya vā dhamma desanāya

original: amatassa adhigamāpanato amatassa dātā. Lokuttarassa dhammassa uppāditattā veneyyānurūpena
analyzed: amatassa adhigama āpanataḥ amatassa dātā lokuttarassa dhammassa uppādita ttā veneyya anurūpena

original: yathāsukhaṃ lokuttaradhammassa dānena ca dhammesu issaroti dhammassāmī. Tathāgatapadaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthaṃ.
analyzed: yathāsukham lokuttara dhammassa dānena ca dhammesu issaroti dhammassāmī tathāgata padam heṭṭhā vutta ttham

original: Idāni “jānaṃ jānātī”tiādīhi vuttaguṇaṃ sabbaññutāya visesetvā dassetukāmo sabbaññutaṃ
analyzed: idāni jānam jānāti iti ādīhi vutta guṇam sabbaññu tāya visesetvā dassetu kāmo sabbaññu tam

original: sādhento “natthī”tiādimāha. Evaṃbhūtassa hi tassa bhagavato pāramitāpuññaphalappabhāvanipphannena
analyzed: sādhentaḥ na atthi itiādim āha evaṃbhūtassa hi tassa bhagavataḥ pāramitā puñña phala ppabhāva nipphannena

original: arahattamaggañāṇena sabbadhammesu savāsanassa sammohassa vihatattā asammohato sabbadhammānaṃ
analyzed: arahatta magga ñāṇena sabba dhammesu sa vāsanassa sammohassa vihata ttā a sammohataḥ sabba dhammānaṃ

original: ñātattā aññātaṃ nāma natthi. Tatheva ca sabbadhammānaṃ cakkhunā viya ñāṇacakkhunā
analyzed: ñāta ttā aññātam nāma natthi tathā iva ca sabba dhammānam cakkhunā viya ñāṇa cakkhunā

original: diṭṭhattā adiṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi. Ñāṇena pattattā aviditaṃ nāma natthi. Asammohasacchikiriyāya
analyzed: diṭṭha ttā adiṭṭham nāma natthi ñāṇena patta ttā aviditam nāma natthi asammoha sacchikiriyāya

original: sacchikatattā asacchikataṃ nāma natthi. Asammohapaññāya phuṭṭhattā paññāya aphassitaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: sacchikata ttā a sacchikatam nāma natthi a sammoha paññāya phuṭṭha ttā paññāya a phassitam nāma natthi

original: Paccuppannanti paccuppannaṃ kālaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā. Upādāyāti ādāya, antokatvāti attho.
analyzed: paccuppannam ti paccuppannam kālam vā dhammam vā upādāya ati ādāya antokatvā iti attho

original: Upādāyavacaneneva kālavinimuttaṃ nibbānampi gahitameva hoti. “Atītā”divacanāni ca
analyzed: upādāya vacanena iva kāla vinimuttam nibbānam pi gahitam eva hoti atīta ādi vacanāni ca

original: “natthī”tiādivacaneneva ghaṭiyanti, “sabbe”tiādivacanena vā. Sabbe dhammāti sabbasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammapariyādānaṃ.
analyzed: natthi iti ādi vacanena iva ghaṭiyanti sabbe iti ādi vacanena vā sabbe dhammā ati sabba saṅkhata asaṅkhata dhamma pariyādānam

original: Sabbākārenāti sabbadhammesu ekekasseva dhammassa aniccākārādisabbākārapariyādānaṃ.
analyzed: sabba ākārena ati sabba dhammesu ekekassa iva dhammassa anicca ākāra ādi sabba ākāra pariyādānam

original: Ñāṇamukheti ñāṇābhimukhe. Āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti osaraṇaṃ upenti. Jānitabbanti padaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇa mukhā iti ñāṇa abhimukhe āpātham āgacchanti iti osaraṇam upenti jānitabbanti padam

original: neyyanti padassa atthavivaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: neyyan ti padassa attha vivaraṇa attham vuttam

original: Attattho vātiādīsu vā-saddo samuccayattho. Attatthoti attano attho. Paratthoti paresaṃ
analyzed: atta atthaḥ vā iti ādīsu vā saddo samuccaya tthaḥ atta atthaḥ ti attanaḥ attho para tthaḥ ti paresam

original: tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ attho. Ubhayatthoti attano ca paresañcāti sakiṃyeva ubhinnaṃ attho.
analyzed: tiṇṇam lokānam attho ubhayattho ti attanaḥ ca paresam ca ati sakiṃyeva ubhinnam

original: Diṭṭhadhammikoti diṭṭhadhamme niyutto, diṭṭhadhammappayojano vā attho. Samparāye
analyzed: diṭṭhadhammikaḥ ti diṭṭhadhamme niyuttaḥ diṭṭhadhamma ppayojanaḥ vā attho samparāye

original: niyutto, samparāyappayojano vā samparāyiko. Uttānotiādīsu vohāravasena vattabbo sukhapatiṭṭhattā
analyzed: niyuttaḥ samparāya payojanaḥ vā samparāyikaḥ uttānaḥ ti ādīsu vohāra vasena vattabbo sukha patiṭṭha ttā

original: uttāno. Vohāraṃ atikkamitvā vattabbo suññatāpaṭisaṃyutto dukkhapatiṭṭhattā gambhīro.
analyzed: uttānaḥ vohāram atikkamitvā vattabbaḥ suñña tā paṭisaṃyuttaḥ dukkha patiṭṭha ttā gambhīro

original: Lokuttaro accantatirokkhattā gūḷho. Aniccatādiko ghanādīhi paṭicchannattā paṭicchanno.
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ gūḍhaḥ anicca tā ādikaḥ ghana ādīhi paṭicchanna ttā paṭicchannaḥ

original: Apacuravohārena vattabbo yathārutaṃ aggahetvā adhippāyassa netabbato neyyo. Pacuravohārena
analyzed: a pacuravohārena vattabbaḥ yathārutam aggahetvā adhippāyassa netabbataḥ neyyaḥ pacuravohārena

original: vattabbo vacanamatteneva adhippāyassa nītattā nīto. Suparisuddhasīlasamādhivipassanattho
analyzed: vattabbaḥ vacana mattena iva adhippāyassa nīta ttā nītaḥ su parisuddha sīla samādhi vipassana attho

original: tadaṅgavikkhambhanavasena vajjavirahitattā anavajjo. Kilesasamucchedanato ariyamaggattho
analyzed: tad aṅga vikkhambhana vasena vajja virahita ttā anavajjaḥ kilesa samucchedanataḥ ariya magga tthaḥ

original: nakkileso. Kilesapaṭippassaddhattā ariyaphalattho vodāno. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatesu aggadhammattā
analyzed: na kilesaḥ kilesa paṭippassaddha ttā ariya phala atthaḥ vodāno saṅkhata asaṅkhatesu agga dhamma ttā

original: nibbānaṃ paramattho. Parivattatīti buddhañāṇassa visayabhāvato abahibhūtattā antobuddhañāṇe
analyzed: nibbānam paramattho parivattati iti buddha ñāṇassa visaya bhāvataḥ a bahibhūta ttā anto buddha ñāṇe

original: byāpitvā vā samantā vā alaṅkaritvā vā visesena vā vattati.
analyzed: byāpitvā vā samantā vā alaṅkaritvā vā visesena vā vattati

original: “Sabbaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādīhi bhagavato ñāṇavisayataṃ dasseti. Ñāṇānuparivattīti ñāṇaṃ
analyzed: sabbam kāya kamma nti ādīhi bhagavataḥ ñāṇa visaya tam dasseti ñāṇa anuparivattī iti ñāṇam

original: anuparivatti, ñāṇavirahitaṃ na hotīti attho. Appaṭihatanti nirāvaraṇataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: anuparivatti ñāṇa virahitam na hoti iti attho appaṭihatam ti nirāvaraṇa tam dasseti

original: Puna sabbaññutaṃ upamāya sādhetukāmo “yāvataka”ntiādimāha. Tattha jānitabbanti neyyaṃ.
analyzed: puna sabbaññu tam upamāya sādhetu kāmaḥ yāvatakanti ādim āha tattha jānitabbam ti na iyyam

original: Neyyapariyanto neyyāvasānamassa atthīti neyyapariyantikaṃ. Asabbaññūnaṃ pana neyyāvasānameva
analyzed: neyya pariyantaḥ neyya avasānam assa atthi iti neyya pariyantikam asabbaññūnam pana neyya avasānam eva

original: natthi. Ñāṇapariyantikepi eseva nayo. Purimayamake vuttatthameva iminā yamakena visesetvā
analyzed: natthi ñāṇa pariyantike pi esa iva nayo purima yamake vutta ttham eva iminā yamakena visesetvā

original: dasseti, tatiyayamakena paṭisedhavasena niyametvā dasseti. Ettha ca neyyaṃ ñāṇassa
analyzed: dasseti tatiya yamakena paṭisedha vasena niyametvā dasseti ettha ca na iyyam ñāṇassa

analyzed: pathattā neyya pathaḥ aññamañña pariyanta ṭṭhāyino ti neyyam ca ñāṇam ca khepetvā ṭhānato

original: aññamaññassa pariyante ṭhānasīlā.
analyzed: aññamaññassa pariyante ṭhāna sīlā

original: Āvajjanapaṭibaddhāti manodvārāvajjanāyattā, āvajjitānantarameva jānātīti attho. Ākaṅkhapaṭibaddhāti
analyzed: āvajjana paṭibaddhā ati manaḥ dvāra āvajjana āyattā āvajjita anantaram eva jānāti iti attho ākaṅkha paṭibaddhā ati

original: ruciāyattā, āvajjanānantaraṃ javanañāṇena jānātīti attho. Itarāni dve padāni imesaṃ
analyzed: ruci āyattā āvajjana anantaram javana ñāṇena jānāti iti itarāni dve padāni imesam

original: dvinnaṃ padānaṃ yathākkamena atthappakāsanatthaṃ vuttāni. Āsayaṃ jānātīti ettha āsayanti
analyzed: dvinnam padānam yathākkamena attha ppakāsana attham vuttāni āsayam jānāti iti ettha āsayanti

original: nissayanti etthāti āsayo, micchādiṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā kāmādīhi nekkhammādīhi vā
analyzed: nissayanti ettha ati āsayaḥ micchādiṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā kāma ādīhi nekkhamma ādīhi vā

original: paribhāvitassa santānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sattasantānaṃ anusenti anupavattentīti
analyzed: paribhāvitassa santānassa itam adhivacanam satta santānam anusenti anupavattenti iti

original: anusayā, thāmagatānaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃva etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Anusayaṃ jānātīti anusayakathā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva.
analyzed: etam adhivacanam anusayam jānāti iti anusaya kathā heṭṭhā vuttāya iva

original: Caritanti pubbe katakusalākusalakammaṃ. Adhimuttinti sampati kusale akusale vā cittavosaggo.
analyzed: caritanti pubbe kata kusala akusala kammam adhimuttinti sampati kusale akusale vā citta vosaggo

original: Apparajakkheti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ rāgādirajo etesanti apparajakkhā. Appaṃ rāgādirajo

original: etesanti vā apparajakkhā, te apparajakkhe. Mahārajakkheti ñāṇamaye akkhimhi mahantaṃ
analyzed: vā apparajakkhāḥ te apparajakkhe mahārajakkha iti ñāṇa maye akkhimhi mahantam

original: rāgādirajo etesanti mahārajakkhā. Mahantaṃ rāgādirajo etesanti vā mahārajakkhā, te
analyzed: rāga ādi rajaḥ mahārajakkhāḥ mahantam rāga ādi rajaḥ vā mahārajakkhāḥ te

original: mahārajakkhe. Tikkhindriye mudindriyeti tikkhāni saddhādīni indriyāni etesanti tikkhindriyā.
analyzed: mahārajakkhe tikkha indriye mud indriya iti tikkhāni saddhā ādīni indriyāni etesanti tikkha indriyā

original: Mudūni saddhādīni indriyāni etesanti mudindriyā. Svākāre dvākāreti sundarā saddhādayo
analyzed: mudūni saddhā ādīni indriyāni su ākāre dvi ākārā iti

original: ākārā koṭṭhāsā etesanti svākārā. Kucchitā garahitā asaddhādayo ākārā koṭṭhāsā etesanti
analyzed: ākārā koṭṭhāsāḥ su ākārā kucchitāḥ garahitāḥ asaddha ādayaḥ ākārā koṭṭhāsāḥ etesanti

original: dvākārā. Suviññāpaye duviññāpayeti ye kathitaṃ kāraṇaṃ sallakkhenti sukhena sakkā
analyzed: dvi ākārā su viññāpaye du viññāpayeti ye kathitam kāraṇam sallakkhenti sukhena sakkā

original: honti viññāpetuṃ, te suviññāpayā. Tabbiparītā duviññāpayā. Bhabbābhabbeti bhabbe
analyzed: honti viññāpetum te su viññāpayā tad biparītāḥ du viññāpayā bhabba abhabbā iti bhabbe

original: ca abhabbe ca. Ariyāya jātiyā bhavanti jāyantīti bhabbā. Vattamānasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ.
analyzed: ca abhabbe ca ariyāya jātiyā bhavanti jāyanti iti bhabbāḥ vattamāna samīpe vattamāna vacanam

original: Bhavissanti jāyissanti vāti bhabbā, bhājanabhūtāti attho. Ye ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa
analyzed: bhavissanti jāyissanti vā ati bhabbāḥ bhājana bhūtā ti atthaḥ ye ariya magga paṭivedhassa

original: anucchavikā upanissayasampannā, te bhabbā. Vuttapaṭipakkhā abhabbā.
analyzed: anucchavikāḥ upanissaya sampannā te bhabbāḥ vutta paṭipakkhāḥ abhabbā

original: Satte pajānātīti rūpādike ārammaṇe lagge laggite satte pajānāti. Sadevako lokoti
analyzed: satte pajānāti iti rūpa ādike ārammaṇe lagge laggite satte pajānāti sa devakaḥ

original: saha devehi sadevako. Saha mārena samārako. Saha brahmunā sabrahmako. Saha samaṇabrāhmaṇehi
analyzed: saha devehi sa devakaḥ saha mārena sa mārakaḥ saha brahmunā sa brahmakaḥ saha samaṇa brāhmaṇehi

original: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī. Pajātattā pajā. Saha devamanussehi sadevamanussā. “Pajā”ti sattalokassa
analyzed: sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇī pajāta ttā pajā saha deva manussehi sa deva manussā pajāti satta lokassa

original: pariyāyavacanametaṃ. Tattha sadevakavacanena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ, samārakavacanena
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam etam tattha sa devaka vacanena pañca kāmāvacara deva ggahaṇam sa māraka vacanena

original: chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ. Sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ. Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇīvacanena
analyzed: chaṭṭha kāmāvacara deva ggahaṇam sa brahmaka vacanena brahmakāyika ādi brahma ggahaṇam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇī vacanena

original: sāsanassa paccatthikapaccāmittasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇaṃ samitapāpabāhitapāpasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇañca.
analyzed: sāsanassa paccatthika pacca amitta samaṇa brāhmaṇa ggahaṇam samita pāpa bāhita pāpa samaṇa brāhmaṇa ggahaṇam ca

original: Pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ. Sadevamanussavacanena sammutidevaavasesamanussaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: pajā vacanena satta loka ggahaṇam sa deva manussa vacanena sammuti deva avasesa manussa ggahaṇam

original: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsaloko. Dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha tīhi padehi okāsa lokaḥ dvīhi pajā vasena satta lokaḥ gahitaḥ iti veditabbo

original: Aparo nayo – sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito, samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaraloko,
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ sa devaka ggahaṇena arūpāvacara lokaḥ gahitaḥ sa māraka ggahaṇena cha kāmāvacara loko

original: sabrahmakaggahaṇena rūpāvacarabrahmaloko, sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena
analyzed: sa brahmaka ggahaṇena rūpāvacara brahma lokaḥ sa samaṇa brāhmaṇa ādi ggahaṇena catu parisa vasena

original: sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko, avasesasabbasattaloko vā. Api cettha sadevakavacanena
analyzed: sammuti devehi vā saha manussa lokaḥ avasesa sabba satta lokaḥ vā api ca ittha sa devaka vacanena

original: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassapi lokassa antobuddhañāṇe parivattanabhāvaṃ sādheti.
analyzed: ukkaṭṭha paricchedato sabbassa api lokassa antar buddha ñāṇe parivattana bhāvam sādheti

original: Tato yesaṃ siyā “māro mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī, kiṃ sopi antobuddhañāṇe
analyzed: tatas yesam siyā māraḥ mahā anubhāvo vasa vattī kim saḥ api antar buddha ñāṇe

original: parivattatī”ti. Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento “samārako”ti āha. Yesaṃ pana siyā “brahmā
analyzed: parivattati iti tesam vimatim vidhamento āha yesam pana siyā brahmā

original: mahānubhāvo, ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati. Dvīhi…pe… dasahi
analyzed: mahā anubhāvaḥ ekaṅguliyā ekasmin cakkavāḷa sahasse ālokam pharati dvīhipe dasahi

original: aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati, anuttarañca jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ
analyzed: aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷa sahassesu ālokam pharati anuttaram ca jhāna samāpatti sukham

original: paṭisaṃvedeti, kiṃ sopi antobuddhañāṇe parivattatī”ti. Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento “sabrahmako”ti
analyzed: paṭisaṃvedeti kim saḥ api antar buddha ñāṇe parivattati iti tesam vimatim vidhamento

original: āha. Tato yesaṃ siyā “puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā sāsanapaccatthikā, kiṃ tepi antobuddhañāṇe
analyzed: āha tatas yesam siyā puthū samaṇa brāhmaṇā sāsana paccatthikā kim te pi antar buddha ñāṇe

original: parivattantī”ti. Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā”ti āha.

analyzed: aneka chiddam akkhi mukha ādīhi uggharantam paggharantam adhobhāgena

original: paggharantaṃ. Kimisaṅghanisevitanti sūcimukhādīhi nānāpāṇakulasamūhehi āsevitaṃ.
analyzed: paggharantam sūci mukha ādīhi nānā pāṇa kula samūhehi āsevitam

original: Nānākalimalaparipūranti anekavidhehi asucikoṭṭhāsehi pūritaṃ.
analyzed: anekavidhehi asuci koṭṭhāsehi pūritam

original: 71. Tato māgaṇḍiyo “pabbajitā nāma mānusake kāme pahāya dibbakāmatthāya pabbajanti,
analyzed: tatas māgaṇḍiyaḥ pabbajitāḥ nāma mānusake kāme pahāya dibba kāma tthāya pabbajanti

original: ayañca dibbepi kāme na icchati, idampi itthiratanaṃ, kā nu assa diṭṭhī”ti pucchituṃ
analyzed: ayam ca dibbe pi kāme na icchati idam pi itthi ratanam kā nu assa diṭṭhī iti pucchitum

original: dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha etādisaṃ ce ratananti dibbitthiratanaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati.
analyzed: dutiyam gātham āha tattha etādisam ce ratanam ti dibbitthi ratanam sandhāya bhaṇati

original: Nārinti attano dhītaraṃ sandhāya. Diṭṭhigataṃ sīlavataṃ nu jīvitanti diṭṭhiñca sīlañca
analyzed: nārinti attanaḥ dhītaram sandhāya diṭṭhi gatam sīlavatam nu jīvitanti diṭṭhiñca sīlañca

original: vatañca jīvitañca. Bhavūpapattiñca vadesi kīdisanti attano bhavūpapattiṃ vā tuvaṃ kīdisaṃ vadesi.
analyzed: vatam ca jīvitam ca bhava upapattiñca vadesi kīdisanti attanaḥ bhava upapattim vā tuvam kīdisam vadesi

original: 72. Ito parā dve gāthā vissajjanapucchānayena pavattattā pākaṭasambandhāyeva. Tāsu
analyzed: itas parāḥ dve gāthāḥ vissajjana pucchā nayena pavatta tā pākaṭa sambandhāya iva tāsu

original: paṭhamagāthāya saṅkhepattho – tassa mayhaṃ māgaṇḍiya dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatadhammesu
analyzed: paṭhama gāthāya saṅkhepa atthaḥ tassa mayham māgaṇḍiya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gata dhammesu

original: nicchinitvā “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti evaṃ idaṃ vadāmīti samuggahītaṃ na hoti
analyzed: nicchinitvā idam eva saccam mogham aññanti evam idam vadāmi iti samuggahītam na hoti

original: natthi na vijjati, kiṃ kāraṇā? Ahañhi passanto diṭṭhīsu ādīnavaṃ kañci diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā
analyzed: natthi na vijjati kim kāraṇā aham hi passantaḥ diṭṭhīsu ādīnavam kañci diṭṭhim aggahetvā

original: saccāni pavicinanto ajjhattaṃ rāgādīnaṃ santibhāvena ajjhattasantisaṅkhātaṃ nibbānameva addasanti.
analyzed: saccāni pavicinantaḥ ajjhattam rāga ādīnam santi bhāvena ajjhatta santi saṅkhātam nibbānam eva addasanti

original: Ādīnavanti upaddavaṃ. Sadukkhanti kāyikadukkhena sadukkhaṃ. Savighātanti cetasikadukkhena
analyzed: ādīnavanti upaddavam sa dukkhanti kāyika dukkhena sa dukkham sa vighātanti cetasika dukkhena

original: sahitaṃ. Saupāyāsanti upāyāsasahitaṃ. Sapariḷāhanti sadarathaṃ. Na nibbidāyāti na
analyzed: sahitam upāyāsa sahitam sa pariḷāhanti sadaratham na nibbidā āyāti na

original: vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya. Na virāgāyāti na vaṭṭe virāgatthāya. Na nirodhāyāti na vaṭṭassa
analyzed: vaṭṭe nibbindana tthāya na virāgāya ati na vaṭṭe virāga tthāya na nirodhāya ati na vaṭṭassa

original: nirodhatthāya. Na upasamāyāti na vaṭṭassa upasamatthāya. Na abhiññāyāti na vaṭṭassa
analyzed: nirodha tthāya na upasamāyāti na vaṭṭassa upasama tthāya na abhiññāyāti na vaṭṭassa

original: abhijānanatthāya. Na sambodhāyāti na kilesaniddāvigamena vaṭṭato sambujjhanatthāya.
analyzed: abhijānana tthāya na sambodhāya ati na kilesa niddā vigamena vaṭṭataḥ sambujjhana tthāya

original: Na nibbānāyāti na amatanibbānatthāya. Ettha pana “nibbidāyā”ti vipassanā. “Virāgāyā”ti
analyzed: na nibbānāya ati na amata nibbāna atthāya ettha pana nibbidāya ati vipassanā virāgāya ati

original: maggo. “Nirodhāya upasamāyā”ti nibbānaṃ. “Abhiññāya sambodhāyā”ti maggo. “Nibbānāyā”ti
analyzed: maggaḥ nirodhāya upasamāyāti nibbānam abhiññāya sambodhāya ati maggaḥ nibbānāya ati

original: nibbānameva. Evaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanā, tīsu maggo, tīsu nibbānaṃ vuttanti evaṃ
analyzed: nibbānam eva evam ekasmin ṭhāne vipassanā tīsu maggo tīsu nibbānam vuttan ti evam

original: vavatthānakathā veditabbā. Pariyāyena pana sabbānipetāni maggavevacanānipi nibbānavevacanānipi hontiyeva.
analyzed: vavatthāna kathā veditabbā pariyāyena pana sabbānipetāni magga vevacanāni pi nibbāna vevacanāni pi

original: Ajjhattaṃ rāgassa santinti ajjhattarāgassa santabhāvena nibbutabhāvena ajjhattasantisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: ajjhattam rāgassa santinti ajjhatta rāgassa santa bhāvena nibbuta bhāvena ajjhatta santi saṅkhātam

original: nibbānaṃ olokesiṃ. Dosassa santintiādīsupi eseva nayo. Pacinanti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ.
analyzed: nibbānam dosassa santi nti ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ pacinanti niddesassa uddesa padam

original: Vicinantoti saccāni vaḍḍhento vibhāvento. Pavicinantoti tāneva paccekaṃ vibhāvento.
analyzed: vicinantaḥ ti saccāni vaḍḍhentaḥ vibhāventaḥ pavicinantaḥ ti tān eva paccekam vibhāventaḥ

original: Keci “gavesanto”ti vaṇṇayanti. Adassanti olokesiṃ. Adakkhinti vinivijjhiṃ. Aphassinti
analyzed: keci gavesantoti vaṇṇayanti a dassanti olokesim a dakkhinti vinivijjhim a phassinti

original: paññāya phusiṃ. Paṭivijjhinti ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ akāsiṃ.
analyzed: paññāya phusim paṭivijjhinti ñāṇena paccakkham akāsim

original: 73. Dutiyagāthāya saṅkhepattho – yānimāni diṭṭhigatāni tehi tehi sattehi vinicchinitvā
analyzed: dutiya gāthāya saṅkhepa atthaḥ yāni imāni diṭṭhi gatāni tehi tehi sattehi vinicchinitvā

original: gahitattā “vinicchayā”ti ca attano paccayehi abhisaṅkhatabhāvādinā nayena “pakappitānī”ti
analyzed: ca attanaḥ paccayehi abhisaṅkhata bhāva ādinā nayena pakappitāni iti

original: ca vuccanti, te ve munī diṭṭhigatadhamme aggahetvā ajjhattasantīti yametamatthaṃ
analyzed: ca vuccanti te ve munī diṭṭhi gata dhamme aggahetvā ajjhatta santī iti yam etam attham

original: brūsi, ācikkha me, kathaṃ nu dhīrehi paveditaṃ taṃ kathaṃ pakāsitaṃ dhīrehīti vadati.
analyzed: brūsi ācikkha me katham nu dhīrehi paveditam tam katham pakāsitam dhīrehi iti vadati

original: Imissā gāthāya niddeso uttānattho ṭhapetvā paramatthapadaṃ. Tattha yaṃ paramatthanti yaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānaṃ.
analyzed: imissā gāthāya niddesaḥ uttāna atthaḥ ṭhapetvā paramattha padam tattha yam paramatthanti yam uttamam nibbānam

original: 74. Athassa bhagavā yathā yena upāyena taṃ padaṃ dhīrehi pakāsitaṃ, taṃ upāyaṃ sapaṭipakkhaṃ
analyzed: atha assa bhagavā yathā yena upāyena tam padam dhīrehi pakāsitam tam upāyam sa paṭipakkham

original: dassento “na diṭṭhiyā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha na diṭṭhiyātiādīhi diṭṭhisutiaṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇabāhirasīlabbatāni
analyzed: dassentaḥ na diṭṭhiyā iti gātham āha tattha na diṭṭhiyā ati ādīhi diṭṭhi suti aṭṭha samāpatti ñāṇa bāhira sīlabbatāni

original: paṭikkhipati. “Suddhimāhā”ti ettha vuttaṃ āha-saddaṃ sabbattha nakārena saddhiṃ yojetvā
analyzed: paṭikkhipati suddhim āha iti ettha vuttam āha saddam sabbattha nakārena saddhim yojetvā

original: purimapadattayaṃ netvā “diṭṭhiyā suddhiṃ nāha na kathemī”ti evamattho veditabbo.
analyzed: netvā diṭṭhiyā suddhim na āha na kathemi iti evam atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Yathā cettha, evaṃ uttarapadesupi. Tattha ca adiṭṭhiyā nāhāti dasavatthukaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: yathā ca ittha evam uttara padesu pi tattha ca adiṭṭhiyā na āhāti dasa vatthukam sammādiṭṭhim

original: vinā na kathemi. Tathā assutiyāti navaṅgaṃ savanaṃ vinā. Añāṇāti kammassakatasaccānulomikañāṇaṃ
analyzed: vinā na kathemi tathā assutiyā ati navaṅgam savanam vinā añāṇā ti kammassakata sacca ānulomika ñāṇam

original: vinā. Asīlatāti pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ vinā. Abbatāti dhutaṅgavataṃ vinā. Nopi tenāti
analyzed: vinā pātimokkha saṃvaram vinā dhutaṅgavatam vinā na upi tena ati

original: tesu ekamekena diṭṭhiādimattenāpi na kathemīti evamattho veditabbo. Ete ca nissajja
analyzed: tesu ekam ekena diṭṭhi ādi mattena api na kathemi iti evam atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ete ca nissajja

original: anuggahāyāti ete ca purimadiṭṭhiādibhede kaṇhapakkhike dhamme samugghātakaraṇena
analyzed: anuggahāya āti ete ca purima diṭṭhi ādi bhede kaṇha pakkhike dhamme samugghāta karaṇena

original: nissajja, pacchime adiṭṭhiādibhede sukkapakkhikepi atammayatāpajjanena anuggahāya.
analyzed: nissajja pacchime adiṭṭhi ādi bhede sukka pakkhike pi anuggahāya

original: Santo anissāya bhavaṃ na jappeti imāya paṭipattiyā rāgādivūpasamena santo cakkhādīsu
analyzed: santaḥ a nissāya bhavam na jappeti imāya paṭipattiyā rāga ādi vūpasamena santaḥ cakkha ādīsu

original: kañci dhammaṃ anissāya ekampi bhavaṃ na jappe, apihetuṃ apatthetuṃ samattho siyā,
analyzed: kañci dhammam a nissāya ekam pi bhavam na jappe apihetum apatthetum samatthaḥ siyā

original: ayamassa ajjhattasantīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ayam assa ajjhatta santī ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Savanampi icchitabbanti suttādivasena suṇanampi ākaṅkhitabbaṃ. Sambhārā ime dhammāti
analyzed: savanam pi icchitabbanti sutta ādi vasena suṇanam pi ākaṅkhitabbam sambhārāḥ ime dhammā ti

original: sammādiṭṭhiādikā ime dhammā upakāraṭṭhena sambhārā honti. Kaṇhapakkhikānanti akusalapakkhe
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi ādikāḥ ime dhammāḥ upakāra ṭṭhena sambhārāḥ honti kaṇhapakkhikānam ti akusala pakkhe

original: bhavānaṃ. Samugghātato pahānaṃ icchitabbanti sammā hananato samucchedato pahānaṃ
analyzed: bhavānam samugghātataḥ pahānam icchitabbanti sammā hananataḥ samucchedataḥ pahānam

original: ākaṅkhitabbaṃ. Tedhātukesu kusalesu dhammesūti kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tebhūmakesu
analyzed: ākaṅkhitabbam tedhātukesu kusalesu dhammesu iti kāmarūpa arūpa saṅkhātesu tebhūmakesu

original: kosallasambhūtesu. Atammayatāti nittaṇhabhāvo.
analyzed: kosalla sambhūtesu nittaṇha bhāvaḥ

original: 75. Evaṃ vutte vacanatthaṃ asallakkhento māgaṇḍiyo “no ce kirā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
analyzed: evam vutte vacana attham a sallakkhentaḥ māgaṇḍiyaḥ no ce kirāti gātham āha tattha

analyzed: pana no ca iti saddena yojetvā no ce kira āha no ce kira kathesi iti evam atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Momūhanti atimūḷhaṃ, mohanaṃ vā. Paccentīti jānanti. Imissāpi gāthāya niddeso uttāno.
analyzed: momūhanti ati mūḷham mohanam vā paccenti iti jānanti imissā api gāthāya niddesaḥ uttānaḥ

original: 76. Athassa bhagavā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pucchaṃ paṭikkhipanto “diṭṭhiñca nissāyā”ti
analyzed: athassa bhagavā tam diṭṭhim nissāya puccham paṭikkhipantaḥ diṭṭhiñca nissāya ati

analyzed: gātham āha tassa atthaḥ tvam māgaṇḍiya diṭṭhim nissāya punappunam pucchamānaḥ yāni

analyzed: te diṭṭhi gatāni samuggahitāni tesu eva samuggahītesu pamoham āgataḥ tvam itas ca mayā

original: vuttaajjhattasantito paṭipattito dhammadesanato vā aṇumpi yuttasaññaṃ na passasi,
analyzed: vutta ajjhatta santitaḥ paṭipattitaḥ dhamma desanataḥ vā aṇum pi yutta saññam na passasi

original: tena kāraṇena tvaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ momūhato passasīti.
analyzed: tena kāraṇena tvam imam dhammam momūhataḥ passasi iti

original: Lagganaṃ nissāya laggananti diṭṭhilagganaṃ allīyitvā diṭṭhilagganaṃ. Bandhananti diṭṭhibandhanaṃ. Palibodhanti diṭṭhipalibodhaṃ.
analyzed: lagganam nissāya laggananti diṭṭhi lagganam allīyitvā diṭṭhi lagganam bandhananti diṭṭhi bandhanam palibodhanti diṭṭhi palibodham

original: Andhakāraṃ pakkhandosīti bahalandhakāraṃ paviṭṭhosi. Yuttasaññanti samaṇadhamme yuttasaññaṃ.
analyzed: andhakāram pakkhandosi iti bahala andhakāram paviṭṭhaḥ asi yutta saññam ti samaṇa dhamme yutta saññam

original: Pattasaññanti samaṇadhamme paṭiladdhasaññaṃ. Lagganasaññanti sañjānitasaññaṃ. Kāraṇasaññanti
analyzed: patta saññanti samaṇa dhamme paṭiladdha saññam laggana saññanti sañjānita saññam kāraṇa saññanti

original: hetusaññaṃ. Ṭhānasaññanti kāraṇasaññaṃ. Na paṭilabhasīti na vindasi. Kuto ñāṇanti
analyzed: hetu saññam ṭhāna saññanti kāraṇa saññam na paṭilabhasi iti na vindasi kutas ñāṇam ti

original: maggañāṇaṃ pana kena kāraṇena labhissasi. Aniccaṃ vāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena pañcakkhandhā
analyzed: magga ñāṇam pana kena kāraṇena labhissasi aniccam vā ati hutvā abhāva ṭṭhena pañca kkhandhāḥ

original: aniccaṃ. Aniccasaññānulomaṃ vāti “pañcakkhandhā aniccā”ti uppannā saññā aniccasaññā,
analyzed: aniccam anicca saññā anulomam vā ti pañca kkhandhāḥ aniccā ati uppannā saññā anicca saññā

original: tāya saññāya anulomaṃ appaṭikkūlaṃ aniccasaññānulomaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Dvinnaṃ
analyzed: tāya saññāya anulomam appaṭikkūlam anicca saññā anulomam kim tat vipassanā ñāṇam dvinnam

original: vipassanāñāṇānaṃ dukkhānattasaññānulomānampi eseva nayo.
analyzed: vipassanā ñāṇānam dukkhānatta saññā anulomānam pi esa eva nayo

original: 77. Evaṃ samuggahitesu pamohena māgaṇḍiyassa vivādāpattiṃ dassetvā idāni tesu aññesu
analyzed: evam samuggahitesu pamohena māgaṇḍiyassa vivāda āpattim dassetvā idāni tesu aññesu

original: ca dhammesu vigatappamohassa attano nibbivādataṃ dassento “samo visesī”ti gāthamāha.
analyzed: ca dhammesu vigata ppamohassa attanaḥ nibbivāda tam dassentaḥ samaḥ visesi iti gātham āha

original: Tassattho – yo evaṃ tidhā mānena vā diṭṭhiyā vā puggalena vā maññati, so tena mānena
analyzed: tassa atthaḥ yaḥ evam tidhā mānena vā diṭṭhiyā vā puggalena vā maññati saḥ tena mānena

original: tāya vā diṭṭhiyā tena vā puggalena vivadeyya. Yo pana amhādiso imāsu tīsu vidhāsu
analyzed: tāya vā diṭṭhiyā tena vā puggalena vivadeyya yaḥ pana amhādisaḥ imāsu tīsu vidhāsu

original: avikampamāno, samo visesīti na tassa hoti, na ca hīnoti pāṭhaseso. Imissāpi gāthāya niddeso uttānova.
analyzed: a vikampamānaḥ samaḥ visesī iti na tassa hoti na ca hīnaḥ iti pāṭha sesaḥ imissā api gāthāya niddesaḥ uttānaḥ va

original: 78. Kiñca bhiyyo – “saccanti so”ti gāthā. Tassattho – so evarūpo pahīnamānadiṭṭhiko
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas saccanti saḥ ti gāthā tassa atthaḥ saḥ evarūpaḥ pahīna māna diṭṭhiko

original: “mādiso ‘bāhitapāpattā’dinā nayena brāhmaṇo, idameva sacca”nti kiṃ vadeyya kiṃ vatthuṃ
analyzed: mādisaḥ kim vadeyya kim

original: bhaṇeyya, kena vā kāraṇena bhaṇeyya, “mayhaṃ saccaṃ, tuyhaṃ musā”ti vā kena mānena
analyzed: bhaṇeyya kena vā kāraṇena bhaṇeyya mayham saccam tuyham vā kena mānena

original: diṭṭhiyā puggalena vā vivadeyya. Yasmiṃ mādise khīṇāsave “sadisohamasmī”ti pavattiyā
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā puggalena vā vivadeyya yasmin mādise khīṇa āsave sadisā uham asmi iti pavattiyā

original: samaṃ vā, itaradvayabhāvena pavattiyā visamaṃ vā maññitaṃ natthi, samānādīsu kena
analyzed: samam vā itara dvaya bhāvena pavattiyā visamam vā maññitam na atthi samāna ādīsu kena

original: vādaṃ paṭisaṃyujeyya paṭipphareyyāti. Imissāpi gāthāya niddeso uttāno.
analyzed: vādam paṭisaṃyujeyya paṭipphareyya ati imissā api gāthāya niddesaḥ uttānaḥ

original: 79. Nanu ekaṃseneva evarūpo puggalo? “Okaṃ pahāyā”ti gāthā. Tattha okaṃ pahāyāti
analyzed: nanu ekaṃsena iva evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ okam pahāya ati gāthā tattha okam pahāya ati

original: rūpadhātvādiviññāṇassokāsaṃ tatra chandarāgappahānena chaḍḍetvā. Aniketasārīti rūpanimittaniketādīni
analyzed: rūpa dhātu ādi viññāṇassa ukāsam tatra chanda rāga ppahānena chaḍḍetvā aniketa sārī iti rūpa nimitta niketa ādīni

original: taṇhāvasena asaranto. Gāme akubbaṃ muni santhavānīti gāme gihisanthavāni akaronto.
analyzed: taṇhā vasena a sarantaḥ gāme akubbam muni santhavāni iti gāme gihi santhavāni a karontaḥ

original: Kāmehi rittoti kāmesu chandarāgābhāvena sabbakāmehi puthubhūto. Apurakkharānoti āyatiṃ
analyzed: kāmehi rittaḥ ti kāmesu chanda rāga abhāvena sabba kāmehi puthu bhūtaḥ āyatim

original: attabhāvaṃ anabhinibbattento. Kathaṃ na viggayha janena kayirāti janena saddhiṃ viggāhikakathaṃ na katheyya.
analyzed: atta bhāvam an abhinibbattentaḥ katham na viggayha janena janena saddhim viggāhika katham na katheyya

original: Hāliddakānīti evaṃnāmako gahapati. Yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe
analyzed: hāliddakāni iti evaṃnāmakaḥ gahapati yena ayasmai mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkamīti yena ati bhummatthe

analyzed: karaṇa vacanam tasmai yattha mahākaccāno tattha upasaṅkamī iti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yena vā kāraṇena mahākaccāno devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti
analyzed: yena vā kāraṇena mahākaccānaḥ deva manussehi upasaṅkamitabbaḥ tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti

original: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena mahākaccāno upasaṅkamitabbo? Nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamādhippāyena,
analyzed: evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ kena ca kāraṇena mahākaccānaḥ upasaṅkamitabbaḥ nānā pakāra guṇa visesa adhigama adhippāyena

original: sāduphalūpabhogādhippāyena dijagaṇehi niccaphalitamahārukkho viya. Upasaṅkamīti ca
analyzed: sādu phala upabhoga adhippāyena dija gaṇehi nicca phalita mahā rukkhaḥ viya upasaṅkamīti ca

original: gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ. Atha vā evaṃ gato
analyzed: gataḥ ti vuttam hoti upasaṅkamitvā iti upasaṅkamana pariyosāna dīpanam atha vā evam gataḥ

original: tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ mahākaccānassa samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tatas āsannataram ṭhānam mahākaccānassa samīpa saṅkhātam gantvā iti pi vuttam hoti

original: Abhivādetvāti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā. Idāni yenatthena mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: abhivādetvā iti pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā idāni yena atthena mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhānam

analyzed: āgataḥ tam pucchitu kāmaḥ dasa nakha samodhāna samujjalam añjalim sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvā

original: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu
analyzed: ekamantam nisīdi bhāva napuṃsaka niddesaḥ visamam candima sūriyā parivattanti itiādīsu

original: viya. Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti, evaṃ nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: viya tasmai yathā nisinnaḥ ekamantam nisinnaḥ hoti evam nisīdī iti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nisīdīti nisajjaṃ kappesi. Paṇḍitā hi devamanussā
analyzed: bhummatthe vā etam upayoga vacanam nisīdi iti nisajjam kappesi paṇḍitāḥ hi deva manussā

analyzed: garuṭṭhāniyam upasaṅkamitvā āsana kusala tāya ekamantam nisīdanti ayam ca gahapati

analyzed: tesam aññataraḥ tasmai ekamantam nisīdi

original: Kathaṃ nisinno ca pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti? Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ?
analyzed: katham nisinnaḥ ca pana ekamantam nisinnaḥ hoti iti nisajja dose

original: Atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ uparivātaṃ unnatappadesaṃ atisammukhaṃ atipacchāti. Atidūre nisinno
analyzed: ati dūram acca āsannam upari vātam unnata ppadesam ati sammukham ati pacchā ati ati dūre nisinnaḥ

original: hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
analyzed: hi sace kathetu kāmaḥ hoti uccāsaddena kathetabbam hoti accāsanne nisinnaḥ saṅghaṭṭanam

original: karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno agāravaṃ
analyzed: karoti upari vāte nisinnaḥ sarīra gandhena bādhati unnata ppadese nisinnaḥ agāravam

original: pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca daṭṭhabbaṃ
analyzed: pakāseti atisammukhā nisinnaḥ sace daṭṭhu kāmo hoti cakkhunā cakkhum āhacca daṭṭhabbam

original: hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Tasmā
analyzed: hoti atipacchā nisinnaḥ sace daṭṭhu kāmo hoti gīvam pasāretvā daṭṭhabbam hoti tasmā

original: ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ete cha nisajja dose vajjetvā nisīdi tena vuttam ekamantam nisīdi iti

original: Etadavocāti etaṃ avoca. Vuttamidaṃ bhante kaccāna bhagavatā aṭṭhakavaggiye māgaṇḍiyapañheti aṭṭhakavaggiyamhi māgaṇḍiyapañho nāma atthi, tasmiṃ pañhe.

original: Rūpadhātūti rūpakkhandho adhippeto. Rūpadhāturāgavinibandhanti rūpadhātumhi rāgena
analyzed: rūpadhātu uti rūpa kkhandhaḥ adhippetaḥ rūpadhātu rāga vinibandhanti rūpadhātumhi rāgena

original: vinibaddhaṃ. Viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ. Okasārīti gehasārī ālayasārī. Kasmā panettha

original: “viññāṇadhātu kho gahapatī”ti na vuttanti? Sammohavighātatthaṃ. “Oko”ti hi atthato

original: paccayo vuccati, purejātañca kammaviññāṇaṃ pacchājātassa kammaviññāṇassapi vipākaviññāṇassapi,

original: vipākaviññāṇañca vipākaviññāṇassapi kammaviññāṇassapi paccayo hoti, tasmā “kataraṃ

analyzed: nu kho idha viññāṇanti sammohaḥ bhaveyya tassa vighāta attham tam aggahetvā

original: desanā katāti. Apica vipākaārammaṇavasena catasso abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti vuttāti
analyzed: desanā katā ati api ca vipāka ārammaṇa vasena catasso abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ ti vuttā ati

original: tā dassetumpi idha viññāṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
analyzed: tā dassetum pi idha viññāṇam na gahitam

original: Upayupādānāti taṇhūpayadiṭṭhūpayavasena dve upayā, kāmupādānādīni cattāri upādānāni

analyzed: ete pahīnā ava satthu pana khīṇāsava bhāvo loke ati pākaṭaḥ ti uparima koṭiyā evam vuttam

original: Viññāṇadhātuyāti idha viññāṇaṃ kasmā gahitaṃ? Kilesappahānadassanatthaṃ. Kilesā hi
analyzed: viññāṇa dhātuyā ti idha viññāṇam kasmā gahitam kilesa ppahāna dassana ttham kilesāḥ hi

original: uppannena kilesavisārena ceva kilesavinibandhanena cāti attho. Niketasārīti vuccatīti
analyzed: uppannena kilesa visārena ca iva kilesa vinibandhanena ca ati attho niketasārī iti vuccati iti

analyzed: kilesa visāra vinibandhā pahīnā

analyzed: kasmā pana ittha pañca kkhandhā ca okā ati vuttā cha ārammaṇāni niketanti chandarāgassa

analyzed: evam bāhiresu chasu ārammaṇesu iti chandarāgassa balavat ubbala tāya evam desanā katā ati veditabbā

analyzed: sukhitesu sukhitaḥ ti upaṭṭhākesu dhana dhañña lābha ādi vasena sukhitesu idānāham manāpam

original: cīvaraṃ manāpaṃ bhojanaṃ labhissāmī”ti gehassitasukhena sukhito hoti, tehi pattasampattiṃ
analyzed: cīvaram manāpam bhojanam labhissāmi iti geha ssita sukhena sukhitaḥ hoti tehi patta sampattim

original: attanā anubhavamāno viya carati. Dukkhitesu dukkhitoti tesaṃ kenacideva kāraṇena
analyzed: attanā anubhavamānaḥ viya carati dukkhitesu dukkhitaḥ ti tesam kenacid eva kāraṇena

original: Kāmesūti vatthukāmesu. Evaṃ kho gahapati kāmehi aritto hotīti evaṃ kilesakāmehi aritto hoti.

original: Āguṃ na karotīti akusalādidosaṃ na karoti. Na gacchatīti agativasena na gacchati.

analyzed: na āgacchati iti pahīna kilese na upeti pāpakā ati lāmakā akusalā ati akosalla sambhūtā

analyzed: na upeti na paccāgacchati iti puna na nivattati

original: Aṭṭhānaghāto pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kammapathabhedaṃ na karoti. Cittaṃ āghātento

original: uppannoti cittassa āghāto. Tato balavataro paṭighāto. Paṭihaññanavasena paṭighaṃ.
analyzed: uppannaḥ ti cittassa āghāto tatas balavataraḥ paṭighāto paṭihaññana vasena paṭighaṃ

original: Paṭivirujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Kuppanavasena kopo. Pakopo sampakopoti upasaggavasena
analyzed: paṭivirujjhati iti paṭivirodhaḥ kuppana vasena kopaḥ pakopaḥ sampakopo ti upasagga vasena

original: padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Dussanavasena doso. Padoso sampadosoti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
analyzed: padam vaḍḍhitam dussana vasena doso padoso sampadoso ti upasagga vasena padam vaḍḍhitam

original: Cittassa byāpattīti cittassa vipannatā viparivattanākāro. Manaṃ padūsayamāno uppajjatīti
analyzed: cittassa byāpatti iti cittassa vipanna tā viparivattana ākāraḥ manam padūsayamānaḥ uppajjati iti

original: manopadoso. Kujjhanavasena kodho. Kujjhanākāro kujjhanā. Kujjhitassa bhāvo kujjhitattaṃ.
analyzed: mana upadosaḥ kujjhana vasena kodhaḥ kujjhana ākāraḥ kujjhanā kujjhitassa bhāvaḥ kujjhita ttam

original: Dussatīti doso. Dussanāti dussanākāro. Dussitattanti dussitabhāvo. Pakatibhāvavijahanaṭṭhena
analyzed: dussati iti dosaḥ dussanā ati dussana ākāraḥ dussita ttam ti dussita bhāvaḥ pakati bhāva vijahana ṭṭhena

original: byāpajjanaṃ byāpatti. Byāpajjanāti byāpajjanākāro. Virujjhatīti virodho. Punappunaṃ
analyzed: byāpajjanam byāpatti byāpajjanāti byāpajjana ākāraḥ virujjhati iti virodhaḥ punappunam

original: virujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Viruddhākārapaṭiviruddhākāravasena vā idaṃ vuttaṃ. Caṇḍiko
analyzed: virujjhati iti paṭivirodhaḥ viruddha ākāra paṭiviruddha ākāra vasena vā idam vuttam caṇḍiko

original: vuccati caṇḍo, thaddhapuggalo, tassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ. Na etena suropitaṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: vuccati caṇḍaḥ thaddha puggalo tassa bhāvaḥ caṇḍikkam na etena su ropitam vacanam

original: hoti, duruttaṃ aparipuṇṇameva hotīti asuropo. Kuddhakāle hi paripuṇṇavacanaṃ nāma
analyzed: hoti duruttam a paripuṇṇam eva hoti iti kuddha kāle hi paripuṇṇa vacanam nāma

original: natthi, sacepi kassaci hoti, taṃ appamāṇaṃ. Apare pana “assujananaṭṭhena assuropanato
analyzed: natthi sace pi kassaci hoti tam appamāṇam apare pana assu janana ṭṭhena

original: assuropo”ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ somanassassāpi assujananato. Heṭṭhāvuttaattamanatāpaṭipakkhato
analyzed: assuropo ti vadanti tam akāraṇam somanassassa api assu jananataḥ heṭṭhā vutta atta manatā paṭipakkhato

original: na attamanatāti anattamanatā. Sā pana yasmā cittasseva, na sattassa, tasmā “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na atta mana tā ati anattamana tā sā pana yasmā cittassa iva na sattassa tasmā cittassa ati vuttam

original: Adhimattaparittatā veditabbāti adhimattabhāvo parittabhāvo ca, balavabhāvo mandabhāvoti
analyzed: adhimatta paritta tā veditabbā ati adhimatta bhāvo paritta bhāvo ca balava bhāvaḥ manda bhāvaḥ ti

original: attho. Kañci kāleti ekadā. “Kañci kāla”ntipi pāṭho. Cittāvilakaraṇamatto hotīti cittassa
analyzed: kañci kāle iti ekadā kañci citta āvila karaṇa matto hoti iti cittassa

original: āvilakaraṇappamāṇo, cittakiliṭṭhakaraṇappamāṇoti attho. “Cittālasakaraṇamatto”tipi
analyzed: āvila karaṇa ppamāṇo citta kiliṭṭha karaṇa ppamāṇo ti attho citta alasa karaṇa matto tipi

original: pāṭho, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Tassa cittakilamathakaraṇamattoti attho. Na ca tāva mukhakulānavikulāno
analyzed: tam na sundaram tassa citta kilamatha karaṇam atto ti attho na ca tāva mukha kulāna vikulānaḥ

original: hotīti mukhassa saṅkocanavisaṅkocano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva hanusañcopano hotīti
analyzed: hoti iti mukhassa saṅkocana visaṅkocanaḥ na ca tāva hoti na ca tāva hanu sañcopanaḥ hoti iti

original: dvinnaṃ hanūnaṃ aparāparaṃ calano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva pharusavācaṃ nicchāraṇo
analyzed: dvinnam apara aparam calanaḥ na ca tāva na ca tāva pharusa vācam

original: hotīti paresaṃ mammacchedakaṃ pharusavācaṃ mukhato nīharaṇena bahi nikkhamano na
analyzed: hoti iti paresam mamma chedakam pharusa vācam mukhataḥ nīharaṇena bahi nikkhamanaḥ na

original: ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva disāvidisānuvilokano hotīti parassa abbhukkiraṇatthaṃ daṇḍādiatthāya
analyzed: ca tāva hoti na ca tāva disā vidisā anuvilokano hoti iti parassa abbhuk kiraṇa attham daṇḍa ādi atthāya

original: disañca anudisañca punappunaṃ vilokano na ca tāva hoti.
analyzed: disam ca anudisam ca punappunam vilokanaḥ na ca

original: Na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaparāmasano hotīti āghātanatthaṃ daṇḍañca ekatodhārādisatthañca
analyzed: na ca tāva daṇḍa sattha parāmasanaḥ hoti iti āghātana attham daṇḍam ca ekatodhāra ādi sattham ca

original: ādiyano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaabbhukkiraṇo hotīti vuttappakāraṃ
analyzed: ādiyanaḥ na ca tāva hoti na ca tāva daṇḍa sattha abbhukkiraṇaḥ hoti iti vutta ppakāram

original: daṇḍasatthaṃ ukkhipitvā paharaṇo na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaabhinipātano
analyzed: daṇḍa sattham ukkhipitvā paharaṇaḥ na ca tāva hoti na ca tāva daṇḍa sattha abhinipātano

original: hotīti etaṃ duvidhaṃ parassa paharaṇatthaṃ na ca tāva khipano hoti. Na ca tāva chinnavicchinnakaraṇo
analyzed: hoti iti etam duvidham parassa paharaṇa attham na ca tāva khipanaḥ hoti na ca tāva chinna vicchinna karaṇaḥ

original: hotīti daṇḍasatthādikhipanena parasarīraṃ dvidhākaraṇo ca vividhākārena vaṇakaraṇo
analyzed: hoti iti daṇḍa sattha ādi khipanena para sarīram ca vividha ākārena

original: ca na tāva hoti. “Chiddavicchiddakaraṇo”tipi pāṭho. Na ca tāva sambhañjanapalibhañjano
analyzed: ca na tāva pāṭhaḥ na ca tāva sambhañjana palibhañjanaḥ

original: hotīti sarīraṃ bhañjitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇo na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva aṅgamaṅgaapakaḍḍhano
analyzed: hoti iti sarīram bhañjitvā cuṇṇa vicuṇṇa karaṇaḥ na ca hoti na ca aṅgam aṅga apakaḍḍhanaḥ

original: hotīti aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ sampaggahetvā apanetvā kaḍḍhano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva
analyzed: hoti iti aṅga paccaṅgam sampaggahetvā apanetvā kaḍḍhanaḥ na ca tāva hoti na ca tāva

original: jīvitā voropano hotīti jīvitindriyato voropano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva sabbacāgapariccāgāya
analyzed: jīvitā voropanaḥ hoti iti jīvitindriyato voropanaḥ na ca tāva hoti na ca tāva sabba cāga pariccāgāya

original: saṇṭhito hotīti sabbaṃ parassa jīvitaṃ nāsetvā attano jīvitanāsanatthāya saṇṭhito
analyzed: saṇṭhitaḥ hoti iti sabbam parassa jīvitam nāsetvā attanaḥ jīvita nāsana tthāya saṇṭhitaḥ

original: na ca tāva hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā aññaṃ jīvitā voropetvā attānaṃ jīvitā voropanatthāya
analyzed: na ca tāva hoti idam vuttam hoti yadā aññam jīvitā voropetvā attānam jīvitā voropana tthāya

original: ṭhito, tadā sabbacāgapariccāgā nāma hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ tadā sabbacāgapariccāgā nāma hoti vuttam ha etam bhagavatā

original: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
analyzed: kodham chetvā sukham seti kodham chetvā na socati

original: Kodhassa visamūlassa, madhuraggassa brāhmaṇa;
analyzed: kodhassa visa mūlassa madhuraggassa brāhmaṇa

original: Vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī”ti. ;
analyzed: vadham ariyā pasaṃsanti tat hi chetvā na socati iti

original: Yatoti yadā. Parapuggalaṃ ghāṭetvāti parapuggalaṃ nāsetvā. Attānaṃ ghāṭetīti attānaṃ
analyzed: yatas iti yadā para puggalam ghāṭetvā ati para puggalam nāsetvā attānam ghāṭeti iti attānam

original: māreti. Paramussadagatoti atibalavabhāvaṃ gato. Paramavepullappattoti ativipulabhāvaṃ
analyzed: māra iti ati balava bhāvam gataḥ parama vepulla patto ti ati vipula bhāvam

original: patto. Kodhassa pahīnattāti anāgāmimaggena vuttappakārassa kodhassa pahīnabhāvena.
analyzed: patto kodhassa pahīna ttā ti anāgāmi maggena vutta ppakārassa kodhassa pahīna bhāvena

original: Kodhavatthussa pariññātattāti kodhassa patiṭṭhābhūtassa kāraṇabhūtassa piyāpiyaaṭṭhānasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: kodha vatthussa pariññāta ttā ati kodhassa patiṭṭhā bhūtassa kāraṇa bhūtassa piya apiya aṭṭhāna saṅkhātassa

original: vatthussa ñātatīraṇapariññāhi byāpetvā ñātabhāvena. Kodhahetussa upacchinnattāti
analyzed: vatthussa ñāta tīraṇa pariññāhi byāpetvā ñāta bhāvena kodha hetussa upacchinna ttā ti

original: kodhassa janakahetuno domanassasahagatacittuppādassa ucchinnabhāvena.
analyzed: kodhassa janaka hetuno domanassa sahagata cittuppādassa ucchinna bhāvena

original: Tāsīti bhāyanasīlo hoti. Uttāsīti atibhāyanasīlo. Parittāsīti samantato bhāyanasīlo.
analyzed: tāsi iti bhāyana sīlaḥ hoti uttā asi iti ati bhāyana sīlaḥ parittā asi iti samantataḥ bhāyana sīlaḥ

original: Bhāyatīti bhayaṃ uppajjati. Santāsaṃ āpajjatīti virūpabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Katthī hotīti
analyzed: bhāyati iti bhayam uppajjati santāsam āpajjati iti virūpa bhāvam pāpuṇāti katthī hoti iti

original: attano vaṇṇabhaṇanasīlo hoti. Vikatthīti vividhā nānappakārato vaṇṇabhaṇanasīlo.
analyzed: attanaḥ vaṇṇa bhaṇana sīlaḥ hoti vikatthī iti vividhā nānā pakārataḥ vaṇṇa bhaṇana sīlo

original: Jātiyā vāti khattiyabhāvādijātisampattiyā vā. Gottena vāti gotamagottādinā ukkaṭṭhagottena
analyzed: jātiyā vā ati khattiya bhāva ādi jāti sampattiyā vā gottena vā ati gotama gotta ādinā ukkaṭṭha gottena

original: vā. Kolaputtiyena vāti mahākulabhāvena vā. Vaṇṇapokkharatāya vāti vaṇṇasampannasarīratāya
analyzed: vā kola puttiyena vā ati mahā kula bhāvena vā vaṇṇa pokkhara tāya vā ati vaṇṇa sampanna sarīra tāya

original: vā. Sarīrañhi “pokkhara”nti vuccati, tassa vaṇṇasampattiyā abhirūpabhāvenāti attho.
analyzed: vā sarīram hi pokkharanti vuccati tassa vaṇṇa sampattiyā abhirūpa bhāvena ati attho

original: Dhanena vātiādīni uttānatthāneva.
analyzed: dhanena vāti ādīni uttāna tthāna eva

original: Kukkuccanti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Tattha kukkuccanti kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa
analyzed: niddesassa uddesa padam tattha kukkuccanti kucchitam katam kukatam tassa

original: bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: bhāvaḥ kukkuccam tam pacchā anutāpa lakkhaṇam kata akata anusocana rasam vippaṭisāra paccupaṭṭhānam

original: katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ, dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hatthakukkuccampīti hatthehi kucchitaṃ
analyzed: kata akata padaṭṭhānam dāsabyam viya daṭṭhabbam hattha kukkuccampi iti hatthehi kucchitam

original: kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo hatthakukkuccaṃ. Pādakukkuccādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: katam kukatam tassa bhāvaḥ hattha kukkuccam pāda kukkucca ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Akappiye kappiyasaññitāti acchamaṃsaṃ sūkaramaṃsanti khādati, dīpimaṃsaṃ migamaṃsanti
analyzed: akappiye kappiya saññitā ati accha maṃsam sūkara maṃsanti khādati dīpi maṃsam miga maṃsanti

original: khādati, akappiyabhojanaṃ kappiyabhojananti bhuñjati, vikāle kālasaññitāya bhuñjati,
analyzed: khādati akappiya bhojanam kappiya bhojananti bhuñjati vikāle kāla saññitāya bhuñjati

original: akappiyapānakaṃ kappiyapānakanti pivati. Ayaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitā. Kappiye akappiyasaññitāti
analyzed: akappiya pānakam kappiya pānakam ti pivati ayam akappiye kappiya saññitā kappiye akappiya saññitā ati

original: sūkaramaṃsaṃ acchamaṃsanti khādati, migamaṃsaṃ dīpimaṃsanti khādati, kappiyabhojanaṃ
analyzed: sūkara maṃsam acchamaṃsanti khādati miga maṃsam dīpimaṃsanti khādati kappiya bhojanam

original: akappiyabhojananti bhuñjati, kāle vikālasaññitāya bhuñjati, kappiyapānakaṃ akappiyapānakanti
analyzed: akappiya bhojananti bhuñjati kāle vikāla saññitāya bhuñjati kappiya pānakam akappiya pānakam ti

original: pivati. Ayaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitā. Avajje vajjasaññitāti niddose dosasaññitā.
analyzed: pivati ayam kappiye akappiya saññitā avajje vajja saññitā ati niddose dosa saññitā

original: Vajje avajjasaññitāti sadose niddosasaññitā. Kukkuccāyanāti kukkuccāyanākāro. Kukkuccāyitattanti
analyzed: vajje a vajja saññitā ati sa dose niddosa saññitā kukkuccāyanā ati kukkuccāyana ākāraḥ

original: kukkuccāyitabhāvo. Cetaso vippaṭisāroti cittassa virūpo paṭisaraṇabhāvo. Manovilekhoti cittassa vilekho.
analyzed: kukkuccāyita bhāvo cetasaḥ vippaṭisāro ti cittassa virūpaḥ paṭisaraṇa bhāvaḥ manaḥ vilekho iti cittassa vilekho

original: Katattā ca akatattā cāti kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ katabhāvena ca kāyasucaritādīnaṃ akatabhāvena
analyzed: katattā ca a katattā ca ati kāya duccarita ādīnam kata bhāvena ca kāya su carita ādīnam a kata bhāvena

original: ca. Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritanti mayā kāyena kilesapūtikattā duṭṭhu caritaṃ kāyena kataṃ.
analyzed: ca katam me kāya duccaritan ti mayā kāyena kilesa pūtikattā duṭṭhu caritam kāyena katam

original: Akataṃ me kāyasucaritanti mayā kāyena suṭṭhu caritaṃ na kataṃ. Vacīduccaritavacīsucaritādīsupi
analyzed: a katam me kāya su caritanti mayā kāyena suṭṭhu caritam na katam vacī duccarita vacī su carita ādī supi

original: eseva nayo nirodhapariyosānesu.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ nirodha pariyosānesu

original: Cittassāti na sattassa na posassa. Uddhaccanti uddhatākāro. Avūpasamoti na vūpasamo.
analyzed: cittassa ati na sattassa na posassa uddhaccanti uddhata ākāraḥ a vūpasamaḥ ti na vūpasamaḥ

original: Ceto vikkhipatīti cetaso vikkhepo, bhantattaṃ cittassāti cittassa bhantabhāvo bhantayānabhantagoṇādīnaṃ
analyzed: cetaḥ vikkhipati iti cetasaḥ vikkhepaḥ bhantattam cittassa ati cittassa bhanta bhāvaḥ bhanta yāna bhanta goṇa ādīnam

original: viya. Iminā ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva vipphandanaṃ kathitaṃ. Uddhaccañhi ekārammaṇe vipphandati,
analyzed: viya iminā eka ārammaṇasmiṃ yeva vipphandanam kathitam uddhaccam hi eka ārammaṇe vipphandati

original: vicikicchā nānārammaṇeti. Idaṃ vuccati uddhaccanti ayaṃ uddhatabhāvo kathīyati.
analyzed: vicikicchā nānā ārammaṇā iti idam vuccati ayam uddhata bhāvo kathīyati

original: Musāvādaṃ pahāyāti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjako vacīpayogo
analyzed: musāvādam pahāya ati ettha musā ati visaṃvādana purekkhārassa attha bhañjakaḥ vacī payogaḥ

original: kāyapayogo vā. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
analyzed: kāya payogaḥ vā visaṃvādana adhippāyena pana assa para visaṃvādaka kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādaḥ

original: Aparo nayo – musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. Vādoti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ.
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ musā ati abhūtam ataccham vatthu vādo ti tassa bhūtataḥ tacchataḥ viññāpanam

original: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: lakkhaṇato pana atatham vatthum tathatas param viññāpetu kāmassa tathā viññatti samuṭṭhāpikā

original: cetanā musāvādo, taṃ musāvādaṃ. Pahāyāti imaṃ musāvādacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā.
analyzed: cetanā musāvādaḥ tam musāvādam pahāya ati imam musāvāda cetanā saṅkhātam dussīlyam pajahitvā

original: Paṭiviratoti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova. Natthi tassa vītikkamissāmīti
analyzed: paṭivirataḥ ti pahīna kālato paṭṭhāya tatas dussīlyato orataḥ virataḥ va natthi tassa vītikkamissāmi iti

original: cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, pageva kāyaviññeyyāti iminā nayena aññesupi evarūpesu
analyzed: cakkhu sota viññeyyā dhammā pagā iva kāya viññeyyā ti iminā nayena aññesu pi evarūpesu

original: padesu attho veditabbo.
analyzed: padesu atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Saccaṃ vadatīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti saccasandho, na antarantarā
analyzed: saccam vadati iti sacca vādī saccena saccam sandahati ghaṭa iti iti sacca sandhaḥ na antar antarā

original: musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena
analyzed: musā vadati iti atthaḥ yaḥ hi puriso kadāci musā vadati kadāci saccam tassa musāvādena

original: antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭiyati, tasmā so na saccasandho, ayaṃ pana na tādiso,
analyzed: saccam saccena na tasmā saḥ na sacca sandhaḥ ayam pana na tādisaḥ

original: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
analyzed: musā avatvā saccena saccam sandahatiyā iva ati sacca sandho

original: Thetoti thiro, thirakathoti attho. Eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi

analyzed: na samaṇaḥ samaṇa paṭiñño ti aham samaṇaḥ iti paṭijānantaḥ a brahmacārī iti seṭṭha cariyā

original: virahito. Brahmacāripaṭiññoti vuttapaṭipakkho. Antopūtīti abbhantare kusaladhammavirahitattā
analyzed: virahitaḥ brahmacāri paṭiñño ti vutta paṭipakkho antopūti iti abbhantare kusala dhamma virahita ttā

original: antopūtibhāvamāpanno. Avassutoti rāgena tinto. Kasambujātoti saṅkārasabhāvo. Ācāragocarasampannoti
analyzed: antopūti bhāvam āpannaḥ avassuto ti rāgena tinto kasambu jātaḥ iti saṅkāra sabhāvaḥ ācāra gocara sampannaḥ iti

original: ettha bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena
analyzed: ettha bhikkhu sa gāravaḥ sa patissaḥ hirā uttappa sampanno su nivatthaḥ su pārutaḥ pāsādikena

original: abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu
analyzed: abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhitta cakkhu

original: iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena
analyzed: iriyāpatha sampannaḥ indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ bhojane mattaññū jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ sati sampajaññena

original: samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo
analyzed: samannāgataḥ appicchaḥ santuṭṭhaḥ āraddha vīriyaḥ ābhisamācārikesu sakkacca kārī garu cittīkāra bahulo

original: viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācāro. Evaṃ tāva ācāro veditabbo.
analyzed: viharati ayam vuccati ācāro evam tāva ācāraḥ veditabbo

original: Gocaro pana tividho upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti. Tattha katamo
analyzed: gocaraḥ pana tividhaḥ upanissaya gocaraḥ ārakkha gocaraḥ upanibandha gocaraḥ ti tattha katamo

original: upanissayagocaro? Dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya assutaṃ
analyzed: upanissaya gocaraḥ dasa kathā vatthu guṇa samannāgataḥ kalyāṇa mittaḥ yam nissāya assutam

original: suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti;
analyzed: suṇāti sutam pariyodāpeti kaṅkham vitarati diṭṭhim ujum karoti cittam pasādeti

original: yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati.

original: Ayaṃ vuccati upanissayagocaro.
analyzed: ayam vuccati upanissaya gocaraḥ

original: pattiṃ, na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ ullokento, na adho olokento, na

original: disāvidisaṃ pekkhamāno gacchati. Ayaṃ vuccati ārakkhagocaro.
analyzed: disāvidisam pekkhamānaḥ gacchati ayam vuccati ārakkha gocaro

original: Katamo upanibandhagocaro? Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā yattha cittaṃ upanibandhati. Vuttañhetaṃ

analyzed: bhagavatā kaḥ ca bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ gocaraḥ sakaḥ pettikaḥ visayaḥ yat idam cattāraḥ

original: satipaṭṭhānā”ti, ayaṃ vuccati upanibandhagocaroti. Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānā ti ayam vuccati upanibandha gocarā iti iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca

original: gocarena upeto…pe… samannāgato. Tenapi vuccati ācāragocarasampannoti.
analyzed: gocarena upeta upe samannāgato tena api vuccati ācāra gocara sampanno ti

original: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu

analyzed: vajjesu bhaya dassana sīlo samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu uti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu

original: sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sammā ādāya sikkhati. Ettha ca “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti

original: 88. Sātiyesu anassāvīti sātavatthūsu kāmaguṇesu taṇhāsanthavavirahito. Saṇhoti saṇhehi
analyzed: sātiyesu anassāvī iti kāma guṇesu taṇhā santhava virahitaḥ saṇho ti saṇhehi

original: Na saddhoti sāmaṃ adhigatadhammaṃ na kassaci saddahati. Na virajjatīti khayā rāgassa

original: virattattā idāni na virajjati.
analyzed: viratta ttā idāni na virajjati

original: Yesaṃ esāti yesaṃ puggalānaṃ sātavatthūsu kāmaguṇesu icchā taṇhā. Appahīnāti santhavasampayuttā

analyzed: taṇhā arahatta maggena appahīnā tesam cakkhutaḥ rūpa taṇhā savati iti etesam cakkhu dvārato

original: pavattajavanavīthisampayuttā rūpārammaṇā taṇhā uppajjati. Āsavatīti okāsato yāva
analyzed: pavatta javana vīthi sampayuttā rūpa ārammaṇā taṇhā uppajjati āsavatī iti okāsataḥ yāva

original: bhavaggā dhammato yāva gotrabhū savati. Sandatīti nadīsotaṃ viya adhomukhaṃ sandati.
analyzed: bhavaggāḥ dhammataḥ yāva gotrabhū savati sandati iti nadī sotam viya adhomukham sandati

original: Pavattatīti punappunaṃ uppattivasena pavattati. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Sukkapakkhe
analyzed: pavattati iti punappunam uppatti vasena pavattati sesa dvāresu pi esa iva nayaḥ sukka pakkhe

original: vuttavipariyāyena taṇhā arahattamaggena suppahīnā. Tesaṃ cakkhuto rūpataṇhā na savati.
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena taṇhā arahatta maggena su pahīnā tesam cakkhutaḥ rūpa taṇhā na savati

original: Saṇhena kāyakammena samannāgatoti apharusena mudunā kāyakammena samaṅgībhūto ekībhūto.
analyzed: saṇhena kāya kammena samannāgato ti apharusena mudunā kāya kammena samaṅgībhūtaḥ ekībhūtaḥ

original: Vacīkammādīsupi eseva nayo. Saṇhehi satipaṭṭhānehītiādīsu satipaṭṭhānādayo lokiyalokuttaramissakā.

original: Pariyāpuṇanaatthādiparipucchālokiyalokuttaradhammādhigamavasena sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthā

analyzed: nissāya paṭibhāyati iti tassa puggalassa pariyāpuṇanam allīyitvā ñāṇam jāyati ñāṇam

analyzed: abhimukham hoti cattāro sati paṭṭhānā ati sattatiṃsa bodhi pakkhiya dhammāḥ lokiya lokuttara missaka vasena

analyzed: vuttā magga phalāni nibbattita lokuttara vasena catasso paṭisambhidāyo cha ca abhiññāyo

original: vimokkhantikavasena vuttāti ñātabbā.
analyzed: vimokkha antika vasena vuttā iti ñātabbā

original: Tattha catasso paṭisambhidāyoti cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti attho. Iddhividhādiāsavakkhayapariyosānāni
analyzed: tattha catasso paṭisambhidāyo ti cattāro ñāṇa ppabhedā ti attho iddhividha ādi āsava khaya pariyosānāni

analyzed: hetu phalam tat hi yasmai hetu anusārena arīyati adhigamīyati pāpuṇīyati tasmai attha uti

analyzed: vuccati pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccaya uppannam nibbānam bhāsita tthaḥ vipākaḥ kiriyā ti

analyzed: ime pañca dhammā attho ti veditabbā tam attham paccavekkhantassa so attho pabhedato

analyzed: ñātaḥ pākaṭaḥ hoti dhammaḥ ti saṅkhepato paccayo saḥ hi yasmā tam tam vidahati pavattā iti

analyzed: ca iva pāpā iti ca tasmā dhammo ti vuccati pabhedato pana yaḥ koci phala nibbattakaḥ hetu

analyzed: ariya maggaḥ bhāsitam kusalam akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammo ti veditabbā tam dhammaṃ

analyzed: bhāsitam udīritam sabhāva nirutti saddam ārammaṇam katvā paccavekkhantassa sā nirutti ñātā pākaṭā hoti

analyzed: ettha atthe ñāte attho paṭibhāyati iti idāni tassa saddam āharitvā vutta ppabhede atthe

analyzed: pākaṭībhūte vutta ppabhedaḥ attho tassa puggalassa paṭibhāyati ñāṇa abhimukhaḥ hoti dhamme

analyzed: ñāte dhammo paṭibhāyati iti vutta ppabhede dhamme pākaṭībhūte vutta ppabhedaḥ dhammo paṭibhāyati

original: Niruttiyā ñātāya nirutti paṭibhāyatīti vuttappabhedāya niruttiyā pākaṭāya vuttappabhedā

analyzed: tīsu ñāṇesu gocara kicca ādi vasena vitthāra gatam ñāṇam paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā imāya

original: So vuccati paṭibhānavāti nigamento āha. Yassa pariyatti natthīti pariyatti nāma buddhavacanaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ vuccati paṭibhānavā ti nigamentaḥ āha yassa pariyatti natthi iti pariyatti nāma buddha vacanam

original: Tañhi uggaṇhantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Yassa puggalassa evarūpā pariyatti
analyzed: tat hi uggaṇhantassa paṭisambhidāḥ visadāḥ honti yassa puggalassa evarūpā pariyatti

analyzed: natthi paripucchā natthi iti paripucchā nāma pāḷi aṭṭhakathā ādīsu gaṇṭhi pada attha pada vinicchaya kathā

original: Uggahitapāḷiādīsu hi atthaṃ kathentassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Adhigamo natthīti

original: Sāmanti sayameva. Sayaṃ abhiññātanti sayameva tena ñāṇena avagamitaṃ. Attapaccakkhaṃ
analyzed: sāmanti sayam eva sayam abhiññātanti sayam eva tena ñāṇena avagamitam atta paccakkham

analyzed: dhammanti attanā paṭivijjhitam paccavekkhitam dhammam na kassaci saddahati iti atta paccakkha tāya

original: Ime āsavātiādayo aparena pariyāyena kilesavasena paccayadassanavasena. Ime dhammā

original: Channaṃ phassāyatanānantiādayo phassāyatanānaṃ uppattiñca atthaṅgamañca assādañca

analyzed: upaddavañca nissaraṇañca dassana vasena pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam pañcavīsatividhena

original: udayañca vayañca, tesu chandarāgavasena assādañca, tesaṃ vipariṇāmaṃ ādīnavañca,

original: Amatogadhanti natthi etassa maraṇasaṅkhātaṃ matanti amataṃ. Kilesavisapaṭipakkhattā
analyzed: amatogadham ti natthi etassa maraṇa saṅkhātam matam ti amatam kilesa visa paṭipakkha ttā
