analyzed: ekam anavajja tā ca ati ekam phāsu vihāro pana bhojana anisaṃso ti evam aṭṭhaṅga samannāgatam āhāram āhāreti

original: 90. Upekkhakoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato. Satoti kāyānupassanādisatiyutto.
analyzed: upekkhako ti chaḷaṅga upekkhāya samannāgato satoti kāya anupassanā ādi sati yutto

original: Upekkhakoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgatoti ettha chaḷaṅgupekkhādhammo nāma koti?
analyzed: upekkhako ti chaḷaṅgu pekkhāya samannāgato ti ettha chaḷaṅgu pekkhā dhammo nāma ko ti

original: Ñāṇādayo. “Ñāṇa”nti vutte kiriyato cattāri ñāṇasampayuttāni labbhanti, “satatavihāro”ti
analyzed: ñāṇa ādayaḥ ñāṇanti vutte kiriyato cattāri ñāṇa sampayuttāni labbhanti satata vihāraḥ ti

original: vutte aṭṭha mahācittāni labbhanti, “rajjanadussanaṃ natthī”ti vutte dasa cittāni
analyzed: vutte aṭṭha mahācittāni labbhanti rajjana dussanam natthi iti vutte dasa cittāni

original: labbhanti. Somanassaṃ āsevanavasena labbhati. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena
analyzed: labbhanti somanassam āsevana vasena labbhati cakkhunā rūpam disvā ati kāraṇa vasena

original: cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Porāṇā
analyzed: cakkhu uti laddha vohārena rūpa dassana samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpam disvā porāṇā

original: panāhu – cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati acittakattā, cittampi na passati acakkhukattā. Dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanena
analyzed: pana āhu cakkhu rūpam na passati acittakattā cittam pi na passati acakkhukattā dvāra ārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭanena

original: pana pasādavatthukena cittena passati. Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu “dhanunā vijjhatī”tiādīsu
analyzed: pana pasāda vatthukena cittena passati īdisesu pana ṭhānesu dhanunā vijjhati iti ādīsu

original: viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti. Tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha attho.
analyzed: viya sa sambhārakathā nāma hoti tasmā cakkhu viññāṇena rūpam disvā ti ayam eva ittha attho

original: Neva sumano hotīti lobhuppattivasena chandarāguppattivasena somanasso na hoti. Na
analyzed: na iva sumanaḥ hoti iti lobha uppatti vasena chanda rāga uppatti vasena somanassaḥ na hoti na

original: dummanoti paṭighuppattivasena duṭṭhacitto na hoti. Upekkhakoti upapattito ikkhako
analyzed: dummanaḥ ti paṭigha uppatti vasena duṭṭha cittaḥ na hoti upekkhako ti upapattitaḥ ikkhako

original: hoti, apakkhapatito hutvā iriyāpathaṃ pavatteti. Sato sampajānoti satimā ñāṇasampanno.
analyzed: hoti a pakkha patitaḥ hutvā iriyāpatham pavatteti sataḥ sampajānoti satimā ñāṇa sampannaḥ

original: Manāpaṃ nābhigijjhatīti manavaḍḍhanakaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nābhigijjhati na pattheti.
analyzed: manāpam na abhigijjhati iti iṭṭha ārammaṇam na abhigijjhati na pattheti

original: Nābhihaṃsatīti na tussati. Na rāgaṃ janetīti tattha tattha rañjanaṃ na uppādeti.
analyzed: na abhihaṃsati iti na tussati na rāgam janeti iti tattha tattha rañjanam na uppādeti

original: Tassa ṭhitova kāyo hotīti tassa khīṇāsavassa cakkhādikāyo kampārahitattā ṭhito niccalo
analyzed: tassa ṭhitaḥ uva kāyo hoti iti tassa khīṇāsavassa cakkha ādi kāyo kampā rahita ttā ṭhitaḥ niccalaḥ

original: hoti. Amanāpanti aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. Na maṅku hotīti domanassito na hoti. Appatiṭṭhitacittoti
analyzed: hoti amanāpanti aniṭṭha ārammaṇam na maṅku hoti iti domanassitaḥ na hoti a patiṭṭhita citto ti

original: kodhavasena ṭhitamano na hoti. Alīnamanasoti alīnacitto. Abyāpannacetasoti byāpādarahitacitto.
analyzed: kodha vasena ṭhita manaḥ na hoti alīna manasaḥ iti alīna cittaḥ abyāpanna cetasaḥ iti byāpāda rahita cittaḥ

original: Rajanīye na rajjatīti rajanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ na rāgaṃ uppādeti. Dussanīye na dussatīti
analyzed: rajanīye na rajjati iti rajanīyasmin vatthusmin na rāgam uppādeti dussanīye na dussati iti

original: dosuppāde vatthusmiṃ na dosaṃ uppādeti. Mohanīye na muyhatīti mohanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
analyzed: dosa uppāde vatthusmim na dosam uppādeti mohanīye na muyhati iti mohanīyasmin vatthusmin

original: na mohaṃ uppādeti. Kopanīye na kuppatīti kodhanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ na calati. Madanīye
analyzed: na moham uppādeti kopanīye na kuppati iti kodhanīyasmin vatthusmin na calati madanīye

original: na majjatīti madanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ na saṃsīdati. Kilesanīye na kilissatīti upatapanīyasmiṃ
analyzed: na majjati iti madanīyasmin vatthusmin na saṃsīdati kilesanīye na kilissati iti upatapanīyasmin

original: vatthusmiṃ na upatappati. Diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattoti rūpārammaṇe cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhe
analyzed: vatthusmim na upatappati diṭṭhe diṭṭha matto ti rūpa ārammaṇe cakkhu viññāṇena diṭṭhe

original: diṭṭhamatto. Sute sutamattoti saddāyatane sotaviññāṇena sute sutamatto. Mute mutamattoti
analyzed: diṭṭha matto sute suta matto ti sadda āyatane sota viññāṇena sute suta matto mute muta matto ti

original: ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇena pāpuṇitvā gahite gahitamatto. Viññāte viññātamattoti manoviññāṇena
analyzed: ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇena pāpuṇitvā gahite gahita mattaḥ viññāte viññāta mattaḥ ti manaḥ viññāṇena

original: ñāte ñātamatto. Diṭṭhe na limpatīti cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhe rūpārammaṇe taṇhādiṭṭhilepena
analyzed: ñāte ñāta mattaḥ diṭṭhe na limpati iti cakkhu viññāṇena diṭṭhe rūpa ārammaṇe taṇhā diṭṭhi lepena

original: na limpati. Diṭṭhe anūpayoti rūpārammaṇe nittaṇho hoti. Anapāyoti apaduṭṭhacitto.
analyzed: na limpati diṭṭhe rūpa ārammaṇe nittaṇhaḥ hoti anapāyo ti apaduṭṭha citto

original: Saṃvijjatīti labbhati. Passatīti oloketi. Chandarāgoti sineho. Rūpārāmanti rūpaṃ ārāmaṃ assāti rūpārāmaṃ. Rūpe ratanti rūparataṃ. Rūpe santuṭṭhīti rūpasammuditaṃ.
analyzed: saṃvijjati iti labbhati passati iti oloketi chanda rāgo iti sinehaḥ rūpa ārāmanti rūpam ārāmam assāti rūpa ārāmam rūpe ratanti rūpa ratam rūpe santuṭṭhī iti rūpa sammuditam

original: Dantaṃ nayanti samitinti uyyānakīḷāmaṇḍalādīsu mahājanamajjhaṃ gacchantā dantameva
analyzed: dantam nayanti uyyāna kīḷā maṇḍala ādīsu mahā jana majjham gacchantā dantam eva

original: goṇajātiṃ vā assajātiṃ vā yāne yojetvā nayanti. Rājāti tathārūpāneva ṭhānāni gacchanto
analyzed: goṇa jātim vā assa jātim vā yāne yojetvā nayanti rājā ati tathārūpān eva ṭhānāni gacchantaḥ

original: rājāpi dantameva abhiruhati. Manussesūti manussesupi catūhi ariyamaggehi danto nibbisevanova
analyzed: rājā api dantam eva abhiruhati manussesu uti manussesu pi catūhi ariya maggehi dantaḥ nibbisevanā uva

original: seṭṭho. Yotivākyanti yo evarūpaṃ atikkamavacanaṃ punappunaṃ vuccamānampi titikkhati
analyzed: seṭṭhaḥ yaḥ evarūpam atikkama vacanam punappunam vuccamānam pi titikkhati

original: na paṭipphandati na vihaññati, evarūpo danto seṭṭhoti attho.
analyzed: na paṭipphandati na vihaññati evarūpaḥ danto seṭṭhaḥ ti attho

original: Assatarāti vaḷavāya gadrabhena jātā. Ājānīyāti yaṃ assadammasārathi kāraṇaṃ kāreti,
analyzed: vaḷavāya gadrabhena jātā ājānīyāti yam assa damma sārathi kāraṇam kāreti

original: tassa khippaṃ jānanasamatthā. Sindhavāti sindhavaraṭṭhe jātā assā. Mahānāgāti kuñjarasaṅkhātā
analyzed: tassa khippam jānana samatthā sindhavā ti sindhava raṭṭhe jātā assā mahā nāgā ati kuñjara saṅkhātā

original: mahāhatthino. Attadantoti ete assatarā vā ājānīyā vā sindhavā vā kuñjarā vā varā
analyzed: mahā hatthinaḥ atta dantā iti ete assatarāḥ vā ājānīyāḥ vā sindhavāḥ vā kuñjarāḥ vā varā

original: dantā, na adantā. Yo pana catumaggasaṅkhātena attadantena dantatāya attadanto nibbisevano,
analyzed: dantāḥ na a dantāḥ yaḥ pana catu magga saṅkhātena atta dantena danta tāya atta dantaḥ nibbisevano

original: ayaṃ tatopi varaṃ, sabbehipi etehi uttaritaroti attho.
analyzed: ayam tatas api varam sabbehi pi etehi uttaritaraḥ ti attho

original: Na hi etehi yānehīti yāni etāni hatthiyānādiyānāni, na hi etehi yānehi koci puggalo
analyzed: na hi etehi yānehi iti yāni etāni hatthi yāna ādi yānāni na hi etehi yānehi koci puggalaḥ

original: supinantenapi agatapubbattā “agata”nti saṅkhātaṃ nibbānadisaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ gaccheyya.
analyzed: supin antena api a gata pubba ttā a gata nti saṅkhātam nibbāna disam tam ṭhānam gaccheyya

original: Yathā pubbabhāge indriyadamena dantena aparabhāge ariyamaggabhāvanāya sudantena danto
analyzed: yathā pubbabhāge indriya damena dantena aparabhāge ariya magga bhāvanāya su dantena danto

original: nibbisevano sappañño puggalo taṃ agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchati, dantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: nibbisevanaḥ sappaññaḥ puggalo tam agata pubbam disam gacchati danta bhūmim pāpuṇāti

original: Tasmā attadamanameva varanti attho.
analyzed: tasmai atta damanam eva varanti

original: Vidhāsu na vikampantīti seyyassa seyyohamasmītiādīsu mānavidhāsu na calanti nappavedhanti.
analyzed: vidhāsu na vikampanti iti seyyassa seyyā uham asmi itiādīsu māna vidhāsu na calanti na ppavedhanti

original: Vippamuttā punabbhavāti punabbhavapaṭisandhiyā punappunaṃ uppattito suṭṭhu muttā
analyzed: vippamuttā punabbhavā ti punabbhava paṭisandhiyā punappunam uppattitaḥ suṭṭhu muttā

original: muñcitvā ṭhitā. Dantabhūmimanuppattāti ekantadamanaṃ arahattaphalabhūmiṃ pāpuṇitvā
analyzed: muñcitvā ṭhitā danta bhūmim anuppattā ati ekanta damanam arahatta phala bhūmim pāpuṇitvā

original: ṭhitā. Te loke vijitāvinoti te arahanto sattaloke vijitavijayā vijitavanto nāma honti.
analyzed: te loke ti te arahantaḥ satta loke vijita vijayāḥ vijitavantaḥ nāma honti

original: Yasmā ca bhāvitindriyo nibbhayo nibbikāro danto hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “yassindriyānī”ti
analyzed: ca hoti tasmā tam attham dassentaḥ yassa indriyāni iti

original: gāthamāha. Tassattho – yassa cakkhādīni chaḷindriyāni gocarabhāvanāya aniccāditilakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: gātham āha tassa atthaḥ yassa cakkha ādīni chaṭṭha indriyāni gocara bhāvanāya anicca āditi lakkhaṇam

original: āropetvā vāsanābhāvanāya satisampajaññagandhaṃ gāhāpetvā bhāvitāni, tāni ca kho ajjhattagocarabhāvanāya,
analyzed: āropetvā vāsanā bhāvanāya sati sampajañña gandham gāhāpetvā bhāvitāni tāni ca kho ajjhatta gocara bhāvanāya

original: evaṃ pana bahiddhā ca sabbaloketi yattha yattha indriyānaṃ vekallatā vekallato vā
analyzed: evam pana bahiddhā ca sabba loka iti yattha yattha indriyānam vekallatā vekallataḥ vā

original: sambhavo, tattha nābhijjhādivasena bhāvitānīti evaṃ nibbijjha ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā
analyzed: tattha na abhijjhā ādi vasena bhāvitāni iti evam nibbijjha ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā

original: imaṃ parañca lokaṃ sakasantatikhandhalokaṃ parasantatikhandhalokañca dantamaraṇaṃ
analyzed: imam param ca lokam saka santati khandha lokam para santati khandha lokam ca danta maraṇam

original: maritukāmo kālaṃ kaṅkhati, jīvitakkhayakālaṃ āgameti patimāneti, na bhāyati maraṇassa. Yathāha –
analyzed: maritu kāmaḥ kālam kaṅkhati jīvita khaya kālam āgameti patimāneti na bhāyati maraṇassa yathā āha

original: “Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, nikanti natthī jīvite”. ;
analyzed: maraṇe me bhayam natthi nikanti natthi jīvite

original: “Nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhikaṅkhāmi jīvitaṃ;
analyzed: na abhikaṅkhāmi maraṇam na abhikaṅkhāmi jīvitam

original: Kālañca patimānemi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā”ti. ;
analyzed: kālam ca nibbisam bhatakaḥ yathā ati

original: Bhāvito sa dantoti evaṃ bhāvitindriyo so danto.
analyzed: bhāvitaḥ sa danto ti evam saḥ dantaḥ

original: 91. Nissayatāti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayā. Ñatvā dhammanti aniccādīhi ākārehi dhammaṃ jānitvā.
analyzed: nissaya tā ti taṇhā diṭṭhi nissayāḥ ñatvā dhamman ti anicca ādīhi ākārehi dhammam jānitvā

original: Anissitoti evaṃ tehi nissayehi anissito. Tena aññatra dhammañāṇā natthi nissayānaṃ
analyzed: anissito ti evam tehi nissayehi anissito tena aññatra dhamma ñāṇā natthi nissayānam

original: abhāvoti dīpeti. Bhavāya vibhavāya vāti sassatāya ucchedāya vā. Imissā gāthāya niddeso uttāno.
analyzed: dīpeti bhavāya vibhavāya vāti sassatāya ucchedāya vā imissā gāthāya niddesaḥ uttānaḥ

original: 92. Taṃ brūmi upasantoti taṃ evarūpaṃ ekekagāthāya vuttaṃ upasantoti kathemi. Atarī so visattikanti so imaṃ visatādibhāvena visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ mahātaṇhaṃ atari.
analyzed: tam brūmi upasanto ti tam evarūpam ekeka gāthāya vuttam upasanto ti kathemi atarī saḥ visattikam ti saḥ imam visata ādi bhāvena visattikā saṅkhātam mahā taṇham atari

original: Attano diṭṭhiyā rāgo abhijjhākāyaganthoti sayaṃ gahitadiṭṭhiyā rañjanasaṅkhāto rāgo
analyzed: attanaḥ diṭṭhiyā rāgaḥ abhijjhā kāya gantho ti sayam gahita diṭṭhiyā rañjana saṅkhātaḥ rāgaḥ

original: abhijjhākāyagantho. Paravādesu āghāto appaccayoti paresaṃ vādapaṭivādesu kopo ca
analyzed: abhijjhā kāya gantho paravādesu āghāto appaccayo ti paresam vāda paṭivādesu kopo ca

original: atuṭṭhākāro ca byāpādo kāyagantho. Attano sīlaṃ vā vataṃ vāti sayaṃ gahitamethunaviratisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: atuṭṭhākāro ca byāpādo kāya gantho attano sīlam vā vatam vāti sayam gahita methuna virati saṅkhātam

original: sīlaṃ vā govatādivataṃ vā. Sīlabbataṃ vāti tadubhayaṃ vā. Parāmāsoti iminā suddhītiādivasena
analyzed: sīlam vā go vata ādi vatam vā sīlabbatam vā ati tat ubhayam vā iminā

original: parato āmasati. Attano diṭṭhi idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyaganthoti sayaṃ gahitadiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: paratas āmasati attanaḥ diṭṭhi idaṃsacca abhiniveso kāyagantho ti sayam gahita diṭṭhim

original: “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti ayoniso abhiniveso idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
analyzed: idam eva saccam mogham aññanti ayonisaḥ abhiniveso idaṃsacca abhiniveso kāya gantho

original: Ganthā tassa na vijjantīti tassa khīṇāsavassa dve diṭṭhiganthā sotāpattimaggena na
analyzed: ganthā tassa na vijjanti iti tassa khīṇāsavassa dve diṭṭhi ganthā sotāpatti maggena na

original: santi. Byāpādo kāyagantho anāgāmimaggena. Abhijjhākāyagantho arahattamaggena.
analyzed: santi byāpādaḥ kāya ganthaḥ anāgāmi maggena abhijjhā kāya ganthaḥ arahatta maggena

original: 93. Idāni tameva upasantaṃ pasaṃsanto āha “na tassa puttā”ti evamādi. Tattha puttā
analyzed: idāni tam eva upasantam pasaṃsantaḥ āha na tassa puttā ati evamādi tattha puttā

original: atrajādayo cattāro. Ettha ca puttapariggahādayo puttādināmena vuttāti veditabbā.
analyzed: cattāro ettha ca putta pariggaha ādayo putta ādi nāmena vuttā iti veditabbā

original: Te hissa na vijjanti, tesaṃ vā abhāvena puttādayo na vijjantīti. Attāti “attā atthī”ti
analyzed: te hi ssa na vijjanti tesam vā abhāvena putta ādayaḥ na vijjanti iti attā ati attā atthi iti

original: gahitā sassatadiṭṭhiṃ natthi. Nirattāti “ucchijjatī”ti gahitā ucchedadiṭṭhi.
analyzed: gahitā sassata diṭṭhim natthi nirattā ati ucchijjati iti gahitā uccheda diṭṭhi

original: Natthīti gahetabbaṃ natthi. Muñcitabbaṃ natthīti mocetabbaṃ natthi. Yassa natthi
analyzed: natthi iti gahetabbam natthi muñcitabbam natthi iti mocetabbam natthi yassa natthi

original: gahitanti yassa puggalassa taṇhādiṭṭhivasena gahitaṃ na vijjati. Tassa natthi muñcitabbanti
analyzed: gahitanti yassa puggalassa taṇhā diṭṭhi vasena gahitam na vijjati tassa na atthi muñcitabbanti

original: tassa puggalassa muñcitabbaṃ na vijjati. Gāhamuñcanasamatikkantoti gahaṇañca mocanañca
analyzed: tassa puggalassa muñcitabbam na vijjati gāha muñcana samatikkanto ti gahaṇañca mocanañca

original: vītivatto. Vuddhiparihānivītivattoti vuḍḍhiñca hāniñca atikkanto.
analyzed: vītivattaḥ vuddhi parihāni vītivattaḥ iti vuḍḍhim ca hānim ca atikkantaḥ

original: 94. Yena naṃ vajjuṃ puthujjanā, atho samaṇabrāhmaṇāti yena taṃ rāgādinā vajjena puthujjanā
analyzed: yena nam vajjum puthujjanāḥ atho samaṇa brāhmaṇa ati yena tam rāga ādinā vajjena puthujjanāḥ

original: sabbepi devamanussā itova bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca rattoti vā duṭṭhoti vā vadeyyuṃ.
analyzed: sabbe api deva manussāḥ itas va bahiddhā samaṇa brāhmaṇā ca ratto iti vā duṭṭho ti vā vadeyyuṃ

original: Taṃ tassa apurakkhatanti taṃ rāgādivajjaṃ tassa arahato apurakkhataṃ. Tasmā vādesu
analyzed: tam tassa apurakkhatanti tam rāga ādi vajjam tassa arahataḥ apurakkhatam tasmai vādesu

original: nejatīti taṃkāraṇā nindāvacanesu na kampati.
analyzed: nejati iti nindā vacanesu na kampati

original: Nejatīti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Na iñjatīti calanaṃ na karoti. Na calatīti na tattha
analyzed: nejati iti niddesassa uddesa padam na iñjati iti calanam na karoti na calati iti na tattha

original: namati. Na vedhatīti kampetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya na phandati. Nappavedhatīti na kampati.
analyzed: namati na vedhati iti kampetum a sakkuṇeyyatāya na phandati na pavedhati iti na kampati

original: Na sampavedhatīti na parivattati.
analyzed: na sampavedhati iti na parivattati

original: alabhanto gāmabandhanādīhi baddho nāma hoti. Tassa bandhanassa mokkhatthāyāti etassa
analyzed: a labhantaḥ gāma bandhana ādīhi baddhaḥ nāma hoti tassa bandhanassa mokkha tthāya ati etassa

original: vuttappakārassa bandhanassa mocanatthaṃ.
analyzed: vutta ppakārassa bandhanassa mocana attham

original: Ñāṇampi ñāṇapathoti pure uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ aparāparuppannassa ñāṇampi ñāṇassa sañcaraṇamaggoti

original: Kathaṃkathī puggaloti vicikicchāvanto puggalo. Sakaṅkhoti sadveḷhako. Savilekhoti

original: ñāṇapaṭilābhatthāya. Ñāṇaphusanāyāti ñāṇapaṭivijjhanatthāya. Atha vā ñāṇavindanatthāya.
analyzed: ñāṇa paṭilābha tthāya ñāṇa phusanāya ati ñāṇa paṭivijjhana tthāya atha vā ñāṇa vindana tthāya

original: Ñāṇasacchikiriyāyāti ñāṇassa paccakkhakaraṇatthāya. Sanidānāhanti ahaṃ sanidānaṃ

original: aniyyānikaṃ akatvā dhammadesanaṃ karomi.
analyzed: aniyyānikam a katvā dhamma desanam karomi

original: 104. Sātaṃ asātañca kutonidānāti ettha sātāsātanti sukhadukkhavedanā eva adhippetā.

original: 108. Kathaṃ sametassāti kathaṃ paṭipannassa. Vibhoti rūpanti rūpaṃ vibhavati, na bhaveyya vā. Sukhaṃ dukhañcāti iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpameva pucchati.

original: Jāneyyāmāti jānissāma. Ājāneyyāmāti visesena jānissāma. Vijāneyyāmāti anekavidhena jānissāma. Paṭivijāneyyāmāti sammā jānissāma. Paṭivijjheyyāmāti cittena bujjhissāma.

original: Asaññino vuccanti nirodhasamāpannāti saññāvedanā nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpannā saññābhāvena asaññinoti kathīyanti. Asaññasattāti sabbena sabbaṃ saññābhāvena asaññabhave nibbattā.

original: So evaṃ samāhite citteti tattha soti so bhikkhu. Evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanametaṃ,

original: Ubhayampi cetaṃ aṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Vasippattiyā mudubhūte.

original: Iddhipādabhāvūpagamanena kammaniye. Bhāvanāpāripūriyā paṇītabhāvūpagamena ṭhite āneñjappatte,

original: Āruppamaggasamaṅgīti arūpasamāpattiyā gamanamaggena aparihīno. Papañcāyeva papañcasaṅkhāti taṇhādipapañcāyeva papañcasaṅkhā.

original: 110. Ettāvataggaṃ nu vadanti heke, yakkhassa suddhiṃ idha paṇḍitāse. Udāhu aññampi
analyzed: nu vadanti ha ike yakkhassa suddhim idha paṇḍitāse udāhu aññam pi

original: vadanti ettoti ettāvatā nu idha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā aggaṃ suddhiṃ sattassa vadanti,
analyzed: vadanti ettoti ettāvatā nu idha paṇḍitā samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ aggam suddhim sattassa vadanti

original: udāhu aññampi etto arūpasamāpattito adhikañca vadantīti pucchati.

original: Etto arūpasamāpattitoti etasmā arūpasamāpattito.

original: 111. Ettāvataggampi vadanti heketi eke sassatavādā samaṇabrāhmaṇā paṇḍitamānino ettāvatāpi

original: aggaṃ suddhiṃ vadanti. Tesaṃ paneke samayaṃ vadantīti tesaññeva eke ucchedavādā samayaṃ

original: ucchedaṃ vadanti. Anupādisese kusalāvadānāti anupādisese kusalavādā samānā.
analyzed: ucchedam vadanti an upādisese an upādisese kusala vādā samānā

original: Bhavatajjitāti bhavato bhītā. Vibhavaṃ abhinandantīti ucchedaṃ paṭicca tussanti.

original: Te sattassa samanti te ucchedavādino puggalassa samaṃ anuppattiṃ vadanti. Upasamanti

original: atīva samaṃ. Vūpasamanti santaṃ. Nirodhanti anuppādaṃ. Paṭipassaddhinti apunuppattiṃ.

original: 112. Ete ca ñatvā upanissitāti ete ca diṭṭhigatike sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo nissitāti
analyzed: ete ca ñatvā upanissitā ati ete ca diṭṭhi gatike sassatu cheda diṭṭhiyaḥ nissitā ati

original: ñatvā. Ñatvā munī nissaye so vīmaṃsīti nissaye ca ñatvā so vīmaṃsī paṇḍito buddhamuni.
analyzed: ñatvā ñatvā munī nissaye so vīmaṃsī iti nissaye ca ñatvā saḥ vīmaṃsī paṇḍitaḥ buddha muni

original: Ñatvā vimuttoti dukkhāniccādito dhamme ñatvā vimutto. Bhavābhavāya na sametīti punappunaṃ
analyzed: ñatvā vimuttaḥ ti dukkha anicca āditaḥ dhamme ñatvā vimuttaḥ bhava abhavāya na sameti iti punappunam

original: upapattiyā na samāgacchati. Aparāmasanti aparāmasanto. Parāmāsaṃ nāpajjantoti attho.
analyzed: upapattiyā na samāgacchati a parāmasanti a parāmasantaḥ parāmāsam na āpajjanto ti attho

original: Saddhammappajjotikāya mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

original: Kalahavivādasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kalaha vivāda sutta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 12. Cūḷabyūhasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā
Dvādasame cūḷabyūhasuttaniddese sakaṃsakaṃdiṭṭhiparibbasānāti idampi tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye
analyzed: dvādasame cūḷa byūha sutta niddese idam pi tasmin yeva mahā samaye

original: “sabbepime diṭṭhigatikā ‘sādhurūpāmhā’ti bhaṇanti, kiṃ nu kho sādhurūpāva ime attano
analyzed: sabbe pi ime diṭṭhigatikā sādhu rūpā amhā iti bhaṇanti kim nu kho ime attanaḥ

original: eva diṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhahanti, udāhu aññampi diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhantī”ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ
analyzed: eva diṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhahanti udāhu aññam pi diṭṭhim gaṇhanti iti uppanna cittānam ekaccānam

original: devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ purimanayeneva nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: devatānam tam attham pakāsetum purima nayena iva nimmitabuddhena attānam pucchāpetvā vuttam

original: 113. Tattha ādito dvepi gāthā pucchāgāthāyeva. Tāsu sakaṃ sakaṃ diṭṭhiparibbasānāti
analyzed: tattha āditaḥ dve api gāthā pucchā gāthāya iva tāsu sakam sakam

original: attano attano diṭṭhiyā vasamānā. Viggayha nānā kusalā vadantīti taṃ diṭṭhiṃ balavaggāhaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ diṭṭhiyā vasamānāḥ viggayha nānā kusalāḥ vadanti iti tam diṭṭhim bala vaggāham

original: gahetvā “tattha kusalāmhā”ti paṭijānamānā puthu puthu vadanti, ekaṃ na vadanti. Yo
analyzed: gahetvā tattha kusalāmha ati paṭijānamānā puthu puthu vadanti ekam na vadanti

original: evaṃ jānāti sa vedi dhammaṃ, idaṃ paṭikkosamakevalī soti tañca diṭṭhiṃ sandhāya yo
analyzed: evam jānāti sa vedi dhammam idam paṭikkosama kevalī so ti tat ca diṭṭhim sandhāya yaḥ

original: evaṃ jānāti, so dhammaṃ vediyi. Idaṃ pana paṭikkosanto hīno hotīti ca vadanti.
analyzed: evam jānāti saḥ dhammam idam pana paṭikkosantaḥ hīnaḥ hoti iti ca vadanti

original: Nānā vadantīti nānākāraṇaṃ bhaṇanti. Vividhaṃ vadantīti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇanti. Aññoññaṃ
analyzed: nānā vadanti iti nānā kāraṇam bhaṇanti vividham vadanti iti nānāvidham bhaṇanti aññoññam

original: vadantīti ekaṃ avatvā aññaṃ aññaṃ gahetvā vadanti. Akevalī soti yo akusalo ayaṃ.
analyzed: vadanti iti ekam a vatvā aññam aññam gahetvā vadanti a kevalī saḥ iti yaḥ akusalaḥ ayam

original: Asamattoti na paripūro. Aparipuṇṇoti na sampuṇṇo.
analyzed: a samattaḥ iti na paripūraḥ a paripuṇṇaḥ iti na sampuṇṇaḥ

original: 114. Bāloti hīno. Akkusaloti avidvā.
analyzed: bālaḥ iti hīnaḥ a vidvā

original: 115. Idāni tisso vissajjanagāthā hontīti. Tā purimaḍḍhena vuttamatthaṃ pacchimaḍḍhena
analyzed: idāni tissaḥ vissajjana gāthāḥ honti iti tā purima ḍḍhena vutta mattham pacchima ḍḍhena

original: paṭibyūhitvā ṭhitā. Tena byūhena uttarasuttato ca appakattā idaṃ suttaṃ “cūḷabyūha”nti
analyzed: paṭibyūhitvā ṭhitā tena byūhena uttara suttataḥ ca appakattā idam suttam cūḷabyūhanti

original: nāmaṃ labhi. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ tāva parassa ce dhammanti parassa diṭṭhiṃ. Sabbevime
analyzed: nāmam labhi tattha paṭhama gāthāyam tāva parassa ce parassa diṭṭhim

original: bālāti evaṃ sante sabbeva ime bālā hontīti adhippāyo. Kiṃkāraṇā? Sabbevime diṭṭhiparibbasānāti.
analyzed: bālā ati evam sante sabbe iva ime bālāḥ honti iti adhippāyaḥ kiṃkāraṇā sabbe iva ime diṭṭhi paribbasānā ti

original: 116. Sandiṭṭhiyā ceva na vīvadātā, saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutīmāti sakāya diṭṭhiyā
analyzed: sandiṭṭhiyā ca iva na vīvadātā saṃsuddha paññā kusalā sakāya diṭṭhiyā

original: anavīvadātā avodātā saṃkiliṭṭhāva samānā saṃsuddhapaññā ca kusalā ca mutimanto ca
analyzed: an avīvadātā avodātā saṃkiliṭṭhā ava samānā saṃsuddha paññā ca kusalā ca mutimanto ca

original: te honti ce. Atha vā “sandiṭṭhiyā ce vadātā”ti pāṭho, tassattho – sakāya pana diṭṭhiyā
analyzed: te honti ce atha vā sandiṭṭhiyā ce vadāta iti pāṭho tassa attho sakāya pana diṭṭhiyā

original: vodātā saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutimanto honti ce, na tesaṃ kocīti evaṃ sante tesaṃ
analyzed: vodātā saṃsuddha paññā kusalāḥ mutimanto honti ce na tesam koci iti evam sante tesam

original: ekopi nihīnapañño na hoti, kiṃkāraṇā? Diṭṭhī hi tesampi tathā samattā, yathā itaresanti.
analyzed: ekaḥ api nihīna paññaḥ na hoti kiṃkāraṇā diṭṭhī hi tesam pi tathā samattā yathā itaresanti

original: 117. Na vāhametanti gāthāya saṅkhepattho – yaṃ te mithu dve dve janā aññamaññaṃ “bālo”ti
analyzed: na vā aham etat ti gāthāya saṅkhepa atthaḥ yam te mithu dve dve janāḥ aññam aññam bālaḥ ti

original: āhu, ahaṃ etaṃ tathiyanti tacchanti neva brūmi. Kiṃkāraṇā? Yasmā sabbeva te sakaṃ
analyzed: āhu aham etam na iva brūmi kiṃkāraṇā yasmā te

original: sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti akaṃsu, tena ca kāraṇena paraṃ “bālo”ti
analyzed: sakam diṭṭhim idam eva saccam mogham aññanti tena ca kāraṇena param bālaḥ ti

original: dahanti. Ettha ca tathiyaṃ, tathevanti dvepi pāṭhā.
analyzed: dahanti ettha ca dve api

original: Tacchanti atucchaṃ. Tathanti aviparītaṃ, bhūtanti santaṃ. Yāthāvanti saṃvijjamānaṃ. Aviparitanti na visaṅketaṃ.
analyzed: a tuccham tathanti a viparītam bhūtanti santam yāthāvanti saṃvijjamānam a viparitanti na visaṅketam

original: 118. Yamāhūti pucchāgāthāya “yaṃ diṭṭhisaccaṃ tathiya”nti eke āhu.
analyzed: pucchā gāthāya yam diṭṭhi saccam eke āhu

original: 119. Ekañhi saccanti vissajjanagāthāya ekaṃ saccaṃ nirodho maggo vā. Yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajānanti yamhi sacce pajānanto pajā no vivadeyyuṃ. Sayaṃ thunantīti attanā vadanti.
analyzed: ekam hi saccam ti vissajjana gāthāyaḥ ekam saccam nirodhaḥ maggaḥ vā yasmin pajāḥ naḥ vivade pajānanti yamhi sacce pajānantaḥ pajāḥ naḥ vivadeyyum sayam thunanti iti attanā vadanti

original: 120. Kasmā nūti pucchāgāthāya pavādiyāseti vādino. Udāhu te takkamanussarantīti te vādino udāhu attano takkamattaṃ anugacchanti.
analyzed: kasmai nu iti pucchāgāthāya vādinaḥ udāhu te takkam anussaranti iti te vādinaḥ udāhu attano takkam attam anugacchanti

original: Takkapariyāhatanti vitakkena samantato āhataṃ. Vīmaṃsānucaritanti attano upaṭṭhitapaññāya vicaritaṃ. Sayaṃpaṭibhānanti attano paṭibhānaṃ.
analyzed: takka pariyāhatanti vitakkena samantataḥ āhatam vīmaṃsa anucaritam ti attanaḥ upaṭṭhita paññāya vicaritam sayaṃpaṭibhānam ti attanaḥ paṭibhānam

original: 121. Na hevāti vissajjanagāthāya aññatra saññāya niccānīti ṭhapetvā saññāmattena
analyzed: na ha iva ati vissajjana gāthāya aññatra saññāya niccāni iti ṭhapetvā saññā mattena

original: niccanti gahitaggahaṇāni. Takkañca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvāti attano niccasaṅkappamattaṃ diṭṭhīsu janetvā.
analyzed: niccanti gahita ggahaṇāni takkam ca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā ti attanaḥ nicca saṅkappam attam diṭṭhīsu janetvā

original: Yasmā pana diṭṭhīsu vitakkaṃ janentā diṭṭhiyo sañjanenti, tasmā vuttaṃ “diṭṭhigatāni
analyzed: yasmā pana diṭṭhīsu vitakkam janentāḥ diṭṭhiyaḥ sañjanenti tasmā vuttam diṭṭhi gatāni

original: janenti sañjanentī”tiādi. Janentīti uparūpari diṭṭhiṃ uppādentā janenti. Sañjanentītiādīni
analyzed: janenti sañjanenti itiādi janenti iti upari upari diṭṭhim uppādentāḥ janenti sañjanenti itiādīni

original: upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttāni. Mayhaṃ saccanti mama vacanaṃ tacchaṃ.
analyzed: upasagga vasena padam vaḍḍhetvā vuttāni mayham mama vacanam

original: 122. Idāni evaṃ nānāsaccesu asantesu takkamattaṃ anussarantānaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ
analyzed: idāni evam nānāsaccesu asantesu takka mattam anussarantānam diṭṭhi gatikānam vippaṭipattim

original: dassetuṃ “diṭṭhe sute”tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha diṭṭheti diṭṭhaṃ, diṭṭhasuddhinti
analyzed: dassetum diṭṭhe suta iti ādikāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi tattha diṭṭha iti diṭṭham diṭṭha suddhi nti

original: adhippāyo. Esa nayo sutādīsu. Ete ca nissāya vimānadassīti ete diṭṭhidhamme nissayitvā
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ esa nayaḥ suta ādīsu ete ca nissāya vimāna dassī iti ete diṭṭhi dhamme nissayitvā

original: suddhibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ vimānaṃ asammānaṃ passantopi. Vinicchaye ṭhatvā pahassamāno,
analyzed: suddhi bhāva saṅkhātam vimānam asammānam passantaḥ api vinicchaye ṭhatvā pahassamānaḥ

original: bālo paro akkusaloti cāhāti evaṃ vimānadassīpi tasmiṃ diṭṭhivinicchaye ṭhatvā tuṭṭhijāto
analyzed: bālo paraḥ akkusalo ti ca āha ati evam tasmin diṭṭhi vinicchaye tuṭṭhi jātaḥ

original: hāsajāto hutvā paro “hīno ca avidvā cā”ti evaṃ vadatiyeva.
analyzed: hāsa jātaḥ hutvā paraḥ ca evam

original: Na sammānetītipi vimānadassīti na bahumānaṃ karotīti evampi vimānadassī na bahumānadassī.
analyzed: na sammāneti iti pi vimāna dassī iti na bahu mānam karoti iti evam pi vimāna dassī na bahu māna dassī

original: Domanassaṃ janetīti paṭhamaṃ diṭṭhinissayaṃ allīyitvā domanassaṃ patvā pacchā diṭṭhivinicchaye
analyzed: domanassam janeti iti paṭhamam diṭṭhi nissayam allīyitvā domanassam patvā pacchā diṭṭhi vinicchaye

original: ṭhitakāle somanassaṃ uppādetīti attho.
analyzed: ṭhita kāle somanassam uppādeti iti attho

original: Vinicchayadiṭṭhiyā ṭhatvāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā gahitadiṭṭhiyā ṭhatvā.
analyzed: vinicchaya diṭṭhiyā ṭhatvā ati sanniṭṭhānam katvā gahita diṭṭhiyā ṭhatvā

original: 123. Evaṃ sante yenevāti gāthā. Tattha sayamattanāti sayameva attānaṃ. Vimānetīti garahati. Tadeva pāvāti tadeva vacanaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vadati, taṃ vā puggalaṃ.
analyzed: evam sante yena iva ati gāthā tattha sayam attanā ati sayam eva attānam vimāneti iti garahati tat eva pāvā ati tat eva vacanam diṭṭhim vadati tam vā puggalam

original: 124. Atisāradiṭṭhiyāti gāthāyattho – so evaṃ tāya lakkhaṇātisāriniyā atisāradiṭṭhiyā
analyzed: atisāra diṭṭhiyā ti gāthāyattho so evam tāya lakkhaṇa atisāriniyā atisāra diṭṭhiyā

original: samatto paripuṇṇo uddhumāto, tena ca diṭṭhimānena matto “paripuṇṇo ahaṃ kevalī”ti
analyzed: sa mattaḥ paripuṇṇaḥ uddhu māto tena ca diṭṭhi mānena mattaḥ paripuṇṇaḥ aham kevalī iti

original: evaṃ paripuṇṇamānī. Sayameva attānaṃ manasā “ahaṃ paṇḍito”ti abhisiñcati. Kiṃkāraṇā?
analyzed: evam paripuṇṇa mānī sayam eva attānam manasā aham paṇḍitaḥ iti abhisiñcati kiṃkāraṇā

original: Diṭṭhī hi sā tassa tathā samattāti.
analyzed: diṭṭhī hi sā tassa tathā samattā ati

original: Sabbā tā diṭṭhiyo lakkhaṇātikkantāti tā sabbā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo lakkhaṇaṃ atītā atisarantīti atikkantā. Anomoti anūno.
analyzed: sabbā tāḥ diṭṭhiyaḥ lakkhaṇa atikkantā ati tāḥ sabbāḥ dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyaḥ lakkhaṇam atītāḥ atisaranti iti atikkantāḥ anomaḥ iti anūnaḥ

original: 125. Parassa ceti gāthāya sambandho attho ca – kiñca bhiyyo? Yo so vinicchaye ṭhatvā
analyzed: parassa ca iti gāthāya sambandhaḥ attho ca kiñca bhiyyas yaḥ saḥ vinicchaye

original: pahassamāno “bālo paro akkusalo”ti cāha, tassa parassa ce hi vacasā so tena vuccamāno
analyzed: pahassamānaḥ bālaḥ paraḥ akkusalaḥ iti ca āha tassa parassa ce hi vacasā saḥ tena vuccamāno

original: nihīno hoti, tumo sahā hoti nihīnapañño, sopi teneva saha nihīnapañño hoti. Sopi
analyzed: nihīnaḥ hoti tumo sahā hoti nihīna pañño saḥ api tena iva saha nihīna paññaḥ hoti saḥ api

original: hi taṃ “bālo”ti vadati. Atha tassa vacanaṃ appamāṇaṃ, so pana sayameva vedagū ca
analyzed: hi tam bālaḥ iti vadati atha tassa vacanam appamāṇam saḥ pana sayam eva vedagū ca

original: dhīro ca hoti. Evaṃ sante na koci bālo samaṇesu atthi. Sabbepi hi te attano icchāya paṇḍitā.
analyzed: dhīro ca hoti evam sante na koci bālo samaṇesu atthi sabbe pi hi te attanaḥ icchāya paṇḍitā

original: Vācāyāti kathanena. Vacanenāti bhāsitena. Ninditakāraṇāti garahahetunā. Garahitakāraṇāti avaññātahetunā. Upavaditakāraṇāti upavādahetunā.
analyzed: vācāya ati kathanena vacanena ati bhāsitena nindita kāraṇā ati garaha hetunā garahita kāraṇā ati avaññāta hetunā upavadita kāraṇā ati upavāda hetunā

original: 126. Aññaṃ itoti gāthāya sambandho attho ca – “atha ce sayaṃ vedagū hoti dhīro. Na
analyzed: aññam itas ti gāthāya sambandhaḥ attho ca atha ce sayam vedagū hoti dhīraḥ na

original: koci bālo samaṇesu atthī”ti evañhi vuttepi siyā kassaci “kasmā”ti. Tattha vuccate
analyzed: koci bālaḥ samaṇesu atthi iti evam hi vutte pi siyā kassaci kasmā ati tattha vuccate

original: – yasmā aññaṃ ito yābhivadanti dhammaṃ, aparaddhā suddhimakevalī te. Evampi titthyā
analyzed: yasmai aññam itas yā abhivadanti dhammaṃ aparaddhā suddhim akevalī te evam pi titthyā

original: puthuso vadanti, ye ito aññaṃ diṭṭhiṃ abhivadanti, te aparaddhā viraddhā suddhimaggaṃ,
analyzed: puthusaḥ vadanti ye itas aññam diṭṭhim abhivadanti te aparaddhāḥ viraddhā suddhi maggaṃ

original: akevalino ca teti evaṃ puthutitthiyā yasmā vadantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā panevaṃ vadantīti
analyzed: akevalino ca te ti evam puthu titthiyāḥ yasmai vadanti iti vuttam hoti kasmai pana evam vadanti iti

original: ce? Sandiṭṭhirāgena hi tebhirattā, yasmā sakena diṭṭhirāgena te abhirattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ce sandiṭṭhi rāgena hi yasmā sakena diṭṭhi rāgena te abhirattā iti vuttam hoti

original: Te suddhimagganti te aññatitthiyā akiliṭṭhamaggaṃ. Visuddhimagganti niddosamaggaṃ.
analyzed: te suddhi magganti te añña titthiyāḥ akiliṭṭha maggam visuddhi magganti niddosa maggam

original: Parisuddhimagganti sukkamaggaṃ. Vodātamagganti paṇḍaramaggaṃ. Pariyodātamagganti
analyzed: parisuddhi magganti sukka maggam vodāta magganti paṇḍara maggam pariyodāta magganti

original: pabhāvantamaggaṃ. Viraddhāti vuttavidhinā maggena virajjhitvā ṭhitā. Aparaddhāti
analyzed: pabhāvanta maggam viraddhā ati vutta vidhinā maggena virajjhitvā ṭhitā aparaddhā iti

original: aparajjhitvā ṭhitā. Khalitāti parihīnā. Galitāti tato bhaṭṭhā. Aññāyāti aññāṇena.
analyzed: aparajjhitvā ṭhitā khalitā ati parihīnā galitā ati tatas bhaṭṭhā aññāyā ati aññāṇena

original: Aparaddhāti parājayamāpannā. Atha vā “ñāyāparaddhā”tipi pāṭho. Ñāyena maggena viraddhāti attho.
analyzed: aparaddhā iti parājayam āpannā atha vā ñāya aparaddhā atipi pāṭhaḥ ñāyena maggena viraddhā ati attho

original: 127. Evaṃ abhirattā ca – idheva suddhinti gāthā. Tattha sakāyaneti sakamagge. Daḷhaṃ vadānāti daḷhavādā.
analyzed: evam abhirattā ca idha iva suddhin ti gāthā tattha sa kāyanā iti saka magge daḷham vadānā ati daḷha vādā

original: Thiravādāti sanniṭṭhānavādā. Balikavādāti balavantavādā. Avaṭṭhitavādāti patiṭṭhahitvā kathitavādā.
analyzed: thira vādā ati sanniṭṭhāna vādā balika vādā ati balavanta vādā avaṭṭhita vādā ati patiṭṭhahitvā kathita vādā

original: 128. Ye evañca daḷhavādā, tesu yo koci titthiyo sakāyane vāpi daḷhaṃ vadāno kamettha
analyzed: ye evañca daḷha vādā tesu yaḥ koci titthiyaḥ vā api daḷham vadānaḥ

original: bāloti paraṃ daheyya, saṅkhepato tattha sassatucchedasaṅkhāte vitthārato natthikaissarakārakaniyatiādibhede
analyzed: bālaḥ iti param daheyya saṅkhepataḥ tattha sassatu cheda saṅkhāte vitthārataḥ

original: sake ayane “idameva sacca”nti daḷhaṃ vadāno kaṃ paraṃ ettha diṭṭhigate “bālo”ti saha
analyzed: sake ayane idam eva daḷham vadāno kam param ettha diṭṭhi gate bālo ti saha

original: dhammena passeyya, nanu sabbopi tassa matena paṇḍito eva suppaṭipanno eva ca. Evaṃ
analyzed: dhammena passeyya nanu sabbaḥ api tassa matena paṇḍitaḥ eva suppaṭipannaḥ eva ca evam

analyzed: sante sayam eva saḥ medha gam āvaheyya param vadam bālam asuddhi dhammam saḥ api param bālo

original: ca asuddhidhammo ca aya”nti vadanto attanāva kalahaṃ āvaheyya. Kasmā? Yasmā sabbopi
analyzed: ca asuddhi dhammo ca ayanti vadantaḥ attanā ava kalaham āvaheyya kasmai yasmai sabbaḥ upi

original: tassa matena paṇḍitoyeva suppaṭipannoyeva ca.
analyzed: tassa matena paṇḍitaḥ yā iva suppaṭipannaḥ yā iva ca

analyzed: evam sabbathā api vinicchaye sayam pamāya uddham sa lokasmim vivādam eti iti

analyzed: diṭṭhiyā sayam ca satthāra ādim minitvā saḥ bhiyyas vivādam eti iti evam pana vinicchayesu

analyzed: loke ti arahatta nikūṭena desanam niṭṭhāpesi

analyzed: sayam pamāya ati minitvā paminitvā ati pamāṇam katvā

analyzed: tam na sundaram uddham vādena saddhinti attanaḥ upari kathentena saha desanā pariyosāne

analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

130. Terasame mahābyūhasuttaniddese ye kecime diṭṭhiparibbasānāti idampi “kiṃ nu
analyzed: terasame mahābyūha sutta niddese ye keci ime idam pi kim nu

original: Nindameva anventīti garahameva upagacchanti.

original: pasaṃsampi labhanti, yaṃ etaṃ pasaṃsāsaṅkhātaṃ vādaphalaṃ, taṃ appaṃ, rāgādīnaṃ samāya
analyzed: labhanti yam etam pasaṃsā saṅkhātam vāda phalam tam rāga ādīnam

analyzed: tāva vissajjana gātham āha na alam samāya duve vivādassa phalāni brūmi iti

original: Tattha duve vivādassa phalānīti nindā ca pasaṃsā ca jayaparājayādīni vā taṃsabhāgāni.
analyzed: tattha duve vivādassa phalāni iti nindā ca pasaṃsā ca jaya parājaya ādīni vā taṃsa bhāgāni

original: Etampi disvāti “nindā aniṭṭhā eva, pasaṃsā nālaṃ samāyā”ti etampi vivādaphale ādīnavaṃ
analyzed: etam pi disvā ati nindā aniṭṭhā eva pasaṃsā na alam samāyāti etam pi vivāda phale ādīnavam

original: disvā. Khemābhipassaṃ avivādabhūminti avivādabhūmiṃ nibbānaṃ khemanti passamāno.
analyzed: disvā khema abhipassam avivāda bhūminti avivāda bhūmim nibbānam khemanti passamāno

original: Appakanti mandaṃ. Parittakanti thokaṃ. Omakanti heṭṭhimakaṃ. Lāmakanti pāpakaṃ. Samāyāti
analyzed: appakam ti mandam parittakam ti thokam omakam ti heṭṭhimakam lāmakam ti pāpakam samāyāti

original: Nibbānāyāti amatamahānibbānatthāya. Paṭinissaggāyāti maggena kilesānaṃ nissajjanatthāya.
analyzed: nibbānāya ati amata mahānibbāna atthāya paṭinissaggāya ati maggena kilesānam nissajjana tthāya

original: Paṭipassaddhiyāti phalena paṭipassaddhānaṃ anuppajjanatthāya nālaṃ.
analyzed: paṭipassaddhiyā ti phalena paṭipassaddhānam an uppajjana tthāya na alam

original: 132. Evañhi avivādamāno – yā kācimāti gāthā. Tattha sammutiyoti diṭṭhiyo. Puthujjāti
analyzed: evam hi a vivāda mānaḥ yā kācimā ati gāthā tattha sammutiyā ti

original: puthujjanasambhavā. So upayaṃ kimeyyāti so upagantabbaṭṭhena upayaṃ rūpādīsu ekampi

original: dhammaṃ kiṃ upeyya, kena vā kāraṇena upeyya. Diṭṭhe sute khantimakubbamānoti diṭṭhasutasuddhīsu pemaṃ akaronto.
analyzed: dhammam kim upeyya kena vā kāraṇena upeyya diṭṭhe sute khantim akubbamāno ti diṭṭha suta suddhīsu pemam akarontaḥ

original: Puthujjanehi janitāti puthujjanehi uppāditā. Sammutiyoti diṭṭhiyo. Puthu nānājanehi
analyzed: puthujjanehi janitā ati puthujjanehi uppāditā sammutiyo puthu nānājanehi

original: na eti. Na upagacchatīti nivattati. Nābhinivisatīti pavisitvā nappatiṭṭhati.
analyzed: na eti na upagacchati iti nivattati na abhinivisati iti pavisitvā na patiṭṭhati

original: 133. Ito bāhirā pana – sīluttamāti gāthā tassattho – sīlaṃyeva “uttama”nti maññamānā
analyzed: itas bāhirā pana sīluttamā ti gāthā tassa atthaḥ sīlaṃ yeva uttamanti maññamānā

original: sīluttamāti eke bhonto saṃyamamattena suddhiṃ vadanti, hatthivatādiñca vataṃ samādāya

analyzed: vadanti api ca te kusala avadānā kusalā evaṃvādā

original: 134. Evaṃ sīluttamesu ca tesu tathā paṭipanno yo koci – sace cutoti gāthā. Tassattho
analyzed: evam sīla uttamesu ca tesu tathā paṭipannaḥ yaḥ koci sace cuto ti gāthā tassa attho

analyzed: sace para vicchindanena vā an abhisambhuṇantaḥ vā cutaḥ hoti saḥ tam

original: sīlabbatakammaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārādikammaṃ vā virādhayitvā vedhatī. Na kevalañca vedhati,
analyzed: sīla bbata kammam puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādi kammam vā virādhayitvā vedhatī na kevalam ca vedhati

original: api ca kho taṃ sīlabbatasuddhiṃ pajappatī ca vippalapati ca patthayatī ca. Kimiva?

original: vā satthaṃ vā patthayatīti.
analyzed: vā sattham vā patthayati iti

original: Paravicchindanāya vāti parena vāriyamāno vā. Anabhisambhuṇanto vāti taṃ paṭipattiṃ asampādento vā.
analyzed: para vicchindanāya vāti parena vāriyamānaḥ vā an abhisambhuṇantaḥ vāti tam paṭipattim a sampādentaḥ vā

original: Aññāya aparaddhoti nibbānena parihīno maggato vā. Taṃ vā satthaṃ anubandhatīti taṃ vā satthaṃ sabbattha pacchato gacchati.
analyzed: aññāya aparaddhaḥ ti nibbānena parihīnaḥ maggataḥ vā tam vā sattham anubandhati iti tam vā sattham sabbattha pacchatas gacchati

original: 135. Evaṃ pana sīluttamānaṃ pavedhanakāraṇaṃ ariyasāvako sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabbanti
analyzed: evam pana sīluttamānam pavedhana kāraṇam ariya sāvakaḥ sīla bbatam vā api pahāya sabbanti

original: Virato careti suddhiyā asuddhiyā ca virato careyya. Santi manuggahāyāti diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā.

original: Kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipākanti akusalakammaṃ akusalavipākadāyakaṃ. Sukkaṃ sukkavipākanti lokiyakusalaṃ attanā sadisaṃ sukkavipākadāyakaṃ.

original: Niyāmāvakkantinti maggapavisanaṃ. Sekkhāti satta sekkhā. Aggadhammanti uttamadhammaṃ, arahattaphalaṃ.
analyzed: niyāma avakkantinti magga pavisanam sekkhā ati satta sekkhāḥ agga dhammanti uttama dhammam arahatta phalam

original: 136. Evaṃ ito bāhirake sīluttame saṃyamena visuddhivāde tesañca vipākaṃ sīlabbatapahāyino
analyzed: evam itas bāhirake sīla uttame saṃyamena visuddhi vāde tesam ca vipākam sīlabbata pahāyinaḥ

original: suddhi’manutthunanti vadanti kathentīti.

original: Tapojigucchavādāti kāyapīḷanāditapena pāpahirīyanavādā. Tapojigucchasārāti teneva tapena hirīyanasāravanto. Uddhaṃsarāvādāti saṃsārena suddhiṃ kathayantā.

original: 137. Evaṃ tesaṃ avītataṇhānaṃ suddhiṃ anutthunantānaṃ yopi suddhippattameva attānaṃ
analyzed: evam tesam a vīta taṇhānam suddhim an utthunantānam yaḥ api suddhi ppattam eva attānam

original: maññeyya, tassāpi avītataṇhattā bhavābhavesu taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ patthayamānassa hi jappitāni

original: pavedhitampi hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhavābhavesu pana vītataṇhattā āyatiṃ cutūpapāto
analyzed: pavedhitam pi hoti iti vuttam hoti bhava abhavesu pana vīta taṇha ttā āyatim cutūpapāto

original: idha yassa natthi, sa kena vedheyya kuhiṃ va jappeti ayametissā gāthāya sambandho.
analyzed: idha yassa natthi sa kena vedheyya kuhim va jappeti ayam etissā gāthāya sambandhaḥ

original: Āgamananti puna āgamanaṃ. Gamananti ito aññattha gamanaṃ. Gamanāgamananti ito gantvā puna nivattanaṃ. Kālanti maraṇaṃ. Gatīti gamanavasena gatiyā gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: āgamananti puna āgamanam gamananti itas aññattha gamanam gamana āgamananti itas gantvā puna nivattanam maraṇam gatī iti gamana vasena gatiyā gantabbam

original: 138. Yamāhu dhammanti pucchāgāthā.
analyzed: yam āhu pucchāgāthā

original: 139. Idāni yasmā ekopi ettha vādo sacco natthi, kevalaṃ diṭṭhimattakena hi te vadanti,
analyzed: idāni yasmai ekaḥ api ettha vādo saccaḥ na atthi kevalam diṭṭhimattakena hi te vadanti

original: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “sakaṃ hī”ti imaṃ tāva vissajjanagāthamāha. Tattha sammutinti
analyzed: tasmā tam attham dassentaḥ sakam hi iti imam tāva vissajjana gātham āha tattha sammutin ti

original: diṭṭhiṃ. Anomanti anūnaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhim anomanti anūnam

original: 140. Evametesu sakaṃ dhammaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ brūvantesu aññassa dhammaṃ pana hīnanti vadantesu

original: yassa kassaci – parassa ce vambhayitena hīnoti gāthā. Tassattho – yadi parassa ninditakāraṇā
analyzed: yassa kassaci parassa ce vambhayitena hīnaḥ iti gāthā tassa atthaḥ yadi parassa nindita kāraṇā

original: hīno bhaveyya, na koci dhammesu visesi aggo bhaveyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Puthū hi aññassa
analyzed: hīnaḥ bhaveyya na koci dhammesu visesī aggaḥ bhaveyya kiṃkāraṇā puthū hi aññassa

original: vadanti dhammaṃ nihīnato sabbeva te samhi daḷhaṃ vadānāsakadhamme daḷhavādā eva.
analyzed: vadanti dhammam nihīnataḥ sabbe iva te samhi daḷham vadāna asaka dhamme daḷha vādāḥ eva

original: Vambhayitakāraṇāti dhaṃsitakāraṇā. Garahitakāraṇāti lāmakakatakāraṇā. Upavaditakāraṇāti akkositakāraṇā. Sakāyananti sakamaggaṃ.
analyzed: vambhayita kāraṇā ati dhaṃsita kāraṇā garahita kāraṇā ati lāmakakata kāraṇā upavadita kāraṇā ati akkosita kāraṇā sa kāyananti saka maggam

original: 141. Kiñca bhiyyo – saddhammapūjāti gāthā. Tassattho – te ca titthiyā yathā pasaṃsanti
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas saddhamma pūjā ati gāthā tassa atthaḥ te ca titthiyāḥ yathā pasaṃsanti

original: sakāyanāni, saddhammapūjāpi nesaṃ tatheva vattati. Te hi ativiya satthārādīni sattaronti.
analyzed: sa kāyanāni saddhamma pūjā api nesam tathā iva vattati te hi ativiya satthāra ādīni

original: Tattha yadi te pamāṇā siyuṃ, evaṃ sante sabbeva vādā tathiyā bhaveyyuṃ. Kiṃkāraṇā?
analyzed: tattha yadi te pamāṇā siyum evam sante sabbe iva vādāḥ tathiyāḥ bhaveyyum kiṃkāraṇā

original: Suddhī hi nesaṃ paccattameva. Na sā aññattha sijjhati, nāpi paramatthato. Attani
analyzed: suddhī hi nesam paccattam eva na sā aññattha sijjhati nā api paramatthataḥ attani

original: diṭṭhigāhamattameva hi taṃ tesaṃ parapaccayaneyyabuddhīnaṃ. Paccattamevāti pāṭekkameva.
analyzed: diṭṭhi gāha mattam eva hi tam tesam para paccaya neyya buddhīnam paccattam eva ati pāṭekkam eva

original: 142. Yo pana viparītato bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo, tassa na brāhmaṇassa paraneyyamatthīti
analyzed: yaḥ pana viparītataḥ bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇaḥ tassa na brāhmaṇassa paraneyyam atthi iti

original: gāthā. Tassattho – brāhmaṇassa hi “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sudiṭṭhattā
analyzed: gāthā tassa atthaḥ brāhmaṇassa hi sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā ati ādinā nayena su diṭṭha ttā

original: parena netabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi. Diṭṭhidhammesu “idameva sacca”nti nicchinitvā sumaggahītampi
analyzed: parena netabbam ñāṇam natthi diṭṭhi dhammesu idam eva saccanti nicchinitvā su magga hītam pi

original: natthi. Taṃkāraṇā so diṭṭhikalahāni atikkanto, na hi so seṭṭhato passati dhammamaññaṃ
analyzed: natthi taṃ kāraṇā so diṭṭhi kalahāni atikkantaḥ na hi so seṭṭhataḥ passati dhamma maññam

original: aññatra satipaṭṭhānādīhi.
analyzed: aññatra sati paṭṭhāna ādīhi

original: Na paraneyyoti parena netabbo jānāpetabbo na hoti. Na parapattiyo na parapaccayoti paresaṃ paccetabbo na hoti. Na parapaṭibaddhagūti paresaṃ paṭibaddhagamano na hoti.
analyzed: na para neyyaḥ ti parena netabbaḥ jānāpetabbaḥ na hoti na para pattiyaḥ na para paccayaḥ ti paresam paccetabbaḥ na hoti na para paṭibaddha gūti paresam paṭibaddha gamanaḥ na hoti

original: 143. Jānāmīti gāthāya sambandho attho ca – evaṃ tāva paramatthabrāhmaṇo na hi seṭṭhato
analyzed: jānāmi iti gāthāya sambandhaḥ attho ca evam tāva parama attha brāhmaṇaḥ na hi seṭṭhataḥ

original: passati dhammamaññaṃ, aññe pana titthiyā paracittañāṇādīhi jānantāpi passantāpi “jānāmi
analyzed: passati dhammam aññam aññe pana titthiyā para citta ñāṇa ādīhi jānantā api passantā api jānāmi

original: passāmi tatheva eta”nti evaṃ vadantāpi ca diṭṭhiyā suddhiṃ paccenti. Kasmā? Yasmā
analyzed: passāmi tathā iva etat ti evam vadantā api ca diṭṭhiyā suddhim paccenti kasmai yasmai

original: tesu ekopi adakkhi ce addasa cepi tena paracittañāṇādinā yathābhūtamatthaṃ, kiñhi
analyzed: tesu ekaḥ api adakkhi ce addasa ce pi tena para citta ñāṇa ādinā yathābhūtam attham kiñhi

original: tumassa tena tassa tena dassanena kiṃ kataṃ, kiṃ dukkhapariññā sādhitā, udāhu samudayappahānādīnaṃ
analyzed: tumassa tena tassa tena dassanena kim katam kim dukkha pariññā sādhitā udāhu samudaya ppahāna ādīnam

original: aññataraṃ, yato sabbathāpi atikkamitvā ariyamaggaṃ te titthiyā aññeneva vadanti suddhiṃ,
analyzed: aññataram yatas sabbathā api atikkamitvā ariya maggam te titthiyāḥ aññena iva vadanti suddhim

original: atikkamitvā vā te titthiye buddhādayo aññeneva vadanti suddhinti.
analyzed: atikkamitvā vā te titthiye buddha ādayaḥ aññena iva vadanti suddhin ti

original: 144. Passaṃ naroti gāthāya sambandho attho ca – kiñca bhiyyo? Yvāyaṃ paracittañāṇādīhi
analyzed: passam naro ti gāthāya sambandhaḥ attho ca kiñca bhiyyas yvā ayam para citta ñāṇa ādīhi

original: addakkhi, so passaṃ naro dakkhati nāmarūpaṃ, na tato paraṃ, disvāna vā ñassati tānimeva
analyzed: addakkhi saḥ passam naraḥ dakkhati nāma rūpam na tatas param disvāna vā

original: nāmarūpāni niccato sukhato vā, na aññathā; so evaṃ passanto kāmaṃ bahuṃ passatu appakaṃ
analyzed: nāma rūpāni niccatas sukhataḥ vā na aññathā saḥ evam passantaḥ kāmam bahum passatu appakam

original: vā nāmarūpaṃ niccato sukhato ca athassa evarūpena dassanena na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadanti.
analyzed: vā nāma rūpam niccatas sukhatas ca athassa evarūpena dassanena na hi tena suddhim kusalāḥ vadanti

original: 145. Nivissavādīti gāthāya sambandho attho ca – tena ca dassanena suddhiyā asatiyāpi
analyzed: nivissa vādī iti gāthāya sambandhaḥ attho ca tena ca dassanena suddhiyā asatiyā api

original: yo “jānāmi passāmi tatheva eta”nti evaṃ nivissavādī, etaṃ vā dassanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhiyā
analyzed: yaḥ jānāmi passāmi tathā iva etat ti evam nivissa vādī etam vā dassanam paṭicca diṭṭhiyā

original: suddhiṃ paccento “idameva sacca”nti evaṃ nivissavādī, so subbinayo na hoti taṃ tathā
analyzed: suddhim paccentaḥ idam eva saccanti evam nivissa vādī saḥ su binayaḥ na hoti tam tathā

original: pakappitaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ diṭṭhiṃ purakkharāno. So hi yaṃ satthārādiṃ nissito, tattheva
analyzed: pakappitam abhisaṅkhatam diṭṭhim purakkharāno saḥ hi yam satthārā ādim nissitaḥ tattha eva

original: subhaṃ vadāno suddhiṃ vado, “parisuddhivādo parisuddhidassano vā aha”nti attānaṃ
analyzed: subham vadānaḥ suddhim vado parisuddhi vādo parisuddhi dassanaḥ vā ahanti attānam

original: maññamāno tattha tathaddasā so, tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā aviparītameva so addasa. Yathā
analyzed: maññamāno tattha tathaddasā saḥ tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā aviparītam eva saḥ addasa yathā

original: sā diṭṭhi pavattati, tatheva taṃ addasa, na aññathā passituṃ icchatīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: sā diṭṭhi pavattati tathā iva tam addasa na aññathā passitum icchati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Nivissavādīti patiṭṭhahitvā kathento. Dubbinayoti vinetuṃ dukkho. Duppaññāpayoti
analyzed: nivissa vādī iti patiṭṭhahitvā kathentaḥ dubbinayo ti vinetum dukkho duppaññāpayo ti

original: ñāpetuṃ cittena labbhāpetuṃ dukkho. Dunnijjhāpayoti cittena vīmaṃsitvā gahaṇatthaṃ
analyzed: ñāpetum cittena labbhāpetum dukkhaḥ cittena vīmaṃsitvā gahaṇa ttham

original: punappunaṃ nijjhāpayituṃ dukkho. Duppekkhāpayoti ikkhāpayituṃ dukkho. Duppasādayoti
analyzed: punappunam nijjhāpayitum dukkhaḥ ikkhāpayitum dukkhaḥ duppasādayoti

original: citte pasādaṃ uppādetuṃ dukkho.
analyzed: citte pasādam uppādetum dukkhaḥ

original: Appassīti ñāṇena paṭivedhaṃ pāpuṇi. Paṭivijjhīti cittena avabodhaṃ pāpuṇi.
analyzed: appassī iti ñāṇena paṭivedham pāpuṇi paṭivijjhi iti cittena avabodham pāpuṇi

original: 146. Evaṃ pakappitaṃ diṭṭhiṃ purakkharānesu titthiyesu – na brāhmaṇo kappamupeti
analyzed: evam pakappitam diṭṭhim purakkharānesu titthiyesu  na brāhmaṇaḥ kappam upeti

original: saṅkhāti gāthā. Tattha saṅkhāti saṅkhāya, jānitvāti attho. Napi ñāṇabandhūti samāpattiñāṇādinā
analyzed: saṅkhā ati gāthā tattha saṅkhā ati saṅkhāya jānitvā iti atthaḥ ñāṇa bandhu iti samāpatti ñāṇa ādinā

original: akatataṇhādiṭṭhibandhu. Tattha viggaho – nāpi assa ñāṇena kato bandhu atthīti napi
analyzed: akata taṇhā diṭṭhi bandhu tattha viggahaḥ na api assa ñāṇena kataḥ bandhu atthi iti na pi

original: ñāṇabandhu. Sammutiyoti diṭṭhisammutiyo. Puthujjāti puthujjanasambhavā. Uggahaṇanti
analyzed: ñāṇa bandhu sammutiyo ti diṭṭhi sammutiyo puthujjā ti puthujjana sambhavā uggahaṇanti

original: maññeti uggahaṇanti aññe, aññe tā sammutiyo uggaṇhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: maññā iti aññe aññe tāḥ sammutiyaḥ uggaṇhanti iti vuttam hoti

original: Upekkhatīti upapattito apakkhapatito hutvā passati.
analyzed: upekkhati iti upapattitaḥ a pakkha patitaḥ hutvā passati

original: 147. Kiñca bhiyyo – vissajja ganthānīti gāthā. Tattha anuggahoti uggahaṇavirahito, sopi nāssa uggahoti anuggaho. Na vā uggaṇhātīti anuggaho.
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas vissajja ganthāni iti gāthā tattha anuggaho ti uggahaṇa virahito saḥ api na assa uggaho ti anuggahaḥ na vā uggaṇhāti iti anuggahaḥ

original: Ganthe vossajjitvāti abhijjhādike ganthe cajitvā. Vissajjāti puna anādiyanavasena
analyzed: ganthe vā ussajjitvā ati abhijjhā ādike ganthe cajitvā vissajjāti puna an ādiyana vasena

original: jahitvā. Gadhiteti ghaṭite. Ganthiteti suttena saṅgahite viya ganthite. Bandheti
analyzed: jahitvā gadhitā iti ghaṭite ganthitā iti suttena saṅgahite viya ganthite bandha iti

original: suṭṭhu bandhe. Vibandheti vividhā bandhe. Palibuddheti samantato bandhanena bandhe.
analyzed: suṭṭhu bandhe vibandhā iti vividhā bandhe palibuddhā iti samantataḥ bandhanena bandhe

original: Bandhaneti kilesabandhane. Phoṭayitvāti papphoṭetvā. Saccaṃ vissajjaṃ karontīti visaṅkharitvā
analyzed: bandhana iti kilesa bandhane phoṭayitvā iti papphoṭetvā saccam vissajjam karonti iti visaṅkharitvā

original: aparibhogaṃ karonti. Vikopentīti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karonti.
analyzed: a paribhogam karonti vikopenti iti cuṇṇa vicuṇṇam karonti

original: 148. Kiñca bhiyyo – so evarūpo – pubbāsaveti gāthā. Tattha pubbāsaveti atītarūpādīni
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas saḥ evarūpaḥ pubba āsava iti gāthā tattha pubba āsava iti atīta rūpa ādīni

original: ārabbha uppajjanadhammakilese. Naveti paccuppannarūpādīni ārabbha uppajjanadhamme.
analyzed: ārabbha uppajjana dhamma kilese nave ti paccuppanna rūpa ādīni ārabbha uppajjana dhamme

original: Na chandagūti chandādivasena na gacchati. Anattagarahīti katākatavasena attānaṃ agarahanto.
analyzed: na chandagū iti chanda ādi vasena na gacchati an atta garahī iti kata a kata vasena attānam a garahantaḥ

original: 149. Evaṃ anattagarahī ca – sa sabbadhammesūti gāthā. Tattha sabbadhammesūti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhidhammesu
analyzed: evam anatta garahī ca sa sabba dhammesu iti gāthā tattha sabba dhammesu iti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi dhammesu

original: “yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ vā”ti evaṃpabhedesu. Pannabhāroti patitabhāro. Na kappetīti na
analyzed: yam kiñci diṭṭham vāti evaṃpabhedesu panna bhāro ti patita bhāro na kappeti iti na

original: kappiyo, duvidhampi kappaṃ na karotīti attho. Nūparatoti puthujjanakalyāṇakasekkhā
analyzed: kappiyaḥ duvidham pi kappam na karoti iti atthaḥ puthujjana kalyāṇaka sekkhā

original: viya uparatisamaṅgīpi no hoti. Na patthiyoti nittaṇho. Taṇhā hi patthayatīti patthiyā,
analyzed: no hoti na patthiyaḥ ti nittaṇhaḥ taṇhā hi patthayati iti patthiyā

original: nāssa patthiyāti na patthiyo. Ito parañca heṭṭhā ca tattha tattha vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
analyzed: na assa patthiyā ti na patthiyaḥ itas param ca heṭṭhā ca tattha tattha vutta naya ttā uttāna attham eva

original: Evaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne purābhedasutte vuttasadiso
analyzed: evam arahatta nikūṭena iva desanam niṭṭhāpesi desanā pariyosāne purābheda sutte vutta sadiso

original: eva abhisamayo ahosīti.
analyzed: eva abhisamayaḥ ahosi iti

original: Saddhammappajjotikāya mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

original: Mahābyūhasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: mahābyūha sutta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 14. Tuvaṭakasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tuvaṭaka sutta niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 150. Cuddasame tuvaṭakasuttaniddese pucchāmi tanti idampi tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye “kā
analyzed: cuddasame tuvaṭaka sutta niddese pucchāmi idam pi tasmin yeva mahā samaye kā

original: nu kho arahattappattiyā paṭipattī”ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ
analyzed: nu kho arahatta pattiyāḥ paṭipatti iti uppanna cittānam ekaccānam devatānam tam attham

original: pakāsetuṃ purimanayeneva nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pakāsetum purima nayena iva nimmita buddhena attānam pucchāpetvā vuttam

original: Tattha ādipucchāgāthāya tāva pucchāmīti ettha adiṭṭhajotanādivasena pucchā vibhajitā.
analyzed: tattha ādi pucchā gāthāya tāva pucchāmi iti ettha adiṭṭha jotana ādi vasena pucchā vibhajitā

original: Ādiccabandhūti ādiccassa gottabandhu. Vivekaṃ santipadañcāti vivekañca santipadañca.
analyzed: ādiccabandhu uti ādiccassa gottabandhu vivekam santipadam ca ati vivekam ca santipadam ca

original: Kathaṃ disvāti kena kāraṇena disvā, kathaṃ pavattadassano hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: katham disvā iti kena kāraṇena disvā katham pavatta dassanaḥ hutvā iti vuttam hoti

original: Tisso pucchāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Adiṭṭhajotanāti yaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ na paṭividdhaṃ, tassa
analyzed: tissaḥ pucchā ati gaṇana paricchedaḥ adiṭṭha jotanā ati yat na diṭṭham na paṭividdham tassa

original: pākaṭakaraṇatthāya pucchā. Diṭṭhasaṃsandanāti yaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ, tassa ghaṭanatthāya.
analyzed: pākaṭa karaṇa tthāya pucchā diṭṭha saṃsandanā ti yam ñāṇa cakkhunā diṭṭham tassa ghaṭana tthāya

original: Vimaticchedanāti yā kaṅkhā, tassācchedanatthaṃ. Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātanti dhammānaṃ
analyzed: vimati chedanā ti yā kaṅkhā tassa a chedana attham pakatiyā lakkhaṇam dhammānam

original: tathalakkhaṇaṃ pakatiyā na ñātaṃ. Adiṭṭhanti na diṭṭhaṃ. “Na niṭṭha”ntipi pāṭho.
analyzed: tatha lakkhaṇam pakatiyā na ñātam a diṭṭhanti na diṭṭham na niṭṭhanti pi

original: Atulitanti tulāya tulitaṃ viya na tulitaṃ. Atīritanti tīraṇāya na tīritaṃ. Avibhūtanti
analyzed: tulāya tulitam na tulitam tīraṇāya na tīritam

original: na pākaṭaṃ. Avibhāvitanti paññāya na vaḍḍhitaṃ. Tassa ñāṇāyāti tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇajānanatthāya.
analyzed: na pākaṭam a vibhāvitam ti paññāya na vaḍḍhitam tassa ñāṇāya ati tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇa jānana tthāya

original: Dassanāyāti dassanatthāya. Tulanāyāti tulanatthāya. Tīraṇāyāti tīraṇatthāya. Vibhāvanāyāti
analyzed: dassanāya ati dassana tthāya tulanāya ati tulana tthāya tīraṇāya ati tīraṇa tthāya vibhāvanāya ati

original: vibhāgakaraṇatthāya. Aññehi paṇḍitehīti aññehi buddhisampannehi. Saṃsayapakkhandoti sandehaṃ paviṭṭho.
analyzed: vibhāga karaṇa tthāya aññehi paṇḍitehi iti aññehi buddhi sampannehi saṃsaya pakkhando ti sandeham paviṭṭhaḥ

original: Manussapucchāti manussānaṃ pucchā. Amanussapucchāti nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ pucchā. Gahaṭṭhāti
analyzed: manussa pucchā ati manussānam pucchā amanussa pucchā ati nāga supaṇṇa ādīnam pucchā gahaṭṭhā ati

original: avasesagahaṭṭhā. Pabbajitāti liṅgavasena vuttā. Nāgāti suphassādayo nāgā. Supaṇṇāti
analyzed: avasesa gahaṭṭhā pabbajitā ti liṅga vasena vuttā nāgā ti suphassa ādayaḥ nāgā su paṇṇā ti

original: supaṇṇasaṃyuttavasena. Yakkhāti yakkhasaṃyuttavasena ca veditabbā. Asurāti pahārādādayo.
analyzed: supaṇṇa saṃyutta vasena yakkhā ati yakkha saṃyutta vasena ca veditabbāḥ asurā ti pahārāt ādayaḥ

original: Gandhabbāti pañcasikhagandhabbaputtādayo. Mahārājānoti cattāro mahārājāno. Ahīnindriyanti
analyzed: gandhabbā ati pañca sikha gandhabba putta ādayaḥ mahā rājānoti cattāraḥ mahā rājānaḥ

original: saṇṭhānavasena avikalindriyaṃ. So nimmitoti so bhagavatā nimmito buddho.
analyzed: saṇṭhāna vasena avikalindriyam saḥ nimmitaḥ iti saḥ bhagavatā nimmitaḥ buddhaḥ

original: Vodānatthapucchāti visesadhammapucchā. Atītapucchāti atīte dhamme ārabbha pucchā.
analyzed: vodāna attha pucchā ati visesa dhamma pucchā atīta pucchā ati atīte dhamme ārabbha pucchā

original: Anāgatādīsupi eseva nayo. Kusalapucchāti anavajjadhammapucchā. Akusalapucchāti sāvajjadhammapucchā.
analyzed: anāgata ādīsu pi esā iva nayo kusala pucchā ati anavajja dhamma pucchā akusala pucchā ati sāvajja dhamma pucchā

original: Abyākatapucchāti tadubhayaviparītadhammapucchā.
analyzed: abyākata pucchā ati tad ubhaya viparīta dhamma pucchā

original: Ajjhesāmi tanti taṃ āṇāpemi. Kathayassu meti mayhaṃ kathehi. Gottañātakoti gottena ñātako. Gottabandhūti gottajjhattiko. Ekenākārenāti ekena koṭṭhāsena.
analyzed: ajjhesāmi tam ti tam āṇāpemi kathayassu mā iti mayham kathehi gotta ñātakaḥ iti gottena ñātakaḥ gotta bandhu iti gotta jhattikaḥ ekena ākārena ati ekena koṭṭhāsena

original: Santipadanti santisaṅkhātaṃ nibbānapadaṃ. Ye dhammā santādhigamāyāti ye satipaṭṭhānādayo
analyzed: santi padam ti santi saṅkhātam nibbāna padam ye dhammā santa adhigamāya ati ye sati paṭṭhāna ādayo

original: dhammā nibbānapaṭilābhatthāya. Santiphusanāyāti ñāṇaphassena nibbānaphusanatthāya.
analyzed: dhammāḥ nibbāna paṭilābha tthāya santi phusanāya ati ñāṇa phassena nibbāna phusana tthāya

original: Sacchikiriyāyāti paccakkhakaraṇatthāya. Mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhanti mahantaṃ sīlarāsiṃ.
analyzed: sacchikiriyāya ati paccakkha karaṇa atthāya mahantam sīla kkhandhanti mahantam sīla rāsim

original: Samādhikkhandhādīsupi eseva nayo. Sīlakkhandhādayo lokiyalokuttarā, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ lokiyameva.
analyzed: samādhi kkhandha ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ sīla kkhandha ādayaḥ lokiya lokuttarāḥ vimutti ñāṇa dassanam lokiyam eva

original: Tamokāyassa padālananti avijjārāsissa viddhaṃsanaṃ. Vipallāsassa bhedananti catubbidhavipallāsassa
analyzed: tamokāyassa padālananti avijjā rāsissa viddhaṃsananti vipallāsassa bhedananti catubbidha vipallāsassa

original: bhedanaṃ. Taṇhāsallassa abbuhananti taṇhākaṇṭakassa luñcanaṃ. Abhisaṅkhārassa vūpasamanti
analyzed: bhedanam taṇhā sallassa taṇhā kaṇṭakassa luñcanam abhisaṅkhārassa vūpasamanti

original: puññādiabhisaṅkhārassa nibbāpanaṃ. Bhārassa nikkhepananti pañcakkhandhabhārassa ṭhapanaṃ.
analyzed: puñña ādi abhisaṅkhārassa nibbāpanam bhārassa nikkhepanam ti pañca kkhandha bhārassa ṭhapanam

original: Saṃsāravaṭṭassa upacchedananti saṃsārapavattassa chedanaṃ. Santāpassa nibbāpananti
analyzed: saṃsāra vaṭṭassa upacchedananti saṃsāra pavattassa chedanaṃ santāpassa nibbāpananti

original: kilesasantāpassa nibbuti. Pariḷāhassa paṭipassaddhinti kilesadarathassa sannisīdanaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa santāpassa nibbuti pariḷāhassa paṭipassaddhinti kilesa da rathassa sannisīdanaṃ

original: Devadevoti devānaṃ atidevo.
analyzed: devadeva uti devānam atidevaḥ

original: 151. Atha bhagavā yasmā yathā passanto kilese uparundhati, tathā disvā tathā pavattadassano
analyzed: atha bhagavā yasmai yathā passantaḥ kilese uparundhati tathā disvā tathā pavatta dassanaḥ

original: hutvā parinibbāti, tasmā tamatthaṃ āvikaronto nānappakārena taṃ devaparisaṃ kilesappahāne
analyzed: hutvā parinibbāti tasmā tam attham āvikarontaḥ nānappakārena tam deva parisam kilesa ppahāne

original: niyojento “mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā”ti ārabhitvā pañca gāthā abhāsi.
analyzed: niyojentaḥ mūlam ārabhitvā pañca gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: Tattha ādigāthāya tāva saṅkhepattho – papañcasaṅkhāti papañcāti saṅkhātattā papañcā
analyzed: tattha ādi gāthāya tāva saṅkhepa attho

original: eva papañcasaṅkhā. Tassā avijjādayo kilesā mūlaṃ, taṃ papañcasaṅkhāya mūlaṃ asmīti
analyzed: eva papañca saṅkhā tassāḥ avijjā ādayaḥ kilesāḥ mūlam tam mūlam asmi iti

original: pavattamānañca sabbaṃ mantāya uparundhe. Yā kāci ajjhattaṃ taṇhā uppajjeyyuṃ. Tāsaṃ
analyzed: pavattamānam ca sabbam mantāya uparundhe yā kāci ajjhattam taṇhāḥ uppajjeyyum tāsam

original: vinayāya pahānāya sadā sato sikkhe upaṭṭhitassati hutvā sikkheyyāti.
analyzed: vinayāya pahānāya sadā sataḥ sikkhe upaṭṭhitassati hutvā sikkheyya ati

original: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā vāti citte uppannā vā. Purebhattanti divābhattato purekālaṃ. Accantasaṃyogatthe
analyzed: ajjhatta samuṭṭhānā vā ati citte uppannā vā purebhattanti divābhattataḥ purekālam

original: upayogavacanaṃ, atthato pana bhummameva purebhatteti, esa nayo pacchābhattādīsu.
analyzed: upayoga vacanam atthataḥ pana bhummam eva purebhatta iti esa nayo pacchābhatta ādīsu

original: Pacchābhattanti divābhattato pacchākālaṃ. Purimaṃ yāmanti rattiyā paṭhamakoṭṭhāsaṃ.
analyzed: pacchābhattanti divābhattataḥ pacchākālam purimam yāmanti rattiyā paṭhama koṭṭhāsam

original: Majjhimaṃ yāmanti rattiyā dutiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Pacchimaṃ yāmanti rattiyā tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ.
analyzed: majjhimam yāmanti rattiyā dutiya koṭṭhāsam pacchimam yāmanti rattiyā tatiya koṭṭhāsam

original: Kāḷeti kāḷapakkhe. Juṇheti sukkapakkhe. Vasseti cattāro vassānamāse. Hemanteti cattāro
analyzed: kāḷeti kāḷapakkhe juṇheti sukkapakkhe vasseti cattāraḥ vassānamāse hemanteti cattāraḥ

original: hemantamāse. Gimheti cattāro gimhānamāse. Purime vayokhandheti paṭhame vayokoṭṭhāse,
analyzed: hemanta māse gimha iti cattāraḥ gimhāna māse purime vayaḥ khandha iti paṭhame vayaḥ koṭṭhāse

original: paṭhamavayeti attho. Tīsu ca vayesu vassasatāyukassa purisassa ekekasmiṃ vaye catumāsādhikāni
analyzed: paṭhama vayā iti attho tīsu ca vayesu vassa sata āyukassa purisassa ekekasmin vaye catu māsa adhikāni

original: tettiṃsa vassāni honti.
analyzed: tettiṃsa vassāni honti

original: 152. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya tāva tīhi sikkhāhi yuttaṃ desanaṃ arahattanikūṭena desetvā
analyzed: evam paṭhama gāthāya tāva tīhi sikkhāhi yuttam desanam arahatta nikūṭena desetvā

original: puna mānappahānavasena desetuṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha yaṃ kiñci dhammamabhijaññā
analyzed: puna māna ppahāna vasena desetum yam kiñci iti gātham āha tattha yam kiñci dhammam abhijaññā

original: ajjhattanti yaṃ kiñci uccākulīnatādikaṃ attano guṇaṃ jāneyya. Atha vāpi bahiddhāti
analyzed: ajjhattam ti yam kiñci ucca akulīna tā ādikam attanaḥ guṇam jāneyya atha vā api bahiddhā ti

original: atha vā bahiddhāpi ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā guṇaṃ jāneyya. Na tena thāmaṃ kubbethāti
analyzed: atha vā bahiddhā api ācariya upajjhāyānam vā guṇam jāneyya na tena thāmam kubbetha ati

original: tena guṇena mānaṃ na kareyya.
analyzed: tena guṇena mānam na kareyya

original: Satānanti santaguṇavantānaṃ. Santānanti nibbutasantānaṃ. Na vuttāti na kathitā. Nappavuttāti na vissajjitā.
analyzed: satānam santa guṇavantānam santānam nibbuta santānam na vuttā ati na kathitā na pavuttā ati na vissajjitā

original: 153. Idānissa akaraṇavidhiṃ dassento “seyyo na tenā”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – tena
analyzed: idānissa akaraṇa vidhim dassentaḥ seyyaḥ na tena iti gātham āha tassa atthaḥ tena

original: ca mānena “seyyoha”nti vā “nīcoha”nti vā “sarikkhoha”nti vāpi na maññeyya. Tehi ca
analyzed: ca mānena seyyohanti vā nīcohanti vā sarikkhohanti vā api na maññeyya tehi ca

original: uccākulīnatādīhi guṇehi phuṭṭho anekarūpehi “ahaṃ uccā kulā pabbajito”tiādinā nayena
analyzed: ucca akulīna tā ādīhi guṇehi phuṭṭhaḥ aneka rūpehi aham uccā kulā pabbajitaḥ iti ādinā nayena

original: attānaṃ vikappento na tiṭṭheyyāti.
analyzed: attānam vikappentaḥ na tiṭṭheyya ati

original: 154. Evaṃ mānappahānavasenapi desetvā idāni sabbakilesūpasamavasena desetuṃ “ajjhattamevā”ti
analyzed: evam māna ppahāna vasena api desetvā idāni sabba kilesa upasama vasena desetum ajjhattam eva ati

original: gāthamāha. Tattha ajjhattamevupasameti attani eva rāgādisabbakilese upasameyya. Na
analyzed: gātham āha tattha ajjhattam eva upasameti attani eva rāga ādi sabba kilese upasameyya na

original: aññato bhikkhu santimeseyyāti ṭhapetvā ca satipaṭṭhānādīni aññena upāyena santiṃ
analyzed: aññatas bhikkhu santim eseyya ati ṭhapetvā ca sati paṭṭhāna ādīni aññena upāyena santim

original: na pariyeseyya. Kuto nirattā vāti nirattā kutoyeva.
analyzed: na pariyeseyya kutas nirattā vāti nirattā kutas yā iva

original: Na eseyyāti sīlabbatādīhi na maggeyya. Na gaveseyyāti na olokeyya. Na pariyeseyyāti punappunaṃ na ikkheyya.
analyzed: na eseyya ati sīlabbata ādīhi na maggeyya na gaveseyya ati na olokeyya na pariyeseyya ati punappunam na ikkheyya

original: 155. Idāni ajjhattaṃ upasantassa khīṇāsavassa tādibhāvaṃ dassento “majjhe yathā”ti
analyzed: idāni ajjhattam upasantassa khīṇāsavassa ta ādi bhāvam dassentaḥ majjhe yathā iti

original: gāthamāha. Tassattho – yathā mahāsamuddassa upariheṭṭhimabhāgānaṃ vemajjhasaṅkhāte
analyzed: gātham āha tassa atthaḥ yathā mahā samuddassa upari heṭṭhima bhāgānam vemajjha saṅkhāte

original: catuyojanasahassappamāṇe majjhe pabbatantare ṭhitassa vā majjhe samuddassa ūmi no
analyzed: catu yojana sahassa ppamāṇe majjhe pabbata antare ṭhitassa vā majjhe samuddassa no

original: jāyati, ṭhitova so hoti avikampamāno, evaṃ anejo khīṇāsavo lābhādīsu ṭhito assa avikampamāno,
analyzed: jāyati ṭhitaḥ uva saḥ hoti a vikampamānaḥ evam anejaḥ khīṇa āsavaḥ lābha ādīsu ṭhitaḥ assa a vikampamānaḥ

original: so tādiso rāgādiussadaṃ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñcīti.
analyzed: saḥ tādisaḥ rāga ādi ussadam bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñci iti

original: Ubbedhenāti heṭṭhābhāgena. Gambhīroti udakapiṭṭhito paṭṭhāya caturāsītiyojanasahassāni
analyzed: ubbedhena ati heṭṭhā bhāgena gambhīraḥ ti udaka piṭṭhitaḥ paṭṭhāya caturāsīti yojana sahassāni

original: gambhīro. “Ubbedho”tipi pāṭho, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Heṭṭhāti antoudakaṃ. Uparīti uddhaṃudakaṃ.
analyzed: gambhīraḥ ubbedhaḥ tipi pāṭhaḥ tam na sundaram heṭṭhā ati antar udakam upari iti uddhaṃ udakam

original: Majjheti vemajjhe. Na kampatīti ṭhitaṭṭhānato na calati. Na vikampatīti ito cito
analyzed: majjhe iti vemajjhe na kampati iti ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ na calati na vikampati iti itas citas

original: ca na calati. Na calatīti niccalaṃ hoti. Na vedhatīti na phandati. Nappavedhatīti
analyzed: ca na calati na calati iti niccalam hoti na vedhati iti na phandati na pavedhati iti

original: na parivattati. Na sampavedhatīti na paribbhamati. Aneritoti na erito. Aghaṭṭitoti
analyzed: na parivattati na sampavedhati iti na paribbhamati an eritaḥ uti na eritaḥ a ghaṭṭitaḥ uti

original: akkhobho. Acalitoti na kampito. Aluḷitoti na kalalībhūto. Tatra ūmi no jāyatīti tasmiṃ
analyzed: akkhobhaḥ a calitaḥ iti na kampitaḥ a luḍitaḥ iti na kalalībhūtaḥ tatra ūmi no jāyati iti tasmin

original: ṭhāne vīci na uppajjati.
analyzed: ṭhāne vīci na uppajjati

original: Sattannaṃ pabbatānaṃ antarikāsūti yugandharādīnaṃ sattannaṃ pabbatānaṃ antarantarā.
analyzed: sattannam pabbatānam antarikāsu uti yugandhara ādīnam sattannam pabbatānam antar antarā

original: Sīdantarāti antamaso simbalītūlampi tesu patitapatitaṃ sīdatīti sīdā, pabbatantare
analyzed: sīdantarā ati antamasaḥ simbalī tūlam pi tesu patita patitam sīdati iti sīdā pabbata antare

original: jātattā antarā. “Antarasīdā”tipi pāṭho.
analyzed: antarā antarasīda atipi

original: 156. Idāni evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desitaṃ dhammadesanaṃ abbhānumodento tassa ca arahattassa
analyzed: idāni evam arahatta nikūṭena desitam dhamma desanam tassa ca arahattassa

original: ādipaṭipadaṃ pucchanto nimmitabuddho “akittayī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha akittayīti ācikkhi.
analyzed: ādi paṭipadam pucchantaḥ nimmitabuddhaḥ akittayi iti gātham āha tattha akittayi iti ācikkhi

original: Vivaṭacakkhūti vivaṭehi anāvaraṇehi pañcahi cakkhūhi samannāgato. Sakkhidhammanti
analyzed: vivaṭa cakkhu iti vivaṭehi anāvaraṇehi pañcahi cakkhūhi samannāgato sakkhi dhammanti

original: sakāyattaṃ sayaṃ abhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ. Parissayavinayanti parissayavinayanaṃ.
analyzed: sa kāyattam sayam abhiññātam atta paccakkha dhammam parissaya vinayanti parissaya vinayanam

original: Paṭipadaṃ vadehīti idāni paṭipattiṃ vadehi. Bhaddanteti bhaddaṃ tava atthūti bhagavantaṃ
analyzed: paṭipadam vadehi iti idāni paṭipattim vadehi bhaddanta iti bhaddam tava atthu iti bhagavantam

original: ālapanto āha. Atha vā bhaddaṃ sundaraṃ tava paṭipadaṃ vadehītipi vuttaṃ hoti. Pātimokkhaṃ
analyzed: ālapantaḥ āha atha vā bhaddam sundaram tava paṭipadam vadehi iti pi vuttam hoti pātimokkham

original: atha vāpi samādhinti tameva paṭipadaṃ bhinditvā pucchati. Paṭipadanti etena vā maggaṃ
analyzed: atha vā api tam eva paṭipadam bhinditvā pucchati paṭipadanti etena vā maggam

original: pucchati. Itarehi sīlaṃ samādhiñca pucchati.
analyzed: pucchati itarehi sīlam samādhiñca pucchati

original: Maṃsacakkhunāpīti sasambhārikamaṃsacakkhunāpi. Dibbacakkhunāpīti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ.
analyzed: maṃsa cakkhunā api iti sa sambhārika maṃsa cakkhunā api dibba cakkhunā api iti dibba sadisa ttā dibbam

original: Devānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavinimuttatāya
analyzed: devānam hi su carita kamma nibbattam pitta semha ruhira ādīhi apalibuddham upakkilesa vinimutta tāya

original: dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ
analyzed: dūre pi ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samattham dibbam pasāda cakkhu hoti idam ca api vīriya bhāvanā bala nibbattam

original: ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā, attanā
analyzed: ñāṇa cakkhu tādisam eva ati dibba sadisa ttā dibbam dibba vihāra vasena paṭiladdha ttā attanā

original: ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ. Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbaṃ. Tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena
analyzed: ca dibba vihāra sannissita ttā api dibbam āloka pariggahena mahā jutika ttā api dibbam tirokuṭṭa ādi gata rūpa dassanena

original: mahāgatikattāpi dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena
analyzed: mahāgatika ttā api dibbam tam sabbam sadda sattha anusārena veditabbam dassana ṭṭhena

original: cakkhu, cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhu, dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu.
analyzed: cakkhu cakkhu kicca karaṇena cakkhumiva atipi cakkhu dibbam ca tam cakkhu ca ati dibbacakkhu

original: Tena dibbacakkhunāpi vivaṭacakkhu. Idāni pañcavidhaṃ cakkhuṃ vitthārena kathetuṃ
analyzed: tena dibba cakkhunā api vivaṭa cakkhu idāni pañcavidham cakkhum vitthārena kathetum

original: “kathaṃ bhagavā maṃsacakkhunāpi vivaṭacakkhū”tiādimāha. Maṃsacakkhumhi bhagavato
analyzed: katham bhagavā maṃsacakkhunā api vivaṭa cakkhu iti ādim āha maṃsacakkhumhi bhagavataḥ

original: pañcavaṇṇā saṃvijjantīti ettha sasambhārādikacakkhumhi buddhassa bhagavato pañca
analyzed: pañca vaṇṇā saṃvijjanti iti ettha sa sambhāra ādika cakkhumhi buddhassa bhagavato pañca

original: koṭṭhāsā paccekaṃ paccekaṃ upalabbhanti.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsā paccekam paccekam upalabbhanti

original: Nīlo ca vaṇṇoti umāpupphavaṇṇo. Pītako ca vaṇṇoti kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇo. Lohitako ca
analyzed: nīlo ca vaṇṇoti umā puppha vaṇṇo pītako ca vaṇṇoti kaṇikāra puppha vaṇṇo lohitako ca

original: vaṇṇoti indagopakavaṇṇo. Kaṇho ca vaṇṇoti añjanavaṇṇo. Odāto ca vaṇṇoti osadhitārakavaṇṇo.
analyzed: vaṇṇoti indagopaka vaṇṇo kaṇho ca vaṇṇoti añjana vaṇṇo odāto ca vaṇṇoti osadhi tāraka vaṇṇo

original: Yattha ca akkhilomāni patiṭṭhitānīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne akkhilomāni patiṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhitāni.
analyzed: yattha ca akkhi lomāni patiṭṭhitāni iti yasmin ṭhāne akkhi lomāni patiṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhitāni

original: Taṃ nīlaṃ hoti sunīlanti ettha nīlanti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Sunīlanti antaravirahitaṃ
analyzed: tat nīlam hoti su nīlam ti ettha nīlam ti sabba saṅgāhaka vasena vuttam su nīlam ti antara virahitam

original: suṭṭhu nīlaṃ. Pāsādikanti pasādajanakaṃ. Dassaneyyanti dassanīyaṃ. Umāpupphasamānanti
analyzed: suṭṭhu nīlam pāsādikanti pasāda janakam dassaneyyanti dassanīyam umā puppha samānam

original: dakasītalapupphasadisaṃ. Tassa paratoti tassa samantā bāhirapasse. Pītakanti sabbasaṅgāhakaṃ.
analyzed: daka sītala puppha sadisam tassa paratas ti tassa samantā bāhira passe pītakanti sabba saṅgāhakam

original: Supītakanti antaravirahitaṃ suṭṭhu pītakaṃ. Ubhayato ca akkhikūṭānīti dve ca akkhikoṭiyo.
analyzed: su pītakanti antara virahitam suṭṭhu pītakam ubhayatas ca akkhi kūṭāni iti dve ca akkhi koṭiyo

original: Lohitakānīti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Sulohitakānīti apaññāyamānavivarāni suṭṭhu
analyzed: lohitakāni iti sabba saṅgāhaka vasena vuttam su lohitakāni iti a paññāyamāna vivarāni suṭṭhu

original: lohitakāni. Majjhe kaṇhanti akkhīnaṃ majjhimaṭṭhānaṃ añjanasadisaṃ kaṇhaṃ. Sukaṇhanti
analyzed: lohitakāni majjhe kaṇhanti akkhīnam majjhima ṭṭhānam añjana sadisam kaṇham su kaṇhanti

original: antaravirahitaṃ suṭṭhu kaṇhaṃ. Alūkhanti pāsādikaṃ. Siniddhanti paṇītaṃ. Bhaddāriṭṭhakasamānanti
analyzed: antara virahitam suṭṭhu kaṇham pāsādikam paṇītam

original: apanītatacabhaddāriṭṭhakaphalasadisaṃ. “Addāriṭṭhakasamāna”ntipi pāḷi, tassā tintakākasadisanti
analyzed: apanīta taca bhaddāriṭṭhaka phala sadisam tassā tinta kāka sadisanti

original: attho. Odātanti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Suodātanti antaravirahitaṃ rajatamaṇḍalasadisaṃ
analyzed: attho odātanti sabba saṅgāhaka vasena vuttam su odātanti antara virahitam rajata maṇḍala sadisam

original: suṭṭhu odātaṃ. Setaṃ paṇḍaranti dvīhipi atiodātataṃ dasseti. Pākatikena maṃsacakkhunāti
analyzed: suṭṭhu odātam setam paṇḍaranti ati odātatam dasseti pākatikena maṃsa cakkhunā ati

original: pakatimaṃsacakkhunā. Attabhāvapariyāpannenāti attabhāvasannissitena. Purimasucaritakammābhinibbattenāti
analyzed: pakati maṃsa cakkhunā atta bhāva pariyāpannena ati atta bhāva sannissitena purima su carita kamma abhinibbattena ati

original: purimesu tattha tatthuppannesu attabhāvesu kāyasucaritādikammunā uppāditena. Samantā
analyzed: purimesu tattha tattha uppannesu atta bhāvesu kāya su carita ādi kammunā uppāditena samantā

original: yojanaṃ passatīti samantato catugāvutappamāṇe yojane tirokuṭṭādigataṃ rūpaṃ āvaraṇavirahitaṃ
analyzed: yojanam passati iti samantataḥ yojane tiro kuṭṭa ādi gatam rūpam āvaraṇa virahitam

original: pakatimaṃsacakkhunā dakkhati.
analyzed: pakati maṃsa cakkhunā dakkhati

original: Divā ceva rattiñcāti divasabhāge ca rattibhāge ca. Caturaṅgasamannāgatoti catūhi
analyzed: divā ca iva rattim ca ati divasa bhāge ca ratti bhāge ca catur aṅga samannāgatā iti catūhi

original: aṅgehi samannāgato paripuṇṇaandhakāro ālokavirahito. Sūriyo vā atthaṅgatoti sūrabhāvaṃ
analyzed: aṅgehi samannāgataḥ paripuṇṇa andhakāraḥ āloka virahitaḥ sūriyaḥ vā atthaṅgataḥ ti sūra bhāvam

original: janayanto uṭṭhito sūriyo vigato. Kāḷapakkho ca uposathoti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasīuposathadivaso
analyzed: janayantaḥ uṭṭhitaḥ sūriyaḥ vigataḥ kāḷapakkhaḥ ca uposathaḥ ti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī uposatha divaso

original: ca. Tibbo ca vanasaṇḍoti gahano ca rukkharāsi. Mahā ca kāḷamegho abbhuṭṭhitoti mahanto
analyzed: ca tibbaḥ ca vanasaṇḍo ti gahanaḥ ca rukkha rāsi mahā ca kāḷa meghaḥ abbhuṭṭhito ti mahanto

original: kāḷamegho abbhapaṭalo ca uṭṭhito hoti. Kuṭṭo vāti iṭṭhakācayo vā. Kavāṭaṃ vāti dvāravātapānādikavāṭaṃ
analyzed: kāḷameghaḥ abbha paṭalo ca uṭṭhitaḥ hoti kuṭṭaḥ vāti iṭṭhakā cayaḥ vā kavāṭam vāti dvāra vāta pāna ādi kavāṭam

original: vā. Pākāro vāti mattikādipākāro vā. Pabbato vāti paṃsupabbatādipabbato vā. Gacchaṃ
analyzed: vā pākāraḥ vā ati mattikā ādi pākāraḥ vā pabbataḥ vā ati paṃsu pabbata ādi pabbataḥ vā gacchan

original: vāti taruṇagacchādigacchaṃ vā. Latā vāti karavindādi latā vā. Āvaraṇaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanāyāti

original: rūpārammaṇānaṃ dassanatthāya paṭisedhaṃ natthi. Ekañce tilaphalaṃ nimittaṃ katvāti

original: Anikkhittacchandoti kusalakiriyāya vīriyacchandassa anikkhittabhāvena anikkhittacchando.

original: Appaṭivānīti anivattanaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānanti kusalakaraṇe patiṭṭhābhāvo. Anuyogoti anuyuñjanaṃ. Appamādoti satiyā avippavāso.

original: 161. Tandiṃ māyaṃ hassaṃ khiḍḍanti ālasiyañca māyañca hassañca kāyikaṃ vācasikaṃ khiḍḍañca. Savibhūsanti saddhiṃ vibhūsāya.
