analyzed: puna api pāpassa karaṇato pāpa kiriyā ayam vuccati iti ayam kata paṭicchādana lakkhaṇā

original: māyā nāma vuccati. Yāya samannāgato puggalo bhasmāpaṭicchanno viya aṅgāro, udakapaṭicchanno
analyzed: māyā nāma vuccati yāya samannāgataḥ puggalo bhasma apaṭicchannaḥ viya aṅgāro udaka paṭicchanno

original: viya khāṇu, pilotikāya paliveṭhitaṃ viya ca satthaṃ hoti. Ativelaṃ dantavidaṃsakaṃ
analyzed: viya khāṇu pilotikāya paliveṭhitam viya ca sattham hoti ativelam danta vidaṃsakam

original: hasatīti pamāṇātikkantaṃ dantaṃ vivaritvā paresaṃ dassetvā hāsaṃ somanassaṃ uppādetvā hasati.
analyzed: hasati iti pamāṇa atikkantam dantam vivaritvā paresam dassetvā hāsam somanassam uppādetvā hasati

original: Kāyikā ca khiḍḍāti kāyena pavattā kīḷā. Eseva nayo vācasikāyapi. Hatthīhipi kīḷantīti
analyzed: ca khiḍḍā ati kāyena pavattā kīḷā esā iva nayaḥ hatthīhi pi kīḷanti iti

original: hatthīhi kīḷitatthāya purato dhāvanaādhāvanapiṭṭhanisīdanādikīṭṭhāya kīḷanti. Eseva
analyzed: hatthīhi kīḷita tthāya puratas dhāvana ādhāvana piṭṭha nisīdana ādi kīṭṭhāya kīḷanti esā iva

original: nayo assarathesupi. Aṭṭhapadepi kīḷantīti ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti
analyzed: nayaḥ assa rathesu pi aṭṭhapade pi kīḷanti iti ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assa ati

original: aṭṭhapadaṃ, tasmiṃ aṭṭhapade. Dasapadepi eseva nayo. Ākāsepīti aṭṭhapadadasapadesu
analyzed: aṭṭha padam tasmin aṭṭhapade dasa pade pi esa iva nayo ākāse pi iti aṭṭhapada dasa padesu

original: viya ākāseyeva kīḷanti. Parihārapathepīti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ katvā tattha
analyzed: viyaḥ ākāseya iva kīḷanti parihāra pathe iva iti bhūmiyam nānāpatha maṇḍalam katvā tattha

original: pariharitabbapathaṃ pariharantā kīḷanti. Santikāyapi kīḷantīti santikakīḷāya kīḷanti,
analyzed: pariharitabba patham pariharantā kīḷanti santikāya api kīḷanti iti santika kīḷāya kīḷanti

original: ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā pāsāṇasakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti
analyzed: ekajjham ṭhapitā sāriyaḥ vā pāsāṇa sakkharāyaḥ vā a cālentāḥ nakhena iva apanenti ca upanenti

original: ca. Sace tattha kāci calati, parājayo hotīti.
analyzed: ca sace kāci calati parājayaḥ hoti iti

original: Khalikāyāti jūtaphalake pāsakakīḷāya kīḷanti. Ghaṭikāyāti ghaṭikā vuccati dīghadaṇḍakena
analyzed: khalikāya ati jūta phalake pāsaka kīḷāya kīḷanti ghaṭikāya ati ghaṭikā vuccati dīgha daṇḍakena

original: rassadaṇḍakaṃ paharaṇakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Salākahatthenāti lākhāya vā mañjaṭṭhiyā
analyzed: rassa daṇḍakam paharaṇa kīḷā tāya kīḍanti sa lāka hatthena ati lākhāya vā mañjaṭṭhiyā

original: vā piṭṭhodakena vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā “kiṃ hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ
analyzed: vā piṭṭha udakena vā salākahattham temetvā kim hotu uti bhūmiyam vā bhittiyam vā tam

original: paharitvā hatthiassādirūpāni dassentā kīḷanti. Akkhenāti guḷena. Paṅkacīrenāti paṅkacīraṃ
analyzed: paharitvā hatthi assa ādi rūpāni dassentā kīḷanti akkhena ati guḷena paṅka cīrena ati paṅka cīram

original: vuccati paṇṇanāḷikā, taṃ dhamantā kīḷanti. Vaṅkakenāti gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanakena khuddakanaṅgalena.
analyzed: vuccati paṇṇa nāḷikā tam dhamantā kīḷanti vaṅkakena ati gāma dārakānam kīḷanakena khuddaka naṅgalena

original: Mokkhacikāyāti samparivattakakīḷāya, ākāse vā daṇḍaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā
analyzed: mokkhacikāya ati samparivattaka kīḷāya ākāse vā daṇḍam gahetvā bhūmiyam vā sīsam ṭhapetvā

original: heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattantā kīḷantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ciṅgulakenāti ciṅgulakaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhupariya bhāvena parivattantā kīḷanti iti vuttam hoti ciṅgulakena ati ciṅgulakam

original: vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ, tena kīḷanti. Pattāḷhakenāti
analyzed: vuccati tāla paṇṇa ādīhi katam vāta ppahārena paribbhamana cakkam tena kīḷanti patta āḷhakena ati

original: pattāḷhakaṃ vuccati paṇṇanāḷi, tāya vālikādīni minantā kīḷanti. Rathakenāti khuddakarathena.
analyzed: pattāḷhakam vuccati paṇṇa nāḷi tāya vālikā ādīni minantā kīḷanti rathakena ati khuddaka rathena

original: Dhanukenāti khuddakadhanunā. Akkharikāyāti akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā
analyzed: dhanukena ati khuddaka dhanunā akkharikāya ati akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyam vā

original: akkharajānanakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Manesikāyāti manesikā vuccati manasā cintitajānanakīḷā,
analyzed: akkhara jānana kīḷā tāya kīḷanti manesikāya ati manesikā vuccati manasā cintita jānana kīḷā

original: tāya kīḷanti. Yathāvajjenāti yathāvajjaṃ vuccati kāṇakuṇikhujjādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vajjaṃ,
analyzed: tāya kīḷanti yathāvajjena ati yathāvajjam vuccati kāṇa kuṇi khujja ādīnam yam yam vajjam

original: taṃ taṃ payojetvā dassanakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Mukhabherikanti mukhasaddena bherī viya
analyzed: tam tam payojetvā dassana kīḷā tāya kīḷanti mukhabherikanti mukha saddena bherī viya

original: vādanaṃ. Mukhālambaranti mukhānulittabherisaddakaraṇaṃ. Mukhaḍiṇḍimakanti mukhena
analyzed: vādanam mukha ālambaranti mukha anulitta bheri sadda karaṇam mukha ḍiṇḍimakanti mukhena

original: pahatabherisaddakaraṇaṃ. Mukhavalimakanti oṭṭhamaṃsaṃ jimhaṃ katvā saddakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: pahata bheri sadda karaṇam oṭṭha maṃsam jimham katvā sadda karaṇam

original: “Mukhatalika”ntipi pāṭho, mukhaṃ parivattetvā dhamanaṃ. Mukhabheruḷakanti mukhena
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ mukham dhamanam mukha bheruḷakanti mukhena

original: bherivādanaṃ. Nāṭakanti abhinayaṃ dassetvā uggaṇhāpanaṃ. “Naṭṭaka”ntipi pāṭho. Lāpanti
analyzed: bheri vādanam nāṭakanti abhinayam dassetvā uggaṇhāpanam naṭṭakanti pi pāṭhaḥ lāpanti

original: ukkuṭṭhitakaraṇaṃ. Gītanti gāyanaṃ. Davakammanti hassakīḷākaraṇaṃ. Ayaṃ vācasikā
analyzed: ukkuṭṭhita karaṇam gītanti gāyanam dava kammanti hassa kīḷā karaṇam ayam vācasikā

original: khiḍḍāti ayaṃ kīḷā vācāya jātā vacīdvāre uppannā.
analyzed: ayam kīḍā vācāya jātā vacī dvāre uppannā

original: Kesā ca massu cātiādīsu kesānaṃ kattarikāya ṭhānātirittāni akatvā kattarikāya chedanaṃ
analyzed: kesā ca massu ca ati ādīsu kesānam kattarikāya ṭhāna atirittāni a katvā kattarikāya chedanam

original: ca chavikaraṇavilepanā ca. Gīvādīsu piḷandhanaābharaṇā ca sīse paṭimuñcanapasādhanapiḷandhanā

original: ca sarīranivāsanavicitravatthā ca saṃvelliyabandhanapasādhanañca. “Parāsana”ntipi
analyzed: ca ca ca

original: pāṭho. Sīsaveṭhanapaṭasaṅkhātaveṭhanañca.
analyzed: sīsa veṭhana paṭa saṅkhāta veṭhanam ca

original: Ucchādanādīsu mātukucchito nikkhantadārakānaṃ sarīragandho dvādasamattavassakāle
analyzed: ucchādana ādīsu mātukucchitaḥ nikkhanta dārakānam sarīra gandhaḥ dvādasa matta vassa kāle

original: na vaṭṭati. Puññavante pana dārake ūrūsu nipajjāpetvā telena makkhetvā hatthapādaūrunābhiādīnaṃ
analyzed: na vaṭṭati puññavante pana dārake ūrūsu nipajjāpetvā telena makkhetvā hattha pāda ūru nābhi ādīnam

original: saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ parimaddanti, evarūpaṃ parimaddanaṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: saṇṭhāna sampādana attham parimaddanti evarūpam parimaddanam na vaṭṭati

original: Nhāpananti tesaṃyeva dārakānaṃ gandhādīhi nhāpanaṃ. Sambāhananti mahāmallānaṃ viya
analyzed: tesam yeva dārakānam gandha ādīhi nhāpanam sambāhananti mahā mallānam viya

original: hatthapāde muggarādīhi paharitvā bāhuvaḍḍhanaṃ. Ādāsanti yaṃkiñci ādāsaṃ pariharituṃ
analyzed: hattha pāde muggara ādīhi paharitvā bāhu vaḍḍhanam ādāsanti yaṃkiñci ādāsam pariharitum

original: na vaṭṭati. Añjanaṃ alaṅkārañjanameva. Mālāti baddhamālā vā abaddhamālā vā. Vilepananti
analyzed: na vaṭṭati añjanam alaṅkāra añjanam eva baddha mālā vā a baddha mālā vā

original: yaṃkiñci chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Mukhacuṇṇakaṃ mukhalepananti mukhe kāḷapīḷakādīnaṃ haraṇatthāya
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci chavi rāga karaṇam mukha cuṇṇakam mukha lepanam mukhe kāḷapīḷaka ādīnam haraṇa tthāya

analyzed: mattikā kakkam denti tena lohite calite sāsapa kakkam denti tena dose khādite tila kakkam

original: denti, tena lohite sannisinne haliddikakkaṃ denti, tena chavivaṇṇe ārūḷhe mukhacuṇṇakena
analyzed: denti tena lohite sannisinne haliddikakkam denti tena chavi vaṇṇe ārūḍhe mukha cuṇṇakena

analyzed: mukham cuṇṇenti tat sabbam na vaṭṭati

original: Hatthabandhādīsu hatthe vicitrasaṅkhakapālādīni bandhitvā vicaranti, taṃ vā aññaṃ
analyzed: hattha bandha ādīsu hatthe vicitra saṅkha kapāla ādīni bandhitvā vicaranti tam vai aññam

original: vā sabbampi hatthābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. Apare sikhaṃ bandhitvā vicaranti, suvaṇṇacīrakamuttāvaḷiādīhi

original: ca taṃ parikkhipanti, taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Apare catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana
analyzed: ca tam parikkhipanti tam sabbam na vaṭṭati apare catu hattha daṇḍam vā aññam vā pana

analyzed: makara dantaka ādi vicittam chattam suvaṇṇa rajata ādi vicitrā mora piñcha ādi parikkhittā upāhanā

original: keci ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthataṃ kesantaparicchedaṃ dassetvā meghamukhe
analyzed: keci ratana matta āyāmam catur aṅgula vitthatam kesanta paricchedam dassetvā megha mukhe

original: vijjulataṃ viya nalāṭe uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ bandhitvā cūḷāmaṇiṃ dhārenti, cāmaravālabījaniṃ
analyzed: vijju latam nalāṭe uṇhīsa paṭṭam bandhitvā cūḷāmaṇim dhārenti

original: dhārenti, taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: dhārenti tam sabbam na vaṭṭati

original: Imassa vā pūtikāyassāti imassa cātumahābhūtamayassa kuṇapasarīrassa. Keḷanāti kīḷāpanā.
analyzed: imassa vā pūti kāyassa ati imassa cātumahābhūta mayassa kuṇapa sarīrassa keḷanā ati kīḷāpanā

original: Parikeḷanāti sabbato bhāgena kīḷāpanā. Gedhitatāti abhikaṅkhitatā. Gedhitattanti
analyzed: parikeḷanā ati sabbatas bhāgena kīḷāpanā gedhita tā ati abhikaṅkhita tā gedhita tanti

original: giddhabhāvo abhikaṅkhitabhāvo. Capalatāti alaṅkārakaraṇaṃ. Cāpalyanti capalabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: alaṅkāra karaṇam cāpalyanti capala bhāvam

original: Savibhūsantiādīsu vibhūsāya saha savibhūsaṃ. Chavirāgakaraṇasaṅkhātena parivārena saha saparivāraṃ. Paribhaṇḍena saha saparibhaṇḍaṃ. Parikkhārena saha saparikkhāraṃ.
analyzed: sa vibhūsanti ādīsu vibhūsāya saha sa vibhūsam chavi rāga karaṇa saṅkhātena parivārena saha sa parivāram paribhaṇḍena saha sa paribhaṇḍam parikkhārena saha sa parikkhāram

original: 162. Āthabbaṇanti āthabbaṇikamantappayogaṃ. Supinanti supinasatthaṃ. Lakkhaṇanti maṇilakkhaṇādiṃ. No vidaheti nappayojeyya. Virutañcāti migādīnaṃ vaṭṭetvā vassitaṃ.
analyzed: āthabbaṇam iti āthabbaṇika manta ppayogam supinam iti supina sattham lakkhaṇam iti maṇi lakkhaṇa ādim no vidaha iti na payojeyya virutam ca ati miga ādīnam vaṭṭetvā vassitam

original: Āthabbaṇikāti parūpaghātamantajānanakā. Āthabbaṇaṃ payojentīti āthabbaṇikā kira sattāhaṃ
analyzed: āthabbaṇikā ati para upaghāta manta jānanakāḥ āthabbaṇam payojenti iti āthabbaṇikā kira sattāham

original: aloṇakaṃ bhuñjitvā dabbe attharitvā pathaviyaṃ sayamānā tapaṃ caritvā sattame divase
analyzed: a loṇakam bhuñjitvā dabbe attharitvā pathaviyam sayamānā tapam caritvā sattame divase

original: susānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā sattame pade ṭhatvā hatthaṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjaṃ
analyzed: su sāna bhūmim sajjetvā sattame pade ṭhatvā hattham vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjam

original: parijappanti, atha tesaṃ kammaṃ samijjhati. Evarūpaṃ sandhāya “āthabbaṇaṃ payojentī”ti
analyzed: parijappanti atha tesam kammam samijjhati evarūpam sandhāya āthabbaṇam payojenti iti

original: āha. Tattha payojentīti yuttappayuttā honti. Nagare vā ruddheti nagare samantato
analyzed: āha tattha payojenti iti yutta ppayuttāḥ honti nagare vā ruddhā iti nagare samantataḥ

original: rundhitvā āvaritvā gahite. Saṅgāme vā paccupaṭṭhiteti raṇe upagantvā ṭhite. Paccatthikesu
analyzed: rundhitvā āvaritvā gahite saṅgāme vā paccupaṭṭhitā iti raṇe upagantvā ṭhite paccatthikesu

original: paccāmittesūti paṭāṇībhūtesu verīsu. Ītiṃ uppādentīti sarīracalanaṃ kampanaṃ, tassa
analyzed: pacca amittesu iti paṭāṇībhūtesu verīsu ītim uppādenti iti sarīra calanam kampanam tassa

original: uppādanaṃ karonti. Upaddavanti kāyapīḷanaṃ karonti. Roganti byādhiṃ. Pajjarakanti
analyzed: uppādanam karonti upaddavanti kāya pīḷanam karonti roganti byādhim pajjarakanti

original: jaraṃ. Sūlanti uddhumātakaṃ. Visūcikanti vijjhanaṃ. Pakkhandikanti lohitapakkhandikaṃ.
analyzed: jaram sūlanti uddhumātakam visūcikanti vijjhanam pakkhandikanti lohitapakkhandikam

original: Karontīti uppādenti.
analyzed: karonti iti uppādenti

original: Supinapāṭhakāti supinabyākaraṇakā. Ādisantīti byākaronti. Yo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ supinaṃ
analyzed: supina pāṭhakāḥ ati supina byākaraṇakāḥ ādisanti iti byākaronti yaḥ pubbaṇha samayam supinam

original: passatītiādīsu accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, pubbaṇhasamayeti attho. Evaṃ vipāko
analyzed: passati iti ādīsu accanta saṃyoge upayoga vacanam pubbaṇha samaya iti atthaḥ evam vipākaḥ

original: hotīti iṭṭhāniṭṭhavasena evarūpo vipāko hoti. Avakujja nipannoti adhomukho hutvā
analyzed: hoti iti iṭṭha aniṭṭha vasena evarūpaḥ vipākaḥ hoti avakujja nipanno ti adhomukhaḥ hutvā

original: nipanno passati. Evaṃ supinapāṭhakā supinaṃ ādisanti.
analyzed: nipanno passati evam supina pāṭhakā supinam ādisanti

original: Tañca pana supinaṃ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato
analyzed: tat ca pana supinam passantaḥ catūhi kāraṇehi passati dhātu kkhobhataḥ vā anubhūta pubbataḥ

original: vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti. Tattha pittādīnaṃ khobhakaraṇapaccayayogena
analyzed: vā devatā upasaṃhārataḥ vā pubba nimittataḥ vā ati tattha pitta ādīnam khobha karaṇa paccaya yogena

original: khubhitadhātuko dhātukkhobhato supinaṃ passati, passanto ca nānāvidhaṃ supinaṃ passati.
analyzed: khubhita dhātukaḥ dhātu khobhataḥ supinam passati passantaḥ ca nānāvidham supinam passati

original: Anubhūtapubbato passanto pubbe anubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ passati. Devatopasaṃhārato
analyzed: anubhūta pubbataḥ passantaḥ pubbe anubhūta pubbam ārammaṇam passati devatā upasaṃhārato

original: passanto devatānaṃ ānubhāvena ārammaṇāni passati. Pubbanimittato passanto puññāpuññavasena
analyzed: passantaḥ devatānaṃ ānubhāvena ārammaṇāni passati pubba nimittato passantaḥ puñña apuñña vasena

original: uppajjitukāmassa atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṃ supinaṃ passati. Tattha

original: catunnaṃ mūlakāraṇānaṃ saṃsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva. Tañca panetaṃ catubbidhaṃ

170. Pannarasame attadaṇḍasuttaniddese attadaṇḍā bhayaṃ jātanti paṭhamagāthāya attho
analyzed: pannarasame attadaṇḍa sutta niddese attadaṇḍāḥ bhayam jātanti paṭhama gāthāya attho

original: – yaṃ lokassa diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vā samparāyikaṃ vā bhayaṃ jātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ attadaṇḍā
analyzed: yam lokassa diṭṭhadhammikam vā samparāyikam vā bhayam jātam tam sabbam atta daṇḍā

original: bhayaṃ jātaṃ attano duccaritakāraṇā jātaṃ, evaṃ santepi janaṃ passatha medhagaṃ,
analyzed: bhayam jātam attanaḥ duccarita kāraṇā jātam evam sante pi janam passatha medha gam

original: imaṃ sākiyādijanaṃ passatha aññamaññaṃ medhagaṃ hiṃsakaṃ bādhakanti. Evaṃ taṃ paṭiviruddhaṃ
analyzed: imam sākiya ādi janam passatha aññam aññam medha gam hiṃsakam bādhakam ti evam tam paṭiviruddham

original: vippaṭipannaṃ janaṃ paribhāsitvā attano sammā paṭipattidassanena tassa saṃvegaṃ janetuṃ
analyzed: vippaṭipannam janam paribhāsitvā attano sammā paṭipatti dassanena tassa saṃvegam janetuṃ

original: āha “saṃvegaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā saṃvijitaṃ mayā”ti. Pubbe bodhisatteneva satāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: āha saṃvegam kittayissāmi yathā saṃvijitam mayā ati pubbe bodhisattena iva satā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Tayoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Daṇḍāti duccaritā. Kāyadaṇḍoti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Vacīdaṇḍādīsupi
analyzed: tayā iti gaṇana paricchedaḥ daṇḍā ati duccaritā kāya daṇḍā iti kāya duccaritam vacī daṇḍa ādī supi

original: eseva nayo. Tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritanti pāṇātipātādikāyato pavattaṃ duṭṭhuṃ caritaṃ,
analyzed: tividham kāya duccaritanti pāṇa atipāta ādi kāyato pavattam caritam

original: kilesapūtikattā vā duṭṭhu caritanti laddhanāmaṃ tividhaṃ duccaritaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ.
analyzed: vā duṭṭhu caritanti laddha nāmam tividham duccaritam kāya duccaritam

original: Catubbidhanti musāvādādicatubbidhaṃ. Tividhanti abhijjhāditividhaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammikanti
analyzed: catubbidhanti musāvāda ādi catubbidham tividhanti abhijjha ādi tividham diṭṭhadhammikam ti

original: diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve paṭisaṃvedanīyaṃ. Samparāyikanti anāgate attabhāve
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme imasmiṃ yeva atta bhāve paṭisaṃvedanīyam samparāyikanti anāgate atta bhāve

original: paṭisaṃvedanīyaṃ. Āgucārīti pāpakārī aparādhakārī. Tamenaṃ rājā paribhāsatīti pāpakāriṃ
analyzed: paṭisaṃvedanīyam āgu cārī iti pāpa kārī aparādha kārī tam enam rājā paribhāsati iti pāpa kārim

original: rājā paribhāsati, bhayaṃ uppādeti. Dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: rājā paribhāsati bhayam uppādeti dukkham domanassam paṭisaṃvedeti iti kāyikam dukkham

original: cetasikaṃ domanassaṃ vindati. Etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassanti evarūpaṃ bhayañca
analyzed: cetasikam domanassam vindati etam bhayam dukkham domanassanti evarūpam bhayam ca

original: dukkhañca domanassañca. Kuto tassāti tassa corassa kuto uppannaṃ. Attadaṇḍato jātanti
analyzed: dukkham ca domanassam ca kutas tassa ati tassa corassa kutas uppannam atta daṇḍataḥ jātanti

original: attanā kataduccaritato uppannaṃ.
analyzed: attanā kata duccaritataḥ uppannam

original: Antamasoti heṭṭhimato. Savacanīyampi karoti “na te labbhā ito pakkamitu”nti ito imamhā
analyzed: antamasaḥ ti heṭṭhimataḥ savacanīyam pi karoti na te labbhā itas pakkamitum ti itas imamhā

original: gāmādinā gantuṃ na labbhā. Na sakkā bahi nikkhamitunti palibodhaṃ saṅgaṃ karoti.
analyzed: gāma ādinā gantum na labbhā na sakkā bahi nikkhamitunti palibodham saṅgam karoti

original: Dhanajānipaccayāpīti dhanaparihānikāraṇāpi. Rājā tassa vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti.
analyzed: dhana jāni paccayā api iti dhana parihāni kāraṇā api rājā tassa vividhā kamma kāraṇā kārāpeti

original: Kasāhipi tāḷetīti kasādaṇḍakehi potheti. Vettehipi tāḷetīti sakaṇṭakavettalatāhi
analyzed: tāḷeti iti kasā daṇḍakehi vettehi pi tāḷeti iti sa kaṇṭaka vetta latāhi

original: potheti. Aḍḍhadaṇḍakehītiādayo heṭṭhā vuttanayāyeva. Sunakhehipi khādāpetīti katipayāni
analyzed: potha iti aḍḍhadaṇḍakehi iti ādayaḥ heṭṭhā vutta nayāya iva su nakhehi pi khādāpeti iti katipayāni

original: divasāni āhāre adatvā chātasunakhehi khādāpeti. Te muhuttena aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikameva
analyzed: divasāni āhāre a datvā chāta sunakhehi khādāpeti te muhuttena aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam eva

original: karoti. Sūle uttāsetīti sūlaṃ āropeti. Rājā imesaṃ catunnaṃ daṇḍānaṃ issaroti imāsaṃ
analyzed: karoti sūle uttāseti iti sūlam āropeti rājā imesam catunnam daṇḍānam issaroti imāsam

original: catunnaṃ āṇānaṃ kātuṃ rājā samattho.
analyzed: catunnam āṇānam kātum rājā samatthaḥ

original: Sakena kammenāti sayaṃkatena kammena. Tamenaṃ nirayapālāti ettha ekacce therā “nirayapālā
analyzed: sakena kammena ati sayaṃkatena kammena tam enam niraya pālā ati ettha ekacce therāḥ niraya pālā

original: nāma natthi, yantarūpaṃ viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ taṃ “atthi
analyzed: nāma natthi viya kammam eva kāraṇam kāreti iti vadanti tesam tam atthi

original: nirayesu nirayapālāti, āmantā. Atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva.
analyzed: nirayesu niraya pālā ati āmantā atthi ca kāraṇikā ati ādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitam eva

original: Yathā hi manussaloke kammakāraṇakārakā atthi, evameva nirayesu nirayapālā atthīti.
analyzed: yathā hi manussa loke kamma kāraṇa kārakā atthi evam eva nirayesu niraya pālā atthi iti

original: Tattaṃ ayokhilanti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā
analyzed: tat tam tigāvutam atta bhāvam sampajjalitāya loha pathaviyāḥ uttānakam

original: dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti, tathā vāmahatthādīsu. Yathā ca uttānakaṃ
analyzed: dakkhiṇa hatthe tāla ppamāṇam aya sūlam pavesenti tathā vāma hattha ādīsu yathā ca uttānakam

original: nipajjāpetvā evaṃ urenapi vāmapassenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi nipajjāpetvā taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva.
analyzed: nipajjāpetvā evam urena api vāma passena api dakkhiṇa passena api nipajjāpetvā tam kamma kāraṇam karontiyā iva

original: Saṃvesetvāti jalitāya lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ nipajjāpetvā. Kuṭhārīhīti
analyzed: saṃvesetvā ati jalitāya loha pathaviyā tigāvutam atta bhāvam nipajjāpetvā kuṭhārīhi iti

original: mahatīhi gehacchādanassa ekapakkhamattāhi kuṭhārīhi tacchenti, lohitaṃ nadī hutvā
analyzed: mahatīhi geha chādanassa eka pakkha mattāhi kuṭhārīhi tat chenti lohitam nadī hutvā

original: sandati, lohapathavito jālā uṭṭhahitvā tacchitaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti, mahādukkhaṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: sandati loha pathavitaḥ jālā uṭṭhahitvā tad chita ṭṭhānam gaṇhāti mahā dukkham uppajjati

original: tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dāru viya aṭṭhaṃsampi chaḷaṃsampi karonti. Vāsīhīti
analyzed: tad śantā pana sutta āhatam karitvā dāru viya aṭṭhaṃsam pi chaḍaṃsam pi karonti vāsīhi iti

original: mahāsuppapamāṇāhi vāsīhi. Rathe yojetvāti saddhiṃ yugayottaupakkharacakkakubbarapājanehi
analyzed: mahā suppa pamāṇāhi vāsīhi rathe yojetvā ati saddhim

original: sabbato pajjalite rathe yojetvā. Mahantanti mahākūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ. Āropentīti sampajjalitehi
analyzed: sabbatas pajjalite rathe yojetvā mahantanti mahā kūṭāgāra ppamāṇam āropenti iti sampajjalitehi

original: ayamuggarehi pothentā āropenti. Sakimpi uddhanti supakkutthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulaṃ
analyzed: ayam uggarehi pothentāḥ āropenti su pakka utthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhitta taṇḍulam

original: viya uddhaṃ adho tiriyañca gacchati. Mahānirayeti avīcimahānirayamhi.
analyzed: viyat uddham adhas tiriyan ca gacchati mahāniraya iti avīci mahānirayamhi

original: Catukkaṇṇoti caturassamañjūsāsadiso. Vibhattoti catudvāravasena vibhatto. Bhāgaso
analyzed: catukkaṇṇo ti catu rassa mañjūsā sadisaḥ vibhatto ti catu dvāra vasena vibhattaḥ bhāgaso

original: mitoti dvāravīthīnaṃ vasena bhāge ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā vibhatto. Pariyantoti parikkhitto.
analyzed: mitaḥ iti dvāra vīthīnam vasena bhāge ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā vibhattaḥ pariyantaḥ ti parikkhittaḥ

original: Ayasāti upari navayojanikena ayapattena chādito. Samantā yojanasataṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhatīti
analyzed: ayasā ti upari nava yojanikena aya pattena chāditaḥ samantā yojana satam pharitvā tiṭṭhati iti

original: evaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, yathā samantā yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā
analyzed: evam pharitvā tiṭṭhati yathā samantā yojana sate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā

original: viya nikkhamanti. Kadariyātapanāti sabbepi te ussadehi saddhiṃ aṭṭha mahānirayā kadariyā
analyzed: viya nikkhamanti kadariya ātapanā ati sabbe pi te ussadehi saddhim aṭṭha mahānirayā kadariyā

original: niccaṃ tapantīti kadariyātapanā. Balavadukkhatāya ghorā. Kappaṭṭhikānaṃ accīnaṃ atthitāya
analyzed: niccam tapanti iti kadariya ātapanā balava dukkha tāya ghorā kappaṭṭhikānam accīnam atthi tāya

original: accimanto. Āsādetuṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ dukkaratāya durāsadā. Diṭṭhamattā vā sutamattā vā lomāni
analyzed: accimantaḥ āsādetum ghaṭṭetum dukkara tāya durāsadāḥ diṭṭha mattāḥ vā suta mattāḥ vā lomāni

original: haṃsentīti lomahaṃsanarūpā. Bhīsanatāya bhismā. Bhayajananatāya paṭibhayā. Sukhābhāvena dukhā.
analyzed: haṃsentī iti lomahaṃsana rūpā bhīsa natāya bhismā bhaya janana tāya paṭibhayā sukha abhāvena dukhā

original: Puratthimāya bhittiyātiādigāthānaṃ evaṃ avīcinirayoti pariyantaṃ katvā ayaṃ saṅkhepattho
analyzed: puratthimāya bhittiyā iti ādi gāthānam evam avīci nirayaḥ iti pariyantam katvā ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ

original: – aggijālānaṃ vā pana sattānaṃ vā tesaṃ dukkhassa vā vīci antaraṃ natthi etthāti
analyzed: aggi jālānam vā pana sattānam vā tesam dukkhassa vā vīci antaram natthi ettha ati

original: avīci. Tatra hi puratthimādīhi bhittīhi jālārāsi uṭṭhahitvā pāpakammino puggale jhāpento
analyzed: tatra hi puratthima ādīhi bhittīhi jālārāsi uṭṭhahitvā pāpa kammino puggale jhāpento

original: pacchimādīsu bhittīsu paṭihaññati paharati, tā ca bhittiyo vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ
analyzed: pacchima ādīsu bhittīsu paṭihaññati paharati tāḥ ca bhittiyaḥ vinivijjhitvā paratas yojana satam

original: gaṇhāti, heṭṭhā uṭṭhitā upari paṭihaññati, upari uṭṭhitā heṭṭhā paṭihaññati. Evaṃ
analyzed: gaṇhāti heṭṭhā uṭṭhitā upari paṭihaññati upari uṭṭhitā heṭṭhā paṭihaññati evam

original: tāvettha jālānaṃ vīci nāma natthi. Tassa pana anto yojanasataṭṭhānaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhassa
analyzed: tāva ettha jālānam vīci nāma natthi tassa pana antar yojana sata ṭṭhānam khīra valli piṭṭhassa

original: pūritanāḷi viya sattehi nirantaraṃ pūritaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi paccantānaṃ sattānaṃ
analyzed: pūrita nāḷi viya sattehi nirantaram pūritam catūhi iriyāpathehi paccantānam sattānam

original: pamāṇaṃ natthi, na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhenti, sakasakaṭṭhāneyeva paccanti. Evamettha
analyzed: pamāṇam natthi na ca aññam aññam byābādhenti saka saka ṭṭhāneya iva paccanti evam ettha

original: sattānaṃ vīci nāma natthi. Yathā pana jivhagge cha madhubindūni sattamassa tambalohabinduno
analyzed: sattānam nāma natthi yathā pana jivhagge cha madhu bindūni sattamassa tamba loha binduno

original: anudahanabalavatāya abbohārikāni honti, tathā tattha anudahanabalavatāya sesā cha
analyzed: anudahana balavatāya abbohārikāni honti tathā tattha anudahana balavatāya sesā cha

original: akusalavipākupekkhā abbohārikā honti, dukkhameva nirantaraṃ paññāyati. Evamettha
analyzed: akusala vipāka upekkhāḥ abbohārikāḥ honti dukkham eva nirantaram paññāyati evam ettha

original: dukkhassa vīci nāma natthi. Nirassādaṭṭhena nirayo.
analyzed: dukkhassa vīci nāma natthi nirassāda ṭṭhena nirayaḥ

original: Tattha sattā mahāluddāti tasmiṃ nibbattā sattā mahantā luddā. Mahākibbisakārinoti
analyzed: tattha sattāḥ mahā luddā ti tasmin nibbattā sattāḥ mahantāḥ luddāḥ mahā kibbisa kārino ti

original: mahantadāruṇakammakārino. Accantapāpakammantāti ekaṃsena pāpakammino. Paccanti na
analyzed: mahanta dāruṇa kamma kārinaḥ accanta pāpa kammantā ati ekaṃsena pāpa kammino paccanti na

original: ca miyyareti channaṃ jālānamantare paccanti, na ca miyyanti. Jātavedasamo kāyoti
analyzed: ca channam jālānam antare na ca jātavedasamaḥ

original: tesaṃ sarīraṃ aggisadisaṃ. Tesaṃ nirayavāsinanti tesaṃ pāpakammānaṃ nirayavāsīnaṃ.
analyzed: tesam sarīram aggi sadisam tesam niraya vāsinaṃ ti tesam pāpa kammānam niraya vāsīnam

original: Passa kammānaṃ daḷhattanti pāpakammānaṃ thirabhāvaṃ olokehi. Na bhasmā hoti napī
analyzed: passa kammānam daḷha ttanti pāpa kammānam thira bhāvam olokehi na hoti

original: masīti chārikāpi na hoti aṅgāropi. Puratthimenāti yadā taṃ dvāraṃ apārutaṃ hoti,
analyzed: masī iti chārikā api na hoti aṅgāraḥ api puratthimena ati yadā tam dvāram a pārutam hoti

original: atha tadabhimukhā dhāvanti, tesaṃ tattha chaviādīni jhāyanti. Dvārasamīpaṃ pattānañca
analyzed: atha tad abhimukhāḥ dhāvanti tesam tattha chavi ādīni jhāyanti dvāra samīpam pattānam ca

original: tesaṃ taṃ pīdhīyati, pacchimaṃ apārutaṃ viya khāyati. Esa nayo sabbattha. Abhinikkhamitāsā
analyzed: tesam tam pīdhīyati pacchimam a pārutam viya khāyati esa nayo sabbattha

original: teti nirayā nikkhamituṃ āsā etesanti nikkhamitāsā. Mokkhagavesinoti muñcanupāyaṃ
analyzed: te iti nirayāḥ nikkhamitum āsāḥ nikkhamita asāḥ mokkha gavesino ti muñcan upāyam

original: esantā gavesantāpi. Na te tato nikkhamituṃ, labhanti kammapaccayāti te sattā nirayato
analyzed: esantā gavesantā api na te tatas nikkhamitum labhanti kamma paccayā ati te sattāḥ nirayataḥ

original: nikkhamanadvāraṃ pāpakammapaccayā nādhigacchanti. Tesañca pāpakammantaṃ, avipakkaṃ
analyzed: nikkhamana dvāram pāpa kamma paccayāḥ na adhigacchanti tesam ca pāpa kammantam avipakkam

original: kataṃ bahunti tesañca sattānaṃ lāmakaṃ dāruṇakammaṃ avipākaṃ bahuvidhaṃ nānappakāraṃ
analyzed: katam bahunti tesam ca sattānam lāmakam dāruṇa kammam avipākam bahuvidham nānappakāram

original: adinnavipākaṃ kataṃ upacitaṃ atthi.
analyzed: adinna vipākam katam upacitam atthi

original: Saṃveganti vinilanaṃ. Ubbeganti ṭhitaṭṭhānato gamanaṃ. Utrāsanti ubbejanaṃ asanniṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vinilanam ubbeganti ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ gamanam utrāsanti ubbejanam a sanniṭṭhānam

original: Bhayanti cittutrāsanaṃ. Pīḷananti ghaṭṭanaṃ. Ghaṭṭananti pīḷākaraṇaṃ. Upaddavanti
analyzed: bhayanti cittu trāsanam pīḍananti ghaṭṭanam ghaṭṭananti pīḷā karaṇam upaddavanti

original: ītiṃ. Upasagganti rundhanaṃ.
analyzed: ītim upasagganti rundhanam

original: 171. Idāni yathānena saṃvijitaṃ, taṃ pakāraṃ dassento “phandamāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: idāni yathā anena saṃvijitam tam pakāram dassentaḥ phandamāna nti ādim āha tattha

original: phandamānanti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi kampamānaṃ. Appodaketi appe udake. Aññamaññehi byāruddhe
analyzed: phandamānam ti taṇhā diṭṭhīhi kampamānam appa udaka iti appe udake aññamaññehi byāruddhe

original: disvāti nānāsatte ca aññamaññehi saddhiṃ viruddhe disvā. Maṃ bhayamāvisīti maṃ bhayaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: disvā iti nānāsatte ca aññamaññehi saddhim viruddhe disvā mam bhayam āvisi iti mam bhayam paviṭṭham

original: Kilesaphandanāya phandamānanti rāgādikilesacalanāya calamānaṃ. Payogoti kāyavacīmanopayogo.
analyzed: kilesa phandanāya rāga ādi kilesa calanāya calamānam kāya vacī manaḥ upayogaḥ

original: Viruddhāti virodhamāpannā. Paṭiviruddhāti paṭimukhaṃ hutvā virodhamāpannā, suṭṭhu
analyzed: viruddhā ati virodham āpannā paṭiviruddhā ati paṭimukham hutvā virodham āpannā suṭṭhu

original: viruddhā vā. Āhatāti kodhena āhatā pahatā. Paccāhatāti paṭimallā hutvā āhatā. Āghātitāti
analyzed: viruddhā vā āhatā ati kodhena āhatā pahatā paccāhatā ati paṭimallāḥ hutvā āhatāḥ āghātitā ati

original: ghaṭṭitā. Paccāghātitāti visesena ghaṭṭitā. Pāṇīhipi upakkamantīti hatthehipi paharanti.
analyzed: ghaṭṭitā paccāghātitā ati visesena ghaṭṭitā pāṇīhi pi upakkamanti iti hatthehi pi paharanti

original: 172. Samantamasāro lokoti nirayaṃ ādiṃ katvā samantato loko asāro niccasārādirahito.
analyzed: samantam asāraḥ nirayam ādim katvā samantataḥ lokaḥ asāraḥ nicca sāra ādi rahitaḥ

original: Disā sabbā sameritāti sabbā disā aniccatāya kampitā. Icchaṃ bhavanamattanoti attano
analyzed: disā sabbā sameritā ati sabbāḥ disāḥ anicca tāya kampitāḥ iccham bhavanam attanoti attano

original: tāṇaṃ icchanto. Nāddasāsiṃ anositanti kiñci ṭhānaṃ jarādīhi anajjhāvuṭṭhaṃ nāddakkhinti.
analyzed: tāṇam icchantaḥ kiñci ṭhānam jarā ādīhi an ajjhāvuṭṭham

original: Asāroti na sāro, sāravirahito vā. Nissāroti sabbena sabbaṃ sāravirahito. Sārāpagatoti
analyzed: asāraḥ ti na sāraḥ sāra virahitaḥ vā nissāraḥ ti sabbena sabbam sāra virahito sāra apagato ti

original: sārato apagato. Niccasārasārena vāti satatasārasaṅkhātena sārena vā. Uparipadadvayepi
analyzed: sārataḥ apagataḥ nicca sāra sārena vāti satata sāra saṅkhātena sārena vā upari pada dvaye pi

original: eseva nayo. Ye puratthimāya disāya saṅkhārāti ye puratthimāya disāya paccayehi saṅgamma
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ye puratthimāya disāya saṅkhārā ati ye puratthimāya disāya paccayehi saṅgamma

original: samāgamma katā saṅkhārā. Tepi eritāti tepi saṅkhārā kampitā. Sameritāti sammā kampitā.
analyzed: samāgamma katā saṅkhārā tepi eritā ati tepi saṅkhārā kampitā sameritā ati sammā kampitā

original: Calitāti calanaṃ gatā. Ghaṭṭitāti udayabbayena pīḷitā. Aniccatāyāti hutvā abhāvatāya.
analyzed: calitā ati calanam gatā ghaṭṭitā ati udaya bbayena pīḍitā anicca tāya ati hutvā abhāva tāya

original: Jātiyā anugatāti nibbattiyā anupaviṭṭhā. Jarāya anusaṭāti paripakkatāya anupatthaṭā.
analyzed: jātiyā anugatā ati nibbattiyā anupaviṭṭhā jarāya anusaṭā ati paripakka tāya anupatthaṭā

original: Byādhinā abhibhūtāti cātuvisamena uppannabyādhinā ajjhotthaṭā. Maraṇena abbhāhatāti
analyzed: byādhinā abhibhūtā ati cātuvisamena uppanna byādhinā ajjhotthaṭā maraṇena abbhāhatā ati

original: maccunā abhiāhatā pahatā. Atāṇāti rakkhavirahitā. Aleṇāti leṇavirahitā. Asaraṇāti
analyzed: maccunā abhiāhatā pahatā a tāṇā ati rakkha virahitā a leṇā ati leṇa virahitā a saraṇā ati

original: natthi etesaṃ saraṇanti asaraṇā. Asaraṇībhūtāti sayaṃ saraṇakiccaṃ na karontīti asaraṇībhūtā.
analyzed: natthi etesam saraṇanti asaraṇā asaraṇībhūtā ati sayam saraṇa kiccam na karonti iti asaraṇībhūtā

original: Attano bhavananti niddesapadassa uddesapadaṃ. Tāṇanti pālanaṃ. Leṇanti leṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: attanaḥ bhavananti niddesa padassa uddesa padam tāṇanti pālanam leṇanti leṇa ṭṭhānam

original: Saraṇanti dukkhanāsanaṃ. Gatinti patiṭṭhaṃ. Parāyananti paraṃ ayanaṃ. Ajjhositaṃyeva
analyzed: saraṇam ti dukkha nāsanam gatinti patiṭṭham parāyanam ti param ayanam ajjhositam yeva

original: addasanti jarādīhi madditaṃyeva addakkhiṃ. Sabbaṃ yobbaññanti yobbanabhāvo yobbaññaṃ,
analyzed: addasanti jarā ādīhi addakkhim sabbam yobbaññanti yobbana bhāvaḥ yobbaññam

original: sacetanānaṃ sabbaṃ yobbaññaṃ. Jarāya ositanti paripākāya jarāya avasitaṃ madditaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha.
analyzed: sa cetanānam sabbam yobbaññam jarāya ositanti paripākāya jarāya avasitam madditam evam sabbattha

original: 173. Osāne tveva byāruddhe, disvā me aratī ahūti yobbaññādīnaṃ osāneyeva antagamake
analyzed: osāne tu eva byāruddhe disvā me aratī ahū iti yobbañña ādīnam osāne yā iva anta gamake

original: eva vināsake eva jarādīhi byāruddhe āhatacitte satte disvā arati me ahosi. Athettha
analyzed: eva vināsake eva jarā ādīhi byāruddhe āhata citte satte disvā arati me atha itthā

original: sallanti atha etesu sattesu rāgādisallaṃ. Hadayassitanti cittanissitaṃ.
analyzed: sallam ti atha etesu sattesu rāga ādi sallam hadayassitam ti citta nissitam

original: Yobbaññaṃ jarā osāpetīti jarā atthaṅgameti vināseti. Evaṃ sabbattha.
analyzed: yobbaññam jarā osāpeti iti jarā atthaṅgamā iti vināsā iti evam sabbattha

original: 174. “Kathaṃ ānubhāvaṃ salla”nti ce? Yena sallena otiṇṇoti gāthā. Tattha disā sabbā
analyzed: katham ānubhāvam sallanti ce yena sallena otiṇṇo ti gāthā tattha disā sabbā

original: vidhāvatīti sabbā duccaritadisāpi puratthimādidisāpi vidisāpi dhāvati. Tameva sallamabbuyha,
analyzed: vidhāvati iti sabbā duccarita disā api puratthima ādi disā api vidisā api dhāvati tam eva sallam abbuyha

original: na dhāvati na sīdatīti tameva sallaṃ uddharitvā tā ca disā na dhāvati, caturoghe ca na sīdati.
analyzed: na dhāvati na sīdati iti tam eva sallam uddharitvā tāḥ ca disāḥ na dhāvati catur oghe ca na sīdati

original: Aññāṇantiādīsu ñāṇadassanapaṭipakkhato aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ. Abhimukho hutvā dhammena
analyzed: aññāṇa nti ādīsu ñāṇa dassana paṭipakkhataḥ aññāṇam adassanam abhimukhaḥ hutvā dhammena

original: na sameti na samāgacchatīti anabhisamayo. Anurūpato dhamme bujjhatīti anubodho. Tappaṭipakkhatāya
analyzed: na sameti na samāgacchati iti anabhisamayaḥ anurūpatas dhamme bujjhati iti anubodhaḥ tad paṭipakkha tāya

original: ananubodho. Aniccādīhi saddhiṃ yojetvā na bujjhatīti asambodho. Asantaṃ asamañca
analyzed: ananubodhaḥ anicca ādīhi saddhim yojetvā na bujjhati iti asambodhaḥ asantam asamañca

original: bujjhatītipi asambodho. Catusaccadhammaṃ na paṭivijjhatīti appaṭivedho. Rūpādīsu
analyzed: bujjhati iti pi asambodhaḥ catu sacca dhammam na paṭivijjhati iti appaṭivedhaḥ rūpa ādīsu

original: ekadhammampi aniccādisāmaññato na saṅgaṇhātīti asaṅgāhaṇā. Tameva dhammaṃ na pariyogāhatīti
analyzed: eka dhammam pi anicca ādi sāmaññataḥ na saṅgaṇhāti iti asaṅgāhaṇā tam eva dhammam na pariyogāhati iti

original: apariyogāhaṇā. Na samaṃ pekkhatīti asamapekkhanā. Dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ pati na apekkhatīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
analyzed: a pariyogāhaṇā na samam pekkhati iti asamapekkhanā dhammānam sabhāvam na apekkhati iti apaccavekkhaṇā

original: Kusalākusalakammesu viparītavuttiyā sabhāvagahaṇābhāvena vā ekampi kammaṃ etassa
analyzed: kusala akusala kammesu viparīta vuttiyā sabhāva gahaṇa abhāvena vā ekam pi kammam etassa

original: paccakkhaṃ natthi, sayaṃ vā kassaci dhammassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti apaccakkhakammaṃ.
analyzed: paccakkham natthi sayam vā kassaci dhammassa paccakkha karaṇam nāma na hoti iti a paccakkha kammam

original: Yaṃ etasmiṃ anuppajjamāne cittasantānaṃ mejjhaṃ bhaveyya suci vodānaṃ, taṃ duṭṭhuṃ
analyzed: yam etasmin an uppajjamāne citta santānam mejjham bhaveyya suci vodānam tam duṭṭhum

original: mejjhaṃ imināti dummejjhaṃ. Bālānaṃ bhāvo bālyaṃ. Muyhatīti moho. Balavataro moho
analyzed: mejjham imināti dummejjham bālānam bhāvaḥ bālyam muyhati iti mohaḥ balavataraḥ mohaḥ

original: pamoho. Samantato muyhatīti sammoho. Vijjāya paṭipakkhabhāvato na vijjāti avijjā.
analyzed: pamohaḥ samantataḥ muyhati iti sammohaḥ vijjāya paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ na vijjāti avijjā

original: Oghayogattho vuttoyeva. Thāmagataṭṭhena anusetīti anusayo. Cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti abhibhavatīti
analyzed: ogha yoga tthaḥ thāma gata ṭṭhena anuseti iti anusayaḥ cittam pariyuṭṭhāti abhibhavati iti

original: pariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Hitaggahaṇābhāvena hitābhimukhaṃ gantuṃ na sakkoti aññadatthu laṅgatiyevāti
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhānam hita ggahaṇa abhāvena hita abhimukham gantum na sakkoti añña datthu laṅgatiyā iva ati

original: laṅgī, khañjatīti attho. Durugghāṭanaṭṭhena vā laṅgī. Yathā hi mahāpalighasaṅkhātā
analyzed: laṅgī khañjatī iti atthaḥ durugghāṭana ṭṭhena vā laṅgī yathā hi mahā paligha saṅkhātā

original: laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti, evamayampi laṅgī viyāti laṅgī. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti evam ayam pi laṅgī viyāti laṅgī sesam uttāna attham eva

original: Yā evarūpā kaṅkhāti ettha kaṅkhanavasena kaṅkhā. Kaṅkhaṃ ānayatīti kaṅkhāyanā. Purimakaṅkhā
analyzed: yā evarūpā kaṅkhā ati ettha kaṅkhana vasena kaṅkhā kaṅkham ānayati iti kaṅkhāyanā purima kaṅkhā

original: hi uttarakaṅkhaṃ ānayati nāma. Ākāravasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. Kaṅkhāsamaṅgicittaṃ kaṅkhāya
analyzed: hi uttara kaṅkham ānayati nāma ākāra vasena vā etam vuttam kaṅkhā samaṅgi cittam kaṅkhāya

original: āyitattā kaṅkhāyitaṃ nāma. Tassa bhāvo kaṅkhāyitattaṃ. Vimatīti vigatā mati vimati.
analyzed: āyita ttā kaṅkhāyitam nāma tassa bhāvaḥ kaṅkhāyita ttam vimati iti vigatā mati vimati

original: Vicikicchāti vigatā cikicchā vicikicchā, sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto kicchati kilamati
analyzed: vicikicchāti vigatā cikicchā vicikicchā sabhāvam vā vicinantaḥ kicchati kilamati

original: etāyāti vicikicchā. Sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, kampanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā, anekaṃsaggāhapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: etāya ati vicikicchā sā saṃsaya lakkhaṇā kampana rasā anicchaya paccupaṭṭhānā aneka saggāha paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānā, paṭipattiyā antarāyakarāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: vā a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānā paṭipattiyāḥ antarāya karā ti daṭṭhabbā

original: Kampanaṭṭhena dvidhā eḷayatīti dveḷhakaṃ. Paṭipattinivāraṇena dvidhāpatho viyāti
analyzed: kampana ṭṭhena dvidhā eḷayati iti dveḷhakam paṭipatti nivāraṇena dvidhā pathaḥ viyāti

original: dvedhāpatho. “Niccaṃ vā idaṃ aniccaṃ vā”tiādipavattiyā ekasmiṃ ākāre saṇṭhātuṃ asamatthatāya
analyzed: dvedhā pathaḥ niccam vā idam aniccam vā ati ādi pavattiyā ekasmin ākāre saṇṭhātum a samattha tāya

original: samantato setīti saṃsayo. Ekaṃsaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthatāya na ekaṃsaggāhoti anekaṃsaggāho.
analyzed: samantataḥ seti iti saṃsayaḥ ekaṃsam gahetum a samattha tāya na ekaṃsa ggāho ti an ekaṃsa ggāho

original: Nicchetuṃ asakkontī ārammaṇato osakkatīti āsappanā. Ogāhituṃ asakkontī parisamantato
analyzed: nicchetum asakkontī ārammaṇataḥ osakkati iti āsappanā ogāhitum asakkontī parisamantataḥ

original: sappatīti parisappanā. Pariyogāhituṃ asamatthatāya apariyogāhaṇā. Nicchayavasena
analyzed: sappati iti parisappanā pariyogāhitum a samattha tāya a pariyogāhaṇā nicchaya vasena

original: ārammaṇe pavattituṃ asamatthatāya chambhitattaṃ cittassa, thaddhabhāvoti attho. Vicikicchā
analyzed: ārammaṇe pavattitum asamattha tāya chambhita ttam cittassa thaddha bhāvaḥ ti atthaḥ vicikicchā

original: hi uppajjitvā cittaṃ thaddhaṃ karoti, yasmā pana sā uppajjamānā ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: hi uppajjitvā cittam thaddham karoti yasmā pana sā uppajjamānā ārammaṇam gahetvā

original: manaṃ vilikhantī viya, tasmā manovilekhoti vuttā.
analyzed: manam vilikhantī viya tasmā manovilekhā iti vuttā

original: Viddhoti sallena laddhappahāro. Phuṭṭhoti ghaṭṭito. Paretoti pīḷito. Dhāvatīti purato
analyzed: viddhaḥ iti sallena laddha pahāro phuṭṭho ti ghaṭṭito paretaḥ iti pīḷitaḥ dhāvati iti puratas

original: gacchati. Vidhāvatīti anekavidhena gacchati. Sandhāvatīti vegena dhāvati. Saṃsaratīti ito cito ca carati.
analyzed: gacchati vidhāvati iti anekavidhena gacchati sandhāvati iti vegena dhāvati saṃsarati iti ito cito ca carati

original: Acelakoti niccolo, naggoti attho. Muttācāroti visaṭṭhācāro, uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena
analyzed: acelakaḥ ti niccolaḥ naggaḥ ti attho mutta ācāro ti visaṭṭha ācāraḥ uccāra kamma ādīsu lokiya kula putta ācārena

original: virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti, passāvaṃ karoti, khādati bhuñjati. Hatthāpalekhanoti
analyzed: virahitaḥ uccāram karoti passāvam karoti khādati bhuñjati

original: hatthe piṇḍamhi ṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalikhati, uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthamhiyeva
analyzed: hatthe piṇḍamhi ṭhite jivhāya hattham apalikhati uccāram vā katvā

original: daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalikhati. Te kira daṇḍakaṃ “satto”ti paññapenti. Bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ
analyzed: daṇḍaka saññī hutvā hatthena apalikhati te kira daṇḍakam satto ti paññapenti bhikkhā gahaṇa ttham

original: “ehi bhadante”ti vutto na etīti na ehibhadantiko. Tena hi “tiṭṭha bhadante”ti vuttopi
analyzed: ehi bhadanta iti vutto na eti iti na ehibhadantiko tena hi tiṭṭha bhadanta iti vuttaḥ api

original: na tiṭṭhatīti na tiṭṭhabhadantiko. Tadubhayampi kira so “etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti na karoti.
analyzed: na tiṭṭhati iti na tat ubhayam pi kira so etassa vacanam katam bhavissati iti na karoti

original: Abhihaṭanti puretaraṃ gahetvā āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ. Uddissakatanti “idaṃ tumhe uddissa
analyzed: puretaram gahetvā āhaṭam bhikkham idam tumhe uddissa

original: kata”nti evaṃ ārocitaṃ bhikkhaṃ. Na nimantananti “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā
analyzed: katanti evam ārocitam bhikkham na asukam nāma kulam vā vīthim vā

original: gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati na gaṇhāti. Na kumbhimukhāti
analyzed: gāmam vā paviseyyātha ati evam nimantita bhikkham pi na sādiyati na gaṇhāti na

original: kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Na kaḷopimukhāti kaḷopīti ukkhali
analyzed: kumbhitaḥ uddharitvā diyyamānam bhikkham na gaṇhāti na kaḷopimukhā ati kaḷopī iti ukkhali

original: vā pacchi vā, tatopi na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Kumbhikaḷopiyo maṃ nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ
analyzed: vā pacchi vā tatas pi na gaṇhāti kasmā kumbhika ḷopiyaḥ mam nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāram

original: labhantīti. Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ karitvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
analyzed: labhanti iti na ummāram antaram karitvā diyyamānam na gaṇhāti kasmai

original: Ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatīti. Daṇḍamusalesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ayam mam nissāya antara karaṇam labhati iti daṇḍa musalesu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Na dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Kabaḷantarāyo
analyzed: na dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmin uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāti kasmai kabaḷantarāyaḥ

original: hotīti. Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana “gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamatī”ti, pāyantiyā
analyzed: hoti iti na gabbhiniyā ati ādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyam dārako kilamati iti pāyantiyā

original: dārakassa khīrantarāyo hotī”ti, “purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotī”ti na gaṇhāti.
analyzed: dārakassa khīra antarāyaḥ hoti iti purisa antara gatāya rati antarāyaḥ hoti iti na gaṇhāti

original: Na saṃkittīsūti saṃkittetvā katabhattesu. Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānamatthāya
analyzed: na saṃkittīsu iti saṃkittetvā kata bhattesu dubbhikkha samaye kira acelaka sāvakāḥ acelakānam atthāya

original: tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti, ukkaṭṭho acelako tatopi na paṭiggaṇhāti.
analyzed: tato tato taṇḍula ādīni samādapetvā bhattam pacanti ukkaṭṭhaḥ acelako tatas api na paṭiggaṇhāti

original: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho “piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī”ti upaṭṭhito hoti, tattha tassa
analyzed: na yattha sā ati yattha su nakhaḥ piṇḍam labhissāmi iti upaṭṭhitaḥ hoti tattha tassa

original: adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti. Saṇḍasaṇḍacārinīti samūhasamūhacārinī.
analyzed: a datvā āhaṭam na gaṇhāti kasmai etassa piṇḍa antarāyaḥ hoti iti saṇḍa saṇḍa cārinī iti samūha samūha cārinī

original: Sace hi acelakaṃ disvā “imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti manussā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti,
analyzed: sace hi acelakam disvā imassa bhikkham dassāma ati manussāḥ bhatta geham pavisanti

original: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti.
analyzed: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopi mukha ādīsu nilīnāḥ makkhikāḥ uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti

original: Tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Maṃ nissāya makkhikānaṃ gocarantarāyo jātoti.
analyzed: tatas āhaṭam bhikkham na gaṇhāti kasmā mam nissāya makkhikānam gocara antarāyaḥ jātaḥ ti

original: Thusodakanti sabbasassasambhārehi kataṃ sovīrakaṃ. Ettha ca surāpānameva sāvajjaṃ,
analyzed: thusodakam ti sabba sassa sambhārehi katam sovīrakam ettha ca surā pānam eva sāvajjam

original: ayaṃ pana sabbesupi sāvajjasaññī.
analyzed: ayam pana sabbesu pi sāvajja saññī

original: Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati. Ekālopikoti yo ekeneva
analyzed: ekāgāriko ti yaḥ ekasmiṃ yeva gehe bhikkham labhitvā nivattati ekālopikaḥ iti yaḥ ekena iva

original: ālopena yāpeti. Dvāgārikādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekissāpi dattiyāti ekāya dattiyā. Datti
analyzed: ālopena yāpa iti dvāgārika ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ ekissā api dattiyā ati ekāya dattiyā datti

original: nāma ekā khuddakapāti hoti, yattha aggabhikkhaṃ pakkhipitvā ṭhapenti. Ekāhikanti
analyzed: nāma ekā khuddaka pāti hoti yattha agga bhikkham pakkhipitvā ṭhapenti ekāhikam ti

original: ekadivasantarikaṃ. Aḍḍhamāsikanti aḍḍhamāsantarikaṃ. Pariyāyabhattabhojananti vārabhattabhojanaṃ,
analyzed: eka divasa antarikam aḍḍhamāsikam ti aḍḍha māsa antarikam pariyāya bhatta bhojanam iti vāra bhatta bhojanam

original: ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena aḍḍhamāsavārenāti evaṃ divasavārena ābhataṃ bhattabhojanaṃ.
analyzed: eka aha vārena dvīha vārena sattāha vārena aḍḍha māsa vārena ati evam divasa vārena bhatta bhojanam

original: Sākabhakkhotiādīni vuttatthāneva. Ubbhaṭṭhakoti uddhaṃ ṭhitako. Ukkuṭikappadhānamanuyuttoti
analyzed: sākabhakkho ti ādīni vutta tthāni eva ubbhaṭṭhakaḥ ti uddham ṭhitakaḥ ukkuṭika padhānam anuyuttaḥ ti

original: ukkuṭikaṃ vīriyaṃ anuyutto. Gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati.
analyzed: ukkuṭikam vīriyam anuyuttaḥ gacchantaḥ api ukkuṭikaḥ uva hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati

original: Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ
analyzed: kaṇṭakāpassayiko ti aya kaṇṭake vā pakati kaṇṭake vā bhūmiyam koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ

original: attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti. Seyyanti sayantopi tattheva seyyaṃ kappeti. Phalakaseyyanti
analyzed: attharitvā ṭhāna caṅkama ādīni karoti seyyanti sayantaḥ api tattha iva seyyam kappeti phalaka seyyanti

original: rukkhaphalake seyyaṃ. Thaṇḍilaseyyanti thaṇḍile ucce bhūmiṭṭhāne seyyaṃ. Ekapassayikoti
analyzed: rukkha phalake seyyam thaṇḍila seyyam ti thaṇḍile ucce bhūmiṭṭhāne seyyam eka passayiko ti

original: ekapasseneva sayati. Rajojalladharoti sarīraṃ telena makkhetvā rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
analyzed: eka passena iva sayati rajaḥ jalladharā uti sarīram telena makkhetvā raju ṭṭhāna ṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati

original: athassa sarīre rajojallaṃ laggati, taṃ dhāreti. Yathāsanthatikoti laddhaṃ āsanaṃ
analyzed: sarīre rajaḥ jallam laggati tam dhāreti yathā santhatikaḥ iti laddham āsanam

original: akopetvā yadeva labhati, tattheva nisīdanasīlo. Vekaṭikoti vikaṭakhādanasīlo, vikaṭanti
analyzed: a kopetvā yat eva labhati tattha eva nisīdana sīlaḥ vekaṭikaḥ ti vikaṭa khādana sīlaḥ vikaṭanti

original: gūthaṃ vuccati. Apānakoti paṭikkhittasītudakapāno. Sāyaṃ tatiyaṃ assāti sāyatatiyakaṃ.
analyzed: gūtham vuccati apānako ti paṭikkhitta sītudaka pāno sāyam tatiyam assa ati sāyatatiyakam

original: Pāto majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ “pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī”ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.
analyzed: pāto majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattum pāpam pavāhessāmi iti udakorohana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: Te salle abhisaṅkharotīti te rāgādisattasalle abhinibbatteti. Abhisaṅkharontoti abhinibbattento.
analyzed: te salle abhisaṅkharoti iti te rāga ādi satta salle abhinibbatteti abhisaṅkharontaḥ iti abhinibbattentaḥ

original: Sallābhisaṅkhāravasenāti sallābhinibbattāpanakāraṇā. Puratthimaṃ disaṃ dhāvatīti
analyzed: sat lābhi saṅkhāra vasena ati sat lābhi nibbattāpana kāraṇā puratthimam disam dhāvati iti

original: purimaṃ disaṃ gacchati. Te sallābhisaṅkhārā appahīnāti ete rāgādisallā payogā nappahīnā.
analyzed: purimam disam gacchati te salla abhisaṅkhārāḥ ete rāga ādi sallā payogā na appahīnā

original: Sallābhisaṅkhārānaṃ appahīnattāti sallapayogānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. Gatiyā dhāvatīti
analyzed: salla abhisaṅkhārānam appahīna ttā ati salla payogānam appahīna bhāvena gatiyā dhāvati iti

original: gatiyaṃ dhāvati. Gatiyā gatinti gatito gatiṃ.
analyzed: gatiyam dhāvati gatiyā gatinti gatitas gatim

original: Na sīdatīti na nimujjati. Na saṃsīdatīti na samantato mujjati. Na osīdatīti na osakkati. Na avasīdatīti na paccosakkati. Na avagacchatīti na heṭṭhā gacchati.
analyzed: na sīdati iti na nimujjati na saṃsīdati iti na samantataḥ mujjati na osīdati iti na osakkati na avasīdati iti na paccosakkati na avagacchati iti na heṭṭhā gacchati

original: 175. Evaṃ mahānubhāvena sallena otiṇṇesu ca sattesu – tattha sikkhānugīyanti, yāni
analyzed: evam mahā anubhāvena sallena otiṇṇesu ca sattesu tattha yāni

original: loke gadhitānīti gāthā. Tassattho – ye loke pañca kāmaguṇā paṭilābhāya gijjhantīti
analyzed: loke gadhitāni iti gāthā tassa atthaḥ ye loke pañca kāmaguṇā paṭilābhāya gijjhanti iti

original: katvā “gadhitānī”ti vuccanti, cirakālasevitattā vā “gadhitānī”ti vuccanti. Tattha
analyzed: katvā gadhitāni iti vuccanti cira kāla sevita ttā vā gadhitāni iti vuccanti tattha

original: taṃ nimittaṃ hatthisikkhādikā anekā sikkhā kathīyanti, uggayhanti vā. Passatha yāva
analyzed: tam nimittam hatthi sikkhā ādikā anekā sikkhā kathīyanti uggayhanti vā passatha yāva

original: samattho vāyaṃ loko, yato paṇḍito kulaputto tesu vā gadhitesu tāsu vā sikkhāsu adhimutto
analyzed: samatthaḥ vā ayam lokaḥ yatas paṇḍitaḥ kula putto tesu vā gadhitesu tāsu vā sikkhāsu adhimuttaḥ

original: na siyā, aññadatthu aniccādidassanena nibbijjha sabbaso kāme. Attano nibbānameva sikkheti.
analyzed: na siyā añña datthu anicca ādi dassanena nibbijjha sabbaso kāme attanaḥ nibbānam eva sikkheti

original: Paṭivijjhitvāti ñāṇena nikkhametvā vā nibbijjhitvā vā.
analyzed: paṭivijjhitvā ti ñāṇena nikkhametvā vā nibbijjhitvā vā

original: 176. Idāni yathā nibbānāya sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ dassento “sacco siyā”tiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: idāni yathā nibbānāya sikkhitabbam tam dassentaḥ sacco siyā ti ādim āha tattha

original: saccoti vācāsaccena ñāṇasaccena maggasaccena ca samannāgato. Rittapesuṇoti pahīnapesuṇo.
analyzed: sacco ti vācā saccena ñāṇa saccena magga saccena ca samannāgataḥ ritta pesuṇo ti pahīna pesuṇaḥ

original: Vevicchanti macchariyaṃ.
analyzed: vevicchanti mat śariyam

original: 177. Niddaṃ tandiṃ sahe thīnanti pacalāyikañca kāyālasiyañca cittālasiyañcāti ime tayo dhamme abhibhaveyya. Nibbānamānasoti nibbānaninnacitto.
analyzed: niddam tandim sahe thīnanti pacalāyikam ca kāya alasiyam ca citta alasiyam ca ati ime tayaḥ dhamme abhibhaveyya nibbāna mānasaḥ ti nibbāna ninna cittaḥ

original: Kāyassa akalyatāti khandhattayasaṅkhātassa nāmakāyassa gilānabhāvo. Gilāno hi akallakoti
analyzed: kāyassa a kalya tā ati khandha ttaya saṅkhātassa nāmakāyassa gilāna bhāvaḥ gilānaḥ hi a kallako ti

original: vuccati. Vinayepi vuttaṃ – “nāhaṃ, bhante, akallako”ti. Akammaññatāti kāyagelaññasaṅkhāto
analyzed: vuccati vinaye pi vuttam na aham bhante a kallakaḥ ti akammañña tā ati kāya gelañña saṅkhātaḥ

original: akammaññatākāro. Megho viya ākāsaṃ kāyaṃ onayhatīti onāho. Sabbato bhāgena onāho
analyzed: akammañña tā ākāraḥ meghaḥ viya ākāsam kāyam onayhati iti onāhaḥ sabbatas bhāgena onāhaḥ

original: pariyonāho. Abbhantare samorundhatīti antosamorodho. Medhatīti middhaṃ, akammaññabhāvena
analyzed: pariyonāhaḥ abbhantare samorundhati iti antosamorodhaḥ medhati iti middham a kammañña bhāvena

original: vihiṃsatīti attho. Supanti tenāti suppaṃ. Akkhidalādīnaṃ pacalabhāvaṃ karotīti pacalāyikā.
analyzed: vihiṃsati iti attho supanti tena ati suppam akkhi dala ādīnam pacala bhāvam karoti iti pacalāyikā

original: Suppanā suppitattanti ākārabhāvaniddesā. Olīyanāti olīyanākāro. Dutiyaṃ upasaggavasena
analyzed: ākāra bhāva niddesā olīyanā ti olīyana ākāraḥ dutiyam upasagga vasena

original: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Līnanti avipphārikatāya paṭikuṭikaṃ. Itare dve ākārabhāvaniddesā. Thinanti
analyzed: vaḍḍhitam līnanti a vipphārika tāya paṭikuṭikam itare dve ākāra bhāva niddesā thinanti

original: sappipiṇḍo viya avipphārikatāya ghanabhāvena ṭhitaṃ. Thiyanāti ākāraniddeso. Thiyitassa
analyzed: sappi piṇḍaḥ viya a vipphārika tāya ghana bhāvena ṭhitam ākāra niddeso

original: bhāvo thiyitattaṃ, avipphāravasena thaddhatāti attho.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ thiyitattam a vipphāra vasena thaddhatā ati attho

original: Sabbasaṅkhāradhātuyāti nibbānaninnamānaso sabbatebhūmikasaṅkhātadhātuyā. Cittaṃ paṭivāpetvāti
analyzed: sabba saṅkhāra dhātuyā ati nibbāna ninna mānasaḥ sabba tebhūmika saṅkhāta dhātuyā cittam paṭivāpetvā ati

original: cittaṃ nivattāpetvā. Etaṃ santanti etaṃ nibbānaṃ. Kilesasantatāya santaṃ. Atappakaṭṭhena paṇītaṃ.
analyzed: cittam nivattāpetvā etam santanti etam nibbānam kilesa santatāya santam a tappakaṭṭhena paṇītam

original: Na paṇḍitā upadhisukhassa hetūti dabbajātikā kāmasukhassa kāraṇā dānāni na denti.
analyzed: na paṇḍitāḥ upadhi sukhassa hetu uti dabba jātikāḥ kāma sukhassa kāraṇā dānāni na denti

original: Kāmañca te upadhiparikkhayāyāti ekaṃsena te paṇḍitā kāmakkhayāya kāmakkhepanatthaṃ
analyzed: kāmam ca te upadhi parikkhayāya ati ekaṃsena te paṇḍitā kāma kkhayāya kāma kkhepana attham

original: dānāni denti. Apunabbhavāyāti nibbānatthāya. Jhānāni bhāventīti paṭhamajjhānādīni
analyzed: dānāni denti apunabbhavāya ati nibbāna atthāya jhānāni bhāventi iti paṭhamajjhāna ādīni

original: vaḍḍhenti. Punabbhavāyāti punabbhavakāraṇā. Te paṇḍitā nibbānaṃ abhimukhaṃ hutvā dānaṃ dadanti.
analyzed: vaḍḍhenti punabbhavāya ati punabbhava kāraṇā te paṇḍitāḥ nibbānam abhimukham hutvā dānam dadanti

original: 178. Sāhasāti rattassa rāgacaritādibhedā sāhasākāraṇā. Niddeso uttānatthoyeva.
analyzed: sāhasā ati rattassa rāga carita ādi bhedā sāhasā kāraṇā niddesaḥ

original: 179. Purāṇaṃ nābhinandeyyāti atītaṃ rūpādiṃ nābhinandeyya. Naveti paccuppanne. Hīyamāneti
analyzed: purāṇam na abhinandeyya ati atītam rūpa ādim na abhinandeyya nava iti paccuppanne hīyamāne iti

original: vinassamāne. Ākāsaṃ na sito siyāti taṇhānissito na bhaveyya. Taṇhā hi rūpādīnaṃ ākāsanato “ākāso”ti vuccati.
analyzed: vinassamāne ākāsam na sito siyāti taṇhā nissitaḥ na bhaveyya taṇhā hi rūpa ādīnam ākāsanato ākāsaḥ ti vuccati

original: Vemāneti abhavamāne. Vigacchamāneti apagacchamāne.
analyzed: vemānā iti a bhavamāne vigacchamānā iti apagacchamāne

original: “Ākāsatī”ti “ākassatī”ti ca duvidho pāṭho.
analyzed: ākāsati iti ākassati iti ca duvidhaḥ pāṭhaḥ

original: 180. Kiṃ kāraṇā ākāsaṃ na sito siyāti ce? Gedhaṃ brūmīti gāthā. Tassattho – ahañhi
analyzed: kim kāraṇā ākāsam na sitaḥ siyā iti ce gedham brūmi iti gāthā tassa atthaḥ aham hi

original: imaṃ ākāsasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ rūpādīsu gijjhanato gedhaṃ brūmi “gedho”ti vadāmi. Kiñca
analyzed: imam ākāsa saṅkhātam taṇham rūpa ādīsu gijjhanataḥ gedham brūmi gedha uti vadāmi kiñca

original: bhiyyo – avahananaṭṭhena “ogho”ti ca ājavanaṭṭhena “ājava”nti ca “idaṃ mayhaṃ, idaṃ
analyzed: bhiyyas avahanana ṭṭhena oghoti ca ājavana ṭṭhena ca idam mayham idam

original: mayha”nti jappakāraṇato “jappana”nti ca dummuñcanaṭṭhena “ārammaṇa”nti ca kampakaraṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: mayhanti jappa kāraṇataḥ jappananti ca dummuñcana ṭhena ārammaṇanti ca kampa karaṇa ṭṭhena

original: “kampana”nti ca brūmi, esāva lokassa palibodhaṭṭhena duratikkamanīyaṭṭhena ca “kāmapaṅko duraccayo”ti.
analyzed: kampananti ca brūmi esā ava lokassa palibodha ṭṭhena duratikkamanīya ṭṭhena ca kāma paṅkaḥ duraccayaḥ ti

original: Ājavanti āpaṭisandhito javati dhāvatīti ājavaṃ, vaṭṭamūlatāya punabbhave paṭisandhidānataṇhāyetaṃ
analyzed: ājavanti ā paṭisandhitaḥ javati dhāvati iti ājavam vaṭṭa mūla tāya punabbhave paṭisandhi dāna taṇhāya itam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Jappananti patthanā, taṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ārammaṇampi vuccati taṇhāti
analyzed: adhivacanam jappananti patthanā taṇhāya etam adhivacanam ārammaṇam pi vuccati taṇhā ati

original: rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu uppannataṇhā muccituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhena ārammaṇāti kathīyati.
analyzed: rūpa ādīsu ārammaṇesu uppanna taṇhā muccitum asakkuṇeyya ṭṭhena ārammaṇā iti kathīyati

original: Kāmapaṅkoti osīdanaṭṭhena kalalaṃ. Kaddamoti saṅgaṭṭhena kaddamo. Tāpanaṭṭhena kileso.
analyzed: kāma paṅko ti osīdana ṭṭhena kalalam kaddamo ti saṅga ṭṭhena kaddamo tāpana ṭṭhena kileso

original: Niyyāsaṃ viya laggāpanaṭṭhena palipo. Rundhitvā dhāraṇaṭṭhena palirodho. Evametaṃ
analyzed: niyyāsam viya laggāpana ṭṭhena palipaḥ rundhitvā dhāraṇa ṭṭhena palirodhaḥ evam etam

original: gedhādipariyāyaṃ ākāsaṃ anissito.
analyzed: gedha ādi pariyāyam ākāsam a nissitaḥ

original: 181. Saccā avokkamanti gāthā. Tassattho – pubbe vuttā tividhāpi saccā avokkamaṃ moneyyapattiyā
analyzed: saccāḥ avokkamanti gāthā tassa atthaḥ pubbe vuttā tividhā api saccāḥ avokkamam moneyya pattiyā

original: munīti saṅkhaṃ gato nibbānathale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo, sa veevarūpo sabbāni āyatanāni
analyzed: muni iti saṅkham gataḥ nibbāna thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo sa veevarūpo sabbāni āyatanāni

original: nissajjitvā “santo”ti vuccati. Niddese vattabbaṃ natthi.
analyzed: nissajjitvā santo ti vuccati niddese vattabbam natthi

original: 182. Kiñca bhiyyo – sa ve vidvāti gāthā. Tattha ñatvā dhammanti aniccādinayena saṅkhatadhammaṃ
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas sa ve vidvā iti gāthā tattha ñatvā anicca ādi nayena saṅkhata dhammaṃ

original: aññāya. Sammā so loke iriyānoti asammāiriyanakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānā sammā so loke iriyamāno.
analyzed: aññāya sammā saḥ loke iriyāno ti a sammā iriyana karānam kilesānam pahānā sammā saḥ loke iriyamāno

original: 183. Evaṃ apihento ca – yodha kāmeti gāthā. Tattha saṅganti sattavidhaṃ saṅgaṃ yo accatari. Nājjhetīti na abhijjhāyati.
analyzed: evam ca yodha kāma iti gāthā tattha saṅganti sattavidham saṅgam yaḥ accatari na ajjheti iti na abhijjhāyati

original: 184. Tasmā tumhesupi yo evarūpo hotuṃ icchati, taṃ vadāmi – yaṃ pubbeti gāthā. Tattha
analyzed: tasmā yaḥ evarūpaḥ hotum icchati tam vadāmi yam pubbā iti gāthā tattha

original: yaṃ pubbeti atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjanadhammaṃ kilesajātaṃ atītaṃ kammañca.
analyzed: yam pubbe ti atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjana dhammam kilesa jātam atītam kammañca

original: Pacchā te māhu kiñcananti anāgatepi saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjanadhammaṃ rāgādikiñcanaṃ
analyzed: pacchā te mā āhu kiñcananti anāgate pi saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjana dhammam rāga ādi kiñcanaṃ

original: mā ahu. Majjhe ce no gahessasīti paccuppannarūpādidhammepi na gahessasi ce. Evaṃ upasanto carissasi.
analyzed: mā ahu majjhe ce no gahessasi iti paccuppanna rūpa ādi dhamme pi na gahessasi ce evam upasantaḥ carissasi

original: Abījaṃ karohīti maggañāṇena na bījaṃ karohi. Rāgakiñcananti rāgaphandanaṃ. Dosakiñcanādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: abījam karohi iti magga ñāṇena na bījam karohi rāga kiñcanam ti rāga phandanam dosa kiñcana ādīsu pi esa eva nayo

original: 185. Evaṃ arahattappattiṃ dassetvā idāni arahato thutivasena ito parā gāthāyo abhāsi.
analyzed: evam arahatta pattim dassetvā idāni arahataḥ thuti vasena itas parāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: Tattha sabbasoti gāthāya mamāyitanti mamattakaraṇaṃ. “Mama ida”nti gahitaṃ vā vatthu.
analyzed: tattha sabbaso ti gāthāya mamāyitam ti mamatta karaṇam mama idam ti gahitam vā vatthu

original: Asatā ca na socatīti avijjamānakāraṇā asantakāraṇā na socati. Na jīyatīti jāniṃ nādhigacchati.
analyzed: asatā ca na socati iti avijjamāna kāraṇā asanta kāraṇā na socati na jīyati iti jānim na adhigacchati

original: Ahu vata meti mayhaṃ ahosi vata. Taṃ vata me natthīti yaṃ atīte ahosi, taṃ mayhaṃ
analyzed: ahu vata mā iti mayham ahosi vata tam vata me natthi iti yam atīte ahosi tam mayham

original: idāni na santi. Siyā vata meti yaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissati, taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmīti idāni
analyzed: idāni na santi siyā vata mā iti yam mayham bhavissati tam vata aham na labhāmi iti idāni

original: ahaṃ ekaṃsena na pāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: aham ekaṃsena na pāpuṇāmi

original: 186. Kiñca bhiyyo – yassa natthīti gāthā. Tattha kiñcananti kiñci rūpādidhammajātaṃ.
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas yassa na atthi iti gāthā tattha kiñcana nti kiñci rūpa ādi dhamma jātam

original: Abhisaṅkhatanti kammena saṅkharitaṃ. Abhisañcetayitanti cittena rāsikataṃ. Avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva. Asesavirāganirodhāti virāgasaṅkhātena maggena niravasesanirodhā.
analyzed: abhisaṅkhatanti kammena saṅkharitam abhisañcetayitanti cittena rāsikatam avijjāya tu eva ati avijjāya tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā ati virāga saṅkhātena maggena niravasesa nirodhā

original: Suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti avasavattisallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanavasena
analyzed: suññatas lokam avekkhassu iti avasavatti sat lakkhaṇa vasena vā tuccha saṅkhāra samanupassana vasena

original: vāti dvīhākārehi suññato lokaṃ passa. Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ uddharitvā.
analyzed: vāti dvīhākārehi suññatas lokam passa attā anudiṭṭhim ūhati ca ati sakkāya diṭṭhim uddharitvā

original: Evaṃ maccutaro siyāti evaṃ maraṇassa taraṇo bhaveyya. Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantanti evaṃ
analyzed: evam maccutaraḥ siyāti evam maraṇassa taraṇaḥ bhaveyya evam lokam evam

original: khandhalokaṃ passantaṃ. Maccurājā na passatīti maraṇarājā na oloketi na dakkhati.
analyzed: khandha lokam passantam maccu rājā na passati iti maraṇa rājā na oloketi na dakkhati

original: Nāññaṃ patthayate kiñcīti aññaṃ appamattakampi na patthayati na pihayati. Aññatra appaṭisandhiyāti nibbānaṃ ṭhapetvā. “Aññatrappaṭisandhiyā”ti ekapadaṃ katvāpi paṭhanti.
analyzed: na aññam patthayate kiñci iti aññam appamattakam pi na patthayati na pihayati aññatra appaṭisandhiyā ati nibbānam ṭhapetvā aññatra appaṭisandhiyā ati eka padam katvā api paṭhanti

original: 187. Kiñca bhiyyo – aniṭṭhurīti gāthā. Tattha aniṭṭhurīti anissukī. “Aniṭṭharī”tipi
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas aniṭṭhurī iti gāthā tattha aniṭṭhurī iti anissukī

original: keci paṭhanti. Sabbadhī samoti sabbattha samo, upekkhakoti adhippāyo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: keci paṭhanti sabbadhī samaḥ ti sabbattha samaḥ upekkhakaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ kim vuttam

original: hoti? Yo so “natthi me”ti na socati, tamahaṃ avikampinaṃ puggalaṃ puṭṭho samāno aniṭṭhurī
analyzed: hoti yaḥ saḥ natthi mā iti na socati tam aham avikampinam puggalam puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ aniṭṭhurī

original: ananugiddho, anejo sabbadhī samoti imaṃ tasmiṃ puggale catubbidhaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ brūmīti.
analyzed: an anugiddhaḥ an ejaḥ sabbadhī samaḥ ti imam tasmin puggale catubbidham ānisaṃsam brūmi iti

original: Niṭṭhuriyoti issukī. Niṭṭhurabhāvo niṭṭhuriyaṃ, taṃ nissāya ettakampi natthīti kheḷapātanti
analyzed: niṭṭhuriyā ti issukī niṭṭhura bhāvaḥ niṭṭhuriyam tam nissāya ettakam pi natthi iti kheḷa pātam ti

original: attho. Niṭṭhuriyakammanti niṭṭhuriyakaraṇaṃ. Gahaṭṭho vā hi gahaṭṭhaṃ bhikkhu vā
analyzed: atthaḥ niṭṭhuriya kammanti niṭṭhuriya karaṇam gahaṭṭhaḥ vā hi gahaṭṭham bhikkhu vā

original: bhikkhuṃ nissāya vasanto appamattakeneva kujjhitvā taṃ nissāya ettakampi natthīti
analyzed: bhikkhum nissāya vasanto appamattakena iva kujjhitvā tam nissāya ettakam pi natthi iti

original: kheḷaṃ pātetvā pādena maddanto viya niṭṭhuriyaṃ nāma karoti. Tassa taṃ kammaṃ “niṭṭhuriyakamma”nti
analyzed: kheḷam pātetvā pādena maddantaḥ viya niṭṭhuriyam nāma karoti tassa tam kammam niṭṭhuriya kammanti

original: vuccati. Issāti sabhāvaniddeso. Tato parā dve ākārabhāvaniddesā. Itarattayaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ.
analyzed: vuccati sa bhāva niddeso tatas parā dve ākāra bhāva niddesā pariyāya vacanam

original: Lakkhaṇādito panesā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā issā; tattha ca anabhiratirasā;
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana isā para sampattīnam usūyana lakkhaṇā issā tattha ca an abhirati rasā

original: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā; parasampattipadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: tatas vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā para sampatti padaṭṭhānā

original: Lābhepi na iñjatīti paccayalābhe na calati. Alābhepīti paccayānaṃ alābhepi.
analyzed: lābhe api na iñjati iti paccaya lābhe na calati alābhe api iti paccayānam alābhe api

original: 188. Kiñca bhiyyo – anejassāti gāthā. Tattha nisaṅkhatīti puññābhisaṅkhārādīsu yo
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas anejassa ati gāthā tattha nisaṅkhati iti puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādīsu yaḥ

original: koci saṅkhāro. So hi yasmā nisaṅkhariyati, nisaṅkharoti vā, tasmā “nisaṅkhatī”ti
analyzed: saṅkhāraḥ saḥ hi yasmai nisaṅkhariyati nisaṅkharoti vā tasmai

original: vuccati. Viyārambhāti vividhā puññābhisaṅkhārādikā ārambhā. Khemaṃ passati sabbadhīti
analyzed: vuccati viya ārambhā ti vividhā puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādikā ārambhā khemam passati sabbadhi iti

original: sabbattha abhayameva passati.
analyzed: sabbattha abhayam eva passati

original: Ārambhāti kammānaṃ paṭhamārambhā. Viyārambhāti uparūpari vividhaārambhanavasena vīriyārambhā. Tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhijanakakammānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā viyārambhā ārato.
analyzed: ārambhā ati kammānam paṭhama ārambhā viyārambhā ati upari upari vividha ārambhana vasena vīriya ārambhā tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhi janaka kammānam adhivacanam tasmā

original: 189. Evaṃ passanto na samesūti gāthā. Tattha na vadateti “sadisohamasmī”tiādinā mānavasena
analyzed: evam passantaḥ na samesu iti gāthā tattha na vadata iti sadisaḥ ham asmi iti ādinā māna vasena

original: samesupi attānaṃ na vadati omesupi ussesupi. Nādeti na nirassatīti rūpādīsu kañci
analyzed: attānam na vadati omesupi ussesupi na ādeti na nirassati iti rūpa ādīsu kañci

original: dhammaṃ na gaṇhāti na nissajjati. Sesaṃ sabbattha tattha tattha vuttanayattā pākaṭameva.
analyzed: dhammam na gaṇhāti na nissajjati sesam sabbattha tattha tattha vutta naya ttā pākaṭam eva

original: Evaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
analyzed: evam arahatta nikūṭena iva desanam niṭṭhāpesi iti

original: Saddhammappajjotikāya mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

original: Attadaṇḍasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: attadaṇḍa sutta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 16. Sāriputtasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā
190. Soḷasame na me diṭṭhoti sāriputtasuttaniddeso. Tattha ito pubbeti ito saṅkassanagare
analyzed: soḷasame na me diṭṭho ti sāriputta sutta niddeso tattha itas pubbe ti itas saṅkassanagare

original: otaraṇato pubbe. Vagguvadoti sundaravado. Tusitā gaṇimāgatoti tusitakāyā cavitvā
analyzed: otaraṇato pubbe tusitā tusita kāyā cavitvā

original: mātukucchiṃ āgatattā tusitā āgato. Gaṇācariyattā gaṇī. Santuṭṭhaṭṭhena vā tusitasaṅkhātā
analyzed: mātukucchim āgatattā tusitā āgataḥ gaṇācariyattā gaṇī santuṭṭhaṭṭhena vā tusita saṅkhātā

original: devalokā gaṇiṃ āgato, tusitānaṃ vā arahantānaṃ gaṇiṃ āgatoti.
analyzed: deva lokāḥ tusitānam vai arahantānam gaṇim āgataḥ iti

original: Iminā cakkhunāti iminā attabhāvapariyāpannena pakatimaṃsacakkhunā. Iminā attabhāvenāti
analyzed: iminā cakkhunā ati iminā atta bhāva pariyāpannena pakati maṃsa cakkhunā iminā atta bhāvena ati

original: iminā pacchimena attabhāvena. Tāvatiṃsabhavaneti tāvatiṃsadevaloke. Pāricchattakamūleti
analyzed: iminā pacchimena atta bhāvena tāvatiṃsa bhavanā iti tāvatiṃsa deva loke pāricchattaka mūlā iti

original: koviḷārarukkhassa heṭṭhā. Paṇḍukambalasilāyanti rattakambalasadisapāsāṇapiṭṭhe. Vassaṃ
analyzed: koviḷāra rukkhassa heṭṭhā paṇḍu kambala silāyanti ratta kambala sadisa pāsāṇa piṭṭhe vassam

original: vuṭṭhoti vuṭṭhavasso. Devagaṇaparivutoti devasaṅghena parivārito. Otiṇṇoti avatiṇṇo.
analyzed: vuṭṭhaḥ ti vuṭṭha vassaḥ deva gaṇa parivutaḥ iti deva saṅghena parivāritaḥ otiṇṇaḥ ati avatiṇṇaḥ

original: Imaṃ dassanaṃ pubbeti aññatra imamhā dassanā pubbe. Na diṭṭhoti aññadā na diṭṭhapubbo.
analyzed: imam dassanam pubbe iti aññatra imamhā dassanā pubbe na diṭṭhaḥ ti aññadā na diṭṭha pubbaḥ

original: Khattiyassa vāti khattiyassa vadantassa na suto. Brāhmaṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: khattiyassa vā ati khattiyassa vadantassa na sutaḥ brāhmaṇa ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Madhuravadotiādīsu byañjanasampannaṃ madhuraṃ vadatīti madhuravado. Pemajanakaṃ pemārahaṃ
analyzed: byañjana sampannam madhuram vadati iti pema janakam

original: vadatīti pemanīyavado. Hadayaṅgamacitte ṭhapanayogyaṃ vadatīti hadayaṅgamavado. Karavīkasakuṇasaddo
analyzed: vadati iti pemanīya vadaḥ hadayaṅgama citte ṭhapana yogyam vadati iti hadayaṅgama vadaḥ karavīka sakuṇa saddaḥ

original: viya madhuraghoso assāti karavīkarutamañjughoso. Vissaṭṭho cāti apalibuddho tattha
analyzed: viya madhura ghosaḥ assa ati vissaṭṭhaḥ ca ati apalibuddhaḥ tattha

original: tattha apakkhalano. Viññeyyo cāti suvijāneyyo ca. Mañju cāti madhuro ca. Savanīyo
analyzed: tattha apakkhalanaḥ viññeyyaḥ ca ati su vijāneyyaḥ ca mañju ca ati madhuraḥ ca savanīyaḥ

original: cāti kaṇṇasukho ca. Bindu cāti ghano ca. Avisārī cāti na patthaṭo ca. Gambhīro cāti
analyzed: ca ati kaṇṇa sukho ca bindu ca ati ghano ca avisārī ca ati na patthaṭo ca gambhīro ca ati

original: na uttāno ca. Ninnādi cāti ghosavanto ca. Assāti assa satthuno. Bahiddhā parisāyāti
analyzed: na uttānaḥ ca ninna ādi ca ati ghosavanto ca assa ati assa satthuno bahiddhā parisāya ati

original: parisato bahi. Na niccharatīti na nikkhamati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Evarūpo madhurasaddo nikkāraṇā
analyzed: parisataḥ bahi na niccharati iti na nikkhamati kiṃkāraṇā evarūpaḥ madhura saddaḥ nikkāraṇā

original: mā vinassatūti. Brahmassaroti aññe chinnassarāpi bhinnassarāpi kākassarāpi honti,
analyzed: mā vinassatu uti brahmassarā uti aññe chinnassarā api bhinnassarā api kākassarā api honti

original: ayaṃ pana mahābrahmuno sarasadisena sarena samannāgato. Mahābrahmuno hi pittasemhehi
analyzed: ayam pana mahābrahmuno sara sadisena sarena samannāgataḥ mahābrahmuno hi pitta semhehi

original: apalibuddhattā saro visuddho hoti, bhagavatāpi katakammaṃ vatthuṃ sodheti, vatthuno
analyzed: a palibuddha ttā saraḥ visuddhaḥ hoti bhagavatā api kata kammam vatthum sodheti vatthuno

original: suddhattā nābhito paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto saro visuddho aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatāva samuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: suddhattā nābhitas paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto saraḥ visuddhaḥ aṭṭhaṅga samannāgatā ava samuṭṭhāti

original: Karavīko viya bhaṇatīti karavīkabhāṇī, mattakaravīkarutamañjughosoti attho.
analyzed: karavīkaḥ viya bhaṇati iti karavīka bhāṇī matta karavīka ruta mañju ghosaḥ ti attho

original: Tāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānaṃ atikkāmeti. Uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṃ upanento tāreti.
analyzed: tāreti iti a khemanta ṭṭhānam atikkāmeti uttāreti iti khemanta bhūmim upanentaḥ tāreti

original: Nittāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānato nikkhāmento tāreti. Patāretīti pariggahetvā tāreti,
analyzed: nittāreti iti akhemanta ṭṭhānataḥ nikkhāmento tāreti patāreti iti pariggahetvā tāreti

original: hatthena pariggahetvā viya tāretīti attho. Sabbampetaṃ tāraṇuttāraṇādikhemantaṭṭhāne
analyzed: hatthena pariggahetvā viya tāreti iti attho sabbam petam tāraṇa uttāraṇa ādi khemanta ṭṭhāne

original: ṭhapanamevāti āha – “khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpetī”ti. Satteti veneyyasatte. Mahāgahanatāya
analyzed: ṭhapanam eva iti āha khemanta bhūmim sampāpeti iti satta iti veneyya satte mahā gahana tāya

original: mahānatthatāya dunnittariyatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṃ jātikantāraṃ.
analyzed: mahānattha tāya dunnittariya tāya ca jātiyā iva kantāraḥ jāti kantāraḥ tam jāti kantāram

original: Gaṇassa sussūsatīti gaṇo assa vacanaṃ sussūsati suṇāti upalakkheti. Sotaṃ odahatīti
analyzed: gaṇassa sussūsati iti gaṇaḥ assa vacanam sussūsati suṇāti upalakkheti sotam odahati iti

original: sotukāmatāya sotaṃ avadahati patiṭṭhāpeti. Aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapetīti ñātukāmaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: sotu kāma tāya sotam avadahati patiṭṭhāpeti aññā cittam upaṭṭhapeti iti ñātu kāmam cittam

original: paṇidahati. Gaṇaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvāti janasamūhaṃ akosallasambhūtā akusalā uṭṭhāpetvā.
analyzed: paṇidahati gaṇam akusalāḥ vuṭṭhāpetvā ati jana samūham akosalla sambhūtāḥ akusalāḥ uṭṭhāpetvā

original: Kusale patiṭṭhāpetīti kosallasambhūte kusale ṭhapeti. Saṅghīti rāsivasena saṅgho
analyzed: kusale patiṭṭhāpeti iti kosalla sambhūte kusale ṭhapeti saṅghī iti rāsi vasena saṅghaḥ

original: assa atthīti saṅghī. Parisavasena gaṇo assa atthīti gaṇī. Gaṇassa ācariyoti gaṇācariyo.
analyzed: assa atthi iti saṅghī parisa vasena gaṇaḥ assa atthi iti gaṇī gaṇassa ācariyo ti gaṇa ācariyo

original: 191. Dutiyagāthāya sadevakassa lokassa, yathā dissatīti sadevakassa lokassa viya
analyzed: dutiya gāthāya sa devakassa lokassa yathā dissati iti sa devakassa lokassa viya

original: manussānampi dissati. Yathā vā dissatīti tacchato aviparītato dissati. Cakkhumāti
analyzed: manussānam pi dissati yathā vā dissati iti tacchataḥ aviparītataḥ dissati cakkhumā ti

original: uttamacakkhumā. Ekoti pabbajjāsaṅkhātādīhi eko. Ratinti nekkhammaratiādiṃ.
analyzed: uttama cakkhumā ekaḥ ti pabbajjā saṅkhāta ādīhi ekaḥ ratinti nekkhamma rati ādim

original: Patirūpakoti suvaṇṇapatirūpako kuṇḍalo. Mattikākuṇḍalovāti mattikāya katakuṇḍalo
analyzed: patirūpakaḥ iti suvaṇṇa patirūpakaḥ kuṇḍalaḥ mattikā kuṇḍalo vā ati mattikāya kata kuṇḍalo

original: viya. Lohaḍḍhamāsova suvaṇṇachannoti suvaṇṇena paṭicchanno lohamāsako viya. Parivārachannāti
analyzed: viya lohaḍḍha māsaḥ uva suvaṇṇa channaḥ ti suvaṇṇena paṭicchannaḥ loha māsakaḥ viya parivāra channā ati

original: parivārena chāditā. Anto asuddhāti abbhantarato rāgādīhi aparisuddhā. Bahi sobhamānāti
analyzed: parivārena chāditā antar asuddhā ati abbhantarataḥ rāga ādīhi aparisuddhā bahi sobhamānā iti

original: cīvarādīhi bāhirato sundarā.
analyzed: bāhirataḥ sundarā

original: Akappitairiyāpathā cāti asajjitairiyāpathā. Paṇidhisampannāti paripuṇṇapatthanā.
analyzed: a kappita airiyā pathā ca ati a sajjita airiyā pathā paṇidhi sampannā ati paripuṇṇa patthanā

original: Visuddhasaddoti parisuddhakittisaddo, yathābhūtathutighosoti attho. Gatakittisaddasilokoti
analyzed: visuddha saddo ti parisuddha kitti saddaḥ yathā bhūta thuti ghoso ti atthaḥ gata kitti sadda silokaḥ ti

original: kittisaddañca silokañca gahetvā caraṇasīlo. Kattha visuddhasaddoti ce? “Nāgabhavane
analyzed: kittisaddam ca silokam ca gahetvā caraṇasīlaḥ kattha visuddhasaddo ti ce nāga bhavane

original: ca supaṇṇabhavane cā”tiādinā nayena vitthāretvā vuttaṭṭhāne. Tato ca bhiyyoti tato
analyzed: ca supaṇṇa bhavane ca ati ādinā nayena vitthāretvā vutta ṭṭhāne tato ca tato

original: vuttappakārato ca veneyyavasena atirekataropi dissati.
analyzed: vutta ppakārataḥ ca veneyya vasena atirekataraḥ api dissati

original: Sabbaṃ rāgatamanti sakalaṃ rāgandhakāraṃ. Dosatamādīsupi eseva nayo. Andhakaraṇanti
analyzed: sabbam rāgatamanti sakalam rāga andhakāram dosatama ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ andha karaṇanti

original: paññālokanivāraṇakaraṇaṃ. Acakkhukaraṇanti paññācakkhuno akaraṇaṃ. Aññāṇakaraṇanti
analyzed: paññāloka nivāraṇa karaṇam a cakkhu karaṇanti paññā cakkhuno a karaṇam aññāṇa karaṇanti

original: ñāṇena ajānanakaraṇaṃ. Paññānirodhikanti paññānayananāsakaṃ. Vighātapakkhikanti pīḷākoṭṭhāsikaṃ.
analyzed: ñāṇena a jānana karaṇam paññā nirodhikanti paññā nayana nāsakam vighāta pakkhikanti pīḷā koṭṭhāsikam

original: Anibbānasaṃvattanikanti apaccayaamatanibbānatthāya na saṃvattanikaṃ.
analyzed: a nibbāna saṃvattanikam ti apaccaya amata nibbāna atthāya na saṃvattanikam

original: Sabbaṃ taṃ tena bodhiñāṇena bujjhīti taṃ sakalaṃ tena catumaggañāṇavasena bujjhi.
analyzed: sabbam tam tena bodhi ñāṇena bujjhi iti tam sakalam tena catu magga ñāṇa vasena bujjhi

original: Paṭhamamaggavasena jāni anubujjhi. Dutiyamaggavasena puna aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Tatiyamaggavasena
analyzed: paṭhama magga vasena anubujjhi dutiya magga vasena puna aññāsi paṭivijjhi tatiya magga vasena

original: paṭivedhaṃ pāpuṇi sambujjhi. Catutthamaggavasena nissesapaṭivedhena sammābujjhi.
analyzed: paṭivedham pāpuṇi sambujjhi catuttha magga vasena nissesa paṭivedhena sammābujjhi

original: Adhigacchi phassesi sacchākāsīti etaṃ tayaṃ phalavasena yojetabbaṃ. Paṭhamadutiyavasena
analyzed: adhigacchi phassesi sacchākāsi iti etam tayam phala vasena yojetabbam paṭhama dutiya vasena

original: paṭilabhi. Tatiyavasena ñāṇaphassena phusi. Catutthavasena paccakkhaṃ akāsi. Atha
analyzed: paṭilabhi tatiya vasena ñāṇa phassena phusi catuttha vasena paccakkham akāsi atha

original: vā ekekaphalassa tayopi labbhanti eva.
analyzed: vā ekeka phalassa tayo pi labbhanti eva

original: Nekkhammaratinti pabbajjādīni nissāya uppannaratiṃ. Vivekaratinti kāyavivekādimhi
analyzed: nekkhamma ratim ti pabbajja ādīni nissāya uppanna ratim viveka ratim ti kāya viveka ādimhi

original: uppannaratiṃ. Upasamaratinti kilesavūpasame ratiṃ. Sambodhiratinti maggaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannaratiṃ.
analyzed: uppanna ratim upasama ratim ti kilesa vūpasame ratim sambodhi ratim ti maggam paccavekkhantassa uppanna ratim

original: 192. Tatiyagāthāya bahūnamidha baddhānanti idha bahūnaṃ khattiyādīnaṃ sissānaṃ. Sissā
analyzed: tatiya gāthāya bahūnam idha baddhānam ati idha bahūnam khattiya ādīnam sissānam sissā
