original: saṃsāre agatapubbaṃ disaṃ patthento vuttanayena sakaṃ cittaṃ rakkheyyāti attho. Kā panesā disā nāma –
analyzed: saṃsāre agata pubbam disam patthentaḥ vutta nayena sakam cittam rakkheyya ati attho kā pana esā disā nāma

original: “Mātāpitā disā pubbā, ācariyā dakkhiṇā disā;
analyzed: mātā pitā disā pubbā ācariyāḥ dakkhiṇāḥ disā

original: Puttadārā disā pacchā, mittāmaccā ca uttarā.
analyzed: puttadārā disā pacchā mittāmaccā ca uttarā

original: “Dāsakammakarā heṭṭhā, uddhaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇā;
analyzed: dāsa kamma karāḥ heṭṭhā uddham samaṇa brāhmaṇā

original: Etā disā namasseyya, alamatto kule gihī”ti. –
analyzed: etāḥ disā namasseyya alam attaḥ kule gihi iti

original: Ettha tāva mātāpitādayo “disā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: ettha tāva mātā pitā ādayaḥ disā iti vuttā

original: “Disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo;
analyzed: disā catassaḥ vidisā catassaḥ uddham adhas dasa disāḥ

original: Katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā, yamaddasā supine chabbisāṇa”nti. –
analyzed: katamam disam tiṭṭhati nāga rājā yamaddasā supine

original: Ettha puratthimādibhedā disāva “disā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: ettha puratthima ādi bhedā disā ava disā ti vuttā

original: “Agārino annadapānavatthadā, avhāyikā tampi disaṃ vadanti;
analyzed: agārinaḥ anna da pāna vattha dāḥ a vhāyikā tam pi disam vadanti

original: Esā disā paramā setaketu, yaṃ patvā dukkhī sukhino bhavantī”ti. –
analyzed: esā disā paramā seta ketu yam patvā dukkhī sukhinaḥ bhavanti iti

original: Ettha nibbānaṃ “disa”nti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi tadeva adhippetaṃ. Taṇhakkhayaṃ virāgantiādīhi
analyzed: ettha nibbānam disanti vuttam idha api tat eva adhippetam taṇha kkhayam virāga nti ādīhi

original: dissati apadissati tasmā “disā”ti vuccati. Anamatagge pana saṃsāre kenaci bālaputhujjanena
analyzed: dissati apadissati tasmā disā ti vuccati anamatagge pana saṃsāre kenaci bāla puthujjanena

original: supinenapi agatapubbatāya “agatapubbā disā nāmā”ti vuccati. Taṃ patthayantena kāyagatāsatiyā
analyzed: supinena api a gatapubba tāya a gata pubbā disā nāma ati vuccati tam patthayantena kāya gata asatiyā

original: yogo karaṇīyoti. Vajatotiādīsu ettha magguppādato samīpaṃ vajato. Ṭhitikkhaṇe gacchato.
analyzed: yogo karaṇīyaḥ ti vajato ti ādīsu ettha magga uppādato samīpam vajato ṭhiti kkhaṇe gacchato

original: Phalodayato atikkamato.
analyzed: phala udayataḥ atikkamataḥ

original: Anteti antamhi ṭhite. Panteti vanagahanagambhīre ṭhite. Pariyanteti dūrabhāvena pariyante
analyzed: anta iti antamhi ṭhite pantā iti vana gahana gambhīre ṭhite pariyantā iti dūra bhāvena pariyante

original: ṭhite. Selanteti pabbatānaṃ ante. Vananteti vanaghaṭānaṃ ante. Nadanteti nadīnaṃ
analyzed: ṭhite selantā iti pabbatānam ante vanantā iti vana ghaṭānam ante nadantā iti nadīnam

original: ante. Udakanteti udakānaṃ pariyante. Yattha na kasīyati na vapīyatīti yasmiṃ kasanañca
analyzed: ante udakantā iti udakānam pariyante yattha na kasīyati na vapīyati iti yasmin kasanam ca

original: vapanañca na karīyati. Janantaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhite. Manussānaṃ anupacāreti kasanavapanavasena
analyzed: vapanam ca na karīyati janantam atikkamitvā ṭhite manussānam an upacāreti kasana vapana vasena

original: manussehi anupacaritabbe senāsane.
analyzed: manussehi an upacaritabbe senāsane

original: 196. Sattamagāthāya kyāssa byappathayo assūti kidisāni tassa vacanāni assu.
analyzed: sattama gāthāya assu iti kidisāni tassa vacanāni assu

original: Musāvādaṃ pahāyāti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo
analyzed: musāvādam pahāya ati ettha musā ati visaṃvādana purekkhārassa attha bhañjanakaḥ vacī payogaḥ

original: kāyapayogo vā. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: kāya payogaḥ vā visaṃvādana adhippāyena pana assa para visaṃvādaka kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā

original: cetanā musāvādo. Aparo nayo – musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu, vādoti tassa bhūtato
analyzed: cetanā musāvādaḥ aparaḥ nayaḥ musā ati abhūtam ataccham vatthu vādo ti tassa bhūtataḥ

analyzed: tacchataḥ viññāpanam lakkhaṇato pana atatham vatthum tathatas param viññāpetu kāmassa

original: tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo. So yamatthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appatāya
analyzed: tathā viññatti samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādaḥ saḥ yam attham bhañjati tassa appa tāya

original: appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya
analyzed: appa sāvajjaḥ mahanta tāya mahāsāvajjaḥ api ca gaha ṭṭhānam attanaḥ santakam a dātu kāma tāya

original: “natthī”tiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo, sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo.
analyzed: natthi iti ādi naya ppavattaḥ appasāvajjo sakkhinā hutvā attha bhañjana attham vuttaḥ mahāsāvajjo

original: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ
analyzed: pabbajitānam appakampi telam vā sappim vā labhitvā hasa adhippāyena ajja gāme telam

original: nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā
analyzed: nadī maññe sandati iti pūraṇa kathā nayena pavattaḥ appasāvajjaḥ adiṭṭham yeva pana diṭṭha nti ādinā

original: nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
analyzed: nayena vadantānam mahāsāvajjaḥ

original: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu visaṃvādanacittaṃ tajjo vāyāmo parassa
analyzed: tassa cattāro sambhārāḥ honti atatham vatthu visaṃvādana cittam tad jaḥ vā āyāmaḥ parassa

original: tadatthavijānananti. Eko payogo sāhatthikova. So ca kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā
analyzed: tad attha vijānanam ti ekaḥ payogo sāhatthikaḥ uva saḥ ca kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā

original: vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ
analyzed: vācāya vā para visaṃvādaka kiriyā karaṇe daṭṭhabbo tāya ce kiriyāya paraḥ tam attham

original: jānāti, ayaṃ kiriyasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanākkhaṇeyeva musāvādakammunā bajjhati.
analyzed: jānāti ayam kiriya samuṭṭhāpikā musāvāda kammunā bajjhati

original: Saccaṃ vadatīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti saccasandho, na antarantarā
analyzed: saccam vadati iti sacca vādī saccena saccam sandahati ghaṭa iti iti sacca sandhaḥ na antar antarā

original: musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena
analyzed: musā vadati iti atthaḥ yaḥ hi puriso kadāci musā vadati kadāci saccam tassa musāvādena

original: antarikatāya saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭiyati, tasmā na so saccasandho. Ayaṃ pana na tādiso,
analyzed: antarikatāya saccam saccena na tasmā na saḥ sacca sandho ayam pana na tādiso

original: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
analyzed: musā avatvā saccena saccam sandahatiyā iva ati sacca sandho

original: Thetoti thiro, thirakathoti attho. Eko puggalo haliddirāgo viya thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu
analyzed: theto ti thiraḥ thira kathaḥ ti attho ekaḥ puggalaḥ haliddi rāgaḥ viya thusa rāsimhi

original: viya assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti. Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya
analyzed: viya assa piṭṭhe ṭhapita kumbhaṇḍam iva ca na thira kathaḥ hoti ekaḥ pāsāṇa lekhā viya

original: indakhīlo viya ca thirakatho hoti, asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dvekathā na katheti. Ayaṃ vuccati theto.
analyzed: indakhīlaḥ viya ca thira kathaḥ hoti asinā sīsam chindante pi dvekathā na kathā iti ayam vuccati

original: Paccayikoti pattiyāyitabbo, saddhāyitabbakoti attho. Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko
analyzed: paccayikaḥ ti pattiyāyitabbaḥ saddhāyitabbakaḥ ti attho ekaccaḥ hi puggalaḥ na paccayikaḥ

analyzed: hoti idam kena vuttam asukena ati vutte mā tassa vacanam saddahatha ati vattabbatam

original: āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “yadi tena vuttaṃ,
analyzed: āpajjati ekaḥ paccayikaḥ hoti idam kena vuttam asukena ati vutte yadi tena vuttam

original: idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida”nti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
analyzed: idam eva pamāṇam idāni upaparikkhitabbam na atthi evam eva idam ti vattabba tam āpajjati

original: ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
analyzed: ayam vuccati paccayikaḥ a visaṃvādakaḥ lokassa ati tāya sacca vādi tāya lokam na visaṃvādeti iti attho

original: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāyātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano
analyzed: pisuṇam vācam pahāya ati ādīsu vācāya yassa tam vācam bhāsati tassa hadaye

analyzed: piya bhāvam parassa ca suñña bhāvam karoti sā pisuṇa vācā yāya pana attānam pi param pi

original: pharusaṃ karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā, neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ pharusavācā.
analyzed: pharusam karoti yā vācā sayam pi pharusā na iva kaṇṇa sukhā na hadayaṅgamā ayam pharusa vācā

original: Yena samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo. Tesaṃ mūlabhūtāpi cetanā pisuṇavācādināmameva
analyzed: yena sampham palapati niratthakam so sampha ppalāpaḥ tesam mūla bhūtā api cetanā pisuṇa vācā ādi nāmam eva

original: labhati, sā eva idha adhippetāti.
analyzed: labhati sā eva idha adhippetā ati

analyzed: cetanā pisuṇa vācā sā yassa bhedam karoti tassa appaguṇa tāya appasāvajjā mahā guṇa tāya mahā sāvajjā

original: Tassā cattāro sambhārā honti – bhinditabbo paro, “iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī”ti
analyzed: tassā cattāro sambhārāḥ honti bhinditabbaḥ paraḥ iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissanti iti

original: vāyāmo, tassa tadatthavijānananti.
analyzed: vāyāmaḥ

original: evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā

original: daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
analyzed: daḷhīkammam kattā iti attho

analyzed: aññatra gantum pi na icchati iti samagga nandī

analyzed: vācam bhāsati naḥ itaranti

analyzed: patantam na icchanti ācariya upajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evam vadanti kim ime ahirikā

original: anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne”ti. Atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ icchanti.
analyzed: caranti caranti atha ca āgama adhigama sampattim icchanti

original: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusavācāpi

original: Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho. “Nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
analyzed: na ilā ti elam vuccati dosaḥ na assā elanti na ilā niddosā ati attho na ilaṅgo seta pacchādo ti

original: ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ

original: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī. Pure saṃvaddhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
analyzed: guṇa paripuṇṇa tāya pure bhavāti porī pure porī purassa

original: esātipi porī, nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti, pitimattaṃ
analyzed: porī nagara vāsīnam kathā ati atthaḥ nagara vāsinaḥ hi yutta kathāḥ honti

original: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.

original: Anatthaviññāpikā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā samphappalāpo. So āsevanamandatāya
analyzed: anattha viññāpikā kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā akusala cetanā samphappalāpaḥ saḥ āsevana manda tāya

original: appasāvajjo, āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa dve sambhārā – bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathā
analyzed: appasāvajjaḥ āsevana mahanta tāya mahāsāvajjaḥ tassa dve sambhārā bhārata yuddha sītā haraṇa ādi niratthaka kathā

original: purekkhāratā, tathārūpīkathākathanañca.
analyzed: purekkhāra tā tathārūpī kathā kathanañca

original: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī, vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ

original: tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti bhūtavādī. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthasannissitameva

original: aṭṭhaṅgike magge ca. Lakkhaṇe cāti aniccādilakkhaṇapaṭivedhe ca. Kāraṇe cāti hetumhi

original: ca. Ṭhānāṭhāne cāti ṭhāne ca aṭṭhāne ca, kāraṇākāraṇe cāti attho. Idāni vitthāretvā
analyzed: ca ṭhāna aṭhāne ca ati ṭhāne ca aṭṭhāne ca kāraṇa akāraṇe ca ati atthaḥ idāni vitthāretvā

original: dassetuṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: dassetum sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā iti ādim āha

original: 197. Aṭṭhamagāthāya ekodi nipakoti ekaggacitto paṇḍito.
analyzed: aṭṭhama gāthāya ekodi ekagga citto paṇḍito

original: Jātarūpassa oḷārikampi malaṃ dhamatīti suvaṇṇassa thūlaṃ jallaṃ aggisaṃyogena nīharati.
analyzed: jātarūpassa oḷārikam pi malam dhamati iti suvaṇṇassa thūlam jallam aggi saṃyogena nīharati

original: Sandhamatīti sammā nīharati. Niddhamatīti apunabhavappattikaṃ katvā nīharati. “Jhāpetī”ti
analyzed: sandhamati iti sammā nīharati niddhamati iti apunabhavappattikam katvā nīharati jhāpeti iti

original: keci vadanti. Majjhimakampīti tato sukhumatarampi. Sukhumakampīti atisukhumatarampi.
analyzed: keci vadanti majjhima kampi iti tatas sukhumataram pi sukhuma kampi iti ati sukhumataram pi

original: Evamevāti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. Attano oḷārikepi kilese dhamatīti kāyaduccaritādike
analyzed: evam eva ati opamma sampaṭipādanam attanaḥ oḷārike pi kilese dhamati iti kāya duccarita ādike

original: thūlakilese vīriyātapena nīharati. Majjhimakepi kileseti kāmavitakkādike oḷārikasukhumānaṃ
analyzed: thūla kilese vīriya ātapena nīharati majjhimake pi kilesa iti kāma vitakka ādike oḷārika sukhumānam

original: majjhimakepi. Sukhumakepīti ñātivitakkādike atisaṇhakepi kilese. Sammādiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: majjhimake pi sukhumake pi iti ñāti vitakka ādike ati saṇhake pi kilese sammādiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhiṃ

original: dhamatīti saha vipassanāya maggasampayuttāya sammādiṭṭhiyā viparītasaṅkhātaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: dhamati iti saha vipassanāya magga sampayuttāya sammādiṭṭhiyā viparīta saṅkhātam micchādiṭṭhim

original: nīharati. Sammāsaṅkappādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nīharati sammā saṅkappa ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: 198. Evaṃ āyasmatā sāriputtena tīhi gāthāhi bhagavantaṃ thometvā pañcahi gāthāhi
analyzed: evam āyasmatā sāriputtena tīhi gāthāhi bhagavantam thometvā pañcahi gāthāhi

original: pañcasatānaṃ sissānamatthāya ca senāsanagocarasīlavatādīni pucchito tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ
analyzed: pañca satānam sissānam atthāya ca senāsana gocara sīlavata ādīni pucchitaḥ tam attham pakāsetum

original: “vijigucchamānassā”tiādinā nayena vissajjanamāraddhaṃ. Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāvattho
analyzed: vijigucchamānassa ati ādinā nayena vissajjanam āraddham tattha paṭhama gāthāya

original: – jātiādīhi jigucchamānassa rittāsanaṃ sayanaṃ sevato ve sambodhikāmassa sāriputta
analyzed: jāti ādīhi jigucchamānassa ritta āsanam sayanam sevataḥ ve sambodhi kāmassa sāriputta

original: bhikkhuno yadidaṃ phāsu yo phāsuvihāro yathānudhammaṃ yo ca anudhammo, taṃ te pavakkhāmi
analyzed: bhikkhuno yat idam phāsu yaḥ phāsu vihāro yathānudhammam yo ca anudhammo tam te pavakkhāmi

original: yathā pajānaṃ yathā pajānanto vadeyya, evaṃ vadāmīti. Yaṃ phāsuvihāranti yaṃ sukhavihāraṃ.
analyzed: yathā pajānam yathā pajānantaḥ vadeyye evam vadāmi iti yam yam sukha vihāram

original: Asappāyarūpadassanenāti itthirūpādisamaṇāsappāyarūpadassanena. Taṃ bodhiṃ bujjhitukāmassāti
analyzed: asappāya rūpa dassanena ati itthi rūpa ādi samaṇa asappāya rūpa dassanena tam bodhim bujjhitu kāmassa ati

original: taṃ catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ bodhiṃ bujjhituṃ icchantassa. Anubujjhitukāmassāti anurūpāya
analyzed: tam catu magga ñāṇa saṅkhātam bodhim bujjhitum icchantassa anubujjhitu kāmassa ati anurūpāya

original: paṭipattiyā bujjhitukāmassa. Paṭivijjhitukāmassāti abhimukhe katvā nibbijjhitukāmassa.
analyzed: paṭipattiyāḥ bujjhitu kāmassa paṭivijjhitu kāmassa ati abhimukhe katvā nibbijjhitu kāmassa

original: Sambujjhitukāmassāti pahīnakilese apaccāgamanavasena sammā bujjhituṃ icchantassa.
analyzed: sambujjhitu kāmassa ati pahīna kilese apaccāgamana vasena sammā bujjhitum icchantassa

original: Adhigantukāmassāti pāpuṇitukāmassa. Sacchikātukāmassāti paṭilābhasacchikiriyāya pattukāmassa.
analyzed: adhigantu kāmassa ati pāpuṇitu kāmassa sacchikātu kāmassa ati paṭilābha sacchikiriyāya pattu kāmassa

original: Atha vā bujjhitukāmassāti sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ ñātukāmassa. Anubujjhitukāmassāti sakadāgāmimaggañāṇaṃ
analyzed: atha vā bujjhitu kāmassa ati sotāpatti magga ñāṇam ñātu kāmassa anubujjhitu kāmassa ati sakadāgāmi magga ñāṇam

original: puna ñātukāmassa. Paṭivijjhitukāmassāti anāgāmimaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhavasena ñātukāmassa.
analyzed: puna ñātu kāmassa paṭivijjhitu kāmassa ati anāgāmi magga ñāṇam paṭivedha vasena ñātu kāmassa

original: Sambujjhitukāmassāti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ sammā ñātukāmassa. Adhigantukāmassāti catubbidhampi
analyzed: sambujjhitu kāmassa ati arahatta magga ñāṇam sammā ñātu kāmassa adhigantu kāmassa ati catubbidham pi

original: adhigantukāmassa. Phassitukāmassāti ñāṇaphusanāya phusitukāmassa. Sacchikātukāmassāti
analyzed: adhigantu kāmassa phassitu kāmassa ati ñāṇa phusanāya phusitu kāmassa sacchikātu kāmassa ati

original: paccavekkhaṇāya paccakkhaṃ kattukāmassa.
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇāya paccakkham kattu kāmassa

original: Catunnaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge vipassanāti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ purimakoṭṭhāse uppannaudayabbayādivipassanāñāṇāni.
analyzed: catunnam maggānam pubbabhāge vipassanā ati catunnam ariya maggānam purima koṭṭhāse uppanna odaya bbaya ādi vipassanā ñāṇāni

original: 199. Dutiyagāthāya sapariyantacārīti sīlādīsu catūsu pariyantesu caramāno. Ḍaṃsādhipātānanti
analyzed: dutiya gāthāya sa pariyanta cārī iti sīla ādīsu catūsu pariyantesu caramānaḥ

original: piṅgalamakkhikānañca sesamakkhikānañca. Te hi tato tato adhipatitvā khādanti, tasmā
analyzed: piṅgala makkhikānam ca sesa makkhikānam ca te hi tatas tatas adhipatitvā khādanti tasmai

original: “adhipātā”ti vuccanti. Manussaphassānanti corādiphassānaṃ.
analyzed: adhipātā ti vuccanti manussa phassānam ti cora ādi phassānam

original: Cattāro pariyantāti cattāro mariyādā paricchedā. Antopūtibhāvaṃ paccavekkhamānoti
analyzed: cattāro pariyantā ati cattāro mariyādā paricchedāḥ antopūtibhāvam paccavekkhamāno ti

original: abbhantare kucchitabhāvaṃ sīlavirahitabhāvaṃ olokayamāno. Anto sīlasaṃvarapariyante
analyzed: abbhantare kucchita bhāvam sīla virahita bhāvam olokayamānaḥ antar sīla saṃvara pariyante

original: caratīti sīlasaṃvaraparicchedabbhantare carati vicarati. Mariyādaṃ na bhindatīti
analyzed: carati iti sīla saṃvara pariccheda bbhantare carati vicarati mariyādam na bhindati iti

original: sīlamariyādaṃ sīlaparicchedaṃ na kopeti.
analyzed: sīla mariyādam sīla paricchedam na kopeti

original: Ādittapariyāyaṃ paccavekkhamānoti ādittadesanaṃ olokento. Akkhabbhañjanavaṇapaṭicchādanaputtamaṃsūpamaṃ
analyzed: āditta pariyāyam paccavekkhamāno ti āditta desanam olokento

original: paccavekkhamānoti sākaṭikassa akkhabbhañjanaupamañca, kuṭṭhabyādhino vaṇānaṃ paṭicchādanatelapilotikaupamañca,
analyzed: paccavekkhamānaḥ ti sākaṭikassa akkhabbhañjana opamam ca kuṭṭha byādhinaḥ vaṇānam paṭicchādana tela pilotika opamam ca

original: kantārapaṭipannānaṃ jāyampatikānaṃ puttamaṃsakhādanaupamañca olokento. Bhaddekarattavihāraṃ paccavekkhamānoti –
analyzed: kantāra paṭipannānam jāyampatikānam putta maṃsa khādana opamañcaḥ olokentaḥ bhadda eka ratta vihāram paccavekkhamāno ti

original: “Atītaṃ nānvāgameyya, nappaṭikaṅkhe anāgataṃ;
analyzed: atītam na anvāgameyya na paṭikaṅkhe anāgatam

original: Taṃ ve ‘bhaddekaratto’ti, santo ācikkhate munī”ti. –
analyzed: tam ve bhaddekaratto ti santaḥ ācikkhate munī iti

original: Evaṃ vuttaṃ bhaddekarattavihāraṃ olokento. Tā uppatitvā uppatitvā khādantīti nippatitvā nippatitvā khādanti.
analyzed: evam vuttam bhaddekarattavihāram olokento tāḥ uppatitvā uppatitvā khādanti iti nippatitvā nippatitvā khādanti

original: 200. Tatiyagāthāya paradhammikā nāma sattasahadhammikavajjā sabbepi te bāhirakā. Kusalānuesīti kusaladhamme anvesamāno.
analyzed: tatiya gāthāya paradhammikāḥ nāma satta sahadhammika vajjāḥ sabbe pi te bāhirakā kusala anuesī ti kusala dhamme anvesamānaḥ

original: Satta sahadhammike ṭhapetvāti bhikkhubhikkhunīsikkhamānāsāmaṇerasāmaṇerīupāsakaupāsikāyo vajjetvā. Athāparānipi atthi abhisambhotabbānīti aparānipi madditabbāni atthi saṃvijjanti.
analyzed: satta sahadhammike ṭhapetvā ti bhikkhu bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇera sāmaṇerī upāsaka upāsikāyaḥ vajjetvā atha aparāni api atthi abhisambhotabbāni iti aparāni api madditabbāni atthi saṃvijjanti

original: 201. Catutthagāthāya ātaṅkaphassenāti rogaphassena. Sītaṃ athuṇhanti sītañca uṇhañca.
analyzed: catuttha gāthāya ātaṅka phassena ati roga phassena sītam athuṇhanti sītam ca uṇham ca

original: So tehi phuṭṭho bahudhāti so tehi ātaṅkādīhi anekehi ākārehi phuṭṭho samāno. Anokoti
analyzed: so tehi phuṭṭhaḥ bahudhā ati saḥ tehi ātaṅka ādīhi anekehi ākārehi phuṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ

original: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇādīnaṃ anokāsabhūto. Abbhantaradhātupakopavasena vāti sarīrabbhantare
analyzed: abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa ādīnam anokāsa bhūtaḥ abbhantara dhātu pakopa vasena vāti sarīra abbhantare

original: āpodhātukkhobhavasena vā aññadhātukkhobhavasena vā. Uṇhanti sarīrabbhantare tejodhātukkhobhavasena
analyzed: āpaḥ dhātu khobha vasena vā añña dhātu khobha vasena vā uṇhanti sarīra abbhantare tejaḥ dhātu khobha vasena

original: uṇhaṃ bhavati. Abhisaṅkhārasahagataviññāṇassāti kusalākusalacetanāsampayuttacittassa.
analyzed: uṇham bhavati abhisaṅkhāra sahagata viññāṇassa ati kusala akusala cetanā sampayutta cittassa

original: Okāsaṃ na karotīti avakāsaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na karoti. Avatthitasamādānoti otaritvā gāhako.
analyzed: okāsam na karoti iti avakāsam patiṭṭham na karoti avatthita samādānaḥ ti otaritvā gāhako

original: 202. Evaṃ “bhikkhuno vijigucchato”tiādīhi tīhi gāthāhi puṭṭhamatthaṃ vissajjetvā
analyzed: evam bhikkhunaḥ vijigucchataḥ tiādīhi tīhi gāthāhi puṭṭham attham vissajjetvā

original: idāni “kyāssa byappathayo”tiādinā nayena puṭṭhaṃ vissajjento “theyyaṃ na kāre”tiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni theyyam na kārā iti ādim āha

original: Tattha phasseti phuseyya. Yadāvilattaṃ manaso vijaññāti yaṃ cittassa āvilattaṃ vijāneyya,
analyzed: tattha phasseti phuseyya yat āvilattam manasaḥ vijaññāti yam cittassa āvilattam vijāneyya

original: taṃ sabbaṃ “kaṇhassa pakkho”ti vinodayeyya.
analyzed: tam sabbam kaṇhassa pakkhaḥ iti vinodayeyya

original: Adinnādānaṃ pahāyāti ettha adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ, parasaṃharaṇaṃ, theyyaṃ
analyzed: a dinna ādānam pahāya ati ettha a dinnassa ādānam a dinna ādānam para saṃharaṇam theyyam

original: corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ
analyzed: corikā iti vuttam hoti tattha adinnam ti para pariggahitam yattha paraḥ yathā kāma kāritam

original: āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti; tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino
analyzed: āpajjantaḥ a daṇḍa ārahaḥ an upavajjaḥ ca hoti tasmin para pariggahite para pariggahita saññinaḥ

original: tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Taṃ hīne parassa santake
analyzed: tad ādāyaka aupakkama samuṭṭhāpikā theyya cetanā adinnādānam tam hīne parassa santake

original: appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ. Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya. Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ
analyzed: appa sāvajjam paṇīte mahā sāvajjam kasmā vatthu paṇīta tāya vatthu samatte sati guṇa adhikānam

original: santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa
analyzed: santake vatthusmim mahā sāvajjam tam tam guṇa adhikam upādāya tatas tatas hīna guṇassa

original: santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
analyzed: santake vatthusmim appasāvajjam

original: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, theyyacittaṃ,
analyzed: tassa pañca sambhārāḥ honti para pariggahitam para pariggahita saññitā theyya cittam

original: upakkamo, tena haraṇanti. Pahāyāti imaṃ adinnādānacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā.
analyzed: tena haraṇanti pahāya ati imam adinnādāna cetanā saṅkhātam dussīlyam pajahitvā

original: Paṭiviratoti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova. Dinnameva ādiyatīti
analyzed: paṭivirataḥ ti pahīna kālato paṭṭhāya tatas dussīlyato orataḥ virataḥ uva dinnam eva ādiyati iti

original: dinnādāyī. Cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhatīti dinnapāṭikaṅkhī. Thenetīti theno, na
analyzed: dinna ādāyī cittena api dinnam eva paṭikaṅkhati iti dinna pāṭikaṅkhī thenā iti iti thenaḥ na

original: thenena athenena. Athenattāyeva sucibhūtena. Attanāti attabhāvena, athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ
analyzed: thenena athenena athenattāya iva sucibhūtena attanāti atta bhāvena athenam sucibhūtam

original: attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: atta bhāvam katvā viharati iti vuttam hoti itas param vutta nayam eva

original: Mettāyanavasena metti. Mettākāro mettāyanā. Mettāya ayitassa mettāsamaṅgino cittassa
analyzed: mettāyana vasena metti mettā ākāraḥ mettāyanā mettāya ayitassa mettā samaṅgino cittassa

original: bhāvo mettāyitattaṃ. Anudayatīti anudayā, rakkhatīti attho. Anudayākāro anudayanā.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ mettāyitattam anudayati iti anudayā rakkhati iti atthaḥ anudaya ākāraḥ anudayanā

original: Anudayitassa bhāvo anudayitattaṃ. Hitassa esanavasena hitesitā. Anukampanavasena
analyzed: anudayitassa bhāvaḥ anudayita ttam hitassa esana vasena hita isitāḥ anukampana vasena

original: anukampā. Sabbehipi imehi padehi upacārappanāppattāva mettā vuttā. Vipulenāti ettha
analyzed: anukampā sabbehi pi imehi padehi mettā vuttā vipulena ati ettha

original: pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā. Bhūmivasena pana taṃ mahaggataṃ. Paguṇavasena appamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: pharaṇa vasena vipula tā daṭṭhabbā bhūmi vasena pana tam mahaggatam paguṇa vasena appamāṇam

original: Sattārammaṇavasena ca appamāṇaṃ. Byāpādapaccatthikappahānena averaṃ. Domanassappahānato
analyzed: satta ārammaṇa vasena ca appamāṇam byāpāda paccatthika ppahānena averam domanassa ppahānato

original: abyāpajjaṃ, niddukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: a byāpajjam niddukkham ti vuttam hoti

original: Āvilanti appasannaṃ. Luḷitanti kalalaṃ. Eritanti asanniṭṭhānaṃ. Ghaṭṭitanti ārammaṇena ghaṭṭanamāpāditaṃ. Calitanti kampamānaṃ. Bhantanti vibbhantaṃ. Avūpasantanti anibbutaṃ.
analyzed: āvilanti appasannam luḷitanti kalalam eritanti a sanniṭṭhānam ghaṭṭitanti ārammaṇena ghaṭṭanam āpāditam calitanti kampamānam bhantanti vibbhantam a vūpasantanti anibbutaṃ

original: Yo so māroti evamādīsu mahājanaṃ anatthe niyojetvā māretīti māro. Kaṇhakammattā kaṇho.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ māro ti evamādīsu mahājanam anatthe niyojetvā māreti iti māro kaṇha kammattā kaṇho

original: Kāmāvacarissarattā adhipati. Maraṇaṃ pāpanato antagū. Muñcituṃ appadānaṭṭhena namuci.
analyzed: adhipati maraṇam pāpanataḥ antagū muñcitum appadāna ṭṭhena namuci

original: Mārassa baḷisanti mārabaḷisaṃ. Vaṭṭasannissitaṭṭhena mārassa āmisanti mārāmisaṃ.
analyzed: mārassa baḷisanti māra baḷisam vaṭṭa sannissita ṭṭhena mārassa āmisanti māra āmisam

original: Vasavattanaṭṭhena mārassa visayoti māravisayo. Gocaraṭṭhena mārassa nivāsoti māranivāso.
analyzed: vasa vattana ṭṭhena mārassa visayo ti māra visayaḥ gocara ṭṭhena mārassa nivāso ti māra nivāso

original: Kāmacāraṃ caraṭṭhena mārassa gocaroti māragocaro. Duppamuñcanaṭṭhena mārassa bandhananti
analyzed: kāmacāram cara ṭṭhena mārassa gocaro ti māra gocaraḥ duppamuñcana ṭṭhena mārassa bandhanan ti

original: mārabandhanaṃ. Dukkhuddayoti dukkhabandhano.
analyzed: māra bandhanam dukkhuddayo ti dukkha bandhano

original: 203. Mūlampi tesaṃ palikhañña tiṭṭheti tesaṃ kodhātimānānaṃ yaṃ avijjādikaṃ mūlaṃ,
analyzed: mūlam pi tesam palikhañña tiṭṭha iti tesam kodha atimānānam yam avijjā ādikam mūlam

original: tampi palikhaṇitvā tiṭṭheyya. Addhā bhavanto abhisambhaveyyāti etaṃ piyāpiyaṃ abhibhavanto
analyzed: tam pi palikhaṇitvā tiṭṭheyya addhā bhavantaḥ abhisambhaveyya ati etam piya apiyam abhibhavantaḥ

original: ekaṃseneva abhibhaveyya, na tattha sithilaṃ parakkameyyāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ekaṃsena iva abhibhaveyya na tattha sithilam parakkameyya ati adhippāyaḥ

original: mūlāni honti, tathā atimānassāpi.

original: 204. Paññaṃ purakkhatvāti paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. Kalyāṇapītīti kalyāṇapītiyā samannāgato. Caturo sahetha paridevadhammeti anantaragāthāya vuccamāne paridevanīyadhamme saheyya.

original: Vicayabahuloti parivīmaṃsanabahulo. Pavicayabahuloti visesena vīmaṃsanabahulo. Pekkhāyanabahuloti

original: Abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ. Paṭikkantaṃ nivattanaṃ.

original: Nipajjāyapi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nipad jāyapi e sa iva nayo

original: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitaapalokitāni nāma honti.

analyzed: sabbāni gahitāni eva ati

original: dukkhanti. Ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇenāssa pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati “sampahaṃsati
analyzed: dukkhanti ratanattaya guṇa anussaraṇena assa pasādam janeti ayam vuccati sampahaṃsati

original: kālenā”ti. Kāle cittaṃ samādaheti yasmiṃ samaye saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca
analyzed: kālena ati kāle cittam samādaha iti yasmin samaye saddhā paññānam samādhi vīriyānam ca

original: samabhāvo, tasmiṃ kāle cittaṃ samādaheyya.
analyzed: sama bhāvaḥ tasmin kāle cittam samādaheyya

original: Ajjhupekkhati kālenāti yasmiṃ samaye sammā paṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ
analyzed: ajjhupekkhati kālena ati yasmin samaye sammā paṭipattim āgamma a līnam an uddhatam a nirassādam

original: ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
analyzed: ārammaṇe sama pavattam samatha vīthi paṭipannam cittam hoti tadā assa paggaha niggaha sampahaṃsanesu

original: na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya samappavattesu assesu. Ayaṃ vuccati “ajjhupekkhati
analyzed: na byāpāram āpajjati sārathi viya sama pavattesu assesu ayam vuccati ajjhupekkhati

original: kālenā”ti. So yogī kālakovidoti eso vuttappakāro kammaṭṭhānayoge niyutto paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanasamādahanaajjhupekkhanakālesu
analyzed: kālena ati saḥ yogī kāla kovidaḥ ti eso vutta ppakāro kammaṭṭhāna yoge niyuttaḥ paggaha niggaha sampahaṃsana samādahana ajjhupekkhana kālesu

original: cheko byatto. Kimhi kālamhītiādinā paggahādikālaṃ pucchati.
analyzed: chekaḥ byattaḥ kimhi kālamhi itiādinā paggaha ādi kālam pucchati

original: Idāni paggahādikālaṃ vissajjento “līne cittamhī”tiādimāha. Atisithilavīriyatādīhi
analyzed: idāni paggaha ādi kālam vissajjentaḥ līne cittamhi iti ādim āha ati sithila vīriya tā ādīhi

original: citte līnabhāvaṃ gate dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena paggaho. Uddhatasmiṃ
analyzed: citte līna bhāvam gate dhamma vicaya vīriya pīti sambojjhaṅga samuṭṭhāpanena paggahaḥ uddhatasmin

original: viniggahoti accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhate citte passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena
analyzed: viniggahaḥ ti acca āraddha vīriya tā ādīhi uddhate citte passaddhi samādhi upekkhā sambojjhaṅga samuṭṭhāpanena

original: niggaho. Nirassādagataṃ cittaṃ, sampahaṃseyya tāvadeti paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānaṃ
analyzed: niggahaḥ nirassāda gatam cittam sampahaṃseyya tāvadeti paññā apayoga manda tāya vā upasama sukhānam

original: vigamena vā assādavirahitaṃ gataṃ aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena vā ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena
analyzed: vigamena vā assāda virahitam gatam aṭṭha saṃvega vatthu paccavekkhaṇena vā rata nattaya guṇa anussaraṇena

original: vā tasmiṃ khaṇe cittaṃ sampahaṃseyya.
analyzed: vā tasmin khaṇe cittam sampahaṃseyya

original: Sampahaṭṭhaṃ yadā cittanti yasmiṃ kāle vuttanayeneva sampahaṃsitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Alīnaṃ
analyzed: sampahaṭṭham yadā cittam ti yasmin kāle vutta nayena iva sampahaṃsitam cittam hoti alīnam

original: bhavati nuddhatanti vīriyasamādhīhi saññojitattā līnuddhaccavirahitañca hoti. Samathanimittassāti
analyzed: bhavati vīriya samādhīhi saññojita ttā hoti samatha nimittassa ati

original: samatho ca nimittañca samathanimittaṃ, tassa samathanimittassa. So kāloti yo so līnuddhaccavirahitakālo
analyzed: samathaḥ ca nimittam ca samatha nimittam tassa samatha nimittassa saḥ kālo ti yaḥ saḥ līn uddhacca virahita kālo

original: vutto, so kālo. Ajjhattaṃ ramaye manoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ kasiṇādigocarajjhatte
analyzed: vuttaḥ saḥ kālaḥ ajjhattam ramaye manaḥ ti jhāna sampayuttam cittam kasiṇa ādi gocara ajjhatte

original: toseyya abhiramāpeyya.
analyzed: toseyya abhiramāpeyya

original: Etena mevupāyenāti etena vuttaupāyena eva. Ma-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. Ajjhupekkheyya
analyzed: etena mā iva upāyena ati etena vutta aupāyena eva makāraḥ pada sandhi vasena vuttaḥ ajjhupekkheyya

original: tāvadeti yadā upacārappanāhi taṃ cittaṃ samāhitaṃ, tadā “samāhitaṃ citta”nti jānitvā
analyzed: tāvat eti yadā cittam samāhitam tadā samāhitam cittam ti jānitvā

original: paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāpāraṃ akatvā tasmiṃ khaṇe ajjhupekkhanameva kareyya.
analyzed: paggaha niggaha sampahaṃsanesu byāpāram a katvā tasmin khaṇe ajjhupekkhanam eva kareyya

original: Idāni “kimhi kālamhi paggāho”ti puṭṭhagāthaṃ nigamento “evaṃ kālavidū dhīro”tiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni kimhi kālamhi paggāho ti puṭṭhagātham nigamentaḥ evam kāla vidū dhīra iti ādim āha

original: Kālena kālaṃ cittassa, nimittamupalakkhayeti kālānukālaṃ samādhisampayuttacittassa
analyzed: kālena kālam cittassa nimittam upalakkhayeti kāla anukālam samādhi sampayutta cittassa

original: ārammaṇaṃ sallakkheyya, upaparikkheyyāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva. Evaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam sallakkheyya upaparikkheyya ati attho sesam sabbattha pākaṭam eva evam

original: arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
analyzed: arahatta nikūṭena desanam niṭṭhāpesi iti

original: Saddhammappajjotikāya mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: saddhammappajjotikāya mahā niddesa ṭṭhakathāya

original: Sāriputtasuttaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sāriputta sutta niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Aṭṭhakavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aṭṭhaka vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Saddhammappajjotikā nāma mahāniddesa-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saddhammappajjotikā nāma mahā niddesa aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā
